Name: Helle
Review: Horrifying customer care and service. If you buy a product and something happens with the item, they will not help you to find a solution or provide you with any kind of service. I would never recommend anyone buying anything from this brand. I have never experienced worse service

Name: Justin Cooke
Review: My family and I have bought and worn Canada Goose our entire lives. We did so because of the quality of their product. However, despite their promise that "Every Canada Goose purchase is fully warranted for the lifetime of the product" Canada Goose failed to repair one of my jackets, returning it to me with a broken zip. It is so sad to see a brand lose everything it stood for and a multi-generational customer in exchange for short term shareholder value. What is worse are the stock copy and paste platitudes provided by their customer services team as evident by their reply below.

Name: Nicole
Review: I was so excited to have a Canada Goose coat and after much research purchased a Shelburne Parka. It was very expensive but given the lifetime warranty, I felt this was a coat I would have forever. I only wore this coat in extreme cold weather, maybe 10 times a year. I have had the coat for a little over 5 years and it has small holes along the entire length of the seams of both sleeves, on the cuffs and in other areas of the sleeves. The material is such poor quality that it is literally ripping away from the stitching. I have never had a coat do this before. I thought it wouldn’t be a huge issue because of the lifetime warranty. This is clearly a manufacturing defect. I submitted a warranty claim and was told that they will repair the sleeves with “zigzag stitching that will hardly be noticeable.” When you spend $2000 on a coat, the last thing you want is zigzag stitching down both sleeves. I requested a re-inspection but was told this was the only option. I either live with a coat with tears in the sleeves or have noticeable zigzag stitching all along the sleeves. I am so incredibly disappointed in the customer service. Save your money and buy a product whose company stands behind their work and warranty.

Name: Hayley
Review: Case Number: 00888876I spent £1,000 on a Canada Goose coat, believing it came with a lifetime warranty, only to be told that a minor tear was an “accidental tear” and therefore not covered. What’s even more frustrating is that they won’t offer any repair service—paid or otherwise. Instead, they are simply sending the coat back in the same damaged condition.For a company charging thousands of pounds for their products, it’s shocking that they refuse to provide basic repair options. Customer service has been painfully slow, despite the jacket arriving at their warehouse quickly.This whole experience has been frustrating and completely unacceptable for a so-called premium brand. I won’t be buying from Canada Goose again and certainly won’t be recommending them.

Name: Enzo
Review: Excessively poor quality and terrible customer service.My McMillan Parka had excessive pilling on the cuffs after wearing it less than 10 times. Also numerous stiches started to fail.I sent the Parka to be repaired but according to their "QA Experts" this was judged as normal wear. I could not beleive my eyes when I read the customer service email. A 1200€ jacket in such a terrible state after wearing it less than 10 days. This has never happened to any jacket I ever wore, even extremely cheap ones.Stay away from this brand, the quality is absolutely terrible and the customer service will not take any accountability of it.

Name: Ian Cooper
Review: Absolutely shocking service and product my jumper fell apart after only wearing a few times I will never shop with Canada goose again. Please don’t reply saying our warranty team have conducted an inspection, as you say this to every review , Canada goose is a joke . Moncler kill you stone dead as they listen and don’t just fob you off with poor feable excusesWhat a surprise the expected reply so why ask me to send it back and then tell me it was never covered in the first place . Absolute joke.

Name: Kylie Mccafferty
Review: I am extremely disappointed with Canada Goose’s warranty process and customer service. I sent in **two items** under their **"lifetime warranty"**, both of which had quality issues, including stitching defects and down that wouldn’t hold loft. After weeks of chasing for updates, I was finally told that both items **only needed dry cleaning**, and I was **charged for this**, despite it being presented as a "repair."  This is completely unacceptable for a so-called premium brand. Instead of addressing the **actual quality issues**, Canada Goose **charges customers for dry cleaning and calls it a repair**—no additional fixes, no replacement down, just cleaning. If I had known that the down would **flatten so quickly** and require expensive professional dry cleaning to restore it, I would never have purchased these products.  On top of this, their customer service is **completely unresponsive**—I’ve sent multiple emails and had to **chase every single update**. For the price Canada Goose charges, I expected far better aftercare. **Their "lifetime warranty" is misleading, and their support team does not take customer concerns seriously.**  I will be escalating this matter further. **If you’re considering Canada Goose, be aware that their warranty does not cover what you might expect, and you could be charged for basic maintenance while being left with unresolved quality issues.

Name: Ariana Fitzpatrick
Review: Canada Goose won't accept my return because there is a small snag on the inside of the coat; a snag I didn't cause and must have been there when I received it. When I received the coat I tried it on and it didn't fit so I put it back in the box to make the return. I've been working with Canada Goose to try and get them to understand it must have been damaged before I received it but they are unwilling to listen to me and just keep claiming since it's damaged as there's no way a quick try on could have caused the issue but they won't accept the return, basically just keeping my money and leaving me with a product that I can't wear because it doesn't fit and out over $1,000 (nothing to them but quit a bit to me). What's further frustrating is that you can return damaged items if you notice they are damaged with you receive them, so had i just thoroughly inspected the coat when received instead of just the quick try on, I could have sent it back as damaged and wouldn't be in this mess. However, since I didn't do that, in bring accused of causing damage instead of the mindless drones of Canada Goose customer service actually using their brains of other possibilities (IE. That I received it in that condition). This is my first experience purchasing from Canada Goose and I will never do so again. The customer service team has been so rude; it's been a nightmare.

Name: Consumer
Review: Warning be careful with online purchases as refund rejected even though item never worn

Name: Leona Ribeiro
Review: I bought the Canada Goose Paradigm Expedition Parka Black Label for €2,000, expecting top-tier warmth and wind resistance, as advertised for temperatures as low as -30°C. Instead, I can feel the wind at just 10°C. The jacket is supposed to be wind-resistant, yet air cuts right through it.Even worse, when I’m in the car and rest my arm on the armrest, I can feel the cold seeping through the sleeve—proof that the so-called 750-fill power down is more air than insulation. The sleeves feel empty, like they’re barely filled with anything substantial.For the price, I expected real protection against the cold, not just a fancy logo and marketing hype. If you’re looking for a truly warm winter coat, look elsewhere—this one is all style, no function.1/5 stars. Not worth the money.

Name: Robert
Review: Bought a new Canada goose Crofton jacket from third party online it’s 100% authentic in late December 2024, worn jacket for less than a month.Discovered the large stitching around the arctic disk is loose, not tightly embroidered.Got in touch with Canada goose customer service, received instructions to send my jacket to Scottish mountain gear for inspection, CG ask me to send photos of all the labels inside the jacket for genuine or  counterfeits product. Passed with flying colours.Weeks later received reply from CG to say the stitching is within tolerance, I replied to say how on earth did this jacket passed quality control and workmanship on a luxury brand.We been battling for a month, CG kept apologising for my disappointment with their customer service, CG don’t explain why or try to resolve their manufacturing defects, CG kept on asking for my return address.Between me and my wife we have two Parka’s  and two salida waterproof coats, I have enclosed zoomed in photos of the arctic disk on the Parka’s for CG to compare the stitching against the crofton jacket.Finally this week a reply from CG saying the arctic disk on the crofton jacket is within tolerance again, CG suggesting I caused the defects and will not take any responsibility on their poor workmanship without any repair or replacement arctic disk and would like to return my jacket.Canada Goose you’re have LOST a valuable customer. The luxury brand that you cannot TRUST !!!!DISAPPOINTED CUSTOMER Your case number is 00859751Robert  UK

Name: RICKY ROMERO
Review: Worst customer service and warranty policies my black jacket turned grey in one wear I called the warranty service and they never mentioned that I was supposed to sign for my repair jacket. But yet they have no problem when you order a new product from them the leave it at the front door. But nooo I have to sign for this damage product it makes no sense. I will never ever order anything from this overpriced company!!!

Name: Ian Tunstall
Review: I bought a Canada goose coat from Harrods in the UKI had to have it repaired once as the cuffs were fraying Now the seems on the arms are splitting and now I’ve been told they are doing nothing about itWe have 8 Canada coats and I will never buy another after such poor service Ian Tunstall 00874830Warranty claim

Name: Rene Gindelberger
Review: A fraudulent transaction happened on a debit card held by one of my customers.  She did not place the order and tried to get someone to help her and couldn't.  So as her financial institution, I got on a call with her and spoke to someone named Jamie (sp?) and she advised me to send information to their website to get my customer assistance - this was the email response:  Hello,Thank you for reaching out to us.Please note that this email address and our webform are no longer monitored as we focus on providing real-time support through our Live Chat messaging channel.For immediate assistance, we encourage you to connect with us via Live Chat, where our team of expert stylists are available and ready to provide assistance with your purchase needs, or resolve your inquiries quickly and efficiently.We appreciate your understanding as we enhance our support to serve you better.Warm regards,The Canada Goose Team THIS IS RIDICULOUS!!YET AGAIN - your company wants to take no responsibility for a fraudulent transaction.  We have filed the dispute - but you could resolve this much faster than the review process if you would put forth a little bit of compassion and research.  Almost $1400 of fraud - and your answer is talk to her bank. I work at her bank. we have done our part - do better?!!!

Name: Daniel Kim
Review: I've always been a bigger fan of Canada Goose than Moncler and own several of their products. I've shopped both online and in-store and have always had good interactions with their team. However, my most recent online purchase was a nightmare due to their policies and customer service.I ordered two jackets in different sizes, intending to keep the one that fit best. When the package arrived, I took both jackets out, tried them on, and within five minutes, I put the one that didn’t fit back into the box, taped it up, and processed the return.A few weeks later, I noticed my refund hadn’t been posted, which was unusual since Canada Goose had always been quick with refunds in the past. When I reached out to their customer service team, I was shocked to learn that the item was being sent back to me. They refused the refund because they claimed the jacket had a hole in it—and since I had selected "sizing" as the reason for my return instead of "damaged," they said I was responsible.First, if I’m spending over $1,000 on an item, the last thing I’m doing is inspecting it for quality control—that's Canada Goose’s job, not mine. Second, why would I intentionally damage a jacket that I planned to return, especially when I was buying two of the same item in different sizes? Lastly, even if I did have bad intentions (which I didn’t), wouldn’t I have claimed the item was "damaged" rather than selecting "sizing" as the reason for return? The jacket was out of the box for five minutes—there’s no way I caused the damage.I love their products, but they just lost a customer. Their policies make no sense, and their customer service team clearly needs better training. Not every case is the same, and they need to use more common sense when handling returns.Warning: If you're buying online, inspect your product immediately—even if you're just trying it on—because if you return it and they claim it’s damaged, you’ll be stuck footing the bill. It’s like walking into a fitting room, trying something on, and then being charged for damage they can’t prove wasn’t already there.Canada Goose, do better. Your policies make no sense.

Name: Darlene Pillar
Review: I just tried a "trade in " with a very expensive parka that we purchased for 1500$ ...we just retired to the okanagan and thought well we won't need this parka anymore...my husband  wore it on his way to work but only ended up wearing it 4 times in northern Canada where there is no sun in the winterOn their website they ask a few questions before you send it to them and because it looked so perfect and was only being worn 4 times we thought their on line quote would stand......BUT.....they don't stand by that till they get it    they re- assess....they took another 50% off of their quote.... because of fade spot on the coat...now I know for sure they are lying because there is no sun where he worked and only wore it 4 times ....when I disagreed with their assessment they said there was nothing I could do that that is that according to themI asked for the coat back and they said because of " their " process they can't return it....WELL I AM THE CUSTOMER!...NOT YOUbut on several requests they just repeat themselves that there's nothing they can do

Name: Jo
Review: Beware to buy off Canada Goose!! I don’t even think Canada Goose are worthy of 1 star. Couldn’t give zero.I purchased a Chelsea Parka which was a bit tight across chest returned it to them on 17th Feb it was sent back to me on 21st Feb no documents in box- phone line not working asked online chat said it didn’t meet the return criteria! Further 2 more weeks of online chat conversations to try to resolve this as the coat was tried on twice!! Emails get undelivered, the correspondence has been horrendous, I finally get a call yesterday to be told this is there final decision the coat shows signs of wear!! I’ve asked for photographic proof to be told I can’t have them- I was then told it showed dirt in the inside of the coat and on the front panel and by the pockets!! I opened the box while on the phone and the coat has no dirt- this is a scam to make money off you. I’ve bought of them over the years but never again- how are they getting away with it!! She was based in the US who phoned and said I could take it to a shop- can’t return to uk shop now they stopped doing that 2 months ago! I don’t know where to go for help as I know I never wore that coat!Please don’t buy off them and have to go through what I have and others I have read.something needs to be done about them. Thanks for your reply, I can assure you I never wore that coat! I just want people to know what you do and I’m not the only one  who has wrote a review saying the same thing. You can’t even send me the proof!!It was a 5 day turn around from receiving it to getting picked up to return - 2 of which was in the sealed box waiting to be collected!  ‘Thanks for your understanding’ I don’t understand as I know it wasn’t worn . Disgusting!!

Name: Sergio Avanca
Review: I ordered an item to withstand the cold weather in Switzerland, but when I received the item it did quite the opposite and I could not wear it for the rest of the trip.

Name: Mark
Review: My Canada Goose vest zipper has failed.Warranty void due to the stye number tag being missing? Every other tag is inside it.This is absolutely unacceptable for such an expensive product.  Perhaps someone at Canada Goose can reply here.  I actually use this vest for serious outdoor activities, and spent the money on it in the hopes it really has a lifetime warranty.  If this silly requirement truly does "void the warranty," I will choose a different Company to purchase the two down parkas I was considering from Canada Goose.UPDATE:Based on the reply from Canada Goose, I have decided to spend $3500.00 on a competitive product.  This silly policy of “needing all tags” is completely unacceptable.  All the tags with exception of one are in the garment.  If this isn’t enough, it shows Canada Goose is likely using this as an excuse for not taking care of warranty claims.Cheesy.

Name: Anya
Review: Could you provide a way to contact you???? Chat doesn't work, and online form is a scam, you send an email saying you do not reply to online forms. I need to contact you about a potential product defect. How can a company selling such expensive items NOT HAVE A WAY OF CONTACTING THEM??

Name: L Wil
Review: There’s a reason there are so many 1 star reviews!Incredibly poor quality with a horrible warranty service. You are buying over priced crap that will start to fall apart then they won’t fix it.Buyer be ware! Read the reviews!

Name: Lily
Review: Horrible customer service and definitely not worth the price! I bought my mom a jacket as a present. Sadly, it didn’t fit her so I wanted to exchange it to get her a bigger size. I later found out Canada goose doesnt do exchanges; so in order to get a bigger size you have to return it, get the money back, and buy the right size (so I returned it). They DECLINED my return because it showed signs of “wear” but when I received photos as evidence, they don’t clearly show anything. It was never worn because it didn't fit! I was never notified that my return was being sent back to me until I reached out 3 weeks later when I didn’t see the money come back. The jacket could’ve easily been stolen sitting out for three weeks in the mail room. A $1500 jacket mind you. Opening the box they have left me with no original box, no hanger, jacket cover and certification of authenticity so I can’t even sell it…They dont care about you, they care about the money! Especially given the size and reputation of the company, I was expecting better. Never doing business with them again. Edit : So I guess “trying on the jacket I paid for” was too much for Canada Goose. Literally, jacket didnt fit so how could she have worn it? The jacket never left the house. They sent back the jacket in a clear bag with no original anything and also NEVER TOLD ME they were sending it back? Three weeks of no response. They clearly do not care about their customers. I will still fight for the Original Box, Hanger, Jacket Cover and print of authentication.Reading more reviews and it looks like im not the only one with a similar problem.

Name: Daniel Esteban
Review: Worst company ever, gave them my money 10 days ago they know I didn’t received my package and still told me I need to wait another 10 days for a resolution. Honestly Do Not Buy from them.

Name: DD
Review: My patience has really been tested with Canada Goose Generations. I sent in my parka a month ago and I am still waiting on the gift card. In the mean time, the coat I want is sold out and I have been dealing with extreme cold temps in Chicago and wanting to get my jacket but of course, I want to use the gift card that I don't have. I emailed Generations last week and 4 days later was told they are having an issue where they cannot process gift cards and no idea when the problem will be fixed.

Name: James
Review: Do not buy online from CG! Bought a Hybridge Vest - package arrived but inner box was cut and vest had been stolen. Sent multiple pictures but Canada Goose says unless item is returned they will not give a refund. Multiple calls to unhelpful people and no resolution, they just say take it up with your credit card company.Update - CG saw this review and replied, but with the same answer that is incredibly frustrating - "no refund unless the item is returned". How can I return the item if I never received it - it was stolen before the package arrived.

Name: SL
Review: This company is an absolute joke. The worst customer service to ever exist. Such bad practice. Just take a look at their responses to the reviews on this site. Just a ‘not bothered’ attitude overall. Both in store and online

Name: Mouni Guerlain
Review: I recently bought Canada Goose expedition shipping from the official Canada Goose website for over 1800 US dollars, it arrived with perfume on it and some stains on the fabric which means it was worn by someone else I hadn't returned it because I'm always busy my concern was that I had worn it and I was felling cold that mean the quality is not the same at all , it's not worth the cost at all.  Order number CGUS_A02758562 ah yes for next day  shipping I pay like 38 us dollars that was scam they shipped regular i bought on 11 November and was delivered on 19 November they call it next day shipping, ridiculous

Name: Holly
Review: Would give 0 stars if possibleExpensive coat purchased and the quality was so bad after little wear. Faded, holes and discoloured seams. Sent off for warranty repair and they returned it with bad quality repairs and WITHOUT the fur. They lost this but covered it up by saying that it never arrived with the coat. So insinuating that I was lieing. Rude and unprofessional customer service. Will be taking this further*Your reply is insulting, I packaged the coat with the fur, you lost it and lied

Name: tracey
Review: I purchased the Sherborn Parker. This was unfortunately too small I returned the coat for a refund  within  their stated 30 day return period My return was rejected and the coat returned to me Canada goose quality control said there was a snag on the coat and signs of significant wear, not sure how as coat unworn  . The coat had only been tried on once prior to putting this back in the box to return . I requested pictures of the so called damage and wear . On the first photo it looked like a crease in the seam not a snag ? . The 2 other photos showed what looked like lint ?? I have spent hours on the webchat trying to sort this with no success. My emails are no longer being answered and I keep getting automated replies sign posting me to the webchat however no one is willing to discuss this any further with myself . I am down £1325 for a coat that is too small i have been asked by trust pilot to provide more information. on this review but where ? in summary update what information is required i bought a coat tried it on and returned the item as it was too small and the return was rejected as the quality team said the coat showed signs of wear ? i have read many reviews regards canada goose products that have been returned and rejected for similar reasonsi wrote an honest review of my unsatisfactory experience with this company who took no steps to hear my views regards tracey

Name: KIKC
Review: Fantastic service from the Birmingham, UK , branch , exchanged a jacket with no issues at all, even went away and steamed the jacket, excellent customer service . :-)

Name: Sabir Barre
Review: Had a jacket for a few years amazing quality however the down started to disappear. Requested a repair and was pleased it was accepted and sent of my jacket after a few weeks got a notification it was complete. I was so excited. Then DHL said they delivered the parcel I was confused then they provided a picture of someone else with my parcel! Outrageous!!!   This was not my flat and it was not me upon complaining they came to the conclusion it was beyond retrievable. I was then told to contact the sender to arrange a ‘refund or reorder’. Canada goose have now stopped replying to me and I called them now and they are saying they need to speak to dhl. It seems as they are blaming eachother. I am so disappointed I used to be so proud to own and wear a Canada goose. I feel robbed.

Name: HH
Review: Ordered a parka from their official website in the EU region 31.1.2025, got confirmation emails, and also confirmed with the customer service 4 days later (4.2.), that my order is still valid, as it was not shipping. My order was cancelled day after the customer service confirmed it. Canada Goose claims first it was error in stock, after telling them my country's consumer policy do not allow companies just cancel orders due to their incorrect stock balances, Canada Goose now says it's their new policy to not be able to deliver the order to certain regions, which again is not affecting to this order due the consumer policy requiring shops to be visible and open about their agreements and conditions, as I was able to make order normally, got confirmations several times and whatever the policy was, it was not visible to the customer at the time the order was placed.  I have requested them to arrange a parka and shipping (and other stuff you got from ordering directly from canada goose) from their physical official EU stores (those stores have some stock), but they refuse, have asked them to provide me a private link to pay (when to order was cancelled, I was refunded), have asked them if they cover all extra costs if I have to route the item from another place, they refuse.Please resolve this to the customer's advantage, as this was huge error on Canada Goose's end, and does not follow consumer policies and good practicesThere is a case about this, and I have chatted with the EU chat about this but they do not help. Edit 15.2.2025 // Customer service says their decision is final that nothing could not be done (absolutely can be done), customer service will not provide any explanation why they are going against the consumer policies, just keeps saying that the decision is final.

Name: NikA
Review: 1 Star - Terrible Quality and ServiceI am extremely disappointed with my $1000 Canada Goose jacket. After only two wears, the down started coming out like tissues from a box—and it never stopped. I sent it in for warranty repair, hoping for a solution, but they kept my jacket for six weeks during the middle of winter in Chicago, only to return it with no changes at all.This was a complete waste of $1000. I eventually had to buy a new jacket, which I actually enjoy—and it cost me a third of the price! Save your money and avoid the hype; the quality and service from Canada Goose are unacceptable.

Name: Angela
Review: I bought a coat through Canada Goose Generation on 12/31/24.  Received it but it did’t fit.  I turned around and sent it to them to buy it at price of $500.00 when I paid $800.00.  They just sent me an email that the coat did not meet their standard but it was bought on their website.  It’s a SCAM and will file a complain with the BBB and any other website.

Name: Clay
Review: Button popped immediately off the Carlyle pant

Name: Anna Rivers
Review: I bought a jacket on the website and paid for next day delivery. The next day I received a hat with an invoice inside with a different name and address. The orders had obviously gotten mixed up at some point. I called customer services and spoke to an incredibly rude person who told me she was going to open a case. I then heard nothing, no email, no call. I called back again and had the same experience - and repeat. Finally on about my 6th call someone sent me an email asking for the proof that I had a hat and not a jacket. I did this immediately and got no response. So I called again. A long story of multiple calls and two weeks later. The hat is returned and I get zero comms from Canada Goose. When I call (we're on about call 20 by now) I get told that the case is still being investigated and they can't give me any updates. Meanwhile I have no coat and I am out £1300. I have never experienced such a poor level of customer service. DO NOT buy from Canada Goose. If they make a mistake YOU will pay for it. I am increasingly scared I will never get my money back.

Name: jo jo
Review: My coat was torn and looking a bit tired, I sent it off for repairs knowing I would have to pay and was very happy with the price, £60 and it was all done within 2 weeks, very happy customer and now I can enjoy my coat again

Name: Terry Brown
Review: We have just had the pleasure of being served by Grace in the Edinburgh store. Super friendly and a credit to the Canada Goose brand.

Name: Anthony H
Review: I’ve got several Canada Goose jackets which I purchased based on the rating for -5 and up to -20…. I recently wore these in Japan both of them with underlayers and I still felt cold in maximum -5°, And even in 3° in Osaka very disappointed by them. I will be trying Mackage and Fjallraven Stood they are half the price

Name: Jan Fairweather
Review: I recently purchased a Canada Goose Shelburne parka coat, expecting it to provide the warmth and comfort that the brand is known for. According to the instructions, the coat can withstand temperatures as low as -10 degrees Celsius. However, I have been feeling cold while wearing this coat, especially around my back and arms, even when the temperature here in New Jersey is 30 degrees. I have had to wear an extra layer under the coat to alleviate the cold.Given the high price of $1500, I expected the coat to perform better, especially when compared to less expensive coats that provide more warmth. It seems like the company prioritizes profit over customer satisfaction, which is disappointing. I had high expectations for this brand, and I believe it should live up to its promises.

Name: Rita Santos
Review: I genuinely cannot express how utterly disappointed I am with Canada Goose and their customer service. I sent back a nearly new hat due to a defect in the stitching – a thread had come undone, which began to form a hole. However, after a week of waiting for an evaluation, their team concluded that it was "accidental damage" and refused to repair or replace it.The baffling part is that no one from Canada Goose took the time to properly assess the issue or even ask for more details. The hat is essentially brand new, used only a couple of times, and there's no sign of wear or tear—just a single thread that came undone. There were no broken threads, no marks, or any other form of damage to indicate it was mishandled. Yet, their response was to blame it on “accidental damage” without any explanation or transparency in how this was determined.I’ve since discovered that many others have had similar experiences, which just reinforces my belief that Canada Goose is more focused on its image and profits than actually providing a decent level of customer service or standing behind its supposed "lifetime guarantee." Now, I’m left with a faulty hat that’s heading for the bin, and it’s clear that they’ve lost yet another customer in the process.In contrast, other brands like Arc'teryx, Patagonia, North Face, and Moncler consistently prioritise their customers, offering great service and even supporting sustainability initiatives. Patagonia, in particular, even goes so far as to repair older products to reduce waste. This is the kind of ethos I want to support moving forward, and it’s a stark reminder of what Canada Goose is clearly lacking.It’s safe to say I won’t be trusting or supporting Canada Goose again, and I’d encourage others to look for brands that genuinely value their customers and uphold their promises.

Name: Kirsty Collins
Review: My coat had a problem with the seams after 2 years on the arms so Sent my coat in for warranty repair , after reading reviews about warranty repairs I was a little anxious  but within 3 days of me sending it I had emails to update me on receiving the coat then same day inspection and  outcome and said it was going for repair , a few days later and it was done and sent back to me .  I received it today and wow it was all nicely well packaged and all repaired like new even put me new cuffs on and sent me a bag to keep it looking new , Thankyou Canada goose

Name: Susan Lord
Review: $1,000 for a Parka, with the sales pitch of a Lifetime Warranty.Now, the Canada Goose company, forces ‘you to ‘pay to courier your coat to the company, if you have a Warranty Claim!As well, they force you to clean it for over $100.00, whether it’s clean or not!!!They cite health mandates🙄Even if you had it cleaned last winter, you must still have the receipt…or get this, they will charge you for them to clean it, once you pay to mail it to them🥴There is no one to discuss your issue with, ahead of your incurring these expenses…and over cleaning can cause undue breakdown of the materials.The coat prematurely faded substantially, in it’s second winter, of simply wearing it to walk from my parking spot, to the company door! The coat barely even ‘saw the sunlight!!!Yes it was warm; the only salvation.The Canada Goose company couldn’t give any indication whatsoever; of what they could do (if anything) for me!!!!I was supposed to just do without it at the beginning of the impending winter, pay to return, pay to clean… on a song and a prayer they would even do anything for me!Then this year I looked down at my cuffs and was horrified to see they were becoming unraveled…like wtaf😳I didn’t even want to wear it!I created an account (which you are forced to do), and sent them pictures.They have a clause called “normal wear and tear” that may exclude them taking any responsibility, they tell me!!!!!!I ask again, can I at least bring it to your store, or can I drive it to the place I would have to pay to courier it?No.Wow, so I elected to pay my trusted seamstress to put two new cuffs on it for $45.00; hence, only being without the coat for two days. As well, I didn’t have to search for a box and pay for shipping, nor pay for a cleaning it didn’t even require🤬Of note:I have a 25 year old Zellers coat with the same type of cuffs, which has been worn a lot more than my Canada Goose Parka; and it’s cuffs remain immaculate to this day.Anyone contemplating purchasing a Canada Goose product, needs to know their warranty is literally a complete sham.🤥

Name: Hannes
Review: I bought a jacket a few years ago and was very happy with it until I wore a dark cashmere sweater underneath it for the first time and looked like a plucked chicken. I then sent the jacket in the following summer, but according to the customer service department, no excessive loss of downs could be detected and the jacket was sent back to me. Now I tried it again and sent in the jacket via the store so that the employee on site could see the loss of down. He agreed to my opinion and sent in the jacket, but Canada Goose again refused to see the loss of down. A further complaint and an escalation to Quality Assurance in Canada did nothing and the jacket was sent back to me. The staff at the Munich store then stood up for me, but again no result, although they tried every possible way.I would really like to upload a photo but that's not possible so I put the photo in mit profile picture, small but maybe you will be able to see for yourself the excessive loss of down when you zoom in (as you can see, taken by an employee in the Canada Goose store in Munich).Last answer to the employees in the Munich store was, that this kind of down seepage is not excessive after some years. They must have forgotten about the requests the years before and they must have a totally different understanding of a non excessive down seepage as the Munich store employees and me, I guess. 2 things annoy me the most. On the one hand, the poor quality of the jacket at this price and on the other hand, that the promise of a lifetime guarantee is not kept.

Name: NP
Review: Terrible quality, awful customer services, and laughable warranty. Well, they just lost a customer. Do they care? Of course they don't. Probably a good thing because I normally purchase a Canada Goose coat for my wife and I each Christmas, so, am looking forward to seeing what other brands have to offer.My issue - it's simple. My Wascana Rain Jacket developed a hole in the pocket after very light use (we are talking I have worn this jacket probably ten times). So, after raising a warranty claim, and waiting 3 months, I was able to send the jacket for repair under the lifetime warranty. But no, Canada Goose replied with the following:'The jacket has been shrunk, likely due to improper cleaning. Additionally, the abrasion damage to the baker at the lower left pocket has caused delamination.' and...'These concerns fall under negligence...'Amazingly, it has been shrunk! Must be the rain that has done that, because the jacket has never been washed. And it's nice of them to remind me of the fault (i.e. the hole in the pocket). It's obvious that this is a faulty jacket, and the stitching has failed.. So, I have the jacket back, with a wonderful hole in the pocket.If I was interested in wasting more of my time, I would reply to Canada Goose claiming that the jacket was clearly faulty. As a solicitor, I assess the likelihood of claiming this would be approximately 60/40 in my favor. But I do not wish to waste my time as I will earn far more by just driving my businesses, so I am happy to cut my losses and pass on the good news to my friends and family to avoid this brand, as the quality and customer services simply don't match their price tag.Glad I didn't take one of my other coats with me to Iceland when I went last month! Who knows what could have happened....

Name: Jayesh
Review: Customer service is so poor, numbers don’t work, and when you get in touch with someone, they have no idea what you are telling them. Online chat says one thing and secondly returned my items fault and now not will rectify the issue. They have zero care for customer once they have the money off you, very poor business ethics.Since opening this review, Customer service have been in touch via a message on here. not email an email or phone call. They have said the return was outside the 30-day period and been worn with a smell. Before placing the order for the gloves, I contacted them via live chat asking what the returns process and period for Christmas was presents."Don’t worry Jayesh, you have until the end of January as we have extended the period for the festive period"We raised a return on the 8th of Jan, Returned the glove in the box they came in.No communications from Canada Goose, gloves were returned to us this week, not in the box we sent them in, and they are not the gloves we sent back, plus the paperwork inside the box has someone else's details on it referring to a Parker jacket costing £1350. They have commented below to say the gloves had been worn, smell and tags removed well they weren’t and the item you have now sent me back is not the item we sent in. We actually thought paying the big money for a brand we would have a level of customer service, this is the worst I have ever had so far, the lack of quality communications, the lack of understanding of the issue, the carelessness of the process and to cap all this off the manner in which they reply shows they have zero care for their customers.To round this off I do not accept the pathetic excuse below. I want this matter escalated and I will be sure to make sure this review and process is documented across all social media channels as this is sickening behaviour.Sending me the paper work of another order would also been seen as a data leak. I now have the personal details of another customer. I would not be happy if my details had been leaked.

Name: Munir Soizick
Review: I called twice to talk to Jennifer Wong who helped me in the Boston downtown store to get some help with my purchase. The first time, I was told she was on break, the second time she was away. I wrote her an email and was told she would call back when back at work but didn’t. When I called she was again “on break “. Very disappointing.

Name: Chenell E.
Review: I'm Extremely disappointed with the product and the Customer Service of this company. I purchased the Chilliwack Fleece Bomber, the price is 695$. After two days of wearing it, the wool on the bomber is peeling horribly. Which is ridiculous for the price. Apparently, Canada Goose uses recycled wool on this particular bomber and sadly it shows. I've tried 2 times to call customer service, and no one picks up the phone. I will not purchase another item from Canada Goose, and I'm happy that I didn't spend over a 1000$ on a coat. I thought Dior was bad, this company needs to get it together. If your thinking of buying from them, go buy Alo or Varley instead.

Name: Ines
Review: I ordered a Canada Goose jacket and paid via PayPal. My credit card was charged accordingly. BUT in addition I had to pay a foreign transaction fee of around 25€ (as the receiver of the money is located in a non-€-country, e.g. Canada Goose Switzerland). I returned the jacket and just guess… I had to pay again the same fee of around 25€. In a nutshell, I paid 50€ for nothing!!! And Canada Goose refuses to refund the money. Unbelievable! And it took the customer service took over 2 weeks to answer. This online shop is not recommended.

Name: hkymom
Review: Horrible return policy and customer service. No returns if you have worn the product even within the 30 days. If they stand by their products, what is the concern? How do you know if it stands up to the temperature without trying it out? Arms are not insulated enough to meet the temperature standards stated and the zipper is very challenging and forget trying to zip it with gloves. For the cost of these jackets, this is unacceptable.

Name: Atrimtraveller
Review: Wanted to order a men’s Expedition Parka XL in white. I was told it was only available at the London Regent St store. On contacting them they said yes they can take payment online and they would arrange it.  Great.  I’m in Northern Ireland. Well Canada Goose Regent St have told me they only deliver in England because of customs issues and associated costs.Well I have news for Canada Goose.  Wales, Scotland and Northern Ireland are all part of the UK. If you use Royal Mail it’s the same Price anywhere in the UK and no customs at all.So I have told Canada Goose Regent St that I will buy it from them and that I will arrange for Royal Mail to collect it from their store.I never heard back from them again, so I emailed the CEO and offered the same.I never received a reply.So you know how poor Canada Goose customer service is when it’s poor from the top down.I’ve never heard of the CEOs office of any company refuse to reply to a customer and I’ve never heard of a company declining to make a sale for £1750.Appalling service from the CEO down.As you can see from the Canada Goose reply they have zero knowledge of geography and didn’t read my review.Point 1. Northern Ireland, England, Scotland and Wales make up the UK.  Posting from any one of these to any of the other is not international shipping.  Posting from Ireland to Northern Ireland does constitute international shipping so they could not deliver it.  Your London store could.Point 2.  I stated that I would arrange shipping with Royal Mail to collect the item from your London store and deliver it to me.  This is the same price for Northern Ireland, England, Wales and Scotland because they are all in the UK and do not require international shipping. So Canada Goose would only have to take payment and have a parcel ready for collection by Royal Mail.I still have been ghosted by Canada Goose London and the CEOs office.I ended up buying a Stirling Shearling parka from Moose Knuckles.I bought it from their store in England and they shipped it to me in Northern Ireland in 24hrs with no customs fees.DO NOT BUY Canada goose.  They are ignorant, unintelligent and pathetic.BUY MOOSE KNUCKLES.

Name: Sarojini
Review: Terrible customer services. Too long to go on about it, but if the senior manager wants to share their number me, I’ll explain the situation. Trust me it’s laughable. They have my coat as the zipper was faulty. It’s the middle of winter and they have my coat. Send it back pls !!

Name: Ian
Review: Shockingly bad customer service. I ordered a jumper (£450) but was sent an empty box. Literally nothing in in the box, not even a delivery note. I even took a video of me opening it because it was so light that I knew there was a problem before I even opened it. That was three weeks ago. I logged the issue with CG customer service who asked for photos and my video which I sent immediately. Since then I have had nothing back from them despite two follow-ups from me. Calling their customer support staff ambassadors is a bad joke. I wouldn't expect such bad service even for a volume brand, let alone a premium brand such as CG. So I find myself £450 out of pocket and still no response - shockingly bad in every way. Update (17/1/25) Another long and fruitless call with a "brand ambassador". I insisted on a refund but was told that this was not possible as the investigation into what happened to my missing item was ongoing (3 weeks after the delivery of an empty box). I was categorically assured that I would get a call back within 48 hours but, of course, nothing. Staggering!Final update 29 Jan - a month since the initial issue. CG has now refunded my money and has sent me a £100 gift voucher as a goodwill gesture which is appreciated. But, overall I still have a very negative view of my first (and probably last) interaction with them.

Name: Tara Boyko
Review: I thought hood removed, I have had this jacket since last Christmas and have t worn, as I don’t like a non removable hoodWould like to exchange but sure to late

Name: Brittany F
Review: Very disappointed. I have been an avid customer for years. I found a jacket that I adored. I ordered it in a few different sizes and had to return 3 of them for poor quality issues. I was just trying to find a new, unused jacket that fit properly. One arrived with a small hole, one was incredibly dirty, (I created a return before I took it out of the box) and one was discoloured. I kept trying because I like the jacket style. I contacted CG about the quality issues and my disappointment. This complaint is specific to the dirty jacket. I created a return for the jacket that was sent to me used and dirty within an hour of seeing it. I didn’t even take it out of the box when I saw the zipper pull was dark blue with what looked like Jean dye. I had the jacket in my possession a total of 2 hours before taping it back up to send back. I listed in the return comments that the jacket arrived dirty and used and I was disappointed. I returned it the next morning to UPS. I had inquired about the status of my return with CG about ten days later, they said it was holidays, it should be processed shortly, no issues. The next morning I woke up to an email saying my return didn’t meet the return standards and they had shipped it back, the day EARLIER, the same day I spoke to customer service! They said it was worn, dirty and washed! the EXACT reason I returned it to begin with. They had already shipped it back to me the day before they confirmed they were sending it back, via email. I have been calling since last Thursday asking to speak with a supervisor. They told me I’d hear back from a supervisor in 24-48 hours. It’s been 3.5 business days with no call back. I don’t expect them to fix this based on the lack of help I’ve received. The replacement I ordered came in, ironically it also reeks of someone else’s perfume. I’m nervous if I try to return it, they’ll blame me for that, again! Now I’m stuck with two expensive, poor QA jackets that I need to return because they don’t do exchange andI could only return and re-buy. Terrible QA, terrible return experience and unhelpful customer service. Update: I received a call from a very rude supervisor who talked over me with no interest in listening or helping. She immediately told me that they were sticking with their decision to blame me for the dirty jacket. I asked for proof and she said doesn’t have details from the warehouse. I asked to speak with someone else and she talked over me for at least 30 seconds not willing to listen to anything and said she was the highest level of management. I gave them proof in the return details with photo that it was sent to me dirty, but they refused to acknowledge the photo I sent. Unbelievable. They said the decision was final. I have escalated with my credit card company.  This is not ethical business behaviour and they will continue to lose brand loyalty with this kind of customer service. Second update: they have confirmed the jacket is used and dirty in the reply.  No one is disputing that. The problem is that they sent it to me this way. They have picture proof too. Pretty terrible business practice here, and again, no customer service support.

Name: George B
Review: The online team did a fantastic job on getting the correct sizes to fit me and worked above and beyond to make sure I was happy with my choice

Name: Heidi Schonfeldt
Review: I returned a puffer jacket last year that was damaged, it was received by you in 12/27/2024 and you still have not refunded me. I have been phoning you for weeks and no one answers. I try live chat and no one gets back to me. I’ve emailed you and I get an automatic response saying that your emails don’t work anymore and it tells me to use your live Chat. I am so sad and totally disgusted by your service and I am a loyal customer. So shocking and I will never buy your products again. You have stolen my money and kept the returned jacket. That is illegal and disgusting.

Name: Mr Dean Whiskin
Review: I sent my coat and fur for repairs, yes I was not supposed to send the fur but I only read this after I sent off my coat. After the repairs were complete I received my coat back with no fur, Canada goose have said that it was not received with the jacket but I know it was wrapped in the middle of the jacket when I sent it. They have denied receiving it with the jacket and there is nothing I can do about it and they have been very unhelpful. NOTE to all if sending your coat for repairs, DO NOT SEND YOUR FUR as you will never see the fur again. I would not even mind if they said that the fur has been lost.

Name: Anthony
Review: Having owned Canada Goose Silverthorne for approximately 5 years, I have recently had to return it due to a defect in the closer flap near the chest. The popper had pulled away from the material leaving a large hole, out of which the filling was escaping.This was not the first time this has happened because both Bell pockets poppers had came away some time ago, I was not too worried about the pockets as they did not really affect the jacket but once the storm flap button came away also I thought I would return to Canada Goose, after all there is a 'Lifetime Guarantee' !!After several correspondance with Canada Goose aftercare they have declared all 3 buttons have came away due to accidental damage.I'm at a loss how buttons coming away from the material it is supposed to be fixed to, during its intended function, can be classed as accidental damage.Coat was in immaculate condition, safe to say if it is returned without the repair I will never purchase another item from CG and encourage others not to also.EDIT -  YOU HAVE JUST ADMITTED THE COAT CANNOT BE REPAIRED DUE TO THE FAULT SO THEREFORE IT SHOULD BE REPLACED.  THERE WILL NOT BE ANOTHER OPPURTUNITY TO GIVE ME A BETTER SERVICE BECAUSE I WILL NOT PURCHASE ANOTHER CANADA GOOSE ITEM IF THIS IS THE LEVEL OF SERVICE PROVIDED !!!

Name: Reviewer
Review: Ordered 6 days ago. Paid 2 day delivery.  Still haven’t received.tried phoning customer service , no answer . Tried emailing , it bounced back non deliverable . Tried phoning shop, told to go on live chat , sat on it for 40 minutes no response . Money taken from bank but no order not happy . I eventually had to drive 14 miles to pick this order up myself

Name: Jeff
Review: This coat got the best reviews for warmth and it does the job! I would have done five stars but it seems like the more recent costs (in the last ten years) don’t have the same quality and/or the backpack straps that the original have.

Name: Consumer
Review: Great jacket that really keeps you warm in winter. I really like the fit! But: the quality does not justify the price at all. Last year, I had to return a jacket after just 3 months because of a defective zipper. This time, I went for another MacMillan - a newer model. Now, after just 4 weeks, the seams under the arms and at the end of the sleeves are already fading! The cotton cuffs on the sleeves already need to be treated with a lint remover. A jacket that costs 1500 euro… Jesus.

Name: Coralee McKean
Review: Customer service for Canada Goose is terrible. I tried the number listed on the website four times and waited two hours to speak with a customer service agent. My very expensive Canada Goose jacket was a Christmas gift in 2019. The jacket is coming apart under the arms and on the cuffs. It was black when I first got it but it looks more grey now. The colour has faded drastically. The stitching on various sections of the jacket are broken. If I had read these reviews before I asked my husband to buy this coat, I would not have asked for it. Turns out the jacket has had the same problems with coming apart at the seams and fading in colour with many other purchasers listed above. Logistically, I could have had at least 4 brand-new jackets in the six years I was able to use this one. Be aware that this product does not stand the test of time. I recommend that you buy a coat from Sport Check, it will last longer and will be 1/5 of the price. Also, my Canada Goose did not last through 6 Canadian winters. Bad purchase on my part and lesson learned!!!!

Name: Katherine Epstein
Review: I purchased the Canada Goose knit jacket expecting premium quality given the steep price tag, but I was sorely disappointed. After less than a few wears, a noticeable hole appeared in the knit fabric, which is unacceptable for a jacket at this price point. To make matters worse, when I reached out to Canada Goose about the defect, their customer service was unhelpful and unwilling to fix or replace the product. For a brand that markets itself as high-end, this level of quality and service is shocking. Save your money and invest in a brand that stands behind its products.Product belowHyBridge® Knit Jacket (Women’s)

Name: David
Review: Over from the UK, Went along today having had this place on my pad for 6 months, and was asked to wait outside in a queue of 1.whats that all about when the  Shop was visibly empty? I was told I had to wait 10 minutes for a PA having already been waiting 5 minutes after being told 2-5 minutes by the chap prior to them swapping over, who failed to share that was the reason for waiting.  Who needs or wants a PA to shop? If I need assistance I ask!  Left, along with the person who was about to join behind me. Shame, your loss CG, went to North face who appreciate people are not idiots and need an assistant just to be in their shop,  was able to go alone withoutBeing made to feel like a criminal and  picked up 2 new coats and a Gillet without having spoken to any assistants until it came to paying. Perfect! You may have some quality products but the customer experience is shocking!! Better options and experiences further down the road.

Name: Charles Ebel
Review: Package not delivered.  Canada Goose refuses to take responsibility.  Customer service has been nonresponsive.  Emails to CEO have not been acknowledged.Pricey stuff for poor customer service.

Name: Andy
Review: Very frustrating (but always very polite and respectful) requesting support from CG.  I requested 4 zipper pulls for the very poorly-designed side zipper pockets on the CG Wyndham Black Label men parka.  Without zipper pulls, the 4 side zipper pockets are near impossible to find and unzip. When you finally locate one of the zippers, the zipper snags on the jacket material.  Canada Goose only accepted to provide ONE zipper pull although there are FOUR zippers on the side pockets of this 1,500$ jacket.  I had to provide several photos of the zippers, labels, CG logo, CG disc,  etc. and they respond that they can only provide ONE zipper pull.  I don't get it - these are simple cotton zipper pulls probably costing pennies to produce.

Name: Kevin Jagg
Review: Charge premium price for worst service ever .Payed £375 for a hoodie which was to big .   As I was putting it back in the packaging i noticed it had marks on which I ticked that this was the case on the returns note .After around 10 days I got a phone call from Dmitry who started the call my saying he had some bad news for me .   He then told me I was not getting a refund .   When I asked why he told me I had returned a different item which I hadn’t .When I asked to speak a manager about this he told me that that would not be possible .He told that he had not made the decision but it was final .He eventually told me he would get someone to call me within the hour which never happened .24 hours I call customer services who told me they would look into it and call me back .  Guess what it never happened .Later that evening I then spoke to a lady who was helpful and assured me someone would get back to me .   They did .I spoke to another lady who fully understood my frustration and said she felt bad that I had gone through all this through no fault of my own .She called me today as promised and said she had fought my case as she agreed but someone had made a decision not to refund .She said I could not speak to the  decision maker and neither could she as she just communicates through email with whoever it is .Apparently my case is now closed even though I was never told a case had been opened .If this is how Canada Goose treat their customers it’s beyond shameful .I have also tried to contact them through Facebook and LinkedIn but looks like they can’t be bothered to reply .I suggest the directors/management of Canada Goose stand in their own queue and experience what the people who pay their salaries are put through .I have not finished with this yet and will keep this site updated.A very disgruntled customer who is £375 out of pocket and does not even have hoodie to carry out my own tests on it .I am posting this message on CG Facebook page and linked in page as well as sending it as a private message via LinkedIn to as many Canada Goose staff worldwide.Let’s see if anyone at CG cares .

Name: Tania Cyr
Review: I have a Canada Goose jacket. It is not new (7 years old or so), however, I sent it back to Canada Goose November 2021 due to a defect in the stitching in the arm and to inspect the colour fading. They fixed the defect in stitching and changed the cuffs that were tearing (thank you). I had to chase them again for the fading, they said that for the amount of years I have had the jacket (5-years ish) that is was normal!? It looks crappy, it’s Navy blue looks grey, colour is uneven all over, the stitching is now undone under one arm and in both pockets! I am very disappointed and would assume that for the price it would last at least 10 years. It just constantly looks like I am rubbing against a car full of salt :-( My cousin has a Canada Goose Jacket over 10 years old as his main jacket (I have a few more) and it still look new with no fading.

Name: Daniel Lapena
Review: I am not sure where to start. After discovering that there was a 1 cm tear on one of the pockets of my parka, due to simple usage, very little usage, I decide to (instead of taking him to the tailor next door) use the top level warranty repair service from Canada Goose. Just to discover they have the worst customer service experience who will treat you like if you were a rat trying to take advantage of them and their warranty service. After spending nearly $2k on a parka the least you can expect is a top level of customer service, let alone top quality of the garment. But the reality is the opposite. And this is less than 2 years after purchasing it.First the make you upload around 5 photos from every angle of the coat, issue and receipt. 1 week later the “accept” the case asking you to pay to send it and in a very passive aggressive way, to also take it to the dry cleaner (and attach the receipt!) otherwise you will have to pay to have it cleaned by them. Half a month into the process they decide that the tear is “accidental damage” without giving me any more details, asking you to pay to have it returned. How sure you need to be to call a customer a liar over a micro tear that could an accident as well as a product of the quality of the material. Despite my multiple attempts to ask for a repair (not even a replacement at this stage), they would not listen to me or allow me to discuss over the phone. All is done over email with a 2 day delay on every exchange. General phone customer service, was delightfully useless with regards to any escalations. At least they had the “nice” gesture of sending it back free of charge. The rest was attempt after attempt to get the assurance someone would be able to come to their senses and at least repair it, but no. The only thing they could offer was another review at my cost (later at theirs after insisting). Ultimately, 1.5 months into this process I decide to give up and avoid another month of back and forth, missing typer coldest days of winter. The local tailor fixed it in 20 min for £10.After all this, my conclusion here is that the only accident for me was the moment I decided to buy a Canada Goose garment. Fingers crossed I don’t have to ever use their customer service or warranty services ever again.

Name: mark easton
Review: So we spend £870 on two items and delivery turned up with only 1 item in the box,these were for  x2 Christmas presents for our children l, so have been chasing up constantly since the delivery of the one item to now be told, that the box hasn’t been tampered with and it doesn’t look good for you. This response has infuriated me as it looks like we’re waving goodbye to £300. We will never purchase online again of any decent value and will never purchase from Canada Goose again. To many flawes in this delivery system now.

Name: janina
Review: I recently purchased the Aliston Parka. I had worn it for less than a week and noticed loose threads on the sleeve.  I sent it for the Warranty program and received an email that the garment is in excellent condition and they are returning it to me without offering a solution to fix it. I am completely at a loss for words.  This is not the company I thought they were. Will not buy from them again.

Name: Andrew Wilde
Review: If I could give 0 stars I would! This is my first time buying Canada goose & it will certainly be the last! I purchased a coat & it turned up in awful packaged condition & damaged! I have no idea how you could send something like this out? I spent the entire day yesterday trying to sort it & when I finally got hold of customer service today (Emanuel) he was so rude & surprisingly couldn’t put me on to a manager? Still no resolution!Update-got a phone call off a manager who was really helpful in resolving the issue.

Name: tony
Review: Canada goose‘s response to my comment that there should be no sales tax on a goose down coat is simply wrong again. First, Goose down coats and not considered fur Coats, and the New Jersey law they quote was repealed in 2009 for real fur coats. Canada Goose Co.  top management needs to review who’s making these replies and reference these questions to more qualified individuals.

Name: Ali
Review: If I could rate this service zero stars, I would. The customer service experience I received from Canada Goose was utterly disappointing. I submitted my coat for authentication, and despite sending multiple emails with a copy of my receipt, I consistently received responses indicating that they had not received it. I attempted to contact customer service, but my efforts were met with repeated delays and lack of resolution. It is clear that I provided all the necessary information, including the purchase date, but I was unable to obtain a clear status update. Twenty days after submitting my request, I had to reach out again to inquire about the progress, only to be informed that there was no date of purchase, which is clearly inaccurate. Despite my repeated attempts to contact customer service over a period of nearly a month, I have yet to receive a satisfactory response.

Name: Vicky
Review: Purchased a gift last year that was well received so purchased again this year. Delivery was in a reasonable time so can not complain.The item did not look like it did online but if it was for me I actually prefer it. The picture showed it to be quite padded and ridged bu when arrived it was a lot softer. It was quite screwed up but the creases will drop out.The negative was the same as last year the gift box was massive, no exaggeration you could fit 10 items in the box not just the one

Name: C E
Review: I bought my Canada Goose mens knitted Hybridge Jacket for 695.00 plus tax from Neiman Marcus on 10/16/24. As of now the jacket is useless because the zipper teeth do not line up and the zipper gets stuck when trying to take the jacket off and I usually have to pull the jacket over my head to get it off. Customer service although nice started a warranty claim but decided to tell me that usually for warranty service you have to pay for shipping and handling as well as a cleaning fee, but the customer service rep said she was emailing the appropriate department to see if the fees could be waived since the jacket is so new and I needed to wait 24 to 48 hours for approval. Oh thank you for trying to back your own 695.00 jacket that failed within 2 months from the date of purchase as Neiman Marcus wouldn't take it back either. I think the correct response should be like with any other comany of much less value we will send you a return receipt immediately and get this fixed for you as soon as possible. BTW 4 to 6 week wait time to get this fixed. Higher price goods worse service, lesser price goods better service. I have a patigonia 180.00 perfection, and I bet if I have an issue the sporting goods store I bought it from would take it back in a heartbeat and replace it or give me a store credit asap. I hope the jacket gets fixed properly and I can use it.

Name: Andrew
Review: Ordered Crompton Hoodie and the tightening popper was faulty, I also think that their sizing tool is wrong as according to their online chart I was meant to order a size Large, when it arrived it was to big. Have emailed customer service and tried ringing and had no response . Awful customer service

Name: Brenda Kryski
Review: Canada Goose customer service warranty is the worst. Writing emails to warranty are an absolute waste of time and phone calls are equally as bad.  Do not buy Canada Goose if something goes wrong with your apparel good luck. My jacket from day one was not water repellent I would freeze to point of soaking wet saturated jacket in light snow. I  let them know ASAP the first few weeks of owning the Cyprus Hooded Ladies Sage Jacket. You’re paying for a luxury name here there is no high end great quality fabric to keep you warm it’s a fashion jacket here folks. Your better off to save your money and buy different brand.  It was never washed how could the DWR diminish over time it was a brand new jacket. Why are you replying to my comment on my Trust Pilot comment when you never answered my emails? You know I have a health issue and you went ahead and had the jacket heavily sprayed with the toxic DWR before contacting me first. At least if you would have let me know before hand that this is the route you go with warranty I would have declined and accepted the fact  I wasted $1200 on a brand name jacket that’s really a cheaply made jacket. So if your jacket becomes wet and saturated from snow or light rain. Canada Goose just resprays your jacket with  DWR which contains PFAOS and is known to be toxic. Next time I will do my research on the fabric on my next jacket ..

Name: JC
Review: This is an update to my previous review, and it's only gotten worse! It's been 3 months now, and I still have not received my refund, and Canada Goose hasn't processed my return, to the point DHL sent it back to me and I had to send it back to them. So much hassle, worst experience ever! NEVER buy from them.Reference of my other review:Worst experience EVER!!! Do not ever buy Canada GooseIf there was a score to go -100, i would absolutely give Canada Goose that. The returns process for online orders has been the most painful and frustrating experience i’ve had from a supposedly luxury brand. 1. The returns documents didn’t include a commercial invoice, which was such a hassle for DHL pickups as the courier would not accept the return parcel. 2. The return parcel was stuck in customs in the Netherlands, about 1.5 months and counting as I write this. This was because they couldn’t figure out the duties and taxes themselves! 3. Lastly, I still don’t have my $2000 refund after 1.5 months. Every day I have been emailing them and reaching out to Live Chat Support and none of them could be of any help. For a luxury brand, this has been so disappointing, it’s actually ridiculous! NEVER AGAIN am I purchasing from Canada Goose!

Name: Sonal Hussain
Review: Customer services is really quite poor and very slow. It takes months to get anywhere with them, and dozens of chasing emails….

Name: Adam Mian
Review: I paid $800 CAD (with tax) for a very stylish rain jacket. (Kent men's jacket)Loved the styling, as I could use it as an overcoat with a suit, or also as a casual jacket for a night out.From product description:"This slim-fit jacket is designed with our flexible and breathable Tri-Durance SS fabric that blocks strong winds and rain."The first few times I wore it in light rain, I could swear i was getting wet underneath, on my upper back/shoulders - but questioned whether maybe I didn't have the hood up and it was getting in that way.One day in a medium rain I got home to discover I was SOAKED - and had had it tightly zipped and hood on the entire time.  I contacted their customer service, who sent me shipping instructions to send it back to them to 'have the waterproof coating re-applied' - at my cost to ship.They also sent a warning that if the garment wasn't sent cleaned to their standards, a 'cleaning fee' would be imposed.  To be sure of this, I called them and asked for detailed cleaning instructions.  (wash cold, LAY FLAT to dry).  This took a couple extra days to do before I was ready to send.  Sent it to them with a HANDWRITTEN NOTE confirming that I'd cleaned it to their instructions.Some time later, I get a mail from them saying they had received it and were proceeding to inspection.  Immediately after that, another mail advising that it would need to be cleaned, and they would be invoicing me $25-$45, "depending on the care instructions of your product".I messaged them back with an incredulous message, and eventually they graciously advised that they would wave the fee.Fast forward 1 month, and I finally get the jacket back.  As by this time it was summer (and a very dry one at that), I hung the jacket in my closet and didn't think on it again.The very first time I finally went to use the jacket again was Remembrance Day, Nov 11.  I stood outside in a light drizzle for an hour.  When I got home, I was again absolutely soaked in the same area.  I couldn't believe it!I called and they wanted me to open a NEW case #.  I told them this hadn't been resolved from the last one, and that they must not have actually tested the jacket after 'waterproofing' it again.They wanted to repeat the process from before, however this time I insisted they pay for return shipping - and that I wanted them to thoroughly test what is obviously a defective jacket.  Note that this jacket even now looks just as new - and has not been worn more than a dozen times.. gently.Repeated the cleaning process (despite it only being worn the once since return!), and had them put a note on file that I was cleaning it.When they received it this time, I got the following message:"We hope this email finds you well.Our Quality Assurance team conducted a thorough inspection of your garment, and it was determined that the condition reflects normal wear and tear. As such, we are unable to provide repairs for your parka as these types of issues are not covered under our warranty.As a result, no other repairs can be offered at this time. We will now arrange for your garment to be returned it to you at our expense to the following address: "What an absolute failure to stand by their product!Jacket leaked from day 1, has NO visible wear (I plan to take photos and videos) - and just how does one 'wear and tear' a jacket on the upper back and shoulders?!I have never regretted a clothing purchase so much in my life.Premium pricing - for dollar-store quality and no company support of their products.=======Added in response to Canada Goose reply:1) Where in your marketing of this product did you ever state this is a 'wind jacket designed to repel light splashes'?!Here is the retailer I purchased it from:  takeitoutside dot ca/products/mens-kent-jacket Read online description.  This OFFICIAL RETAILER also apparently isn't aware of the new description you give in your reply - as we discussed my intended use at length when comparing with other products they had in store.  They advised that not only was this supposedly completely weatherproof, but was backed by your company's great 'lifetime warranty'.2) Yes, you supposedly re-applied your DWR coating when I sent it in for inspection after it initially wouldn't repel any water from NEW, wore it ONCE in a light rain and it failed terribly!! (anyone interested can look up the weather in Halifax, NS Canada on Nov 11 at 11:00 to see how light the rain was).  How do you try to pawn that off with a comment such as 'diminishes after repeated use and cleaning' when this was literally the first time I wore it after your 're-treatment'?This response from you shows everything potential customers need to see about your business practices.

Name: burgessricky92
Review: Avoid this company at all costs .....look at the other reviews......ordered from them for the first time and had to return  as the item looked as if it had been worn or certainly tried on before which you really don't expect from such an item ......weeks have passed without any email confirmation of my return and despite calling 4 times and never a promised call returned now im told a problem with the collection depot.....still unresolved and every time I call im told a completely different story ....incredibly disappointing....next step is to contact my bank UPDATE .....After Canada goose reply iv spoken directly to DHL who have suggested that the weight was incorrectly input confusing the volumetric weight ....more interestingly they have confirmed that the  delivery  weight was almost identical to the collection weight .....how can a company do this ..... CANADA GOOSE an apology please instead of an arrogant and factually incorrect reply

Name: FOV
Review: I wanted to share a great customer service experience I recently had. The zipper tab on my hybrid came off, and it wasn’t an easy fix. I reached out to CG to see if they could help. They asked me to send it back and mentioned it wasn’t typically something covered under their warranty.However, they offered to fix it at their own cost. After a few weeks, it came back good as new! I’m extremely impressed with their service and the way they handled the situation.

Name: Nathan Oman
Review: HyBridge® Coat absolutely waste of money!!!! £895 for a jacket that is meant to be warm!! 10c in Scotland and I was freezing cold, this jacket says 0 to -15 temperature! Don’t buy Canada goose jackets there liers waste of money!!

Name: K.
Review: They have lied to me numerous timesThey replied to me trying to make themselves look goodA company that charges for thousands for jackets has 3.5 star reviews what does that tell you?I will put this short I bought the jacket at the end of last year and was shocked by the quality of it. Not warm at all as advertised even in the uk weather. Complained immediately and spent hours on the phone, emailed and live chatted speaking to the useless agents made me question if they are AI even that are that useless. They said they will allow me to return it for a refund as it was only worn twice multiple times and said that I didn’t need to get it dry cleaned after checking. Then they completely ignored me and all of my emails leaving me with this jacket for almost a year worth nothing and not even worth wearing either. They replied to my reviews trying to lie and say to make a “warranty claim” they don’t even reply to emails or live chats calls anything they just cut me off once they find out my order number. Which they also wiped the confirmation from my account completely honestly disgusted and in the right mind to burn it. Final warning they won’t reply to me and if you do not do so now I will talk to my contact at the BBC and my other agencies and I will have this published to the news. I can disprove whatever nonsense they reply to this with like “make a claim” or “we have contacted you” they stole the money and don’t care about the customer one bit with the awful qaulity jacket. Seen £100 jackets better and warmer than this. Soon you will be no longer operating and will be paying me if this the way you want to go because I will take this to the full extent of the law. £1400 for this and you can’t even show me basic respect and sort this out. At the very least I offered for you to give me store credit I’ve sat on calls chats all of it emailing for hours on end and nothing. Sort it out this week or you will be facing the consequences NEVER BUY FROM THEMREPLIED AND COMPLETELY IGNORED WHAT I SAIDI CANNOT RETURN IT BECAUSE YOU IGNORE MY EMAILS ON PURCHASE. Take this is an indicator to steer clear from this brand. You will be hearing of this in the news soon

Name: Consumer
Review: They have lied to me numerous timesThey replied to me trying to make themselves look goodA company that charges for thousands for jackets has 3.5 star reviews what does that tell you? I will put this short I bought the jacket at the end of last year and was shocked by the quality of it. Not warm at all as advertised even in the uk weather. Complained immediately and spent hours on the phone, emailed and live chatted speaking to the useless agents made me question if they are AI even that are that useless.
