They said they will allow me to return it for a refund as it was only worn twice multiple times and said that I didn’t need to get it dry cleaned after checking. Then they completely ignored me and all of my emails leaving me with this jacket for almost a year worth nothing and not even worth wearing either. They replied to my reviews trying to lie and say to make a “warranty claim” they don’t even reply to emails or live chats calls anything they just cut me off once they find out my order number. Which they also wiped the confirmation from my account completely honestly disgusted and in the right mind to burn it. Final warning they won’t reply to me and if you do not do so now I will talk to my contact at the BBC and my other agencies and I will have this published to the news.

Name: Gemma
Review: Absolutely shocking unbelievable experience I sent my coat back to be fixed by the Canada goose warranty team and they stole my fur and sent my coat back claiming I never sent it in I'm seeking legal advice as they can’t just steal from people these coats are very expensive even more so for the fur what a unprofessional nasty customer services be aware of you send your coat back they may steal from you too !

Name: Ian hirst
Review: Order number - CGGB_A01458544Shocking customer service !!!I order a £1500 jacket on Thursday and the website says delivery within 3 to 4 working days.It’s now Monday and the item is still shown as yet to be picked up by DHL so I called customer service (or lack of)I spoke to ikran who told me that the item had been picked up by DHL and would be delivered by Friday.Now Friday would be 6 working days since the order which is not good enough so I tried to cancel my order but was told I couldn’t.I questioned this as the jacket is clearly still sat in the shop in London which the tracking clearly shows.All ikran kept saying was “ well if you’d have paid for quick delivery “I don’t want quick delivery I just want you to fulfil the order in accordance with the web site terms.I do however think that to be charged £16 extra for delivery on a luxury item is a total rip off.Ikran lied about the item being picked up by DHL as now an hour after the phone call the item is still shown as not picked up yet.For a luxury brand this has been a horrible experience and I’m now regretting spending £1500 to be treated like an idiot and lied too.I will never shop with them again so buyers beware !!!!

Name: Sirli Maidre
Review: I bought the Chelsea parka 3 years ago, however I only wore it one season as I tend to buy new jacket every year. All the seams were faded after couple months of wear, the zipper , pocket seams and underarm seams as that’s where there was most friction, I took it to my trusted dry cleaners that specialises on Canada goose, because I thought it’s dust or dirt  since I couldn’t ever imagine it’s actually the fabric colour faded . It’s the only jacket that has kept me warm so I wanted to take it to warranty but realised I have lost my online receipt as I was deleting some my old emails so I can’t take it back now, but anyway I read on Reddit that they don’t accept as they claim it’s wear and tear. For a £1300+ jacket that has colour fading after one season of use does not make sense.Utterly rubbish outer material quality, I will never buy from Canada goose ever again. I am better looking Moncler or Goldbergh . Don’t buy from this company, I literally have a black jacket from adidas that I have worn non stop 5 years through spring and autumn, I can’t count how many times I’ve machine washed it and the colour is still same, no fading. Maybe this jacket was max £100 so for this expensive jacket to have such faulty quality it’s bullshit. They’re literally scamming you claiming they do quality apparel

Name: Damen und Herren Grätz
Review: Bad Customer Service and terrible logistics. I had to pick up my parcel somewhere in the industrial area and customer care team didn’t support nor care. If second reply from customer care is referring to gta/ag you know the shop is terrible. Never again

Name: Mourad
Review: The worst company out there. I never received a jacket and not I got any support about the whereabouts my jacket! I am on my way now to start claim with my credit card provider. Don’t buy from these guys.

Name: ashy bros
Review: i wouldn’t bother, they put they prices through the roof. Go back 5 years ago you’d get the chilliwack bomber for £650 now you’re looking at £1350 for the exact same coat. The brand has fallen off. I’d go for a moose knuckle, you can find good sales on them jackets at that. I managed to find one sale for £500 what was rrp £1020.

Name: M Stelling
Review: I expected much more from Canada Goose given their high prices, but my experience with their non-jacket items has been nothing but disappointing. The biggest shocker? They don’t provide any warranty on anything other than jackets! This is a major red flag, especially since I’ve noticed multiple manufacturing flaws in their other products. Unfortunately, if you run into issues with these items, don’t expect any help from their customer service—they won’t lift a finger.Even with jackets, their warranty is riddled with so many clauses that it feels like they’ve set it up to deny service as often as possible. There’s zero flexibility, and they’ll take any opportunity to refuse a repair. For the price, you’d expect durability and good service, but Canada Goose delivers neither. Save your money and avoid the hassle.

Name: EAL
Review: Great fit, great materials and great looks!  I love this hat.  It provides excellent warmth!

Name: Shajador Rahman
Review: Absolutely disgusted by the level of service given by this mob!My jacket was sent to their warranty department to check for fault.After it was checked and it was posted for return back to my.Canada Goose used DHL express to return the item.DHL Driver attempted delivery, after he realised that no one was home, he left the parcel on my door step and left!Yes that is correct, the driver left a large parcel from Canada Goose, on my door step in the middle of the day when no one was in and left.Surprise Surprise, the parcel was stolen.I logged a complaint with Canada Goose and DHL.To be fair to DHL, they got in touch with me straight away and admitted liability.They said  that the driver has been sacked, and they have logged a case and admit liability.Because they contract is with Canada Goose, they will need Canada Goose to log a claim, and once they receive that they will settle it straight away.The problem started with CANADA GOOSE.Despite several emails and calls, Canada Goose, never logged a claim with DHL, (Well I don't think they did as they just ignored me).They probably have logged the case and are keeping the money for themselves.I sent my jacket to Canada Goose in good faith and they lost it. Whats worse is, there is a company who has accepted liability, but Canada Goose have not even bothered to look into this for some reason.They ignore my emails.I even emailed their CEO dani Reiss but he looks down on people like us and does not respond.I am now in the process of instructing a solicitor to bring a case against Canada Goose and seek compensation for my loss and damages.Please avoid this SCUM of a company.I will continue to raise awareness on every social media platform to expose this company for what they are!I notified you of this problem on 28.10.24!!!!

Name: Kevan Hendren
Review: I purchased a Goose Jacket in January this year and after only wearing it a few times the zipper tag came off and was lost. I contacted Canada Goose who informed I had to send in a copy of all receipts as well as photos to verify the make and purchase details etc.The photos were forwarded 3 times to which they asked for the jacket to be sent by post back to Canada Goose.Due tor value of the jacket and that it was only a zipper tag I was unprepared to post the jacket back as they also asked for the jacket to be dry cleaned before posting. There were emails sent back and forward with me not getting much joy this was in April 24 . Having not  heard anything further in October 24 I therefore contacted customer service not warranty claims where I was lucky enough to be dealt with by a lady Named Marianna. Marianna listened to my plight and informed she would arrange for a new tag to be sent by post with no charge. Within 3 days the tag arrived by DSL and is now on my jacket.How refreshing it was to have a positive experience from a livley woman who listened and dealt with my issue promptly and stuck by her word. Thank you very much Marianna if only there weee more people like you in the modern world instead of these robots of people who cannot take any initiative and deal with people like human beings.Excellent service from a top customer service employee and a breath of fresh air . Canada Goose are lucky to have you Marianna .

Name: Gavin Naish
Review: The most upsetting and insane lack of ownership of a problem i have ever encountered. After purchasing a premium brand at high cost the item was too big, so i initiated a return and waited for a refund so i could purchase a smaller size. After 9 days a box arrived back at my house from DHL with a coat stuffed in it damaged by god knows who, this was not in the same condition i sent it back in. Clearly the returns process is corrupt. As there was no indication why this was returned i called the customer service centre only to be told that i had damaged the item and it was returned, missing parts, back to me. I instigated a PayPal claim as a back up, and upon doing this Canada goose lost all interest in dealing with the problem. Continually fobbed off, i sent a 56 page letter of complaint detailing how i sent the coat back versus how it was returned back to me, which has been totally ignored. i was told to send this to another department, so i did, and again no acknowledgement or reply at all. It seems that there is no interest in after care, after-sale support at all. Nor is there any interest in actually resolving the issue or speaking with customers.  By far the worst experience i have ever received to date of any retailer. Currently i am £1800 out of pocket and have nothing to show for it, no product, return delivery charges and still no refund other than many hours of lost work. I have never left a negative review in my life, its only out of pure frustration that you take this action in the hope that someone might reach out to you prior to legal action. Case no  00730344edit after Canada Goose response, you are missing the point - i am 100% calling you out that your returns department are committing fraud and have been reported as such as they damaged the item. Post the video i sent of the coat in immaculate condition. Or the pictures. Is this your policy to accuse customers who purchase products online of damaging goods?, honeslty absolutley pathetic. Why not post the video you took when the coat was taken out of the box at the returns centre? Yet again, no one takes any responsiblity for what is a very serious issue. Fraud has been committed at your returns centre.

Name: Maryann Nelson
Review: Bought a canada goose jacket just noticed there was a catch on the sleeve so I contacted the warranty team sent pictures to be told its not a manufacturing fault and it can't be repaired even though it clearly states on the Web site the jackets can be repaired for a cost ?. So I said I wasn't happy with this so I was told to send the jacket to the Repair Centre for them to now tell me it's accidental and it's not covered as its not a manufacturing fault and THEY DONT DO REPAIRS?  So I wouldn't waste your money as the products are not made with the best materials and there is no life time warranty as the jackets can't be repaired even though it tell you this all over the canada goose website £950 for a jacket that I will not wear anymore may as well put it in the bin.

Name: A
Review: Thank god i came here to read the reviews before i slapped down $1900 on a Canada Goose jacket. Professionals say to layer your jackets and Canada Goose jackets aren’t water proof anyway.

Name: Kurt Klitzke
Review: Best longest lasting sneakers I have ever owned. Better then advertised, good looking and fashionable.

Name: Flavia Guarnieri
Review: Canada Goose life time warranty is a joke! I sent my jacket for repair in February. After tons of follow ups I got an email informing me it had finally been repaired and sent back on August with a tracking number that didn’t work. I immediately reached out again to ask for the correct number and update. After having to reach out many times and always hearing the same answer “we will reach out to you with an answer in 48 hours” - and never did, today I reached out again …finally got someone who admitted they lost it. Surprise: they asked me to wait 48 hours to provide me with a solution! I know they will not reach out (as always). So frustrated! I’ll never buy another jacked from them. They should stop saying they have lifetime warranty  and stop trying to place themselves as high end product. High end products don’t have defect zippers and when they do the warranty actually works. The customer service is a joke! I’m very sad  and disappointed as I really liked the jacket!

Name: AJ
Review: Terrible customer service and appalling service. Do not purchase online as they will scam you and not deliver. I purchased two jackets and received the incorrect order to which Canada goose have turned round and not done anything about.Shocking.

Name: Megi Ulman
Review: The completely new, black jacket, after just 3 weeks lost the colour on the back, where I was wearing a small backpack. According to Canada Goose it is not a quality issue only NORMAL usage!!!! I have lots of jacket for 20% of a Canada Goose prise and wear them with no issues for years!! Never again Canada Goose!!!!!!

Name: Designer jacket hoarder
Review: Got two Canada goose jackets both discolouring and fraying at the seems. Over 2000 pound on jackets doing this with only minimal use is very poor. The materials you use are definitely substandard in relation to the prices charged. What do Canada goose say it’s part of the jacket the discolouration. Just excuses so they don’t have to honour guarantee. Put me off buying another jacket. If you’re wanting to purchase one be warned after a few month of wearing they start fading and look old and scruffy on you.and for record fading after a few months is not accidental damage or wear and tear. A jacket of high this supposed standard shouldn’t fade read your reviews and use better fabric stop using cheap materials.

Name: Marek Moroz
Review: WARNING: Do not trust this company! I returned an item nearly two months ago, and I still haven’t received my refund. Their responses are absurd, as if written by a bot. Each time, they say they will update me about my package, despite this being a return!They treat their customers like fools, avoiding responsibility and failing to issue refunds. This has been an incredibly frustrating experience, and I urge everyone to think twice before dealing with them. Save yourself the headache!

Name: Sasha Rodgers
Review: Worst company I have ever come across.  The zip on my jacket is faulty and every year I had to send it back to them for it to be repaired.  I have sent my coat back 7 times for the same problem.   Customer service is a shambles.  Unbelievable when you pay so much thinking you will get a good quality coat and they don’t make the product correctly.  Avoid this company.  Now they sent me an email saying my warranty has ended.  On website it states it’s a lifetime warranty.  Scammers.

Name: Jake
Review: My partner recently noticed that her 2-year-old Canada Goose Parka (£1050) has its fur falling out at an insane rate.  Literally hair all over the place such that it can’t even be worn anymore(it would make a big mess wherever she goes).I have the male version of this parka, kept in the same storage and worn under identical conditions (and all per the care guidelines / instructions) and mine is of course perfectly okay.One of the things that sold us on these parkas was the "lifetime warranty", so we were shocked when Canada Goose replied that this would not be covered in any way.   Thinking that maybe they misunderstood the extent of the hair fall, she sent another email and, again, they replied that it is considered “wear and tear”, which is absolutely insane.  No one should expect their parka to start falling apart on its own after 2 years - especially at the premium prices that Canada Goose charges.We will never buy another Canada Goose product again.  I wish trust pilot had existed prior to purchasing our parkas, as we are shocked that so many others are having similar problems and that they are not covering this as defective.

Name: Stuart Britton
Review: It was a fairly warm, and lightweight but not a durable, or well made coat. The materials quickly discolour, fray and wear out. I suggest using a more hard-wearing material for construction. If I worked at your research and development department, I would ruffle a few feathers. That's the main weak point of the coat. The cheap material used and the poor quality of construction. Another problem with it is the length and colour choice. I bought a Langford Parker, which was barely long enough. Another six inches would be needed to keep the knees warm. Most offerings forget the lower body as if only the upper parts needed warmth. The lengths are quite silly. How short are you planning on going before customers start complaining? The colours offered are dreadful- mostly black and some depressing greys. You need a good clothes designer who understands colour.

Name: donna marie
Review: I have been going back n forth with Canada Goose to ask them to repair my daughters jacket that was $2K n only 2 yrs old. This is the second time they are saying its wear and tear. So untrue. I sent them pictures still they refuse to help repair the jacketStill you are saying its wear  n tear., after reading the above review A jacket thats 2 yrs old. Just proves your company doesn’t stand by your warranty..I’m not really surprised because I’ve seen others complaints on your horrible customer service..only says to me that your company will fail in due time. Shame on you Canada Goose

Name: Ragul
Review: ORDER NUMBERCGCA_A02096716This order shows it’s delivered but I yet to receive my package and the picture on the ups tracker is some random elevator picture , not my door tag number This is very incompetent from ups and Canada goose and I want my full refund I contacted the Canada goose and they just escalated the issue without filing a claim with ups I also filed a ups claim by my self so please refund me Update : ups said they refunded in full to the shipper . Please look into it

Name: Genevieve Glenn
Review: Would not recommend using Canada Goose Generations from my personal experience. My recommendation would be to use other resale sites. -Your gift card will be less than if you sold your items on any other resale sites.-Your "gift card" will not allow you to use any pay-later services like Affirm, Afterpay or Klarna on the Canada Goose website or Canada Goose Generations website . - Not convenient as it limits your purchasing power.-Generations and Canada Goose are not the same company and lack of cohesiveness and transparency between the two.- When I had questions regarding lack of transparency on the buyback program each company referred me to the others customer service. I have regularly bought Canada Goose coats since 2014. My opinion of the company has changed and I will no longer be a customer because of my experience with the Canada Goose Generations buyback program.

Name: Andrew Blackadar
Review: I struggle with this company’s customer service. Have been a customer for over 25 years. I tried to exchange a jacket that was defective. It’s become a two week ordeal and I still haven’t shipped it back. Instructions are confusing. Multiple shipping labels later.  CSR’s don’t understand what they are suppose to do which has led me to returning a number of items and will never buy from them again. All I wanted was an exchange and have been driven to return a number of items.  Unfortunately I can’t give less than 1 as a review.

Name: Tom Sörensen
Review: I am very disappointed with my shopping experience at Canada Goose. I ordered a jacket in two different sizes and had to return both items as they did not fit. The return was done properly and according to the return policy.To my surprise, the jackets were resent to me without prior notification. When I asked, customer service explained that the jackets were supposedly showing signs of wear. This is simply wrong. I only wore both jackets to try them on and never used them in any other way. They were returned in exactly the same condition in which I received them.Unfortunately, customer service has not yet offered a satisfactory solution. I hope that this misunderstanding will be resolved as soon as possible and that I will be refunded the purchase price.I advise future customers to be careful and prepare for possible problems with returns.Tom Sörensen

Name: Yared Zavala
Review: I bought shoes, and in two months they came off the sole, very bad quality, I sent a report to warranty and they said that it has no warranty, and I paid 517 with tax, first time I bought and last time I do not recommend these shoes, very bad quality, I have photos of the product ,before check the reviews, I do not recommend this cheap quality product shoes .

Name: Henrik
Review: I have been a Canada Goose customer for many years, and have never used their warranty program previously. The fur ruff on my less than 3 year old jacket became damaged, and I discovered that the fur was of questionable quality. Accordingly, I submitted a warranty claim. Canada Goose requested that I shipped the fur ruff, which I did.After receiving the item and also requesting a photo of the inside label of my jacket, Canada Goose informed me that fur ruffs were not covered under the warranty program. Also, that the damage resulted from "improper care". Canada Goose added that it had been decided to discontinue fur usage, and so was unable to offer any repair or replacement of the fur ruff. I objected, finding no such limitation in the warranty program documentation, and not agreeing that the item had been cared for improperly - rather, the damage appeared to be the result of a quality issue. Furthermore, I discovered that Canada Goose was continuing the sale of fur trimmed garments, while informing me that fur related warranty claims were no longer being serviced. Despite my objections, Canada Goose maintained the original decision, and refused to work with me to find a reasonable solution. I am sorry that Canada Goose does not stand behind their products, and I will make sure to avoid Canada Goose products going forward. This review is to share my experience, in the hopes that others can learn from my bad decision to purchase Canada Goose products.

Name: Jia Zhao
Review: I used the trade-in program hoping to get decent credit to invest a new parka. However, my well-maintained parka(current value over 1800 Canadian dollars) only got me 388 credit. I was upset and shocked. over the years, we've purchased so many Canada goose product's and honestly, we like the products we bought. But the trade-in program is such a disappointment and scam in a way as you as a customer has no saying as all! once you sent in your item, you just have to accept whatever credit you get and they won't return the item if you are not happy with the result. of course, they won't return as they can make the profit again reselling it way higher price than they offered you. It's such a scam as their assessment process is not transparent, you only get a email saying, hey this is all you get for your jacket! I complained about how unfair the program is and demanded to send back my parka( agreed to return the gift card)They refused and stopped communicating with me. I am very upset and will make sure my friends will not use the trade-in program. And will stop purchasing any Canada goose product. I refuse to spend money in a company who don't give a damn to their royal customer. updates:  I had few emails exchanged with a senior customer service rep, he basically repeated the same answer in each email and now he completely ignored me and stopped all the communication.

Name: Harry Archard
Review: I have used my jacket for a number of years now and I have always amazed at how warm and sturdy it is. However the cuffs eventually succumbed to wear and tear with holes appearing so I sent it for repairs under warranty. The initial warranty repair service was good as they paid for postage and fixed the issue under warranty. However they tried to charge me for dry cleaning which I had already had done before sending it in and sent proof of this with the jacket, I then had to email Canada goose sending the same proof. It was then agreed that it had been cleaned and an inspection and repair was carried out. When I received the jacket back there was a new tear around the front pocket which was not there when the jacket was sent. I then contacted customer service about damage and they emailed back to say the tear was present during the initial inspection but was irreparable and must have been caused by accidental damage. The tear was never mentioned by the warranty service following the inspection at the time and I was informed of all other defects found but heard and knew nothing about the tear until I received the coat back. The fact that this damage was blamed on me as a way for Canada Goode to save money is unacceptable given the price of the jacket. To summarise the actual jacket is a great quality product but this quality is let down by  poor quality control and even worse customer service.

Name: Bud
Review: the Wyndham parka i bought is not warm at all and i have been complaining for over 7 MONTHS! asking for a refund yet the customer service is atrocious and has wasted hours of my time cutting my chats off and ignoring me because they refuse to take responsibility. For £1400 the quality is disgusting and the jacket is not worth any where near that amount. it’s not as advertised or warm either. The next step will be to take legal action. I complained a week after getting it too but they are violating my consumer rights and dont care about customers. I have owned multiple other canada goose coats that have been warm yet this one is not at all, DO NOT BUY FROM THEMUPDATE TO THE REPLY.I have spent hours with unhelpful and rude customer support agents not helping and cutting of chats THEY DO NOT CARE.I asked for a refund as soon as I got it and was lied to and ignored for 7 months JOKE OF A COMPANY. Charging £1400 for a coat that is pure  will be taking legal action

Name: Judith Harbron
Review: Never again - would prefer to give no stars!  Purchased Chelsea Parka in North Star White - wore for 6 days whilst on holiday.  Upon return jacket had discoloured with a yellow tinge and the cuffs had bobbled.  I had to get parka dry cleaned before returning (cost of £50), returned to Canada Goose who then eventually sent to Portugal to their dry cleaning facility, kept saying that I would have to pay for dry cleaning despite saying fee would be waived.  I explained that I would like it to be replaced with the same parka in black or a refund.  I have just received the jacket back after over 2 and a half months and it still has discolouration and it looks like the cuffs have just been de-bobbled.  Matter now with credit card company.

Name: Zoe Gould
Review: Visited the Canada goose bullring store today greeted by an employee called Jed went in looking to buy a black t-shirt but then Jed picked out another colour which was even better than I originally wanted. He helped with explaining the sizes and how they fit, he offered us drinks as I was trying on the items. Overall top service and very polite man when I visit again I will be asking for Jed.

Name: Ben
Review: I shipped off two jackets to the Canada Goose Generations program. 1 womens expedition 1 mens expedition, both in extremely good condition. I followed the instructions that Canada Goose gave me. I should have received a total CG Generations Gift Card of $2034. After nearly 2 months of no update, I contacted them and they will not give a resolution date or a timeframe of when they will have an update. It has been well over 2 months. The customer service I have received has been disgusting for a so-called "luxury" brand. BUYER BEWARE: Take your time and your money to Moncler instead!At this rate I just want the store credit that is owed to me or even just return the two jackets that I sent in back to me.

Name: Darren
Review: If your buying from cg don't expect your jacket to be repaired if anything goes wrong sent my hybridge lite in for repair it has around 30% of down filling them simply charged me £35 to wash it and returned it the jacket had already been cleaned by a reputable company called grangers who stated the down filling is gone waste of time and money

Name: Can Inat
Review: If I could 0 stars I would. I have spent thousands of pounds with this company. They sent me a jacket which was shocking quality the fur was horrendous. The box was damaged and falling apart. After contacting them they asked me to place an order over the phone so they can fix it. I did so and after receiving my second jacket the quality is even worse than the first one. They now have over £3000 of my money and do not help when calling. Shocking service for the amount of money they charge for their items. Awful customer service! As a loyal customer who has spent thousands of pounds with them they are shocking!

Name: Ned St. Denis
Review: I would not recommend purchasing any hats! I have 3. The black hat has faded very quickly. My red one had the strap break in less than a year (and they refused to fix it as it is an accessory and not eligible) and when I washed my grey one, the brim lost all strength. For $250 it’s better to invest you money elsewhere.

Name: Ab
Review: I am deeply disappointed with the warranty service provided by Canada Goose. I purchased a coat from an authorized retailer, White in Den Haag, and after only two years, the coat began to show significant discoloration. This was unexpected given the high price and reputation of Canada Goose products.In 2021 I sent my coat to Canada Goose for warranty service, hoping they would address the discoloration issues (few spots). Unfortunately, after receiving the coat back, the discoloration had worsened, and the overall condition of the coat had deteriorated. Despite my repeated attempts to resolve the issue, including providing detailed photos and explanations, Canada Goose has consistently denied responsibility, attributing the damage to improper care and environmental factors, rather than acknowledging a potential manufacturing defect or the impact of their own cleaning process.Their customer service has been frustratingly unhelpful, repeatedly directing me to address my concerns with the original retailer, even though the discoloration was clearly caused by their warranty service. Furthermore, they have refused to replace the coat, despite their own policy stating that products with manufacturing defects should be repaired or replaced.I am left with an expensive coat that no longer meets the quality standards I expected from Canada Goose. This experience has been incredibly disappointing, and I would caution others about the effectiveness and reliability of Canada Goose's warranty service. Their lack of accountability and refusal to provide a satisfactory resolution has led me to lose confidence in the brand.Case Number: 00681801Previous Case Number: 00130387

Name: John
Review: Exceptional customer service

Name: Elain Gentner
Review: I am extremely frustrated and angry with Canada Goose’s response to my claim on a defective Muskoka light purple hoody sweatshirt. After purchasing the sweatshirt, I washed it for the first time and noticed significant water stain damage, which I believe resulted from the color dye running.I contacted Canada Goose customer service and followed their instructions to send the item in for inspection. Despite their team conducting a full inspection, which included laundering the garment, they were unable to remove the stains. To my disbelief, they have refused to replace or refund the item and are not accepting any responsibility.  I wore and washed the sweatshirt only once, and there is absolutely no way I could have caused the water stain damage myself. This entire experience has been incredibly disappointing. I expected much better from a brand like Canada Goose, known for their high-quality products and supposedly excellent customer service. This has left me questioning their commitment to customer satisfaction and the quality of their products.

Name: Elena Mytko
Review: I got my parka in navy blue less then a year ago. Jacket already lost its color under arms (low quality of material! I have other jackets- they don't have the same issue). I wrote to customer Servise - ALA LIFE warranty, but they said, its natural for jacket to loose its color!! There literally white dots under arms - blue color is gone. I really wanna attach pictures of the jacket, but I don't see the option here....I love their design and thought quality is alright, but no......Disappointed....

Name: Chanchal Yadav
Review: One of the worst product I ever bought, especially in this price range. The color faded in just one wear. I will never buy anything again from Canada goose. The product quality is not satisfactory.

Name: Edison Kalimashi
Review: On 02/04/24, I ordered a HyBridge Weyburn Hoodie jacket from Canada Goose. Upon its arrival, I was disappointed to find that the stitching was subpar and the jacket was faulty. After expressing my concerns to the company, they offered me a mere £50 voucher as compensation.Despite the initial setback, I decided to give them another chance and reordered the same jacket on 25/04/24. Unfortunately, the second jacket was even worse than the first one. The stitching was extremely poor, and fur was coming out from multiple places. When I reached out to Canada Goose again, they were unhelpful and only offered £100 in compensation, dismissing the quality issues as something that can happen.It is truly disheartening to see a company like Canada Goose, known for selling high-end clothing at a premium price, falling short in terms of both material quality and workmanship. As a consumer, I feel let down by their lack of attention to detail and commitment to customer satisfaction. In light of my experiences, I find it difficult to justify buying their products when better alternatives exist.

Name: RJG
Review: I am so disapppinted to have to write this review in such negative terms about the company. I purchased a blue Rossclare Parka jacket in January 2023. The cost was over £1000.The fabric had faded around the seams of the arms by the end of the year and I sent the coat in for a warranty review in January 2024. Canada Goose acknowledged the coat as faulty. I have been toing and froing with them now for 4 months to receive a replacement coat in blue.Canada Goose refuse to offer me a replacement other than what they have in WARRANTY STOCK which is black or white.The blue coat is available online outside the UK but they will not offer me that option.When I speak to the customer care team they are entirely sympathetic with my position that when I choose to spend £1000 + on a jacket I want a specific colour - blue on this occasion. However when I go in to writing the only response I get is a gift card to the amount of the jacket or a replacement in black or white. I can’t get my money back even if I wanted it. What is so disappointing is the disingenuous way that I am dealt with, CG hold themselves out to be all about customer care. My request is entirely reasonable. CG are able to replace my jacket, like for like, but refuse to do so. What is WARRANTY STOCK? It is a complete con, CG are really letting themselves down with this approach to their customers. I think we can only assume this as a product of private equity ownership when it is all about profits NOT customers. Shame on you Mr Reiss (who sadly does not even have the courtesy to respond to my representations but hides behind the customer service Team).Any experience of others to help me make progress with CG would be gratefully received!UPDATE - as you can see CG have responded. I note with interest the final paragraph:‘we do not take your feedback for granted as it has been duly forwarded to the appropriate department. We do hope that we are able to re-gain your trust in our brand as we look forward to serving you again in the near future.’I have asked CG to address this statement with honesty and integrity. I very much hope to be able to update this post further to advise that they have GENUINELY sought to regain my TRUST IN THEIR BRAND. The solution is simple enough.FURTHER UPDDATE…No surprise CG have come back with the SAME response. So much for their feedback yesterday! Such a shame….empty of any credible intent..

Name: Stella Serginis
Review: Purchased the Canada goose Belcarra jacket, black size medium. Returned it a week ago.. it’s still processing.. still waiting, after several attempts to re contact, the jacket was only tried on and I returned it for being too large. Now they’re saying it’s going to be returned to me because it looks worn and stinks. I am highly offended of this.. myself and home being a pet and smoke free home as well as very clean, sanitary person. I even just asked for it in a smaller size. Now it’s in review again after waiting a week which I feel is a lost cause in itself again. I need a jacket and am almost afraid to purchase again and the fear to needing to return an item. Very horrible to work with.

Name: abdul rauf
Review: I have recently sent my jacket back due to a very tiny hole which is not clear to the naked eye and a stretch type of mark on my sleeve, after two weeks of inspection which sounds crazy I am now told that I have to pay for the repair, which I find absolutely sickening! I am told the mark is a pin sized burn mark, which when clearly looked at is incorrect, there is no way a burn mark can be pin sized without any rough edges and with the sleeve I was told it's also not a warranty issue. I would therefore advise everybody to stay away from this brand as the warranty is just a scam, and used as a bait when buying the product, but when you claim everything will refuted. I will definitely be staying away from this brand in the future and urge others to do the same

Name: Ruth
Review: I purchased a brand new coat and owned it for one month and two days when the stitches started to come undone in one arm. I contacted Canada Goose for the lifetime warranty, after weeks and weeks (6-8 week process) to be told that nothing could be done and they were sending the coat back to me. I do not recommended this company.

Name: Eveach
Review: Canada Goose - I recently purchased the Rossclair Parka Black Label and in 2019 the Berkley Coat. They are both made with excellent quality and their service was exceptional. I received free shipping on both items. They are packed with a wooden hanger and a bag cover to keep your coat in great condition. The box was fancy too. I had a business trip to DC during the winter storms and the Rossclair Parka kept me warm throughout. The hood was perfect in the cold wind and the style was nice. I received so many compliments as I kept warm and comfortable.The Berkley is a lighter weight jacket and is ideal for everyday use. I love the straps that you can carry your jacket as a backpack so it doesn’t take up all your luggage room. I definitely will purchase from Canada Goose again

Name: Daniel
Review: Dear Canada Goose,I deeply appreciate your heartfelt response to my Trustpilot review. It's truly uplifting to receive such genuine appreciation from a company as esteemed as Canada Goose.Your dedication to craftsmanship and attention to detail shines through in every aspect of your products, and I'm delighted that my experience reflects that commitment.With the onset of the winter months, I eagerly anticipate broadening my Canada Goose collection. The Pom Cashmere Beanie Ribbed is next on my list, and I'm certain it will become another cherished addition to my wardrobe, providing both style and comfort during my outdoor pursuits.Once I've acquired the beanie, I'll be sure to provide a review. Given my exceptional experience with the Gilet, I have no doubt that the beanie will surpass my expectations as well.Thank you once again for your exceptional customer care. Your responsiveness and dedication only serve to strengthen my loyalty to Canada Goose.Warm regards,Daniel

Name: Gabrielle Gordon
Review: Customer service is excellent. Product is even better than the pictures and lifetime warranty is reassuring. It's a lot of money but a product that will last. Its unbelievably comfortable and warm without overheating.

Name: Ophelia
Review: I am satisfied with the durability and comfort it brings during winter season. No need to bundle up sries of layers but one parka is enough to bring heat into your body.

Name: Oliver Hillmann
Review: Poor customer service, long processing time, no exchanges made.Your behavior is anything but customer friendly. I ordered the gloves on January 10th, 2024 and, after trying them on once, informed you of the defect on February 20th, 2024. And then you rule out an exchange. As I said, I've bought a few products from Canada Goose so far, but that was the last time.

Name: Anthony O'Mahony
Review: Another great service , quality jacket hassle free check out and fast delivery

Name: carol khawly
Review: The zipper on the jacket stopped working within 3 months and we had a slight tear in the fabric. It was a pain to deal with customer service. We had to file a claim, pay for shipping it back for inspection then told to pay for repairs. They did not however say what we are paying for, they just sent an email that said you need to pay $40 for repair but did not tell me what repair out of the 2 I’m paying for and which was under warranty. Regret the purchase.. save your money and go with another brand. Overrated

Name: Yutian
Review: The experience was great, very fast delivery.

Name: Jake
Review: Excellent material. Fast shipping.

Name: Martha Herron
Review: Experience was very easy and the product is of superior quality.

Name: Brenda
Review: Run large and not sure how to return for smaller size

Name: Lorrie White
Review: cannot get a live person on the phone that can help with product information. so I ordered two jackets in two sizes and sent all 4 back. very disappointed that a luxury line such as Canada Goose didn't have product specialist that you can speak with!

Name: Chiara
Review: Great products and company vision, proudly Canadian.

Name: Ana
Review: Had to make an exchange and went to the store to get something quickly. The staff was very friendly and helped me get the perfect jacket. They even watched my toddler while I shopped!

Name: Happy coat
Review: Great product. Nicely delivered

Name: Donna
Review: The communication was good. The return was made easy. I wish the jackets would fit me. But unless you are nearly flat chested the slimmer model is too tight.

Name: Martin Vienneau
Review: Service, quality and easy to deal with .

Name: Deborah
Review: We had to change the size and it was so easy The coaf is so well made an do wsrm

Name: Abby
Review: Product arrived quickly and beautifully packaged. It is the warmest coat I have ever had. Worth the money! I look forward to having this for many years, probably decades.

Name: Shona T
Review: Love this jacket, heavy and so incredibly warm!

Name: Grace
Review: Sales rep was friendly, helpful, knowledgeable and willing to assist me. She also answered all my questions and was patient.

Name: Llorie
Review: Friendly and helpful staff, Very good product

Name: Nathalie
Review: Delay and coat quality

Name: Natacha Friedman
Review: This Canada Goose jacket is so warm and comfortable I don’t know how I got through the cold winters without it. Couldn’t be happier with my purchase. I highly recommend this Canada 🇨🇦 Goose jacket for all of your winter outing needs.

Name: Sam
Review: My husband loves the coat. Unique color and very warm.

Name: Stephen
Review: Horrible brand took three month to refund me

Name: Larissa
Review: Size Too small

Name: Gaby
Review: Beautiful, soft and great quality.

Name: Calvin McKee
Review: Team was very friendly. Pierre was very informative and patient. I was impressed by the cold room.

Name: Mei Ling
Review: Canada Goose is very convenient. The quality of the items they sell are excellent. The deliveries are very quick and I love the different kinds of styles they offer. I can always count on Canada Goose to keep my relatives and I warm during the harsh conditions of winter. I will definitely be buying from Canada goose again.

Name: Rhys Morgan
Review: Top quality as always Many Thanks Rhys

Name: Anonymous
Review: Amazing quality!

Name: Tanna
Review: The quality of your products sell themselves.

Name: Brian
Review: This my second,  Wore the first one out

Name: Insup Kim
Review: The entire process was quite easy and straight forward. The fact that they off this warranty program is outstanding. I will be a Canada Goose customer for life because of this. Jackets came back swiftly and cost was fair. You have to pay for cleaning if it wasn’t cleaned beforehand but I would let Canada Goose do the cleaning and you pay them as professional cleaning I found to be more expensive. Not everything was covered in warranty so it could get costly my jacket cost 105 to replace the sleeve, 30 to send in and 45 for dry cleaning. Canada Goose pays for the shipping back to you. The cost of a brand new Lodge Hoodie I believe is 845 plus tax so idk 🤷‍♂️. I’m quite happy

Name: Ivan
Review: I purchased online and over the phone to locate the most desired shoes. The Canada Goose associates made it happen.

Name: Anne
Review: Excellent service online , quick and easy

Name: Charley
Review: Excellent service to accompany quality product. Perhaps over priced but I keep purchasing additional CG anyway.

Name: Anna
Review: Everything from the shopping experience to the shipping speed, unboxing and of course the quality of the product reflects on the price point and is absolutely worth it. I am a believer in the CG name and experience and have since acquired several jackets for different weather types which have carried me through the South Dakota winter. In love with my winter gear!

Name: Gilbert
Review: Everything was quickly processed and easy

Name: Daylyn
Review: Great quality. Fast transaction.

Name: Cesar
Review: The company refused to answer any phone calls and customer service was incompetent and continued to give me a run around on what happened to my order

Name: Buddaman11
Review: Loved everything about the vest I ordered! quality, fit, even the cool box it came in.

Name: Rob Muise
Review: Stop with all the review emails; I purchased this in December 2023, and it's March.

Name: customer
Review: Great but this winter has been raining 🌧 raining 🌧 raining 🌧 so have not been wearing Canadagoose much 🌎

Name: Brett
Review: Poor selection of sizes, no option to back order the size needed.

Name: Jade
Review: Beautiful coat. Well crafted and stands up to the frigid Michigan temperatures. I love how large the hood is and the pockets as well. When I have it on in the car I have to take it off. I love thatyou can secure it to your waist from the inside.

Name: Ein dankbarer Käufer
Review: Very good products and very good quality. Keep up the quality. Please do not go crazy, wild or avantgarde with your fashion style, otherwise you will lose me as customer. I bought two parkas for my wife in the store in Zürich before it closed. That was around January 2024. Please open again a store in Zürich.

Name: MD Mijanur Rahman
Review: Canadagoose jacket is the best quality jacket ever.

Name: Ryan Burns
Review: First-class experience. Great selection. Easy to order. Consistent updates on order and shipping status. And their packaging upon delivery is just gorgeous.

Name: Keri
Review: The men’s jacket is very nice except that the zipper is in the same side that the Women’s jackets are on and not on the traditional side that US Men’s jackets are on, so my husband does not like it for that reason.

Name: Glen
Review: Great product and good service in the store in Vancouver Love the black label

Name: Dianne
Review: Great customer service, excellent quality!

Name: Micheline
Review: Products are high quality, are delivered promptly, well packaged, and are in stock most times. Like styling. Have many Canada Goose products and so do family members (son and daughter) and they are very satisfied as well. Would be great if you could make more clothing without the logo. It’s the quality we love not the logo. Don’t buy often because of the logo - like sweaters and even jackets.

Name: jon
Review: Won’t ship to California

Name: yary
Review: The product is great quality, and it keeps me warm, but the belt is a problem it keeps bending inside the holes and I have to keep fixing it.  I feel for the price maybe use a different type if fabric for the belt.

Name: Simran
Review: Style and fit

Name: Jodie
Review: The sweater I purchased as a Christmas gift for my husband tore apart at the seams during the first wear. You charged me $50.00 shipping to send it to your warehouse for repairs!!! I also purchased a vest and needed to exchange it for a different size and I had to return it and repurchase another one, this also cost me extra shipping. I will not be purchasing anything else from Canada Goose. Terrible costumer service, especially for the price paid!!!

Name: Dwight
Review: Coat is great, warm enough to wear by itself. Not too bulky, can layer it with another piece, ie sweater or hoodie. Would recommend going a size down as it does run big.

Name: Joseph
Review: I’m very satisfied with customer service as well as the online chat. I recently did a trade-in online and went better than expected. Don’t remember the date and time of this transaction.

Name: Customer
Review: Fast delivery, well packed, top quality product.

Name: MS Karen Smith
Review: Great coat grandson love it, great customer experience 👍

Name: Alisa
Review: Excellent website. Fast turn around from order to shipping. Friendly and courteous. You stand  behind your fantastic well made high quality products and have a great delivery service. Thank you Canada Goose.

Name: Max
Review: Very good service and experience with the product and the brand canada goose

Name: TISHA WILLIAMS
Review: Can’t at are made of good quality material. Very warm and stylish. Never go wrong with purchasing a Canada Goose. Will recommend

Name: Debbie
Review: After much deliberation, I finally succumbed to the allure of the Canada Goose jacket, and I can confidently say, it’s been a game-changer. As someone battling Raynaud’s and cold-induced urticaria, finding the perfect balance of style, warmth, and protection seemed like an insurmountable task. However, the moment I slipped into this jacket, I was smitten.First and foremost, the fit is impeccable. Too often, winter coats sacrifice style for functionality, but not this one. It hugs my body in all the right places, accentuating my figure while still allowing room for layering underneath. The tailored silhouette not only adds a touch of elegance but also prevents cold air from sneaking in, providing a barrier against the elements.Speaking of which, the warmth this jacket provides is unparalleled. Even in the harshest of winter conditions, I remain cozy and comfortable, thanks to its premium insulation and innovative design. Whether I’m braving blustery winds or trekking through snow-covered streets, I can trust that this jacket will keep me toasty warm, allowing me to enjoy winter activities without the fear of Raynaud’s flare-ups or urticaria outbreaks.But perhaps what truly sets this jacket apart is its attention to detail when it comes to protection. From the adjustable hood with a luxurious fur trim to the durable, water-resistant outer shell, every element has been meticulously crafted to shield me from whatever Mother Nature throws my way. Even the pockets are strategically placed and lined with fleece, offering both functionality and comfort.In conclusion, the Canada Goose jacket has exceeded all my expectations and then some. It’s not just a coat; it’s a winter essential that has transformed my cold-weather experience. So if you’re on the fence about investing in one, take the leap—you won’t regret it. Embrace winter bliss with the trifecta of style, warmth, and protection that this remarkable jacket provides.

Name: Karima
Review: Is good expérience

Name: Mi
Review: Light and warm

Name: Valerie
Review: Thanks for the great service, quality items and speedy shipping!

Name: Yvonne O'mara
Review: Great customer service and easy return process

Name: theresa
Review: it’s been a horrible experience  I had a little pull strap fall off and you want me to mail it to you .. it’s not needed you can see it’s  ripped.  Also I needed to fill out two forms and thought they were mailing it but nit until today did it start al over

Name: Pamela
Review: The representative I spoke with when I placed my order was very pleasant and helpful

Name: Charliston Santos
Review: Perfect fit, high end gear.

Name: Ryan
Review: I got a great price on my trade in.  Got my new jacket quick and I love it.

Name: Tiffany
Review: Incredible quality and amazing jacket ⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️⭐️

Name: stephanie
Review: I didn’t know the jacket I ordered wasn’t warm enough. I had no idea   Very disappointed especially with the price point

Name: Vivi
Review: This coat was a serious splurge.  It’s so cozy and I love it!!

Name: Todd
Review: The coat is well made and very comfortable.  The only issue I had was it was not available in Canada.

Name: Su
Review: very nice！look good on me！

Name: Mike
Review: Terrific. 100%

Name: Brett
Review: Quality products as always, I’ve got multiple items jackets hoodies jumpers and t shirts and they are always perfect. Thanks Canada Goose 5🌟

Name: Isabel
Review: I love all the product that I bought especially the  jacket and their accessories and bags . I’m so proud to own some of their product . It worth every dollars u spent. I won’t buy any other jacket than Canada Goose it’s so warm and cozy in this coldest place

Name: John
Review: Outstanding products, and customer service top-notch !

Name: Private
Review: Item was very poor quality. Barely any downfill. Kind of disappointing considering they’re known for quality and craftsmanship. Had to exchange it for one that was actually done right

Name: Ethan
Review: Great coat! Keeps your warm for sure, 100% recommend.

Name: customer
Review: Gave 5 star ..... take or ya get 1

Name: Robert
Review: Coat collar was discolored. In order to replace need to dry clean and ship back. large cost would need to be incurred to send back for a defect. I keep it but it has a grayish color on a black coat

Name: Malu
Review: Always great in quality

Name: David
Review: The staff and service in Crystals was amazing.

Name: Ryan
Review: I’m just not understanding how these coats comes with “Lifetime Warranty” but you’re telling me nothing can be done. This is absurd and bad customer service across the board. I will for sure don’t see myself purchasing anything from you and I will definitely be leaving feedback online so people know what they’re actually buying.

Name: Katelynn
Review: The jacket material is bad. I did not like it!

Name: Shu Ping
Review: Fast good on time

Name: Martin
Review: The person that was assigned to me wasn’t very knowledgeable about products. They gave me the necessary attention for a short time and then moved their priorities to another client.

Name: holly
Review: The coat I received was defective. One sleeve shorter than the other. Seamline on sleeve different from the other. Customer service was the worst.

Name: Trish
Review: Perfect coat. Wonderful service

Name: Lorna
Review: I really liked the coat but thought the delivery was slow.

Name: nicholas
Review: Excellent shopping experience.. got the size and color I want with the luxury to try other products as offered by the staff

Name: John
Review: Horrible sizing and fit, and expensive on top of that.

Name: Andrew
Review: The jacket is warm but the zipper isn’t very good. It gets stuck all the time, not something you’d expect from a jacket at this price point.

Name: Linda
Review: Very knowledgeable, kind and helpful.  Great people mean a great company.

Name: Tara
Review: My son’s zipper fell off on a coat I bought this summer for the winter. He used it for 2 months or less and the zipper fell off. I think it’s ridiculous you have to ship the coat out and have it dry cleaned and paid for.

Name: Andrew
Review: Unfriendly staff and uncoordinated with knowledge about the products and recommendations and are on their phones not attentive with any questions to answer talking among themselves

Name: Earl A. M.
Review: Amazing customer service. They found ways to help me. The quality of their products remains superb.

Name: klant
Review: Very good service and product

Name: Pearlofchina kevin
Review: Quality not worth that price.

Name: Kent
Review: I never received my order. Zero communication in over a week. It feels like I've been robbed.

Name: David Pearlstein
Review: Due to good quality and and warmth it provides when going out to cold wintry day. My wife and my two daughters love it and I joined them wearing the Canada Goose!!!

Name: Sh me
Review: Hard to review a coat you never received

Name: Peipei
Review: Deliver time is good, packaging and cloth quality is excellent

Name: Scott
Review: Hat could of had some more elastic for better hold on your head. I purchased this for a gift.

Name: TRACY LU
Review: The coat is good, but the buttons are not functional at all, if you use them, it will loose in a second, only for decoration purpose I guess......

Name: customer
Review: All my experiences have been extremely Positive and every item I’ve purchased has worth the money.

Name: Susan
Review: Prompt delivery, great presentation, great service!  Always!

Name: Ashley
Review: I have two jackets and would never EVER in my life purchase from there again. Crappy quality for the cost and they don’t stand behind their products. I had to go to BBB to get anywhere.

Name: Jalaluddin
Review: love it, great quality

Name: Golnar
Review: I went back and forth with the representatives about an issue with my order and they just kept repeating the same line in their emails. It felt unhelpful and impersonal. Here are the details: I bought a pair of gloves as a gift, it shed feathers. The touch screen option was hit and miss. It was only tried on once (tag was off). I asked for a refund/credit/exchange and was just denied. It was an extremely frustrating experience for a company with such expensive merchandise. Return policies seem so outdated compared to other companies.
HR Laura in Paris is the worst HR I've ever seen.

Name: Kofi
Review: Excellent products and service every time!

Name: Sarah
Review: Absolutely had one of the worst customer service I have ever experienced in my life at Troy, Michigan, Somerset mall. (Non luxury side)One of their staff member threw away my belongings that I had left on the counter into the trash can while I was trying on one of the jackets. I asked the staff members to please find my belongings and no one cared to help me and I had to dig out my stuff from the trash can myself. (Yes I am talking about you, Mr. Baby Blue sweater, black curly haired Arab gentleman with gold necklace)Then another staff member proceeded to tell me that my exchange would be “final sale” because I had left my lipstick in the pocket while trying on the jacket. The jacket sat in my closet until it was brought to the store to be returned. Pretty outrageous reasoning.During that short period of an hour that I spent in their store, felt like I was being treated like a homeless person, soliciting at their business place when I had just purchased a $1600 jacket. Truly, I’ve had better customer service experience at a gas station. At least they don’t touch my belongings and throw them into the trash.This is already my second purchased item from Canada goose, but with this extremely frustrating experience, I never want to shop from Canada goose again if this is hiw their representatives treat their customers.

Name: Kelly
Review: Very quick response! Helpful. Pleased with my overall experience. I love my coat!

Name: Elizabeth Contreras
Review: Canada Goose sells great very well made clothing.  Their returns are super easy and fast.  I highly recommend.  I have two of their jackets and love them!!

Name: Nino Tevdorashvili
Review: I bought two pairs of waterproof Snickers.. good design, nice, gorgeous look, although  it's designed for hiking I don't think it's comfortable for hiking, because it's pretty heavy to wear, not very comfortable and I personally experienced that it's slippery in the rainy days, .. I love both of them but I think it's overpriced.. however I understand , that  high price is for  a brand, price your name, that's all. With this experience, I would never buy again, but once again it feels good when  I am Wearing  this brand, it's more psychological trick. Warm regards

Name: ARTEM
Review: Great products, great service

Name: Dave
Review: I purchased a 1700 jacket that was damaged on arrival. It was a nightmare to return. I had to re order a new jacket and pay for shipping twice. Nobody was ever available to help with the process. For 1700 for a jacket that should be a white glove service if a product you purchased was damaged on arrival. There’s better brands out there.

Name: Maryam
Review: best delivery possible, luxury and quality products,  im so happy with customer service, one of the best brand i know

Name: Mr winston
Review: The shipping was very quick and my return was processed quickly as well. The quality of Canada Goose products is very high.

Name: IM
Review: Quality has deteriorated substantially in the last couple of years. Had to return and ended up purchasing a different brand.

Name: Melissa
Review: It was good, not great.. this is my second Canada goose coat and the fur trim on my new coat is lower quality than my last one despite costing almost twice as much as my last one. I discovered only after purchasing that you stopped using real fur, I’m not impressed.

Name: Geri
Review: I purchased a jacket as a gift for my 22 yr old niece, she loved it. She been wearing the long one , this one was shorter.Quality   Is great

Name: Jonathan
Review: The down in the Wyndham parka is extremely thin in the arms. For almost $2,000 jacket one would expect more.

Name: Jennifer
Review: I live in Chicago and the gloves did not keep my boyfriends hands warms as marketed. I was shocked but what a waste of money. I would be better off with a $20 pair from Amazon. I reached out to Customer Service and got the “sorry no returns or refunds”. I bought the gloves in November for Christmas and messaged in early January. So disappointing

Name: Mason
Review: I have Canada goose puffer jacket and boots - far too expensive.

Name: Sharon Howarth
Review: Professionalism of your service. Just perfect

Name: Carolin Busch
Review: Great quality products with a lot of attention to details. I am no longer freezing on the playground. I highly recommend the brand’s winter coats!

Name: Manon Perreault
Review: The product - in this case a coat - is of the highest quality, without forgetting the unlimited warranty. Delivery was quick and packaging - the box, hanger, and garment bag - add the perfect customer experience touch!

Name: Awais
Review: Very nice Quality.

Name: Snehanshu
Review: Sales persons were caring, knowledgeable. Canada Goose has very good well made products….

Name: Anand
Review: Material quality not so good.

Name: Carl
Review: The jacket is great. However, I expected the material and color to be more matte than the shiny material that it was. There are pictures of jackets that more accurately reflect this style on the website, and this particular jacket and pictures did not.

Name: Jay
Review: I love the quality of their clothing! And to top it off, it keeps you toasty too

Name: Joe
Review: Unpractical customer service. I got a Canada goose jacket as a gift from a friend who lived in Canada. I wanted to exchanged it. The solutions was to  reimburse back my friend’s credit card and ship it back to Canada ! It was impossible to exchange it in any Canada goose stores located in the United States. The jacket is still in its original box. It is waste of time to follow up with customers service.

Name: Delara Uddin
Review: Excellent service, speedy delivery

Name: Liam
Review: I own a number of Canada Goose coats and jackets which I wear often

Name: Edna
Review: The jackets for my grandson were amazing They love them colors and style. I have been buying Canada goose jackets for over 12 years or more. They r very warm stylish and last forever. Would recommend absolutely.Thank you

Name: Laura
Review: I paid full price $1300 for a parka. They sent me a refurbished parka that smell strongly like dry cleaning and the color was faded.

Name: ANGEL TSANG
Review: The quality and style is nice and great.

Name: Toeekneee
Review: Nice Jacket. Delivered promptly. Most importantly it arrived a day after my b'day!

Name: Brandon
Review: Quick shipment, jacket is very warm.

Name: Susanna L
Review: Happy with the purchase, good quality and very stylish!

Name: Patrick Li
Review: Love the productsHave many I have one coat  is wornSleeve needs attention as shell is ripped.Send to repairs. Doesn't including, return after few weeks.When is said life guarantee is NOT quite TRUE.

Name: Mona
Review: They did not put my coat in a box.

Name: Devon
Review: When I received my jacket, the zipper was broken… for $800… I would just expect everything to be correct

Name: jason  jukes
Review: Send out all the items and not tell lies

Name: JADEN
Review: The best experience ever I knew about this jacket

Name: Abdulkariem A
Review: Got a Carson Parka, warm and true to size. Nothing compares.

Name: Liudmyla
Review: Fast and effective

Name: Don
Review: The quality and fit of what I bought i superb.

Name: Nanette
Review: Great product and sales personnel

Name: Curtis King
Review: Oscar and his team of associates helped me feel comfortable and at home for the shopping experience. From the initial hello to the detailed Thank you email after our visit, pheneomenal experience.

Name: Chasidey
Review: I ordered an item that wasn’t in stock and canceled my order two days before it was supposed to be delivered.

Name: Elliott
Review: Joyce was an absolute treasure to work with and helped me find the color I was looking for in the warehouse that wasn’t in the store

Name: Myrte
Review: My experience was great because I walked into the right store. I bought my coat in the Canada Goose store in Banff. The representative that helped me was absolutely awesome. He gave his honest opinion about what coat suited me best in a very nice, constructive way. He took his time and gave advice about how to store the coat as well. I felt very valued as a customer. I had walked into the Canada Goose store in Chinook mall, Calgary. That was a horrible experience. No one seemed to care about me there nor interested in selling me anything or giving advise. I had almost already decided to not buy Canada Goose at all but my partner convinced me in Banff to try one more time. Luckily this turned out to be great.

Name: Sandy
Review: The staff was very helpful and well informed about the products.

Name: customer
Review: Overall experience shopping with CG was good. Return went well on a size exchange. Beautifully packaged and presented. Quality of the product itself is….. good. Definitely paying 60% more for the name/CG badge. I personally wouldn’t buy another garment. If the badge is that important to you then by all means, enjoy.

Name: M. Ekici
Review: As a long-time customer who has consistently trusted and valued Canada Goose for its quality and reliability, it pains me to say that this order has not lived up to the usual standards.The order consisted of two items – slippers and boots. The slippers are exactly as ordered and in perfect condition, for which I am grateful. However, the boots tell a different story. They exhibit noticeable differences in color, appearing faded or discolored. Please refer to the attached images for clarification. As these boots were intended as a gift, the disappointment is even more profound.I have been a loyal customer of Canada Goose for years, regularly purchasing various items such as jackets, coats, sweaters, gloves, etc., from both the Canada Goose store in Frankfurt and Breuninger. My past experiences with in-store purchases have always been positive, allowing me to inspect and ensure the quality of the items before making a purchase. Even my first online order, a children's hat, left me impressed.While the slippers included in this order meet my expectations, the boots, with their evident color discrepancies, have left me extremely disappointed.

Name: Duane
Review: I have been buying Canada Goose jackets for over 35 years. Love the quality that they had; the older ones made in Canada.

Name: Anita
Review: For such a good brand. Your customer service is exceptionally horrible. I called for updates and inquiries and the agents were just absolutely rude and dis not want to help. Bought 2 things and both time was just horrible experience.

Name: Giovanni Tolu
Review: Great company great service

Name: Christian
Review: Worst company in the world I would never recommend anyone buy anything from this company ! I ordered a fleece and they sent me an empty box then tried to claim it wasn’t empty and still have not refunded me !!! How could you regain my trust ?!? You didn’t even try to fix this problem this is exactly what I am talking about they just talk nonsense at this company I swear ! Nothing gets done this company lied on me and said I never contacted when I had proof I contacted them several times once I received the package that was empty I told them and I was promised a refund and some kind of follow up once they tried to figure out what was going on and guess what they never called me back not once ! So I contacted my credit card company and this company Canada goose lied and said I never contacted them which was a lie I contacted them on the phone and through email with proof that we had been in correspondence but this company will try to deceive everyone ! Even now this person who respond didn’t try to fix my problem they said we hope we can regain you trust in the future who would want to trust your company you didn’t even do anything to fix this problem you wrote a bunch of nonsense and said you were sorry how does that help me at all I’m out 595.00 that your company stole from me your a multimillion dollar company stealing 595.00 from working class people then lying about things to keep the money from the customers why would anyone want to buy from your company again it was my first and worst experience with any company ever in my life I don’t recommend anyone make any purchases with them just look at they’re response does that seem like they care to earn my trust all they said was we are sorry you feel that way ! Nothing about a resolution at all !!!! Do not buy from this company you may not get your item and they will try to blame you don’t take the risk it isn’t worth it I’m still dealing with this till this day almost 5 months later and they have not refunded me or made any attempts to contact me with any resolution

Name: Scott
Review: The whole experience is awesome. Website is easy to navigate, the products are the best and the delivery is quick!

Name: Laurie Maddock
Review: Easy to shop, received quickly and beautiful coat.

Name: Kim A
Review: WORST COMPANY EVER! Sold me damaged products TWICE! And won’t refund. Never shopping at this horrible company again.

Name: Bradley Merriman
Review: Great product

Name: Andrade Williams
Review: Salesperson made sure to order jacket in size and colour prior to me leaving store.

Name: Aimee
Review: I had an issue with my first order and it was an easy process to make it right. Thank you.

Name: Hannah Lorber
Review: Worst customer service for luxury brand ever, terrible company policies. Lost in transit items are the responsibility of the customer.

Name: Curt Williamson
Review: Easy to order online. Fast service.

Name: ambrose taylor
Review: The coat is really nice. My wife loves it.

Name: Zhang
Review: Excellent guest service with good people

Name: DEAN LASHMAR
Review: Perfect coat

Name: Michael Purazzo
Review: ALL GREAT, excellent

Name: Marilyn
Review: The torso seems short. The sleeves are a good length.

Name: Tina
Review: Your customer service is very bad. Bad service bad attitude. You never check the product before shipping to customer, I received jacket with an hole in pocket and perfume smell Jacket.

Name: Martin Hewitt
Review: The Lawrence Puffer Long. Looks great and good to wear unfortunately little or no protection against rain. Product should show a warning "Not suitable for outdoor use"

Name: Jiyun
Review: Sent in 4 jackets for trade-in. Got 3 back saying they are not eligible. While 2 of these 3 are still like new. They sent me a $298 gift card for the jacket they kept. $323 -$25 They charge $25 shipping fee for the cloth they accept. It's good that they don't charge the shipping for sending in and sending back the cloth they don't want. The trade-in process was smooth, but the result was just far below my expectations.

Name: henry
Review: Very friendly customer service, good quality.

Name: No name
Review: My experience was pleasant. The sales representative was very professional and kind.

Name: jeongro Yoon
Review: The employees kindly found the clothes we wanted.

Name: ABHISHEK.
Review: The size fitting would had been more good if there was an more of size choice & even there was not much more different style of Langford Parkas & even other style name wasn’t there much style’s & design. Not at all happy with Canada goose men’s outerwear collection. Very disappointing with Canada goose produ.

Name: heather
Review: We were given incorrect product knowledge that led us to purchase a jacket and then have to drive 1.5 hours back to the store to return and exchange and again were given incorrect information. We ultimately had to purchase online and didn’t have the cost for 3 months. No compensation was given for the time nor has wasted to drive back to the store to get the correct item.

Name: candice
Review: I purchase 3 Jacket from Canada Goose 2 Large and 1 Small size for my family in China. The receipt shows 2 large item and 1 small items. But the actually product is 1 large and 2 small jacket.  I shipping  the Jacket  to China and once they received the package we find out they bring the wrong size. Then I have to shipping back to Canada for exchange. I asked for $100 store credit to cover part of my shipping fee as the shipping fee is so expensive. They make the mistake initially and reject to cover some fees by  the store credit.

Name: Shawn
Review: Great experience. The staff was amazing!

Name: leila
Review: Great quality, design

Name: EH
Review: My purchase and exchange experience were both perfect at Yorkdale.  The staff were polite, patient, and willing to understand my concerns.

Name: kathy
Review: I got the special edition, cross over with Bathing Ape,Jacket is latest Canada Goose puffer but with the classical pattern of BApe,It has quality and style!

Name: Mark
Review: Sold my jacket. Great price.

Name: Felix
Review: Employees are friendly and helpful

Name: customer
Review: Kazi and his team were genuinely friendly, helpful, and patient with us on finding the parkas we were looking for. We were so impressed!

Name: Betty Choi
Review: Very helpful staff

Name: olga
Review: I had a warranty issue and it took over one year to resolve it.  The product was not available and the value offered was not enough to buy a new similar product.

Name: jen
Review: I did a in-store visit for my latest purchase. The salesperson helping me seemed distracted or uninterested. I felt rushed and awkward asking to try on different items. I felt like my selection was rushed due to the choices I was presented.

Name: lucie
Review: Very attentive staff, also very willing to allow me to try on different things, did not push me into purchasing once, great location.

Name: catherine
Review: very accommodating and the staff are awesome.

Name: carmen
Review: Customer service is good. But the product quality is a concern. The pull on my zipper is gone in less than a month. I have difficulty to unzip the bottom part and caused some inconvenience

Name: maggie
Review: Hybridge lite vest1/ I tried a vest (sample) which looked very old , the reason is so many people tried it on and also it seemed it was under wash . I told the agent I would buy one but the agent was going to wrap the "sample" for me. I stopped her and asked for a new one, then she called a new one for me to try on and packed for me. I am so shocked why she sold me the sample !!2/ I won't talk about the quality but the collar is not good. The collar burns me if it touches my neck. I feel a plastic wrapping my neck and on fire like. So I just wore it 2 times and left it in my closet. I bought a vest from Costco 8 years ago. It cost CAD28 . I have the same feeling: the collar is not breathable and makes my neck very hot but not burning like Canada Goose.If I can return it , I will absolutely refund it. The sales lady is good to serve me.

Name: Eldis Memushi
Review: Not good very bad quality

Name: Diana Z
Review: Quality of the product is top notch and the customer service at the store was excellent!

Name: Nishant Jain
Review: The sales person was not interested in showing the jacket options and differences. I

Name: fang ming
Review: nice service in store and great quality of the goods

Name: Claudio Recchia
Review: Not what expected for customer service. In shop experience feels rushed and pressured to buy or leave. Employee are not fully willing to help out when item is not available, and suggest or show alternatives above all when the purchase is a small one and not a big. The quality of the product is not equal to the price. My 1200cad jacket lost part of the initial shine, the black is very pale even if always and only sent to professional dry cleaning. My 800cad pants are very stiff and don't really give me the same experience and feeling for many other brand on this range price. Im sorry to be so picky but I believe that now a day as consumer we are much more aware of how we spend our money and when the price tag is this high the expectation must match the price or exceed it, and unfortunately this is not the case for me both from store experience and product appreciation.

Name: Fion
Review: The salesperson was very unfriendly and discriminatory. She didn't help me much.  I was wearing too ordinary clothes that day.
