Since I knew what I wanted to buy, I just wanted to try other styles to see if they looked good. But she didn't give me the service I deserved. In the end, I felt very boring, so I just chose the clothes I planned to buy and asked for a smaller size. She didn't even check and said no. I saw on the website that there was one. And since I’m in a Yorkdale store, is there so little stock? Finally, she wrote my name wrong. Up to now, the emails I receive from Canada Goose all show my wrong name, reminding me of this very unpleasant shopping experience. In the end, they didn’t even give me a shopping bag. Just put my clothes and a dust cover on it and that’s it! Later, I continued to look at other brands in the mall and bought a Chanel bag. Finally, I took the big Chanel bag and asked Canada Goose for a bag. The manager at the door also checked whether I had the purchase receipt. I was really speechless. !

Name: JR
Review: No communication within the warranty department and with the customer. Waited over a week for a promised call back with a supervisor to escalate my concerns. In conclusion I took the proactive approach of sending out my jacket early September where they damaged it during their “mandatory” dry cleaning at my expense, wrapped/boxed it and sent it back . They wouldn’t replace the jacket but only my hood trim and sent me a gift card in the amount for a new one. Approaching December with no jacket in Ontario to no fault of my own shouldn’t be ANYONES concern when dealing with such a prestigious company. The hood trim I had to purchase IN PERSON (shipping takes an egregious amount of time), wasn’t the same one I had even though I was told multiple times they were in inventory. I’ll wear a blanket outside before I wear one of these products again…

Name: Ralph Leigh
Review: The customer service rep was knowledgeable, helpful and friendly.

Name: pamela
Review: Love the cold room, the 1:1 service and especially love the coats. Thank you!

Name: sheri
Review: Service - associate knew her products

Name: satinderjit
Review: I bought a vest from the store at yorkdale mall. I took it with me to my home country without even checking it. When I wore it I found removed price tags in its pockets. It seemed like someone must have returned it and they just handed over the jacket to me with even cleaning it. I am frustrated with the service as this feels disrespectful and disgusting.

Name: anthony
Review: Customer service at the store was exceptional as always.

Name: Collin Davis
Review: From the beginning, my jacket was leaking down. I thought it was stop, but it didn’t. By the time I realized I wanted to return, it wasn’t an option. Very disappointed considering this as my first purchase from Canadas luxury brand.

Name: sally
Review: Generally very good customer service and good warranty against defects and workmanship etc.  Although what’s being covered under warranty has been reducing it feels.

Name: leili
Review: Parka is not as warm as promised

Name: Cécile
Review: DO NOT BUY AT THIS COMPANY!! It's almost unbelievable, I ordered two identical jackets in two different sizes to choose from and of course tried them both on. I kept the smaller one, but they wouldn't let me return the other jacket because it had apparently “been worn” (although the label was still on and there were no stains or anything similar on it). If, according to the policy, it is not possible to try on items of clothing before buying them, be careful with this company (especially as the hygienic aspects of a winter jacket are certainly different from those of underwear or jeans worn directly on bare skin). I am completely disappointed and speechless about this procedure !!!

Name: Ron Denotter
Review: Originally bought a cheap $300 CG knockoff which my wife wore for eight years and loved. Last year I bought her an authentic coat which cost almost six times as much! After one year, the fur has worn off the Center of the hood. CG has warrantee, so we start a claim. What a Joke! They want the coat to be dry cleaned before sending it, want it shipped cross country at my expense, and won’t review pictures that clearly show the problem. I’m not paying $100 to clean and ship only to have them tell me it’s “normal wear and tear”. Next time I buy the cheap Chinese knock off again! It was better quality than the $1700 authentic version.

Name: Nomeriano Jr
Review: Fast and easy delivery, No hussle. Great jacket.

Name: SANDRA
Review: The sales person was very helpful and informative with the purchasing of my coat

Name: Maddelena
Review: i love my coat, fast shipping

Name: Chenyi
Review: Due to overseas travel the staff helped me get my oversized item refund even past due day.  I really appreciated it.

Name: Mario
Review: Easy to return for a smaller size.Very aesthetic shipping.Item exactly like described

Name: customer
Review: Amazing customer service really helpful quality items which you are paying for. They could not do enough for me especially going into the shop and online they go above and beyond couldn’t recommend, enough

Name: Benjamin
Review: It's a nice coat, but the only issue is the zipper (pull) is located on the left.

Name: Josh
Review: Patient staff while I tried on every vedt and fleece zip up in the store.

Name: nate
Review: The in-store associates are very helpful, and their products are of long lasting and good quality.

Name: Olga Ribadeneira
Review: Love, love my jacket always very thankful for your services and this one will be a treasure for me like the others one, for my next generation.

Name: Clint
Review: Warm and comfortable not to bulky

Name: Laila
Review: quick purches quick return

Name: David
Review: Great assistance from the online help and fast shipping. Really love my new parka!

Name: Didimo Arteaga
Review: I love it its comfortable and very nice

Name: Andrew
Review: Top of the line product, service and processing.

Name: Monika
Review: This coat is unwearable even in a normal rain as it gets flat. I wasted almost £1000 and the jacket is ruined after one wash- yes I followed detailed instructions to the letter as the jacket is so pricy- I called the shop, ai checked instructions and I asked CG on instagram. I know how the jacket performed before wash and how it did not perform after wash. I have washed it once since buying so after ONE wash it lost all ability to withstand rain, any rain and any elements whilst it withstood rain and cold it was DRY it literally repelled water it did not soak, in winter I wore shirt sleeve tops the jacket was so hot. I was very happy with it. After one wash the coat is worse than Primark.I cannot believe CG just dismissed my claim without even dropping the coat at the store. I am so gutted disappointed and I feel robbed of my money and I want ro make a formal complaint. Absolute abhorrent I will never buy anything from you and I will deter anyone I can.

Name: Samual
Review: Seyon was perfect

Name: Rocio Salcedo
Review: The best coat I’ve ever own. Worth it

Name: Juanita
Review: Best winter coat ever! Being a Canada Goose, I knew it was going to be pricy but it has been the BEST purchase ever. I took it to: Finland, Chicago, Belgium, England, Alaska, and Patagonia and never felt cold. I wore one max two thin layers underneath and it was perfect. Very breathable, stylish, the color is beautiful!

Name: Guanfu
Review: Very bad online purchasing experience.

Name: Ben
Review: This process took many weeks and should have taken daysWe should have received a new item to replace the one which was sent in given the quality of the item (which had only been worn twice) had significantly eroded. This should not be the experience when you buy a $600 sweater.

Name: Douglas Craig Smith
Review: Poor quality, over priced, odd designs.We are avid CG owners but have observed increasingly poor quality. Recent zipper broken on new item, material piling, threads unravelling and breaking.Prices are climbing far beyond the value of CG. The recent designs are simply not functional and of zero interest to us.

Name: Chad
Review: Great products, great packaging and presentation, in a timely fashion!

Name: Ben
Review: I did not receive my item and I also did not receive a refund if you ask me I feel like I’ve been robbed

Name: Brenda
Review: Fantastic product

Name: Andrew
Review: I was buying my mom a nice pair of leather gloves but I unfortunately purchased the wrong size.  When trying to exchange for another size, I found out the same pair was sold out in a medium but the sales person was very helpful in locating a very similar pair and was gracious in waving a return policy rule that says purchases made via PayPal cannot be returned/exchanged.  5 star product and customer service.

Name: Maria
Review: Love my new coat! This is the second Canada Goose coat  I’ve bought. It’s perfect for those chilly days.

Name: Julie
Review: First time purchasing your products and everything went well. I got a jacket to wear next winter in Eastern Europe where I will get - 20. The whole online experience was good and the item arrived within 5 days. Materials look great quality and I hope it does the job when I wear it.

Name: Edison
Review: 5star quality

Name: Miss Ayisha Alleyne
Review: This coat is perfect so warm,cosy and stylish,  worth every penny!

Name: Richard
Review: It was good until you constantly hounded me about making a review! A review is by choice, not because you are bullied into it... Now leave me alone

Name: Jeffrey Solowey
Review: Great styling, quality materials, very warm coatZipper is a bit cumbersome; not that user-friendly.

Name: Teddy Young
Review: The sales staff at King of Prussia was excellent! They had the. Best attitude I’ve seen in some while.And the Hybridge jacket is great along with the to warm chilliwack bomber! Great coats and great people, makes a great combo!

Name: Timothy McGeever
Review: Rip off £950 price for poorer quality than the expensive £950 warranted and slow poor returns service and refunds

Name: Robert
Review: Great quality merchandise and excellent service.

Name: Caroline
Review: I got a $500 certificate and was able to spend around 450$. I cannot buy anything with the rest of the money. This means that there is a loss of money and that you get to benefit from that loss. Is there anything that can be done with that left over money? Charity? Foundation?

Name: Mike
Review: Why is the zipper on the left side?  Why is it impossible to zip?   For a jacket that’s supposed to be of high quality the zipper is a joke.  Should have bought a moncler.

Name: phyllis
Review: Great quality. But it’s hard to find the right cutting tho.

Name: Almas
Review: Hello. Overall I'm happy, but there are a couple of things. The color of the jacket is not quite what I expected, or rather the shade is not the same. and the material itself seems to be different from the outside from those jackets that I saw in the store. the price is of course very high for it, so I can’t give it a rating of 4.5 in terms of price/quality ratio.

Name: David
Review: Canada Goose is one of the best online experiences I have ever had.

Name: Colten
Review: fast shipping and great product very warm.

Name: Meena
Review: Good quality jackets, order is delivered quickly, and returns are so easy.

Name: John
Review: Quality product.  Quality service help in purchasing it as well.

Name: M T
Review: I've always loved the quality, look, and feel of Canada Goose apparel. But what stood out this time was how seamless the return process was, both in store and online, for our purchases. Returns were free, and communication was proactive and thorough. I'll be buying more CG items online.

Name: KEVIN MIN
Review: Cg  lied to me. Talked to them almost 15 times. Also promised updates and within month. Over 2 months wait

Name: Carol Bremmer
Review: Excellent coat to wear in cold weather.

Name: Apple
Review: It would be better if the quality was stricter.

Name: Derek
Review: I have not recieved a response regarding my return in over a month. Still “waiting on a decision”. Trying to exchange my wife’s Christmas gift for a smaller size. By the time I’m able to send these back to return them it’s going to be a different season. This is terrible customer service from a company that’s so highly regarded. Edit: I cannot respond to their response so editing my review is my only option. I did not miss the return window. I reached out prior to the return window being closed. I was told I would be reached out to with next steps. That never happened. Canada goose dropped the ball then led me on for months. All I’m asking for is to return my unused garments for money back on a gift card and they refuse to help. I’ve never been treated so poorly by a company and have been forced to reach out to the BBB

Name: Max
Review: Fast delivery and a really good clothing brand

Name: Elio Iacolare
Review: Worst customer service ever. I wrote for enquires never replied.  Will bring my money to moncler.

Name: Marc Skuce
Review: Such poor customer service! Brought a bodywarmer in October but needed to get dry cleaned in late Jan as it was a light coloured bodywarmer so got a little bit dirty. Sent off to their authorised dry cleaners - Jeeves of Belgravia, who managed to destroy my zipper label. They attempted to repair it but it looked awful so I rejected their repair. I was advised to go through Canada Goose Warranty claim which I did. Claim went through but they had trouble receiving my pictures (sent email 3 times) but after speaking to a customer service representative on the phone, they agreed to send out the zipper label. They have now gone back on their word and still requesting the pictures again. There a lot of effort on my part to resolve something that Canada Goose and Jeeves of Belgravia have caused. The fact they have now gone back on what they said they would do just tells you everything about this company. Not to be trusted and do not honour their word.

Name: Wen z
Review: I use Apple Pay and my address was not changed, so I called customer service IMMEDIATELY! They said they couldn't see my order on their side.and then the next day I received my order confirmation email and again IMMEDIATELY called them to change address, the customer service staff Elizabeth said my order had shipped so they couldn't change their side, But I didn't have a tracking number how can I track??? and most stupid is I can't cancel on their stupid website, and the assistant won't do that either! So I contacted UPS, and they said Canada Goose blocked the package so I have to contact them to change anything, UPS assistant can't do anything at this point. update: I contacted Canada Goose for a 1 hour call, I said UPS can't make any change for this package, and they need to contact with sender directly for any change, CG responded me they couldn't change it and I had to contact UPS again, so I called UPS AGAIN, and they gave me the same response, that they have a contract that neither the UPS agent nor receiver can make any change, only the sender has the power to do that, I understand it's for safety and it makes sense. So I contacted again for CG, and they gave me the same response for a contact back to UPS, I told them what UPS told me, and CG said they had nothing to do that, but I only needed them to contact with UPS to help me do a minor change on address, you know what, the CG agent just HANG UP MY PHONE!OMG, check what CG replied below, they just like a robot, just keep repeating the same sentence

Name: Jason Stone
Review: Purchased arctic gloves, wore them twice and the pull tag tore in half with little pressure. Canada Goose don’t offer a warranty on accessories so be very careful. There customer service is a disgrace and they don’t back their own products. 2 wears for 660 AUD is unacceptable.

Name: Nicole
Review: Received a coat that looks worn, provided images straight away which clearly show even the internal labels all scrunched up as though it has been worn and returned. Provided images to make the company aware before returning as I did not want the return to be rejected. Was told to await an email within 24-48 hours which I didn’t receive. Have chased this up daily and was told it had been escalated after 3 days. Yesterday I was ignored completely and ignored again today.Edit now on day 10 of receiving the item and still no outcome - will soon be out of returns period yet they advise not to return through normal channels as this may be rejected.Edit day 12 of receiving the item and still no outcome. You have replied and said you will be reaching out to resolve this and still haven’t done. I sent a message on Monday asking how long I can expect to wait and still no reply!! The worst customer service I have ever experienced. Can you actually call or email me to discuss further? My next step will be a PayPal claim if I receive no response.

Name: Émilie Cameron-Nunes
Review: Beware of buying coat online since if the design does not fit you, they will not reimburse or exchange it. I returned my coat because the neck was too tight and the zipper was scratching my chin, and not only could they not exchange it or reimburse me, or even send me some leftover pieces of fabric so I could make alterations but they sent it back to me without its garment case and now they refuse to send me another one. That is stealing!! Worst company ever.

Name: Patrick
Review: Marketing team doesn't pay for surveys.Avoid.https://go (dot) makersights (dot) com/867ICvZk (question mark) PID=207871856 (and) SurveyAccountName=MakerSights

Name: Klodian
Review: I recently encountered a frustrating situation with Canada Goose that has compelled me to share my disappointment. My premium parka went missing during a trip to the repair, leading me to seek assistance from Canada Goose's customer support.To my dismay, the experience was far from satisfactory. Not only did the company fail to provide a solution for my lost parka, but their customer support seemed more adept at avoiding my questions than addressing them directly.The disappearance of my expensive parka was distressing enough, but the lack of transparency and responsiveness from Canada Goose made the situation even more disheartening. As a customer who invested in their high-end product, I expected better support and accountability.Unfortunately, Canada Goose fell short of meeting these expectations, leaving me with unresolved issues and a sense of frustration. I share this experience in the hope that others can make informed decisions about their purchases, taking into consideration not just the quality of the product but also the reliability of the customer support. In this instance, Canada Goose's customer service left much to be desired, and it's something potential buyers should be aware of before investing in their products.

Name: jakub olszewski
Review: Iam very very disappointed in this brand... I always loved canada goose products and they are the best quality jackets.But what happend over the last 2 months is ridiculous... I bought a wyndham jacket but it didn't fit me so I returned it. After 10 days I still haven't heard anything back so I contacted customer service.They told me this is very strange and that they will start a investigation with DHL because them claim they never received my item while the tracking clearly shows it got delicerd at their warehouse. Investigation was supposed to be 30 days MAXIMUM. Today (days 35) I decided to contact them my self. Apparently they had a message back from dhl already but just didn't contact me.DHL now claims that a parcel was never returned and don't want to issue my claim?!?! I have proof of postage that I got at the dhl point, I send them that as well...Now I don't have a jacket and neither my €1675,00!!!!!!!!!!!!Iam very disappointed in Canada Goose and iam not sure if I even want to purchase more items from them in the future...

Name: Sarah Hagedorn
Review: My husband bought me a Trillium Parka for Christmas. As it was a gift, he removed the tags and receipt. The parka ended up being too big and I tried to exchange it. They do not allow exchanges. You have to return, then buy the one you want. I was told I could not return my coat as the tag was no longer on it. We still had the boxes and receipt, but one tag was missing. Now I’m stuck with a very expensive coat that doesn’t fit. The customer service was terrible. I called three times. The first time they said they would speak to a manager about a special exception to return the coat without a tag. They promised to get back to me. They did not get back to me. The second time the same thing happened. The third time they told me no they would not take the coat back or even give store credit so I could get the correct size. After three calls there was no resolution to my problem. Frustrating policy for a coat at this price point. Terrible customer service. I would not recommend this company. I would advise you to never buy these coats as gifts, because if the style or size is not what the receiver wants/needs you will be out of luck and $1600.

Name: FNU Shofiquzzaman
Review: Absolutely love the products of this brand. Great service, and staff is always friendly. Had a great experience purchasing both online and in store.

Name: Ron
Review: I regret my purchase. First, I live in NY and bought the jacket at a CG store in Montreal which is more than 5 hours from where I live. First week I had an issue with the jacket and the CG store in NYC told me I had to go back to the store where I purchased it in Canada. As aggravated as I was by that policy I was even more aggravated when I called the CG store in Canada where I purchased the jacker and was told they will not allow me to send the jacket to them--you have to bring it back in person and exchange it. That's a problem since the jacket configuration I sought after and purchased is extremely difficult to find. The problem involved the zipper; it is extremely difficult to engage and forget about doing it with gloves on. I expected the zipper on a $1,750 jacket would be of better quality. The first week I also noticed the zipper tab stitching at the bottom of the tab was coming apart. The tab is certainly not essential, but a part that likely costs about two cents and helps with zipping up and down particularly when wearing gloves.  I called CG and was instructed to email several photos including the interior tags, and interior and exterior labels. A week after I did so, I get an email asking me to fill out a form and to send the same photos--all for a tab that costs cents. Lastly, I find the down leak inside the jacket extraordinary considering the price and supposed quality of CG products. I had only been wearing the jacket lightly around the city over light sweaters and people have been picking feathers off my clothing when I take my jacket off. I had been trying to replace a parka for two seasons. My choice was down to CG Langford Heritage Black Label Parka and Arc'Teryx Therme SV Parka. I regret buying the CG.

Name: Reelia Jürissaar
Review: Poor quality on materials, wears off with in months, wearing off is not under warranty, aparently overpriced and "life-time" warranty very slow and the warranty is not sufficient for the materials. Surtenly not good investment for long-term winter gear. There is more quality brands for suitable wintergare.

Name: Valerie
Review: I bought Canada Goose boots from Saks because Canada Goose online didn't have it. The boots have an issue, the heel cup sticks inward making the boots extremely uncomfortable. I contacted Canada Goose directly since I thought they would stand behind their product. they sent me an email informing me to contact Saks. I contacted Saks who told me to contact Canada Goose, so I did....again. Canada Goose said they would look into the matter...well I didn't hear from them. I contacted them again and told me to contact Saks. For the price of the boots, I would expect that a company like Canada Goose would stand behind their product and not give me the runaround. I will NEVER buy anything from them ever again. Oh, and the boots after wearing them for 3 months, one of the sides is ungluing!!!! DON'T buy from them, extremely poor service and support.

Name: Arthur
Review: I am extremely disappointed with my experience with Canada Goose. Despite purchasing a jacket on November 26 with a promised delivery by November 28, I never received my package. Upon contacting customer service, they claimed it was delivered, but I have no evidence of receiving it.It's now been several weeks, and despite repeated attempts to resolve this issue, customer service has been unhelpful and unresponsive. I am left without the product and out of pocket. This experience has significantly diminished my view of Canada Goose's reliability and customer support.I had high expectations from a reputable company like Canada Goose, but this experience has severely tarnished my view of their customer service and reliability. It's disheartening to encounter such difficulties and lack of support in resolving what should have been a straightforward issue.

Name: Liz
Review: Bought a gilet on line. It was the wrong size, so took it to the London store and waited 25 minutes in the cold outside for a "personal shopper" once inside, we located the correct size and went to the till. They would not change the item even though we had all the paperwork and they had the smaller size in stock.  I had to BUY the smaller size and take the other back home to Kent and return via the returns collection label? Customer service for this company is always really bad and they absolutely don't care.

Name: Yunqian Zhang
Review: Very good service, enjoy shopping time.

Name: Robert J Lunieski
Review: I purchased three items at MOA Canada goose store, two jackets and a pair of insulated pants. I could not return the pants for a larger size. Past the last return date by four days. One jacket is okay. The second is not good. Looks nice but cannot keep me warm even at 27F. It was a 900$ jacket. Useless in Minnesota winter.

Name: Max
Review: I would like to express my deep dissatisfaction with the after-sales service of Canada Goose. Following a $55 cleaning fee, and the warranty repair I've encountered a significant issue: the fur is coming out of the jacket, sticking to my clothes every time I wear it. This defect has rendered the jacket unusable.Moreover, we are currently in the midst of winter, and not being able to use my down jacket is a major inconvenience. I cannot send it again and afford to be without a warm jacket for two weeks, especially in these cold conditions.Attached is a photo showing the extent of the damage. It is unacceptable to receive a product in such a state, especially after paying for professional cleaning services. I expect Canada Goose to take responsibility and offer an adequate solution to this issue.Ps : I live in NYC and the waranty case is 00566468

Name: John Rockefeller
Review: Canada Goose understands high standards.  It also understands how to own the high end markets.  From ordering to packaging to receiving to customer service you get what you pay for.  It’s well worth less purchasing, and more cherishing.

Name: Giuseppe Farrugio
Review: Incredible,customer service in this company it’s not existent,so if something it’s wrong whit your parka,the fur damage,wooden hanger broke in Half,don’t waste Your time,never again I’ll buy from this company have tree jackets $$$ move to a Bette customer service brand,Brioni !!

Name: Rich
Review: I had a fault with my coat and took it to the Birmingham, UK store and then the store closed and reopened last autumn and I revisited in the hope that they knew something, but my coat has now been lost - have written to Canada Goose and their CEO and have tried repeatedly to make contact with them and have had every correspondence ignored and my coat is now missing and no resolution proposed. I'd recommend avoiding the company as they are quick to take £1,600 for a coat and claim you have a guarantee for faults but nearly 12 months on, no light at the end of the tunnel.

Name: P B
Review: I brought my Canada Goose in for professional cleaning.  I was advised that the fading at the seams will be worse once cleaned.  Since I wore this coat less than 100 times, I am a senior who is not hard on her clothing, I could not understand how this expensive coat would be showing wear.  I was told this is a common issue with Canada Goose in the Dry Cleaning business.  I have submitted a claim but was told by owner of Dry Cleaners they will not warranty "wear".  If this is true, I will never purchase another in the future.  Certainly not worth the money for this poor quality.Update:  I have yet to hear a response about warranty from Canada Goose (I live in Canada).  It has been over 3 weeks!  When I see who Board of Directors are, I am even less impressed.  Save your hard earned money!

Name: Rebecca
Review: Myself and my husband visited your store in Regent Street London yesterday, the store had a organised queue outside we were both happy to wait.We were greeted with a smile by Tillie who spent sometime with me choosing a jacket, my husband decided he wanted to try on one of your mens jacket as well we both ended up purchasing a jacket each.Please pass on our thanks to Tillie she was really helpful, and happy to spend the time with us. The whole shopping experience was smooth and not stressful at all.We both left with big smiles on our faces!!

Name: Angelie Solis
Review: So happy having a warmer coat Can’da goose is the best one

Name: Elizabeth Smn
Review: The coat isn’t has warm as I thought it would be. It also runs small so you have to size up.

Name: Wayne Thechampmccabe
Review: Lovely shop katelyn was so helpful and help me source my jacket just in time for Xmas thanks guys

Name: Michael Danby
Review: Spent £1300 on a Canada goose coat.  It’s nice and warm. Good.  The zip is an absolute nightmare. I’ve been stuck inside the coat 3 times. Tried wd40. Works for a couple of days but then, stuck again.  If you charge top dollar and then put cheap and nasty Chinese zips in.  Taking the p*sdNoted Canada gooses reply below.  Clearly they didn’t read my review (not surprised).  My problem is I can’t get out of the coat, not as they’ve somehow understood that can’t zip it up.  I think it’s pretty clear above?

Name: V Francia
Review: Canada Goose's products, their Customer Care and Warranty Departments exemplify regal, quality, prestige, leadership excellence and exemplary customer service above the rest of their competitors. Particularly Franco, my Warranty Service Advisor was exceptional, friendly, patient, accommodating and ensured that my defected product was going to be taken care of, meaning he assisted me in submitting a speedy claim, efficiently and after I explained the specific defects with my product, he mentioned that most likely the defected product would be eligible for complete replacement at no extra cost in addition to doing his best to ensure that the Warranty Dept as a courtesy would cover my shipping costs!  I can't thank you enough Franco for going above and beyond and taking care of me is the continued reason why my family and I have been long-time valued and loyal Canada Goose clients thru the years and will continue to be valued clients! Administration, please give Franco a nice bonus for the holidays as he exceeded my family's and my expectations!  :)

Name: Zohreh Fayaz
Review: Hi,  bought 3 coats last Christmas.  One of the coats had an issue which needed to be fixed.  So I sent it to them to fix.  Back and forth with them, time wasted caused me to miss wearing my coat for last winter (got it back when the weather was not permitting to wear).  I opened the package I received from Canada goose this year.  The coat looks so wrinkled and old now.  Back and forth with the CS, they ask me to sent it back to review again.  Are you kidding me, paid so much money, and not being able to wear the coat for 2 years? No no I want an exchange, to be able to wear my coat for this Christmas at least.  Am I asking for too much? No of course not.  So do not buy such an expensive cloths with such poor Customer service.

Name: SnakeEyes ny
Review: -- See updated from dec19th below...-- This company is extremely disappointingBought 1 canada goose long jacket for my wife. After 1 winter living in the city it was cracked everywhere. I went back to the NY store. They told me they will fix it if i ship it to the repair facility in Canada!I sent it… had to pay for cleaning…the coat came back fixed but poorly. The sleeves are not the same size anymore. They cleaned it with bleach i feel since the blue color is turning brownish on some spots.Very disappointing by the service for a 1500usd coat.. that didn’t pass 2 winters-- UPDATE dec19thGot a response on Trustpilot as you can see... where they pretend that they will reach out to me.. blabla...Guess what! Nobody reached out.. this company once more cannot be trusted.. same as the first time when they say that they will fix my coat.. and basically ruin it!So my only advise for those who are reading this! AVOID THIS BRAND.. no service for a 1500usd coat.

Name: Rob Richardson
Review: I recently purchased a couple of Canada Goose jackets, these were my first purchases from the brand, one was online from the website and the other from the Dublin store. Both experiences were great and the products are fantastic quality. I have to lean towards the face to face shopping experience though as the staff in Dublin were fantastic and I would probably have ordered the wrong size online.Big thanks to the Dublin team you are amazing and truly understand customer service, see you soon for my next purchase!

Name: Andrew L
Review: When I first got my jacket the button holes were saying shut so I had to cut them to put the button through it. The bands of your arm have freed up. Besides that it keeps me very warm when I need it to

Name: P Motz
Review: Had an amazing experience purchasing my husbands coat at the Canada Goose Banff Location. This is not our first time shopping here, we both have purchased a few coats here and we always are treated like family the moment we walk in the door. I never feel pressured to buy, I’m allowed to try things on and take my time to think about what I want.This time was no different, JC was exceptional. He provided great customer service, made me feel like we were shopping with a friend. Really appreciated his laid back friendly feel. He’s so mild mannered and personable.Manager at this location, I hate I forgot her name is exceptional. Always has the biggest genuine smile and so willing to provide help. She remembers us each time we walk in the door. They make you feel like you’re hanging out with friends while shopping!Did I mention I absolutely love their products! Amazing warm and stylish coats! I wouldn’t shop nor have I at another location . Keep it up guys I’ll be back!

Name: Elif Oksoy
Review: Update as of 12/11/23They decided to get back after my review got so many views, only to tell me accidental damage is not covered . This is a great way to cover themselves. Since when , does this count as accidental damage? The care instruction clearly states gentle wash cycle. I washed the jacket in the gentle wash cycle only to see the rip after washing it. They claim that this as an accidental damage(!)Horrible customer service, this is unacceptable!They did not offer a replacement nor a repair free of charge. They want to charge for the repair which is unheard of.This Canadian company should not be given the privilege selling their products in USA where there is excellent customer service no matter what brand you purchase.

Name: Yo soy Carlos
Review: Great Jackets!I have a 20 yrs old parka and it's been durable, resistant and super warm.At First seems like a high price, but with the time l realized it's an investment.I have used in extreme weather of - 24  (40min) degrees and more constant on - 5 degrees.  (10, hrs outside) Nothing to complain.

Name: Keith Lombardi
Review: Purchased the Amherst Hoodie as an early XMAS gift for my son. Made the mistake of letting 30 days pass for him to receive the gift. When the product was examined it had a hole in the neck line plus dirt and cardboard shavings in the box making for a terrible first impression. Customer service sticking to its 30 policy for a return and equally interesting a no guarantee warrantee service repair that even if approved would take 4-6 weeks turnaround. A perfect combination....limit returns and provide suspect or non-existent warrantee service. One guarantee: just lost a high earning, 22 year old as a life-long customer. Bet that will be more impactful than a simple replacement or repair of a $375 hoodie?Well waited 3 weeks after Canada Goose promised to have a "customer representative" reach out to resolve the problem. No call, no email....which I totally expected. Had the hoodie repaired at my expense. Poor quality product, at an exceptional high price, non-existent customer service, warrantee service when or if they even respond to a problem and a return policy that is not communicated unless you know to ask. But there is an upside.....now that they have my email information I get bombarded with product and sale emails. Not sure  how a customer engagement could get worse?

Name: Katelyn Andrews
Review: I purchased a Canada Goose jacket just over 3 years ago and within those 3 years, it's had about 9 months of use. The black parka is starting to turn white. I've got a note from a professional advising the colour fading is excessive (a fault) and a quick google search will tell you this is a universal problem. Canada Goose have told me this is just "normal" wear and tear. An absolute disgrace. Please don't purchase from this company, the items are of extremely poor quality and customer service is non existent.

Name: James
Review: Purchased online, which was very simple, although I suggest not using a PO Box or parcel locker or anything similar. The jacket itself is very nice and looks stylish. I am in Melbourne Australia which is quite mild compared to many other places, but the jacket does well here that’s for sure. I would say the sizing is also true. Overall, very happy with this jacket.

Name: Virginia
Review: Terrible costumer service! No 👎🏼 Phone email

Name: DEBRA OUELLETTE
Review: Amazing shopping experience and a fantastic product!!!

Name: gary denault
Review: I was walking out because I didn't find what I needed, windbreaker,  while I visiting.  Someone asked if I needed help.  I had never heard of Canada Goose before (not much need of a heavy coat in Dallas) and was happy with the young lady to did help, and the jacket seems to be of good quality.

Name: customer
Review: I have been the proud owner of a Canada Goose Carson Parka Heritage for the past 7 years. As of now too small for me in S, I had to let it go in order to get a new one in M/L and I was very excited to do so. First let me just say that it is ABSOLUTELY UNFAIR that they have the "Canada Goose Generation Program for trade in" only operating in Canada/US and nothing in Europe/UK...WHY?!?! It took me ages to sell my Parka and I have constantly got contacted by scammers, very stressful situation. For such an expensive Parka (£1.5K) the service should be premium EVERYWHERE and not only in Canada/US!Then, and it is not only me saying it, the quality of the Parkas really went down, not really understandable as the price has nearly doubled in the past 7 years.I went to Canada Goose London Regent Street and while trying a Langford Parka Heritage in my size, I noticed that the fur was nothing to compare with my old Carson Heritage. Instead of having a nice and thick goldy Coyote fur, it was some light and fuzzy white and grey fur, very flimsy and not even stitched properly as some of the fur hairs flying everywhere (I asked to try another one and it was the same situation). Also in the fur hood trim they removed the metal wire allowing you to shape it nicely so when the hood is on, it was impossible to see anything and I was looking like a complete idiot with the fur covering my face, such a stupid idea of removing the absolutely essential metal wire!I asked the staff to ask the manager if it was possible to swap the hood trim, or to get it custom made upgraded or just to buy it separate and the answer was "some parka come with it some does not", well such a very useful explaination!I ended up not buying a new one as for £1.5K I really feel the quality has gone and the service in store or globally is absolutely not up to standard according the price mark of those items, very disappointing!

Name: Christine Tam
Review: Great to visit and sales consultant very helpful! Glad to discover the gloves I have been searching for.

Name: Yim Fong Katharine
Review: Friendly salespeople, professional acknowledge for the products.

Name: Brandi Exley
Review: The sales associate and his knowledge of your coats.

Name: Mr M J Edwards
Review: Excellent product, warm, smart

Name: Gary Berliner
Review: The store clerk held the item until we returned from lunch.

Name: GEN CHITOLIE
Review: It was a real pleasure to be in the shop. The staff were so friendly, attentive and patient. I tried on lots of coats with the assistant Brandon being such a joy and lovely to liaise with. Plus all the staff were lovely too. Brandon gave proper customer service, made us feel looked after and listened to. He gave us the option to sit while he gathered all the coats I wanted to try on and gave us refreshments. I even experienced the ice room. Your store should be used as a guide on how to look after customers.

Name: CELLE
Review: Thank you ! Nice

Name: K Dimachkie
Review: I loved the attention and the personalized in-store approach. The salesperson was knowledgeable, didn't attempt to hard-sell, and showed a lot of empathy and understanding. I genuinely felt that he looked out for me and that I was in safe hands.

Name: Deb Williams
Review: Your service was so good at mall of America!! Tks so much 😊

Name: Amantha Shah
Review: The consultant that helped me, was just amazing. It was a big purchase and it was a gift for my sister that was going to South Africa, so the agent was patient and made suggestions which I really appreciated.

Name: LadyCS
Review: They allow me to try as many as I want until I find the right one. The guy is very patient and accommodating

Name: John Tan
Review: Canada Goose not only offers a top-notch product but also excelled in customer service. When buying my first Canada Goose Puffer Jacket, I was uncertain about the design and the right size for me. The staff at Canada Goose Banff were incredibly helpful and accommodating, allowing me to exchange the item twice until I found the perfect one. I appreciate the patience and support of the staff! Special thanks to Romeo and the lady who assisted me!

Name: Deb Brenner
Review: We had such a positive experience. We weren’t sure which coat we wanted so had to try on so many different ones. The saleswoman was beyond patient and kept bringing us allDifferent coats. We came for one coat and ended up buying two!

Name: Katie F

Review: The brand stands by their product. The staff is both knowledgeable and friendly. And the product quality is second to none.

Name: Luke Rowan
Review: I Had a Garson gillet bought for my birthday by my Wife. In less than 30 days the stitching came undone near the left side pocket (jacket had been worn a handful of times & not in tough conditions). I completely appreciate that sometimes things can go wrong and manufacturing processes can never be without flaws. However, I emailed the warrenty/customer service team over 2 weeks ago now. I have had no responses in the way of a solution or next steps. I called the customer service helpline after 7 days had elapsed from the original claim, only to be told that "I need to be patient". I have sent photographs and proof of purchase to them as requested. To say I am disappointed is a huge understatement. I love the jacket and I am devastated that I am currently unable to wear such a nice product in the current cold weather. As a new customer I am also very disappointed so far in Canada Goose, this is the first item of their brand I have had and I would expect the price point and prestige of the name to be reflected in the customer service they offer. I have reluctantly written this negative review in the hopes that it highlights the poor performance so far, of their customer services department. I would also like to add that as a company, they are, at present, in breach of multiple sections of the UK consumer rights act 2015. Please rectify your shortfall here Canada Goose! You should be doing better for your customers!

I’m not sure if this is because of the way we looked however you should never judge anyone by their looks because in the end I left wiht a jacket which I am very happy about.

Name: Bre
Review: I received a Canada goose hat for my birthday and it didn’t fit my head right so all I tried to do was simply exchange it for a different one. It was brand new with tags never worn and I would obviously pay the difference if a hat was more expensive. The manager that helped me was not considerate at all and told me that without a receipt it couldn’t do anything and that even if I had a receipt the chances my grandmother bought it within 30 days and gave it to me as a present then is slim. So why does Canada goose have a 30 day return window when people get things as a gift? That’s almost impossible for people to buy a gift, give the gift, and then have time to return the gift if it doesn’t fit. I think the policy is ridiculous and very inconsiderate. For a high end company like this I am NOT impressed and will be taking my business elsewhere.

Name: Szymon Czerwiński
Review: Canada GOOSE IS CHEATING!I bought a jacket full of joy from CANADA GOOSE, from a company that prides itself on quality, customer service and its prestige! Nothing could be further from the truth! I advise you to be careful and think twice about your purchase! The jacket was slim - according to the procedure, I returned it via the return card received by DHL! The jacket was collected by an employee on October 30, 2023, as confirmed by DHL with his name and surname. Since that day, the company has not refunded the money! At first she claimed that she had not received the jacket and I had to personally prove to her that the goods had been delivered! From the moment of proof, indicating the name and surname of the person receiving it, the time, the day, did she change the narrative and claim to explain the matter? One time he claims that the finance department is analyzing the matter, another time he says they can't find the jacket in stock. Every second e-mail message indicates that it will take another 2 business days. I have already reported the matter to the bank as fraud, and I am also reporting it to the police! In Europe, there is no telephone to call, only an e-mail address to which someone responds every time! There is no help, no explanation, just corporate gibberish! I am shocked that it seems like this - which is wrong - a prestigious brand treats customers as thieves and due to its own mistakes and mess in the warehouse - illegally withholds customers' money! I do not recommend! I advise you to be careful so that you don't have the same problems as I did. I don't have several hundred euros and I don't have a jacket!

Review: The service was amazing when I purchased my coat this summer in prep for winter in alberta(recently moved back from the okanagan) but after wearing my coat on days that hovered just below 0 degrees I found the loft not thick enough to keep me warm without many layers. This is a sad thing since my older coat that I purchased in 2009 from you is warmer and more lofty. I am remiss to say that the quality of Canada goose has gone down and it is not keeping me warm like it did then with my older model. I am certain when it hits -30 which in theory it should withstand well against, I will be left feeling too cold to enjoy being outside for winter activities. So for the money I spent ( 3 times that of which I spent in 2009) I give this only 3 stars for the value and when I purchase my next winter coat likely I will not be returning to the Canada goose label.

Review: Paid 795 EUR for a jacket and the inside pocket was ripped. I immediately sent it back so they can send me a new item. Turns out, they cannot send me the new one and I have to order again even though it was a faulty item to begin with. I expected much better service for such a price.

Name: John Owens
Review: High quality, upscale style, comfortable products and exceptional customer service!

Name: Chriss
Review: They're not trying to sell you the product, they are there to help you find the best fit not only in size but on how you are going to wear it.

Name: Mary Sparkes
Review: Good qualiry as expected and delivery by the company was as promised.

Name: Ozan Cergel
Review: It was a lovely and smooth shopping experience. thanks...

Name: Harsimran Singh Sekhon
Review: Very good, comfortable

Name: Kris M
Review: Amazing quality and service! Everything that I ordered online was perfectly packaged and so nice quality. Everything that I bought in Prudential Center in Boston was amazing and the service was so professional and helpful! Thank you so much!

Name: Paula Gignac
Review: What made this particular store very pleasant was how welcoming and genuine the staff was; I have been to many Canada Goose stores and most of the time found the staff unwelcoming and it made me feel uncomfortable so I left right away and never lingered and purchased anything.

Name: Shreya Dey
Review: Great jacket.Perfect for the cold winters to keep one cosy and protected.

Name: Lesley Mak
Review: I sent an email to the customer service a few weeks ago, but there’s no response all.  For this price, I don’t expect this kind of service.

Name: customer
Review: Great fit, quality, style.

Name: PEMA SHASOK
Review: Bought for the first time! I was visiting Canada from California! Heard so much about how warm n comfy the Canada goose jackets are! So as a souvenir and for my warmth this winter, I bought one! Really impressed with all the customer services we received from the store in downtown Toronto mall! Thank you! Keep up the great job and energy! As about the jacket that I bought, I’m yet to wear n experience it yet since California is not cold yet! But I’m sure it’s so worth it buying! Thank you!

Name: JOHN HOWLETT
Review: Very fast and efficient

Name: Steve Tenzer
Review: All good. A pleasure to work with

Name: Princi90
Review: It was a brilliant experience shopping at Canada Goose store in Banff. The jacket I bought is great and the customer service was praiseworthy.

Name: customer
Review: Canada Goose cold weather gear is beautifully made and does the job it is intended to do.

Name: laline heang
Review: This is my first time went to the store the service was great I love my jacket a lot

Name: WENZE Lyu
Review: I can try different type and size of vest

Name: Monica Reddy
Review: Megan and the team here are an amazing group. I recently moved away and still only choose to shop at Canada Goose when visiting Edmonton. I am always treated with the best customer service I have ever experienced at a Canada Goose. Continue being amazing!

Name: Jamie
Review: the customer service in-store was excellent!

Name: Raff Pellettidri
Review: Great service

Name: Serge
Review: It was great purchasing experience. The package came on time.The vest is very stylish, l love it!

Name: Paul Letournal
Review: Staff friendly, knowledgeable and went above and beyond to find the best fitting jacket ever!!!

Name: Lawrence Inouye
Review: I was greeted promptly by a friendly, courteous sales person who responded to my questions in a polite and knowledgeable manner.  She took the time to provide me with alternatives - style and size.

Name: Tom Sutton
Review: The sales people were both very nice and patient with our party.

Name: Nancy
Review: Love, love, love Canada Goose!!!

Name: Julien Rodot
Review: Overall great experience. The warranty was very appreciated and when we got back the coat it was like brand new. The only thing is that we had to pay the cleaning which could be taken care of by your company.

Name: LINDA PERRY
Review: Our sales rep was fantastic, and friendly.

Name: JOELLEN
Review: The child's hat is adorable, and most importantly, warm.

Name: Travis Michael Jennings
Review: Ali (I think that is the correct spelling of her name) was wonderfully helpful. Unfortunately, she was not there when I went back to purchase my parka. I hope she was credited for the sale. I love my Wyndham Parka.

Name: TRAVIS DAVIDSON
Review: Website is easy to use, Products delivered on time!

Name: Lon Pinkoski
Review: Was a great experience and even though that jacket wasn’t in the store and was ordered in very quickly was extremely happy with staff and the purchase.

Name: DANA MORRISON
Review: Excellent Customer Service. Really nice Staff

Name: Steven
Review: I decided to order my new winter jacket on line from Canada Goose. The selection was great and the ordering process was very easy. I really appreciate how fast me item made its way to me.

Name: Emma
Review: Couldn’t get a product in the uk, found the product in Canada but you don’t offer international shipping 😔

Name: robert
Review: Great service, love my Borden bomber jacket Pure quality, gentleman who who served me was extremely knowledgeable and very helpful.Not my first purchase from Canada Goose and won’t be my last :)

Name: Fred Liu
Review: Super services from your friendly staff in downtown Vancouver

Name: Lisa
Review: The staff was very helpful and friendly.

Name: Kum-Ting See
Review: Very friendly sales people.

Name: Darren
Review: The staff were awesome, from the greeting at the door to the staff in different sections of the store all very friendly and willing to help. Store got super busy and the staff person helping me was able to expidite the purchase and get me out the door so I could keep an appointment on time. That was excellent service, considering there were multiple large ticket item sales happening.

Name: Marianne
Review: The people at the store made it the best experience.

Name: Michele
Review: The young man who helped us was very friendly and knowledgeable. He spent a lot of time explaining the product and making sure we were happy!

Name: Will
Review: Nice team !  Thanks

Name: Norm Thompson
Review: Everything happened as I expected.If today’s ice storm is any indication of what’s around the corner I will get to wear it .

Name: Linda Rewalt
Review: I Purchased, my parka from the Somerset store. Love all of the sales personnel and the young lady that helped me try on various parkas could not have been more professional or knowledgeable. They have a great sales team at the store with a huge product selection.

Name: Nathalie Rheaume
Review: great quick service. Clear instructions on warranty services and quick turnaround.

Name: Wangda Fnu
Review: Very good and very good

Name: Zong Kai Ye
Review: The Canada goose is comfortable outerwear

Name: TC
Review: Great service. Pleasant team to work with. Manager educated us on packing jacket.

Name: Marwan Dalle
Review: Amazing workers and fantastic sales experience. Excellent product quality and brand.

Name: Rose Prince
Review: The staff were so friendly  and knowledgeable,  spent a long time showing me the options and explained all the benefits . I wore my coat in Alaska , I was so warm and cosy . It is worth every penny that I spent and I love it !

Name: WHITNEY Holmes
Review: wonderful!!!! best staff, hype team and knowledgeable about the coats! so warm and getting put ti use with all the wind and snow in bush AK.

Name: K Ann
Review: Fits great, feels great, keeps me warm

Name: may stewart
Review: It was good to walk into the store a receive great polite service

Name: Paige E
Review: I loved the store on fifth avenue and the service was great

Name: Van Huynh
Review: Great Canadian products.

Name: Eugene Poon
Review: The agent one the phone was professional.  The product was delivered faster than I expected

Name: Nicole
Review: Good product, friendly and useful staff.

Name: michael connolly
Review: Good site good products but a bit boring

Name: Stephanie Ross
Review: Great service

Name: Jodie
Review: Great website, great customer service and a truly beautiful product. Well worth the money. Absolutely timeless.

Name: Laurie Jacobs
Review: The sales people were great they listened to what I was saying and were able to put me in the perfect cost for me

Name: Muhammet Arslan
Review: Great coats for me and my daughter, Thank you Canada goose family, for the great quality and delivery..

Name: Randall Christy
Review: I love my down vest.  I really like it comes in at the waist.  Most other down vests are very straight.  Yours are more tailored towards a women’s figute

Name: howard fisher
Review: Incredibly light and warm. Quality materials great zippers and abundant pockets. Seems like it will hold up well.

Name: Tracy
Review: I really enjoyed my products and also the experiences I have in purchasing the coats. The customer services is above and beyond my expectations. I appreciate their services and willing to help customers out with lots of patiences!

Name: andrew loftus
Review: The coat is fantastic. Looks and feels great.

Name: Lijana Pilelyte
Review: The store was very clean and organized, the sales person was very attentive without being pushy, knows the product.

Name: Wendy Struthers
Review: I was able to trade in my old coat and get a new one I preferred.   The sales clerks were great.

Name: Miss Rhonda McEwan
Review: The whole Canada Goose experience was Fantastic

Name: Roger
Review: Zip not working on a £520 fleece. Can’t do it up as you can’t get the two parts to slide in together. Their warranty says it has a special lock on it to stop it opening and I should get used to it. Now taking it to our local council consumer department for them to take action. I wish I had checked here before buying - absolutely disgusting service for a very high priced item

Name: Cody Watier
Review: Sent my jacket in for repair hoping warranty would cover it. NOPE! They claimed it was from "normal wear and tear". Umm excuse me? These zippers are heavy duty. They didn't even offer to fix the zipper at a cost either and instead they sent it back to me in the same condition I sent it. So I wasted around $35ish on shipping, waited a month to get it back not fixed... Still fighting with them and disputing their decision. Their so-called warranty is horrendous. They don't give a sh!t about their customers at all. Would not recommend even bothering trying to deal with their supposed "lifetime warranty". Considering filing a complaint against them to the Better Business Bureau. Would give them 0 star review if I could...

Name: Britni Mcdonough
Review: Literally the worst customer service !!! You are better off buying from a third party like Nordstrom.  Canada goose service is no help at all.  They just keep reading a script never addressing any “issue”. Refused to EXCHANGE a coat purchased in Canada with tags and receipts in the US because their policy is that it has to be done in the county it was purchased in.   I have not had any issue EXCHANGING gifts or purchases bought outside the US in their stores with any other luxury brand. I have purchased a few things from Canada goose without the need for costumer service so they are lucky they got that business out of me.  I would not recommend buying from them just based on customer service.  Makes me wonder how this lifetime warranty is going to go.

Name: Mark C. Casis
Review: Inquired about replacement of a hood and was made to believe prior to sending the jacket that they could replace it (Year bought, style model given)… but after multiple, frustrating back and forth emails/ messages and at least 5 calls to their 1(800) number… I got my jacket back and nothing was done.They could have saved me the time, money, and aggravation right from the start had they told me they could not replace it. I gave the year/model of the jacket and they did not know???  Seriously, someone does not know their job.Worst. Customer. Service.Worst. Warranty.

Name: Kostas Stamkopoulos
Review: I bought a Canada Goose Vest with $570. I found 2 holes on it, 1 one the inside and 1 on the outside. I sent it for inspection (which I paid $30) and they told me that this was an illusion and there was no hole found, and also they inspected the whole vest and there was not hole. So I take it back after 3 weeks of "inspection", I open the package and I find the big hole on the right arm. Now they told me to send the vest back for inspection again. To get 3 weeks and pay another $30. It is the first item from and been very disappointed.

Name: bakr siddeeq
Review: Bought a jacket for £500Not even been a year. Within 6 months it started to bobble. I emailed them and they said its not covered under warranty as its wear and tear. I've had jackets for £50 for years and they've lasted longer.

Name: Chloe
Review: I went into your Regent street store and I had fantastic service and help from Jett. I also spoke to Jameelah on the phone both are so helpful, Friendly and kind. 5 star service from both. The whole atmosphere of the store is great.

Name: Olivia
Review: Do not do the “ generations “ trade in . They wouldn’t take my coat due to “ a hole on the inner cuff.” This was more like fraying than a hole and on top of that with the money these parkas cost this should not even be happening. I have older coats I wore more often with no fraying on the cuffs. They did not specify on the trade in page that this was unacceptable and I wasted my time sending this coat out and now I have to wait for them to hopefully send it back . They should specify on the page more about what is and isn’t accepted for trade ins so others do not waste their time and they should stand by their products and quality. Never buying from them again !

Name: Annette Newton
Review: I have a yellow vest that has silver snaps on pocket and the snaps bled through.  They advised that this was not warranty so sent it back charged me for cleaning and it looks the exact same. Is this not why we purchase expensive items so that warranty is upheld.  I was most disappointed with the way I was treated by their customer care team.  I even reached out to the higher ups on linked in and got no response.  Definitely will not purchase here again.

Name: Alexey B
Review: I recently ordered a 850 pounds coat from Canada Goose, which unfortunately arrived damaged with stains. When I contacted customer support, I was shockingly not offered an exchange; only a return option.Furthermore, there's only one item of this particular model left in my size in the UK, and ordering from American websites is not a viable option for me. This means I have to shell out another 850 pounds to order a new coat and then wait for a refund, which is obviously far from ideal.To add to the inconvenience, the return process isn't as simple as dropping the item off at the post office; it involves arranging for a DHL pickup, which makes the whole process even more time-consuming and costly.The only solution Canada Goose offered me as compensation was a free next business day delivery for my next order, which is completely unsatisfactory, seeing as that is already the standard on their website. I am frankly shocked, outraged, and disappointed by this experience.

Name: Tony Paraskevopoulos
Review: In May I sent my coat  to Canada Goose to be cleaned as per the warranty. Several times I’ve been told since then nothing will be done to my coat because I can’t prove when I bought my coat with a receipt. I finally had a chance to speak to a manager, who actually listened and had my coat reinspected by the warranty team who dropped the ball. now a few repairs are being done to the coat i’ve only had this coat a year and has all these issues. I can’t phathom  how Canada goose can actually get away with this? Inside the coat there’s three tags that the warranty team uses to prove authenticity…. I’ve had this coat for at least a year now and a DWR is being put on my coat, so it doesn’t leak? My coat is  now being fixed the left and right cuffs I think they said the zipper is being replaced along with a couple other repairs? Somethings can be done as per the warranty without a receipt as a manufacturing defect but some manufacturing defects cannot be fixed without a receipt? Three months they had my coat and; if I didn’t speak to a particular manager nothing would’ve been done to my coat and it would’ve been shipped back to me the way it was . Finally, my coat is being sent back to me . I just received a text from the warranty team at at Canada Goose that my coat is being shipped back to me after three months! As per the manager, I’ve been told a goodwill gesture will be applied either a hat, scarf,or gloves one will be sent to me. There’s no promise which one though, but thank you Canada Goose you’re the best. I will never purchase anything from Canada Goose ever again after this. please be careful with Canada Goose because after this experience, I could tell you they don’t care about their customers at all.

Name: Fran
Review: Received mitts for Christmas ( the most expensive pair they sell) and the material started to wear after less than a dozen wearings. Apparently they don’t warranty accessories! Very difficult to deal with and no resolution whatsoever. They kept sending emails about how it would be reviewed by someone higher up. After 6 months plus I gave up( which is probably what they were hoping)!Overpriced and poor quality. I would not recommend buying any product from this company as they do not stand behind their products.

Name: Patsy
Review: Had 3mos.white start coming from seams,the coat had split on pocket, and same on bottom sent it to Canada Goose company, want to charge $250-$350 to replace. Was warm but not worth the money.not for everyday wear for 68 yr.old

Name: kristine prigo
Review: Terrible company, false lifetime warranty, my jacket looked exactly the same as it was still look faded and worn out. No repair has been done. DO NOT BUY from them again

Name: Kristine prigo
Review: Never ever buying a Canada goose again. I brought my Canada goose 4 years ago. The black faded like to an ash grey. The sleeves stitching was coming off. When I sent it to the warranty centre they said this is normal wear and tear and can’t be fixed or replaced. Life time warranty is a scam! Do not buy go for a moncler or something else!

Name: Aliya Sadiq
Review: Canada Goose are THIEVES!! Went into store and wanted to buy two coats. 1 was available and the second I purchased for home delivery as told wasn’t available in store. On the day of delivery wasn’t home get a notification saying “delivered” went home no package was given to neighbours nowhere to be found. Rang dhl rang Canada goose. Canada goose had constantly told me to wait “a few days” for DHL’s response as they’re trying to locate the package. I asked for picture proof of the parcel of where it’s gone. Sent me a picture that is NOTTT my house and NOT MY CAR IN THE DRIVE. I explained I have a bright red door and a silver car. The picture showed a white car and a black door. Canada goose wasn’t interested continued to ask me to wait promising me a refund on “Thursday”. On Wednesday two weeks after my original purchase date, I received an email from customer services claiming I will not be receiving any refund or any coat as the picture shows it was delivered to my house. I even sent them a picture of my house and my door number clearly showing. Unfortunately I paid in store with cash so I cannot charge back and they have just blatantly robbed me. I asked the store for a letter of deadlock to report it to the ombudsman service and I’m told they cannot provide this. WORST COMPANY AND WORST BRAND EVER.

Name: HC CT
Review: Bought multiple jackets for family member under the guise of a lifetime guaranty against defects.  Low and behold, first time i have an issue, they stated its wear and tear for laminate that fell apart inside of an older jacket.  At this point i requested to speak with the supervisor to determine what is considered normal wear and tear vs manufacturer defect.   He pretty much stated anything over something like 5-7 years is considered wear and tear.  This was not stipulated in the lifetime warranty claim.   These jackets WILL not last long and their customer service SUCKS.  DO NOT BUY.

Name: Sona
Review: Never buying anything again! Black jacket after couple of times using faded so much it looks cheaper and worst than Columbia jacket for $100 after 3years. Spent 2x $40 cleaning fees and they return my jacket back and said it looks good to them. Worst $1500 spent in my life.

Name: Ashley
Review: Sent my coat in for repair under the warranty scheme 7 weeks ago and still not received my coat back! Their website advertises a 4 week turn around. Not happy one bit

Name: Mohammed Kassab
Review: I'm posting this review here because Canada Goose did not accept the review I wrote on their website. (seems they don't want people to see\hear my experience)I bought the lockport jacket online, but it turned out too big for me, and I did not like the look. It made me feel like I was a firefighter. So I immediately requested a return online less than 2 hours after receiving the coat. I got it packed and good to go. When their warehouse received it, they rejected the return and said there were signs of "wear" I only tried on the jacked and took it off. I didn't have it on for more than 5 minutes. I didn't go anywhere with it, and the tags are still on. I'm not sure what strict inspection they performed here, but it definitely feels overboard. If trying on a jacket causes "wear" then that tells me the quality of your jacket is very poor. This is the first time I've had a bad experience buying something online. I have no idea what else I could have done to prevent "wear" from trying a jacket on and packing it within 2 hours of receiving it. After all the back and forth with customer service over the phone, their resolution was to either sell it 2nd hand or travel to the USA and use their trade in program. Imagine a Canadian buying a jacket from a Canadian company in Canada being told to travel to the USA to trade in a jacket. The worst customer service I've ever witnessed. So it looks like im stuck with this jacket unless Canada Goose is willing to cover travel expenses to the USA. Very disappointed with the whole experience and I definitely wouldn't buy from Canada Goose again. I feel like I was taken advantage of. I hope all I have shared will help those thinking of being buying online. If you like their products, I strongly recommend going in-store if you can try on things, or else Canada Goose will force you to keep it.

Name: jack warchalowski
Review: Bought good looking, $1000 Winslow Coat before my oversees business trip but decided not to use it.  Sent it back to Toronto based CG for a return after 3 wks - still within the month long return interval.  After 10 days at the return centre the item was processed and returned back to me with no explanation.  After my follow up a number of times I was told that the item was dirty (It was NOT - I never used it and it had original stickers and packaging) and it was missing a hood ( I did forget to include it in the return package).  On top of that the 30 day return period was passed :-).  Never was asked to add the missing hood which could be done within a day (living just outside of Toronto).  Have the pictures of the coat and its perfect (not dirty) condition.  Can't believe that return of this item could be refused with a made up reason !!!.  Unfortunately, this was my fourth but the last purchase at CANADA GOOSE.

Name: Mr,
Review: From a company as highly regarded as Canada Goose, the overall product quality and customer experience has the been the WORST and quite honestly disgusting. I had to return my jacket within the first 40 days of owning it due to the elasticity going in the sleeve. Asked for an exchange as product are fully warranted... Apparently. They repaired and sent back. within 3 months seams started coming apart to which i sent back and they repaired. What i received back from a company who say they have 'Superior Standards' looked like my dog had a go at it. The repair seams didn't meet and loose ends were hanging out. Trying to get any update or a person to speak with regarding a full refund or replacement has been nothing less than a joke. Currently in the process of reporting to trading standards and taking commercial action. Don't believe warranty policy... It's deceptive!

Name: Mila
Review: In December 2022 I ordered two jackets from Canada Goose for a €2990.00. Since both did not fit me, I had both jackets picked up at my door via courier as instructed on the website.Canada Goose later informed me that they had received a game for children (physics professionals) and so they cannot accept my return.I assured them several times that I packed everything correctly and pointed out that they bear the risk for the return. Despite available customer service, I received no help at all. They didn't want to give me my money back... I was asked again and again if I hadn't accidentally sent something else back... They also didn't open a case with courier. I did that myself.I then investigated on my own and found out that one of the "missing jackets" was being sold on an online market place not far from me. Made an appointment and called the police. In cooperation with a very courteous courier employee, I was able to determine from the profile of the person in question that she was selling other goods that had gone missing from the courier, which ultimately led to a house search and the seizure of the two jackets. It turned out that the courier employee (who picked up my package) had stolen the jackets and exchanged them in order to then sell them... Only when Canada Goose got the jackets back did I get my money back. All in all, the whole thing cost me a lot of nerves and time. I put more than 20 hours of work into this and I'm lucky that the jackets could be found in this way. Canada Goose would definitely not have fulfilled its obligation to give me my money back. Even the police file number and a report from the courier were not enough to confirm my story. Only when they got the jackets back in their hands did I get my money back. Without my full commitment, they would have had to give me back the money anyway and would certainly not have found the jackets either. I will definitely never buy or wear anything from this brand again. This was by far the most frustrating online shopping experience I have ever had. That's a violation of consumer rights.

Name: Patricia Walsh
Review: Jacket missing inside strap. Sent pictureswith tags on. Told to return jacket by mailfor an inspection. Jacket three days old. Unwilling to send a simple inside strap.  No supervisor available.  Unable to leave review at end of call.  CANADA GOOSE LEAVES A POOR IMPRESSION. 82% OF ALL REVIEWS ARE POOR OR RATED 1.BE GUIDED

Name: Joe Moe
Review: really bad on the customer service. I accept a question. Do you don't want to respond this A? I cannot respond to you the only $650 in my jacket and every kings and 6 months. I wasn't not gonna pay the bank back until they return my money visit. I had a charge back from the bank  to the bank and. I mean going up-and-down with stupid companies since 6 months very bad customer service  will call you back. They'll never call you back.I recommend that to buy from this company very poor service. Everything do you stole my money? Yes. Will go further and try to get my money back? I don't. Even wanna. Give? Them a star but I'm a lawyer go on here. I want to give them a list weigh less than a star.

Name: Adam
Review: Bought a Brand new jacket from the website.After 1 wear noticed a hole in the sleeve. Sent it for repair under the “lifetime warranty”After 11 weeks I received instruction I would have to pay the repair costs. The company are a disgrace. I bought the jacket, wore it once. It had a fault then I had to pay 20% the value of the jacket to have it repaired

Name: Stussy H
Review: Ordered aCanada Goose expedition.. direct from CG.ORDER NUMBERCGGB_A01181647Jacket arrived well boxed up. However the interior box was torn up in 3 places. Not fit for purpose. As the jacket is for a birthday present, I feel pretty let down. £1450 for a jacket yet packaging is atrotious. Have emailed & called CG. Still awaiting a reply.  Disgusting customer service.

Name: Elsa Chavez
Review: I am looking for the best jacket to live in Chisasibi ( the north of Quebec). I heard Canada goose had the best warm jackets, but I guess it's not right.If you search right the best jackets for a cold Canadian weather are PARKAS with the highest FILL POWER. The jackets should also have MORE DUVET than feathers (preferably 90/10).I looked for parkas for a weather of -30 and below in Rudsak, Moose knuckles and Canadian wolf. I realized that some of those brands offered a fill power of 700 to 800+ fill power and a percentage of 90/10 duvet and feathers.I chatted with a representative in Canada goose and he ended the chat when I asked if they had a parka with those characteristics. They don't offer a better product than those other brands. if you check well they only offer parkas with a fill power of 650+ maximum!!!! Some of those even have 80% duvet and 20% feathers.I guess it's just the name and marketing. I mean if you search well is one the oldest brands, which means it has the name and the money to advertise their products.Please do your research well don't waste your money. Don't buy their products just because it's ""Canada goose" If I hadn't done my research I would be buying a jacket of 2000$ last week. It's not worth it, other brands offer a better quality.

Name: jojo salvador
Review: I am from Chicago. My sister placed an order in behalf of me. It is model Toronto Jacket.  When they arrived here in Chicago, I must try it out, I am usually Small but this one is quite big for a small so I guess this product has 2 Small sizes.  So, she arranges a replacement if none is available just a refund or a credit.  It was arranged but when it was returned, they claimed that it was dirty and used.  To be honest, I tried this 4 times for them to see if it looks good (small or big).  Do not order online because of the risk of not being able to return it for a replacement or full refund.  With this i will not  buy any of their product anymore and go to Kanuk and Alpaca Outerwear.

Name: Beth Hopkins
Review: I spent $1450 on coat in Chicago and they shipped to me because they did not have my size. When I received the coat the zipper was broken. I called abd spoke to costomer service (Brayden) and he told me it would be at my expense to ship it back and also my expanse to pay the $25 "cleaning" fee. Furthermore, if they deemed the coat was not broken then they would give back to me. WHAT??!!!??? I let Brayden know that even Target offers a prepaid label regardless. So I told him that I was going to dispute the charge on my credit card for damaged goods. After a lengthy hold he came back on the line to say to fill out the warranty return.
