They could not exchange it and could not offer a place in NJ to return and exchange. WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE. SHAME ON CANADA GOOSE. Deplorable. I am the client and I was on the defense the entire call. I want the coat. I want a coat that is not damaged. I am calling my credit card company regardless. Why should I be paying interest and have a damaged product? Moncler, Northface here I come!!!

Name: Matt LJ
Review: Credit where it’s due, I’ve used CG a few times now and with the items I’ve decided to keep they have a quality feel and no signs of wear (in frequent use for over a year), more recently I have decided to return an item and within 10 working days they have collected from my doorstep (via DPD) and the amount has already appeared in my bank. Very efficient service!

Name: kevin welling
Review: My jacket lost its shape at the back followed procedure and sent it back they informed me that nothing was wrong and to wash and tumble it this I have done and it’s still the same went back again and was instructed to tumble on cold still no difference am awaiting a reply absolute joke The fact that it’s taken over a year to reply says it all really complete and utter useless company

Name: A. H
Review: Made a claim for their lifetime warranty for only a missing zipper to begin with. The jacket had a few other items to address and I did mention that as well and sent them detailed pictures and a description.The agent reviewed the case and I was asked to send it to their service center but to have it professionally cleaned otherwise they would charge a fee for that.I spent over $60.00 for this and shipping fees only for them to say nothing is covered and offered to "repair" my jacket for almost $300.00Keeping in mind that my primary issue was a missing zipper I declined and just to address that it was $50.00 which made absolutely no sense.In the end, the sent back my jacket and I was charged $100.00 for the benefit of them saying they will not cover anything. Canada Goose has a useless warranty so if you have any issues simply do not waste your time and money with their customer service.For the amount of money you spend the quality nor the service is appropriate.In 2023 with so many competitors on the market I would advise to spend your money elsewhere.The company has really gone downhill.

Name: Georgina Jones
Review: I bought a second hand coat on ebay . The cuffs were frayed .I emailed canada goose and said my situation and I also did not have the original receipt.They said I did not need receipt for warranty .They repaired it and my coat came back like a new coat .The only moan , I have was it took 2 months .It was worth the two months and if I ever find myself with alot of money ,I would definitely buy a brand new one .

Name: Francesca Davies
Review: Although my experience in store wasn’t as expect first time. Their warranty scheme worked for me. Sent my coat, was very worried after reading reviews and straight away they said they would replace. For how much you pay, they don’t offer next day delivery so I went to store in London again to pick it up - friendly staff and because it was less busy I felt the experience was so much better. I came onto here to see how their warranty scheme worked and I got so worried form these reviews sending my £1,250 coat away. Don’t listen to them, the process is faultless.

Name: JALLIE_C
Review: Do not buy from this company if you value your money!I wish I had never bought from CG, they have hands down THE WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE. Helpless and  they just talk to you in circles. I bought a $1400 jacket, I received a  clearly worn item which also was a different size than ordered. The jacket came with stains of which I sent proof to Canada Goose. All they did to fix the issue was told me to send it back and follow their return policies, after a lot of back and forth I was told "I will receive my refund as soon as it was delivered to their warehouse". When I reached out to them I was told to wait "1-2 business days for processing'. It's been 5 days since my return was delivered and when I reach out to them they just talk to me in circles, terrible since the jackets are really cute.

Name: Ali Lee
Review: Excellent service, coat dispatched quickly and when it was the wrong size the returns and refund couldn’t have been simpler.Will definitely buy from here again.

Name: yvonne whitley
Review: As others have mentioned, the warranty is absolute BS!! The parka I bought, began falling to pieces after just a few wears, buttons won't close, leading to a banging sound every time I walk, which means I can't wear it, the inner straps are unravelling from day one, sleeves are beginning to fray and the zip pieces have cracked off, its looking beyond shabby to say the least and I've only worn it a handful of times. To then be told I have to say for shipment from Ireland for repairs for a coat weighing 2.5kg! An absolute joke and extremely unsatisfactory, I feel royally ripped off!

Name: Jennifer Morales
Review: DO NOT RECOMMEND!! Scammers! I have been dealing with Canada Goose for about 3 months now regarding a jacket I sent back them because it didn’t fit me and they literally sent me a shipping label to return to them and now they’re saying they did not receive the jacket that it got sent to the wrong address and well I sent the jacket back using the shipping label they sent me and I have the proof of it and I even got a email saying they received my return but yet they’re saying they didn’t receive it? That is a $1400 jacket I am loosing money on and they seem to not care to help us out I’ve talked to multiple employees and even managers and they all just say the same thing we will try to figure it out. I am very disappointed with their customer service and how they do not care about helping us. If the package got sent to the wrong address that is their fault for sending me the wrong shipping label I followed all of their rerun instructions! be careful when you purchase an item from this company. I have also read a lot of other similar reviews like mine that they send you the wrong shipping label and it gets sent to they wrong address and then they say it’s your fault as the customer for basically following their instructions?? Doesn’t make sense to me that sounds like they just want to Rob their customers hard earned money! I have proof of them saying they received the return and how they still took the money from my account. They’re scammers!! They also have a lot of similar reviews like mine saying they went through the same thing..

Name: Chris Kemp
Review: I purchased a Canada Goode Hoody at a cost of £325 in September last year and it has developed a massive hole in the armpit where the wool has shredded apart.After submitting a warranty claim , packaging up the item and sending for inspection, Canada Goose have said they won’t repair or replace the item as Knitwear isn’t covered under their warranty program!An item of clothing costing £325 really shouldn’t be falling apart after 6 months! Totally unacceptable from a so called high end clothing brand!It’s a shame that Canada Goose as a company looks great from the outside but obviously with all the negative reviews , have zero customer care or after sales care once you have spent money with them! As a household that has 3 Canada Goose Parkas, 3 hoodies , gloves and hats, this will be the final purchase made at Canada Goose! A £325 hoody that is now fit for the bin!Date of experience: 07 March 2023

Name: Rocky
Review: I bought my Canada Goose jacket in 2014, just about 9 years ago, and it held up exceptionally well. It did experience normal wear and tear over the years. In 2023 I was able to submit a warranty claim, and sent in the coat for repairs. Tell me why they were kind enough to complete all of my repairs FREE OF CHARGE. Their customer service was also very reliable and reachable, both through email and telephone. They even sent my coat back in a cool suit bag. I ended up buying a Rudsak coat, since Canada Goose is much pricier now than it was, but it was a total mistake. My Rudsak coat started falling apart not even 4 months after purchase, plus their customer service is trash with a 1 year warranty with rules that are unexceptionally rigid. Canada Goose is worth the extra cash, plus it's a brand you can trust. I was shocked to see all of the poor reviews here, but I do know that many people who did not buy their coat from an official reseller or from the company its self received fake products. Or at least this was the case back in 2014.

Name: Adam Idris
Review: The worst customer service. They expect you to dry clean a brand new mw jacket for $90, then ship it for another $45, then wait for it to be returned. This is a $1,500 coat, they can't afford to send a label ? Really. Then string arm you into paying for cleaning when the item is new ? The life time warranty is a sham. Just read how many people had problems on a warranty. Maybe the department of consumer affairs needs to step in or maybe we all stop buying their overpriced coats and watch them fall. Screw you Canada goose. I bought a Montblanc, and it blows this piece of crap away. Never again will I buy anything from this company.

Name: Bradford Purdom
Review: Canada Goose refused to accept a return that had not been worn and was within the 30-day return window. if you're in Denver at the Cherry Creek mall do your self a favor and go to Arc'teryx in the same mall for comparable and more Colorado-appropriate gear that wont make you look like a douche.

Name: Gill
Review: Do not buy jackets. The fur hood is made from coyote animals who are trapped alive for days. They are hurt and killed badly for these jackets. Please stop this cruelty and do not but Canada Goose jackets. Lots of ethical alternatives available people. Canada goose claim the remaining fur they sale is old stock. What about all the goose feather then? That is shocking as well.

Name: Daniel Cornicello
Review: Canada goose customer service is a disgrace. I bought a light winter coat about a year and a half ago and after about a year of wearing it the left sleeve ripped on its own in multiple locations. The product was clearly defective. I went to Canada goose in soho and they confirmed with me that my product was defective and told me I had to send it to Canada goose where it will be fixed free of charge. They even gave me a pre paid shipping label. Upon its arrival, I was notified I would have to pay $80 for the repair, 40 for each sleeve. This was about three weeks ago now. I have called four times and sent multiple emails to tell them I will not be paying to have the right sleeve fixed when there is nothing wrong with it. Every time they tell me it will be fixed and the charge will go away and all I would need to pay for is the left sleeve  but every time they never follow up and nothing changes. It's a disgrace. Do they really need $40 that badly? Never buy a Canada goose product all they care about is extracting every last dollar they can they couldn't care less about you as the customer.

Name: BB
Review: another company who have made there wealth by duping customer to buy there so called quality products.I bought my son a goose jacket costing nearly £1000 the toggle broke after a few days of wearing it. Will not investigate but told me they would send another toggle. I WANT A QUALITY JACKET not tack not quality assured. They will respond all products are quality assured but obviously not.I was going to purchase another EXPENSIVE item but since extremely poor customer service I won't be, I'm boycotting this firm as will my colleagues

Name: Samanthaw
Review: Dreadful customer service the warranty is useless, my young son saved up to buy a coat and then damaged it,  so we asked for it to be repaired as per their warranty, only to be told it falls outside to their conditions.  It took them over 3 mths to tell us this!  DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS BRAND!

Name: Ping Ke
Review: The Lifetime warranty is useless. I bought a black parka with outershell made with 85% polyester and 15% cotton. After only 2 or 3 seasons’ normal wear (only during tough winter conditions), the fabric faded very bad in the front. My dry cleaner told me this was the problem with that type of Canada Goose fabric. I sent the jacket to Canada Goose Warranty and they told me the fabric was damaged because of an accident. I am very frustrated because there has never been an accident happened to the parka. I would have felt much better if they had told me it was normal wear and tear. Canada Goose is totally a scam to me considering the price I paid and the quality and service I received.

Name: Martin Cutler
Review: I purchased the Borden Bomber jacket for £1095. It was shipped express with DHL and arrived quickly. I recorded opening the sealed package (as I do with all expensive purchases), and to my dismay, there was no jacket inside! I received the standard Canada Goose box, and inside was just a coat hanger and a coat bag. I was furious! I lodged a claim with their customer service Team who were very apologetic. Unfortunately, after a month they have come back and said there is nothing they can do as DHL delivered the package. I have proof the coat was not contained within the package and yet they still won’t help. Absolute joke! I am in the process of taking legal action against Canada Goose/DHL.

Name: SofieH
Review: The Canada Goose Customer Service is outstanding. I have never experienced such a friendly and supportive customer care. It is a 100% worth it to invest in a jacket of this price, if the life long support is of such high quality. Many thanks to the friendly team, I appreciate your service a lot!

Name: M Hardy
Review: Still trying to get my money back from an order I ordered 2 weeks ago that wasn’t in stock ! Tried customer service again when I was told it would be in within 48 hours fobbed off without an excuse again and both times I phoned cut me off when I challenged them for a reason !               I have never known customer service as bad as this before !                             Please AVOID this company and don’t put yourself through the stress I have had with this company !

Name: Sisi Tan
Review: I sent my jacket to warranty. Unfortunately, i am waiting over 6 weeks, no repair and received back for the wrong item. I am frustrated and upset. Called out so many times and email back to the service team, just formal answer will somebody call me back 48 hrs. no one call back to follow up. Reply the email and then nothing help. Also, my account was double charge my cleaning fee and when i receive the jacket extremely dirty. Item received was wrong.

Name: Barry North
Review: Bought my daughter coat last year stitching started coming away in several places I got in contact with Canada goose they responded straight away.I sent jacket of as requested I have now been informed jacket under warranty and will be replaced.There customer services are outstanding and they stand by there warranty I’ve had no problems with this company.

Name: Charles Cazals
Review: Quite impressive, sent my jacket 8 years after I bought it, sleeves were starting to wear out and tear appart.Sent my jacked to them after submitting a customer service request, they made all the repairs for free, and sent it back to me also free of charge. I only had to pay for:- cleaning fees - if you clean it at your own dry cleaners, make sure to keep an invoice, as they do ask for proof- postal shipment only to send it to them - they pay for the return.When I got my jacket back, they had repaired even more than I asked for ! The sleeves were brand new and like the originals, they replaced some patches inside the coat and sewed back the mini holes near the sleeves. Everything looked brand new, super good work !ONE THING I WOULD IMPROVE:They also replaced the fur, which I had not asked for either. I would have preferred they didn't, and generally this is worth asking the customer about beforehand. Personally my opinion against real fur has grown since my purchase 8 years ago.

Name: Olivier Mota
Review: After years of hesitation, my wife and I took the decision to buy a coat each. In addition to a customer service in shop that was not necessarily at the level of a prenium brand (unpleasant saleswoman, no advice,...)I was surprised to discover, 2 months after my purchase, that my coat was losing feathers all over (inside and outside) through the seams (seams that were pulling out of the sleeves)Here I am, back in the Paris shop and I learn that the article is not exchangeable and that it must be sent under warranty (without having the guarantee that it will be in warranty?) for 5 weeks. It's very practical to send a coat for 5 weeks in the middle of winter, it will be more useful in spring...In short, and now to top it all off, Canada Goose has the temerity to ask for a cleaning fee before treating the problem.Besides the fact that I find this aberrant for a prenium brand to claim anything for a coat bought 1400€, this practice is illegal from a French law point of view.In addition, Canada Goose is legally supposed to rectify the problem within 30 days (whereas their announced delay is 5 weeks).I was very disappointed and expected much more from a brand of this standing. I think we can find much better elsewhere and at this price.

Name: J
Review: DEFINATELY IN-HUMANE.UNETHICAL AND UNECCESSARY CRUELTY IN EVERY WAY.  There’s much warmer, more affordable excellent quality, humane outerwear etc alternatives to this primitive company, and their products of cruelty.  No need for animal products anymore.  Evolve already.

Name: Lilian Vivas
Review: Terrible customer service. I sent my parka in for a busted seam, and they insisted I had third party work done. I had never. Canada Goose does not stand by their product.Canada Goose does not stand by their customers. I will never buy Canada Goose again.

Name: D N
Review: Beautiful and warm parka, the best I ever had. A masterpiece of manufacturing. I can’t understand the hate reviews, I think many people got scammed by fakers and didn’t buy the original. Schönste und wärmste Jacke die ich je gehabt hatte. Verarbeitung ist einfach Weltklasse. Verstehe nicht die negativen Bewertungen, die sind vielleicht betrogen worden und haben Fälschungen gekauft.

Name: Ali Tamsen
Review: Their return policy and phone customers service is a nightmare. I followed the link for return several times with no success until I reached out for help through LIVECHAT. No one picked up the phone even when it was ringing. I will never shop at Canada Goose.

Name: Mehran M
Review: The customer service is very rude! I verified that most of the agents are chinese and cannot even speak proper English! They just use the typical system messages to answer questions.

Name: Paul Bloor
Review: Quite simply the worst customer service in the history of retail 3 week old jacket with a faulty zip. I've had to pay to return for inspection then pay to have it returned to me. No one takes ownership for the shoddy service.  You are better going to North Face or Regatta

Name: Jim Caldwell
Review: Wow. Wish I’d seen this before I started buying this product.  Fact is when stuff goes wrong and they absolutely don’t stand behind their product. Poor quality gloves lasted 1 year of light use and then started tearing at the seams.  Never ever purchase their products. Lots of other great quality manufacturers out there who are obviously benefiting from Canada goose’s lack of caring about quality or service.

Name: Daniel  Franey
Review: I purchased some Canada Goose ski gloves for £200.00 several years ago. However I only use them for skiing which equates to at most 5 weeks use in that time. The suede looking patch near both thumbs started to wear away and now look like a pair of cheap £20 gloves. CG asked me to send them in which I did. After about a month of doing nothing they said it was general wear and tear and not covered by their warranty. After a spending thousands on this brand I expect far better customer service. I would thoroughly recommend steering clear of this brand. I know I will from now on. Not good quality product or service. DO NOT USE!

Name: Mark levy
Review: 3rd week waiting for a string cord. Abysmal customer service, no notice to when we will receive (new coat prior to xmas) do not purchase a coat from this company unless you really want to have the worst customer service v the most expensive purchase

Name: Jazz
Review: The Canada Goose company is awful. I send to repair my fur which was falling apart they advise we can't repair after spending thousands of dollars.I will not recommend anyone to buy Canada Goose in the future their customer service is also very bad.

Name: Guido Roma
Review: Unfortunately it is not possible to give 0 stars.I tried to buy 2 times a parka and in both the transactions they took the money and then they delete the order. I tried to speak with the customer care but they were not able to authorize the payment and in the end they told me to go directly to a store. They are ridiculous

Name: MC
Review: They do not deserve one star. I called because I bought a coat two years ago ( Kensington).  I am usually a large, but I had to go to 2xl to get one that fit.  I was considering getting a Chilliwack this year regardless the crazy increase in price. I wanted to order on line but needed advise for the size. After a lecture on Classic and Fusion system (apparently they favour the Asia market), I gave up. This is not rocket science people.  What really angers me is that this is a Canadian company, and considered a standard of quality. I have a hard time to reconnect the poor quality of customer service with the appalling cost of their products. Reading several reviews below, I am not alone. I would appreciate if they could change the name from Canada Goose to something like...Stupid Goose, or maybe Greedy Goose? It would save 33 M proud Canadians the embarrassment of being unwillingly associated to such poor standards.  Needless to say that from now on I will shop elsewhere...for my winter gear.

Name: RIvas Celina
Review: I sent my honest review to Canada Goose and sent it back jus cuz no meet the criteria guidelines I think they only accept good reviews any way the customer service is horrible my North Face keeps saving me for winter I will never stop in this store again

Name: Cliff DeGroot
Review: Repairs require agreeing to send away your jacket for 2-4 weeks.  I asked for them to simply send a button which I could have repaired at a tailor of their choice.  I’d even pay for it. Nope.  Send to them or void warranty.  Seems crazy to go without a jacket for a month in the middle of winter.  I will never get another one or recommend anyone to get one

Name: Juan Francisco
Review: We bought two parkas and we returned it due to the fit and we just got refunded. Customer service of CG is really great

Name: Estefano Elhawary
Review: CG tried to avoid the warranty despite me having a WRITTEN CONFIRMATION from the dry cleaner the jacked shrinked while washing properly, they acted as if "it is normal". I cant even wear it anymore. I will 1. never buy CG again in my life (just spent 20.000 USD last month on designer items, its not about the money but about the treatment) and 2. give bad reviews wherever i can - just because i feel soo ripped off.

Name: Linda De Santis
Review: If I could give 0 stars I would! The WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER. I have a jacket, these Morons, designed and Manufactured, and continue to sell, and they can not fix the rip??? Really? This is ridiculous how I have gotten a complete JERK around from this “high end” company. They are terrible. Everyone you speak to are “very sorry” snd “they understand “. Bull#%}%. ! I’m furious I have a $600 jacket I received for Christmas 12/21. Has holes in the material( which is non repairable ever. They said it said on their website that “knit” can not be warranted. I get it, but I am willing to key to fix it…….Nope! So I guess the jacket is garbage. Pls do yourself a favor, don’t spend a freaking dime on this company. My son got me $160 goose gloves for Christmas, this year. I went to Sake To return them. Refuse to have a product from them and that was just based on their horrible customer service. That was before I found out thus this evening that my jacket is “considered GARBAGE” Very poor business on their part. I own my own business, and sometimes you need to “eat” something to give good customer service. But not here!! Go kick rocks!

Name: Jessica Cooke
Review: Paid £1110 for a coat for my daughter for Christmas, they declined the payment then took the money anyway. There excuse is this happens to ‘1%’ of our clients & this is ‘unfortunate for you’ they will have to speak to their financial team to see where the money has gone then tried to blame my bank, my bank has said it takes around 30 days to get back. I’m absolutely appalled at how unbothered this woman was on the phone, asked why I didn’t try to ring earlier when I tried to ring around 30 times this week, so unbothered yet £1111 is probably her wage equivalent. I’m mortified.

Name: aurita hernandez
Review: Zaman was an amazing help I went to get buy a coat she helped me pick the best size for me and helped me through out my experience, you can tell she loves helping customers and is always nice. Thanks to her I’m happy with the coat I picked up, thanks again

Name: Oliver Warren
Review: Dont not buy from Canada Goose, EVER! Returned a product which should have been a simple exchange, DHL have lost the return and Canada Goose are refusing to help. Customer services is a joke, little no support, and they never update you. You have to call them they never contact you. I've now paid for a coat that I dont even have!

Name: Chase Hadley
Review: Snobby basturds, horrible customer service it’s disgusting they don’t give a fu,..ckAbout anything or anyone and so I assume the company and the board any all of the higher ups don’t give a motherphuck about anything either. F u Canada $1600 for a jacket and u can’t even be polite or even have the respect to even do anything for that fuxcking matter.Wow..

Name: Jack o brien
Review: I ordered a Canada goose hybridge jacket and paid for next day delivery.There has been no delivery and I haven’t even been given an email for my shipping information

Name: Darren Andrews
Review: Really disappointed. I didn't check this myself but would advise others to do so. I purchases a 'Carson' CG coat from Flannels. £1300. There are only 3 pockets. 1 left outer side and right outer side. 1 inside chest pocket which is pathetic! A standard wallet only just fits and add your car key and its bulging! Does NOT fit a phone. Or it would have to be very small to do so. Outer pockets are not deep so beware of your possessions falling out. Given the design I'd have expected 2 or atleast 1 inside pocket with size to hold valuables!! That said the coat is good quality and ridiculously warm! 👌🏻 hopefully I never have to contact customer service because the reviews are shocking!!!

Name: Fran
Review: Beware of the return exchange policy with this company.  It is not customer friendly and really ridiculous.  Here is what happened.  -I saved $525 to by my husband a vest-He needed the next size up so I just wanted to exchange.  Was not allowed-I had to return incorrect size, wait 10 days for a refund and then reorder...-They would not Hold one for me so I was told, and I quote," no guarantee that when you get your refund and go back online to reorder the one you want will be there"-I asked if they would call the NYC store and see if they had the size I needed and hold it for me. (I don't live close to NYC but was going to figure it out)  Answer to that was NOPE we can't hold anything.  I guess they are just used to dealing with people with a lot of money.  I didn't have over $1,000 to put up for a vest.  Took me long enough to save the $525.My take....Canada Goose does not care about their customers.  Too Bad.  Beautiful merchandise,  Crappy Customer Service and Policies.

Name: Jonathan France
Review: I bought a coat for my wife for Xmas and paid extra for next day delivery. The day before Xmas eve at around 7pm I rang up chasing, only to be told that the package was on hold and would be delivered on 28th December. So I had to travel out on Xmas eve and collect the package from the depot. Nothing was mentioned about paying extra for next day delivery & Canada Goose are quite frankly a cowboy company. They’ll charge you for next day, but you won’t get it next day.DO NOT BUY ANYTHING FROM CANADA GOOSE

Name: Doctor
Review: At the price of 2 jackets totaling approx. $2500 , one would think there is some flexibility in orders. I tried to change the color of one of the ordered jackets 2 hours after it was paces only to be told that it is outside company policy (even though the order was not shipped as it was after shipment hours) . Even airlines or new car purchases  let you change / cancel bookings in time frame. The agent would not let me speak to her supervisor either. We thought the folks up north were “reasonable” but this company is just “ GOOSE” and no “CANADA” . I will never buy from them again .

Name: Jason Britton
Review: I bought a Alliston Parker for my wife for Christmas. DHL should have delivered it next day. 4 days later DHL arrived put the box on the floor. Took a photo and left. I went to open the box. The BOX WAS EMPTY!!!!!30 days for a review of my complaint!!! No guarantee that I will get my money back for. £950 box. Disgusting.

Name: Lee
Review: Horrible company bad customer service also tried to order a jacket and the website wasn’t letting me put my details in now gone passed 10:30 am

Name: Jak Howcroft
Review: Unbelievable how poor the service is I was on hold for 35 minutes for some advisor to have an attitude problem telling me it takes as long as it takes. I have had two different coats fail after 6 months, the quality is poor I will never buy anything of this brand again such a shame that they can’t quality control their work force.

Name: Chocolateboy_100
Review: Absolutely rubbish, do not buy Canada Goose coats. Firstly the jacket was £900 and I found the quality just OK, not that impressive for the cost. In my case the zip toggle frayed within about 6-7 wears of the coat. I contacted them asking for a replacement toggle, and the only solution they had was to send back the jacket (from the UK to Canada at my own expense) for a review. So they are effectively proposing I have to be without my jacket for weeks, in Winter, due to their own poor quality products. I have had jackets at MUCH lower cost and had no issues with them whatsoever. I would never buy from this company again, the products are substandard and the service is pathetic. Spend your money elsewhere rather than on this overpriced rubbish!

Name: RG
Review: Canada Goose UK is possibly the worst, disorganised retail brand I ever came across.  I went to their shop in Regent St. London and after 20 min waiting to be served I had to leave witnessing personnel completely lost in their wander up and down the shop, speaking to multiple customers at the same time and serving properly none.I then decided to order online a Parka for my wife. The transaction went through but after a few minutes I have received an email saying the payment was invalid (??). I thought it was a problem with my cc and I placed another order with another cc. Same story, transaction went through and a few minutes later another email of invalid payment. IN BOTH CASES MY CC WAS REGULARLY CHARGED.I called the customer care and waited half an an hour waiting someone to answer. No one picked my call.I then decided to try the Chat service. Eventually I manage to chat with a cust. representative who says that the problem seems to be on their system and that it will take 5-7 business days to clear the transaction on their side.  Meaning my refund for TWO orders placed and never fulfilled will take more than a week to be refunded!!!!  Basically £2,200 blocked on my cc....!Whoever is in charge in the UK must be fired.

Name: Jim Hyndman
Review: Terrible product for the price. The lining is cheap and catches the zip. The lining opened up slowly. Customer service dreadful.

Name: Simon Frederic
Review: They cancelled an order, didn't refund the money. Dont reply to emails, chat closes or is unhelpful. It's been three weeks.I loved this brand until I realized how bad their costumer service is.

Name: Jack
Review: I return my jacket and its been 12 days since the jacket was delivered to them and i have been calling them every day asking for my refund they keep saying we need more time and the customer service guys on phone are the worst they are so ignorant and disrespectful.  CGCA_A01518456

Name: Jules
Review: I ordered my items 2 weeks ago and still have not received it, they even refunded my next day delivery charge but still unable to send me the jacket as DHL messed up the delivery, but Canada goose refuse to help. Been asking for money back and refund but no help.

Name: Jane B
Review: Unbelievable. I truly felt as though I was in the Twilight Zone while on the phone with them. Bought two 1000. gift certificates for Christmas but they were never sent. I was charged on my credit card for them but they couldn’t tell me why they weren’t sent and where they were. Crazy bad. How can a company run a business like this?

Name: Joanna Watts
Review: It has now been 21 days since I return woman's Ellison down jacket order number CGGB_A01006695Picked up by your delivery service on the 18th of November. It has now been over the stated number of days in your policy of when a return should happen.I have done everything as a customer in returning the goods. Which would have been scanned and checked at the time if pick up. I now just want my money back. I did purchase a second jacket which I saved up for and love how it keeps me warm and stylish. I just did not expect that I would have to deal with bad customer service from such company..

Name: Helen Morewood
Review: I bought a coat on 4th November but ordered two sizes. It took over two weeks for the coats to arrive and I had to chase continually and eventually involved Paypal to help. I returned the coat I didn’t want immediately and they acknowledged receipt on 23rd November.  However I am still waiting for my refund! I have rung on several occasions and the customer service team are awful! Rude, unhelpful, and again I have had to get Paypal to help and it is still not resolved two weeks later. Never ever buy directly from this company - shocking!

Name: Sabina Antonovna
Review: Please beware with this company I have spent over £20,000 pound over the years with this company but recently had an issue with my partners coat and the customer service has been shocking the cost is badly faded and the life time warranty is a joke they don’t honour it. Also they communicate on email and really don’t care about customers they tried to charge me £38 to clean a coat which was sent in clean then they told me the fur was mistreated and wanted  another £175 after weeks of nobody caring I finally got the coat back and the fur they sent is ginger and the one I sent in was grey fur and they are still arguing regarding the fur I have sent in proof with pictures and spoke with Canada goose customer service and she told me you can see it’s different fur but the warranty team are calling me a liar I am honestly shocked how they can treat customers like this😡😡😡😡😡😡Canada Goose

Name: Wafa Jadallah
Review: I had a wonderful experience with Canada Goose. The salespeople at Regent Street were great, especially Jameelah, she was amazing! Really gave me personal attention to make sure I got the jacket I wanted. She really went above and beyond and I'm very grateful to her!

Name: Bella
Review: Canada goose Cinematographer is Not Shower Proof. Not.Shower Proof. Foolishly,I trusted the brand and didn't use Trustpilot  this once.It won't happen again. Whats Wrong CanadaGoose?

Name: Michal M
Review: I will Never buy Canada Goose again. Faded fabric, feathers leaking (Chateau Parka). AFTER ONE WINTER.SCANDAL !!!!!!!!

Name: Peter Lustig
Review: I bought the Canada goose lodge down Jacket and now over 2 week i can see that the jacket is losing downs!The Zipper is also not well sometime its stuck if u want to close or open it and i mean you can expect for a jacket that is in this price range to get good qualtiy zippers!Its really bad quality for 650€.I mean i thought its a high quality brand first but now i regret my decision to buy this jacket.I really would recommend to buy other brands you can get way cheaper products with better quality than this.My finally apraisment is that you only pay for the logo and not for the quality.

Name: Chris Brox
Review: The customer service is shocking. The website is most of the time out of service, thus no access to your file and tracking. Compared to the value of the jacket the service provided very poor.

Name: Luna Holloway
Review: This company needs to switch to animal-friendly things! If I could leave no stars then I would! Please care for our animals they don't deserve to die so we can spend money that no one will get.

Name: F. Hamilton-Jones
Review: The most appalling company in existence. No customer service - totally non existent. They don’t answer the phone number given.  They don’t reply to emails sent to them and they don’t complete orders Never ever again will I purchase from Canada Goose UK

Name: Kim
Review: Bought 2 Canada Goose coats. The black one looks wore out and faded. The seams are whitish and the stitching has let loose. You pay like I is high end but it is not.Told to send it back by the agent at Eaton center Toronto. I called customer service in USA as their website is down and has been for a month. They take information but know very little as they read from a card. The Last I spoke to was working from home and get children were loud and our call was dropped. She called me back to tell me I could go to the website but it is still under maintenance. They don't want returns... Just purchased.A supervisor is supposed to call but I don't expect that to happen.

Name: Anne
Review: If I could leave 0 stars I would. Used CG online services to place an order for a $1250 parka. Initially received a confirmation email stating "thanks for your order." Two minutes later received an email stating "oops, something went wrong." Called CG and was told to wait 48 hours to place another order. Placed second order, and several hours later received an email stating "oh no, we're out of stock." Three minutes later received another order stating "we received your order." Total frustration! I found the parka I was looking for at Bloomingdale's.

Name: Keven
Review: Unacceptable warranty for such high prices. I recently bought two Canada Goose jackets, one hoodie and one aviator hat. Quite a large a bill. The hoodie started to have loose threads at many places, leading to several little holes. I called Canada Goose:- You can drop it off at near location but you still need to pay for shipping at the location. Also, they cannot be liable for any lost item- Item must be dry cleaned before sending it back and it's best to include receipt of dry cleaning- Once inspected and if it's covered by warranty they will repair and send it back. If it's deemed the issue is due to improper care, then you will be notified by the Warranty Brand Ambassador (via email) and they will repair it AND bill you for the inspection and repair- I requested that they call before they do any repair and the support agent told me that I will be contacted by email after the inspectionI'll give my money somewhere else and sell off what I bought.Never again Canada Goose for me.

Name: Jelena Golubeva
Review: The worst thing about CG jackets is that they don't last for more than 3 years. I have two and both are worn out after exactly 3 years of wearing. With a jacket costing over 1000 i would expect it to have harder and more resistant fabric.

Name: John Stephen Gloekler
Review: I did not enjoy the experience.  I ordered a jacket and then needed to cancel it one hour later.  Canada Goose claimed they were unable to cancel the order even though it was not shipped

Name: Jonathan
Review: Horrible company. This company is not what they used to be and their jackets are not quality made. The jacket has issues with becoming shiny from using their hand warming pockets, stitching coming apart, holes in the sleeves, fit coming off. Their warranty refused to help me with the same issue I’ve had in the past, they won’t even let you PAY for a repair. You pay this amount of money for a jacket and for a company that advertises lifetime warranty, it’s a sham. Canada Goose has turned into any other major brand now, greedy and they don’t care. Their customer service is also quite bad, they hype you up to let you know that the jacket is covered by warranty and you will have a new one only to be denied by the warranty team and you can’t even be transferred to speak to someone from there.Stay away from them and spend your money elsewhere. They definitely do not deserve your money and everything you’re reading below from other reviews is 100% true.

Name: Felecia
Review: This company has terrible customer service. The managers are not professional or knowledgeable. I am extremely shocked that a company of this caliber has such poor customer service. I was told that by one customer service rep that a exchange was made only to find out later that that didn’t happen. I had to exchange the item because they sent the wrong coat in the first place. They don’t have to worry about me spending another $1219.00 for their brand again. After this incident, I started to wonder if their product was worth the trouble and decided NO it is not! And from the reviews I’m not the only one.

Name: Gary C.
Review: DO not buy Canada goose brand.Worst customer service ever. Even Canadian tire gives better customer service. Purchased a parka, started to fade at multiple locations. Dry cleaned the parka and sent to warranty department. They repaired some parts but not all as they claim it’s wear and tear. Total BS. How can it be considered wear and tear on some spots and not all. So I called the warranty department again to explain. The representative said she u understands and hears what I am saying. Recommended to send back the parka, so I did. I asked about the dry cleaning requirements and she said just don’t open the box as it has special tap to confirm tampering. Also my case number would be linked to the new case#.This will prove that it hasn’t been opened and won’t be required to be dry cleaned again. Now I got an email saying that my parka will be sent to dry cleaning and will be charged for the dry cleaning. I emailed the warranty department again, requesting for a callback. Once again, getting a email reply saying that dry cleaning is mandatory. I’m feeling this is a very small mom and pop shop with amazing marketing team but just operating out of a garage. My recommendation is to STAY AWAY from Canada goose and spend your money on a different brand.

Name: laurie Tanner
Review: ordered a coat for £1200, never arrived! have been chasing for 2 weeks now on a refund as the customer service team said its been sent and its down to me for the delivery, i have provided CCTV as evidence of no parcels arriving, the courier also has no signature or picture of the delivery (BECAUSE IT NEVER ARRIVED)HAVE BEEN SPOKEN TO LIKE A PIECE OF DIRT PROMISED CALLS FROM MANAGERS WHICH HAVE NEVER HAPPENED.

Name: Fritz
Review: Shockingly terrible! I returned a jacket under warranty and Canada Goose offered to replace the coat, provided I pay cost for the replacement jacket because the damage to the coat was not a manufacturer defect.  I paid cost for a replacement coat, which never arrived (shipment tracking indicated the product was returned to sender and never made it to my address or delivery city).  I contacted Canada Goose who then offered me a gift card, which never arrived.  However about a week after offering me a gift card, I received an email from a third-party indicating my gift card had been delivered.  Canada Goose acknowledged over email that the third party gift card provider accidentally sent the gift card to a Canada Goose employee as the recipient and sent me, as grantor, a delivery receipt.  Canada Goose apologized and assured me this would be rectified.  it has been three months since sending my coat and two weeks since the gift card cock-up and nothing despite multiple emails and telephone calls.  I'm now out of a coat, out of more money and have nothing.  Absolute scam run by private equity - Bain Capital should be ashamed!

Name: Mats in Norway
Review: I can’t believe a quality brand like CG has such awful customer service. It’s a long story, but first they screwed up by over billing me when they sent me clothes last year. Then, out of the blue, I receive notification now (1 year later) saying they had shipped my goods. I wrote to them saying this must be a mistake, as I have not ordered anything since last year. They said it was a mistake in their system and that no clothes had been sent. So “no problem” they said … but then they invoice my MasterCard again (for the phantom order) after all. And now I’m having to fight for weeks to get them to cancel their incorrect double billing. And their smug emails where they refuse to own up to the mistake, and just keep “escalating the matter to a manager” are just awful. Fix the mistake, don’t send me repetitive emails about how valuable I am and how much you care and the focus my case is getting. Just fix it! I used to be a huge fan, as we need warm jackets here in Norway. Never buying CG again.UPDATE: I was notified today that they had responded below. Took them 1 1/2 years. 🙄

Name: Stephanie Dick
Review: Worst customer service ever, i regret so much dealing with their ambassadors on the phone, it s such a pity, they have such a marketing that is based on lies. I truly dont have the power even to explain what happened to me today but i still have the force to write everywhere and you ll see

Name: James Keenan
Review: Absolutely shocking customer service. Reading through the other reviews on here to see if I was an isolated incident, apparently not.Warranty claim platform does not work, cant login, cant process at this time, couple of emails fobbing me of with instructions on how to raise a claim.I raised claims in the pass that where honored on their sub standard products. Jackets are warm but the materials used fall apart after a few months of light use. AVOID AT ALL COSTS.

Name: Douglas Regnier
Review: I did finally receive the black box recently. Thank you very much. I do think your product is the best on the market and am proud to own Canada Goose.Thanks again.Douglas Regnier

Name: Kei Wong
Review: Awful customer service, 5 jackets were ordered for my family. Four of five jackets showed up with one missing.  I checked the tracking numbers and the one which didn't arrive showed on the UPS site that it wasn't even shipped out yet.  I called Canada goose and all I was told was that they will "investigate". To me this is unacceptable. This shouldn't be my issue, this isn't even a delivery issue since the item didn't even make it to UPS. I cannot even get a garuntee of when they will ship me my item. They have the item in stock so I do not see why they cannot just ship me one and investigate the situation without inconvenienceing me. This isn't my issue and is no fault of my own so I do not understand why I am the one who needs to be "patient". The item WAS NOT SHIPPED it WAS PAID  FOR and IT IS IN STOCK. There is no valid reason to make me wait with an opened ended investigation. I was told that this was not the "process" but again that isn't my problem. I have followed the process where in the money was paid and I should receive a coat within the delivery window. Their investigation as to why one jacket out of 5 did not leave their distribution facility should not be my problem!

Name: Kelly KellyR
Review: I have purchased three Canada Goose jackets in the last 2 years - including the Salida Rain Jacket. I have recommended these jackets to everyone I’ve met as I believed so strongly in not only the quality but also the backing provided by the company via the warranty. Last month I met someone who had the same rain coat in the same colour - red - and was shocked to see her coat was so much brighter than mine. I knew the colour of my coat had faded - despite only being 1.5 years old - but I was shocked to see how different the colour was - when I compared it directly to the same one. It was honestly shocking. Mine is faded and has almost a white coating. I was aware the colour had changed - which shocked me given the cost and the fact I’ve only worn it around the city - but comparing it directly to another coat was shocking. Customer Service told me to send it to the warranty center. I did this - at a cost of $55 - and they’ve replied to say there is no problem. I’ve exchanged multiple emails and each is more and more unhelpful. I asked to escalate my complaint and again was met by only passive aggressive responses. Why on earth would I risk damage sending my coat - not to mention the cost - if there was no problem. I’m honestly disappointed and disgusted. To make matters worse, I wrote a review explaining this on the Canada Goose website, only to receive an email saying it wouldn’t be posted. Clearly only good reviews get posted. Honestly I’ve never been so disappointed in a company in my life!

Name: Ricardo
Review: Purchased a Canada goose jacket about 5 years ago and it has faded terribly around the button, sew lines and cuffs. Some areas are worst then others. I would wear this coat on cooler days -30 and over. Probably around 3-5 times a year. This Jacket cost me over $1000 as you all are aware of. Lets get to the point and you decide if you will purchase a coat from them.I emailed Canada Goose and sent it in for a review. The reply I got was "normal equal fading". It may be normal for them, but this is not equal fading. Noone is blind, the areas I mentioned earlier really stand out in the daytime. They did nothing to warranty it, repair it, or even a suggestion. The parts that bother me is I have Helly Hansen, Under Armour, Dkny and numerous other jackets for the same time frame as the canada Goose and none of them have this issue. The under armour has been snowboarding numerous times and taken quite a few falls and is in perfect condition still. Especially NO FADING!Helly Hansen is clean and as new as day one, used it to hike and so forth. NO FADING!Other jackets I use for motorcycle and outdoor activities that are used many more days in a year  are in way better condition. These jackets ranged from $150-$700So this only tells me that Canada Goose has inferior product and sells it for a hi profit! If this is what you are looking for then I am happy for you, but I will never purchase anything else from them! Horrible product and dishonest to the clients, treat them as they are blind. Oh wait, they mentioned they put it under special lighting to check for equal fading. Let me tell you something, not sure if they walk around with this special light on day to day bases but I have never in my 40 years of life seen people walk around with a light over them. Unless they were modeling clothes.

Name: r harris
Review: Another one star review to add to the many others on Trustpilot. I bought my wife a gaberdine style black coat in 2019. Last year we noticed rubbing and discolouration around the edges in places where you would not expect a coat to be rubbed.  It's particularly prevalent around the seams. So we now have a black coat with white marks The response from CG is that the coat contains 15% cotton which is a natural product and will discolour over time. What they mean is that the dying process is inadequate. If they know something will discolour, CG should take steps to prevent it happening. They haven't. They're trading on their name for making a warm coat, which it is.  But they're clearly cutting corners to save money. If you want a warm coat buy CG but be under no illusions that they're a poor outfit to deal with if you're unhappy.Update - 26 March 2024.This review has been up for almost two years and CG have just replied. Tells you all you ned to know.

Name: shaba
Review: top jacket, you guys pay top £ and expect some extraordinary things you are paying for good quality and long lasting materials, excellent coats and jumpers have multiple coats from here and all still in a good condition

Name: Luke Mason
Review: For a premium brand, their service is shocking. I have dealt with countless issues from this brand despite being so loyal and buying many products. The latest example, sending out the wrong colour hat and offering no apology. I have had damaged coats, damaged boxes, I think ill spend my money elsewhere in future

Name: JAB Tube
Review: I returned a coat that was received back 12/27 and still no refund.  I’ve called and emailed over 20 times and keep being told it’s escalated and I will get a call back by a certain date and never get a call.   This has been going on for over a month.  When I call they tell me there is no manager and can’t do anything for me.  They admit they have received the jacket (I have tracking) and have no reason for the delay.   Awful.  I’ve just disputed with PayPal which was the form of payment used so I’m hoping that will get me somewhere.  I will never purchase from them again.  Horrible!

Name: rakesh shah
Review: We bought canada goose jacket from a retail store in mall. At register we asked refund policy and girl at register said just keep tag but did not say that u can not wear it. So basically my son wear for 2 days and then he decided to return and when he went to store , it was declined said it is worn. Not buying from this company.

Name: Laura W
Review: AVOID! AVOID! AVOID! Bought a £900 jacket in November 21 which was too big so sent back for a refund. I followed the return procedure and used the label provided. We are at 5th February 2022 and still no refund has been received. I checked Tracker info and they had received jacket back on 6th Dec. I’ve called over 6 times to be told various different things. I’ve also emailed since mid December. I feel Im getting fobbed off and that they have no intention of returning money. I’ve had no choice but to now open up a case with my credit card company to try and call this money back. Chargeback it’s called and it actually costs Canada goose money when your credit card company does so. I’d recommend anyone trying to recover funds to open disputes with your banks and credit cards companies ASAP. You can only do this up to 60 days for some credit cards companies. So perhaps Canada goose are trying to get past that time frame then us customers have no come back. Absolute shambles for such a global well known company, customer service shocking!! AVOID!!

Name: CoreySkillz
Review: I had a bought a Canada goose gillet on the 15th December 2021 it costed £450. They said it will take about 4-5 working days. But it didn’t arrive for like 3 weeks. So in January I asked to refund the order. I also contacted Canada goose multiple times to several different colleagues on the phone and some of them were telling me different answers of why my Gillet wasn’t refunded and didn’t arrive. I figured that the reason they weren’t sure was because they are working from home ,not in the Canada goose headquarters so they were just making things up on the spot.However, the popular response was that there is an error in the system which sounds like a bunch of rubbish. We are now in February and my order still hasn’t been refunded yet. What’s worse is that I didn’t receive a single email or call about my order not arriving or about the “error in the system” for the refund .You would expect a multi-national company like Canada goose that sell expensive luxury products to provide decent customer service. It’s just been poor. Customer service is so bad they don’t even deserve a star rating.

Name: Me Am
Review: The worst costumer service I have ever experienced.The item was returned more that 6 weeks ago and I still haven’t received my money. I contacted them many times but they didn’t reply to my emails and on the phone they keep promising that they are giving a high priority to my case but after that nothing happens and they still don’t refund my money. It seems that they are holding to people’s money in this way as apparently I am not the first person with this problem!

Name: Halia Francis
Review: Shockingly useless and unhelpful customer service.I returned two coats in two separate boxes (as advised) using THEIR prepaid labels.They refunded one of them and told me they'd never received the other and offered absolutely no help in how to manage next steps.  This after they gave me a 2 week run around telling me they were "escalating" my request.I finally got confirmation and proof from UPS that the second coat had indeed been delivered to the returns warehouse and the name of the person who signed for it.Sent that to useless customer service at which point their story was no longer that they could not locate the return, but that they had in fact issued me a credit.Once again I pointed out that the main reason I'd been contacting them for several weeks looking for the $1600 they owe me was because they hadn't issued a credit.Radio silence from them.Such a waste of my time.  I'll have to waste more time asking UPS to get involved next.

Name: Lauryn Gotham
Review: Bought a pbi blue Canada goose lodge down jacket, it arrived the next day, the coat is exactly how described, amazing quality, amazing service!

Name: Ella
Review: Amazing customer service. Sent off my coat as it was discoloured on the seams and an issue occurred which meant my coat took longer to inspect than the usual turnaround. As a goodwill gesture Canada goose sent me a free beanie hat and also got my replacement jacket shipped and it was received the day after it was shipped. Really impressed with how they handled things.

Name: Alic'ia
Review: OMG!  I wished I would have read these reviews before I purchased!  Canada Goose will not refund my money!!  I purchased a jackrabbit the incorrect size and unfortunately ordered a 2nd one.   They received the return of the  $750 jacket more than a month ago. Still no refund! They will not give out any further information but to wait.... Too bad, I love my jacket but this companies customer service is horrific.

Name: Azita Milani
Review: Canada Goose is not refund my money yet! it is more than one month that i returned a jacket to Canada Goose but they have not refunded me. I am very surprised. if they do not want to refund me why they got the jacket back? they got the jacket back but they are not willing to pay me back!

Name: Belourine Kurbonova
Review: shipping was good, came next day but that is what anyone expects from express delivery. anyways i give one star because the quality of the jacket is horrendous, so expensive and after 2-3 wears the stitching has come out in three areas also the feathers come out constantly :( really didn't expect this, was so excited for my first canada goose purchase and wished i read the reviews before, its really not worth the price.

Name: Louise Edeleanu
Review: PLEASE DO NOT BUY ON LINE - SHAMBLESPurchased a £550 jacket on line for my daughter for Xmas which unfortunately was too small.  Found out CG don't do exchanges but you can return and purchase another.  As she was returning to Uni I bought the next size up and returned the jacket.  No communication to say the 2nd jacket had been delivered and when I called was told I'd signed for it!  It's now 3 weeks and still no update from CG... despite numerous calls to customer service who read from a script I have to wait 30 days which is policy for the investigation.  Still no jacket and £550 out of pocket - come on Canada Goose this is not good service for an expensive item.  Disgraceful....

Name: Holly Fogg
Review: Absolutely dreadful customer service..DO NOT PURCHASE FROM THIS COMPANY!  I purchased boots at the New York store for a little over $700.  I was on the fence about them but asked about their return policy and was assured I could return them, “no Problem” I decided they would not work for me and wanted to return them to the store but live outside of NYC.  I contacted CS via e-mail, phone and was told the same thing, I could NOT return them to the on-line department but needed to contact and return them to the store.  A month later and several phone calls later (and we are now out of returnable dates) NO ONE HAS RETURNED MY CALL OR EFFORTS.  Reached out again on-line for assistance and they will not help or elevate the issue to someone who can help.NEVER AGAIN and I will tell everyone how horrible they are as a company.

Name: Shaun
Review: I ordered a body warmer before Christmas, they sent the wrong one completely size and colour as well was different , still waiting for a refund 20 days later after they have received it back , not even an email to say it’s being processed , I have received emails from them asking to write a review twice I replied and twice I don’t meet there standards I suppose means anything that dosnt praise them dosnt meet there standards

Name: Sebastian Hortelano
Review: Dear Canada Goose team,I have purchased a jacket for my wife for Christmas, the purchase process and the delivery were fine no problems at all, but after she received the jacket, she used it 3 times and the zipper broke, and the fabric seems to be failing.   We called customer service and now we have to ship it and pay for shipment, there are no refunds and they will not exchange the product they will "fix it" , there is no option to take it to the store the only option is pay for shipment and it will take up to 4 weeks to get it back. I paid a huge amount for this jacket and i feel that i have been scammed!.

Name: Claire
Review: My son ordered a body warmer costing £395, he received a large white coat on 6th December instead, we sent this back, heard nothing from them. I have rang numerous times only to be told they are still investigating it. Absolutely disgraceful customer service. Do not order from this company, they took my sons Christmas money and he has nothing to show for it.

Name: Veikka Joki-Erkkilä
Review: Asked for suggestions of tailors where I could repair my CG jacket and they repaired it for free. Fast service.

Name: Costa Kallergis
Review: Received what appears to be a used/ dirty jacket crumpled and frumpled with a garment bag and a hanger tossed in.when I wrote a truthful review on there site it was moderated and not allowed. what a joke. there customer service is even a bigger joke but what do you expect its all farmed out.Jacket is going back.Very unprofessional from a company that makes millions. victim of there own success.they just don't care anymore.

Name: Ms Sharp
Review: Absolutely shocking company I would highly recommend people do not use this company! Despite getting order confirmation on 6/12/21 my order apparently was cancelled due to no stock, I received no notification of this. Despite several attempts to contact customer services to chase my order ( no answer after 30mins each time) and an email sent 18/12/21 still no communication! Eventually 6/1/22 I revived a reply to my email to say sorry order was cancelled due to no stock!! Despite this shocking service I received 3 emails asking me to review my new coat!! Can you believe that! So I put a true review on of the above facts which they wouldn’t publish!! That says it all about the company.

Name: Rijad Mohammed
Review: Love my Chateau jacket. 5 years old jacket and it is still in good shape.

Name: Paul Kiely
Review: Shocking customer service!!!This is following on from my previous review. It is now over a month and after phone calls, numerous emails, tweets I am now being full on ignored and still have yet to receive confirmation that they have my coat!!!!Again, I have provided all the information to them, the courier, tracking number, even a photo with the signature and still absolutely nothing!! Hopefully I get my coat back and repaired but I'll never purchase one of their coats again if this is how they treat their customers who spend A LOT of money on their products!!

Name: Trustpilot88
Review: What a load of rubbish. Called on Saturday after placing an order for 5 jackets the night before saying payment not authorised yet it was showing on credit card as authorising and then recalled.  I called my credit card provider who confirmed all was copacetic and it was canada goose who recalled the payment. I called customer service based in the Netherlands and was assured by a 'Diana ' who sounded like a man with a a bad attitude clearly in need of some customer service training, I felt as though i was on one of those scam calls! Anyway,  I was assured that I would receive a call back within 48hrs. 48hrs has passed and I haven't heard from them. I tried to put the order through as 2 separate orders again and the same thing happened. I received an email stating payment not authorised yet is was authorised with my credit card provider. You would expect first class service for a reputable company commanding jackets for the above average price. Try calling 08003234844. Please have a good laugh at their corporate phone message. It's quite entertaining for a company listed on the stock market.

Name: VIV LIV
Review: My review is to update the dissatisfied customer who purchased a Canada Goose at Tyson's Corner II. Canada Goose " Canadian Company"  FYI was bought out by US stake holders back in 2013. -- While still made in Canada, it is over 70% US owned as of 2013. Canada sold it out to the US.  See below:In December 2013, Boston-based private equity firm Bain Capital acquired a 70% equity stake in Canada Goose at a $250 million valuation.Bain Capital, a private-equity firm co-founded by the Republicans’ losing 2012 presidential candidate (he left the company in 2002 to pursue his political career), is buying a majority stake in Canada Goose, the Toronto-based maker of ubiquitous, puffy winter jackets. Bain’s success at wringing profits from the companies it acquires has been mixed. Even so, it’s unlikely that the coat-buying public will notice much of a difference in the short term. The Post is reporting that Dani Reiss, Canada Goose’s heir and CEO, will remain in charge.It was a great company with cheaper warmer winter coats that were actually worth the buy prior to its sale and now huge status symbol! The quality and service has gone down with its sale to the US.

Name: Ada Salas
Review: I sent back a jacket bought from Canada Goose website on December 4th,until today I haven’t received my refund even though I used Canada goose shipping label with a delivery proof (signature delivery confirmed on December 8th). I called customer service many times and always get same answers “someone will call you back, we can not locate this package in our wearhouse”. Still no refund. So unprofessional!Update January 18th, 2022.After being kept 5 weeks without my refund I opened a dispute case with Paypal and the case was closed in my favor. To make it clear Canada Goose didn’t do anything in regards to my refund. PayPal needed only 3 days to review everything and dispute the transaction.. Canada goose needed 5 weeks and no answer.Good I didn’t wait longer to dispute this transaction because after 60 days I wouldn’t  be able to do it and it would cost me over 1,3k. I will never buy anything from Canada Goose anymore. Adrianna

Name: Mercy
Review: January 9, 2022FRAUD BY CANADIAN COMPANY “Canada Goose”Canadian company “Canada Goose” operating also in Tysons II Mall in Vienna, VA, USA, has been engaging in what I consider to be a deliberate and blatant pattern of fraud as substantiated below:Order # CGUS_A01396076 placed in December 2021 with “Canada Goose” was not filled by that “Tyson’s II” mall company, claiming “item was out of stock” which is understandable, BUT THEY POCKETED THE FULL AMOUNT (around US$650) AND HAVE REPEATEDLY FAILED TO REFUND IT despite numerous phone calls and in-person contacts. Numerous recorded phone calls to that company’s sole phone number shown in its online web page (888-2766297) got false promises to refund the fraudulently appropriated amount “within hours”. NO REFUND WAS EVER MADE. Employees contacted were:1.	“Andrew” on Jan 7 at 11am2.	“Jenique” on Jan 8 AT 9am,3.	“Canada Goose” store employees at its store in Tysons II Mall, Virginia, USA on Jan 6 at 12pm.The above “Canada Goose” employees repeatedly refused to connect me to their supervisor or to their finance department. I intend to publicize this fraudulent behavior to protect other US consumers from such fraudulent practices by this Canadian Company operating in the US. Time is of the essence.

Name: Cl
Review: DO NOT ORDER ONLINE - RETURNS IS A SHAM - customer service line in another continent!! Customer service told me there was NO WARRANTY… OMG £400 sweater, stitching came apart under the arm without being washed and only worn for around 4 hours, getting on to PayPal, hopefully they can help.Go to a shop in England - Do not shop on line with them!!!

Name: Wiskers
Review: EDIT: Disappointed to be emailed by Trustpilot; Canada Goose tried flagging my review as fake. Unfortunately I have all the receipts to back up my rubbish experience.----I've ordered from CG before, and had a really good experience. But Christmas shopping has been a disaster.Item's shipped to me were quite clearly someone else's returns, looking worn, scrunched up inside a plastic bag that looked at though it'd been taped up by some sort of clown. These 'new' items were meant to be gifts for family, not someone else's worn rejects.Immediately sent back the items using their returns process. I got proof of return delivery from DHL. No confirmation from CG, no refund, no communication 4 weeks later.Currently going through PayPal/credit card chargeback now.

Name: keurig
Review: Top quality! So warm

Name: Laura-Jean Sansom
Review: I would give this company 0 stars but that isn’t available. I ordered the Crofton Puffer  jacket for a Christmas gift for my partner on 20th December. I received a email to inform me my item had been dispatched. As I paid for express delivery I expected my item to arrive within 1-2 working days. By the 23rd December I still had no tracking information for the coat so I called CG customer service for a tracking update. They reassured me my item was on its way and tracking would update soon and confirmed with me that my item would arrive before Christmas Eve. 24th December I called again for an update when I was informed my item had never been dispatched and they were unsure why I received the dispatch email. We are now on 4th January. I have no coat, they have confirmed they have lost the order. I have been told 4 times I will receive a call back from a manager and to no surprise, I haven’t had any call! They have no solution! Avoid like the plague! What a waste of £850 and ruined our Christmas. Horrific customer service resolution. The only saving grace is the staff in the call centre are polite. A shame the management do not follow up request. Disgusting.

Name: Imran Ali
Review: Never purchase from the online store!!!! Avoid like the plague!! I ordered 5 jackets costing over £5000 for there to be one of the jackets missing with my parcel half opened! I immediately reported it to them for them to hang up the phone and now every time i ring they cut me off! The level of customer service is Nil’

Name: peter waterman
Review: Ordered womens chillwack bomber 9th dec turned up 12th dec in perfect condition with bag and hanger. Lovely coat.Ordered mens chillwack bomber holiday on 29th dec and it turned up 31st dec Dhl, again with hanger and bag in perfect condition.Absolutely lovely coats and for me personally i can't fault the website or service i received twice

Name: Kyung-in Noh
Review: I should’ve read some of the reviews here. I purchased a womens jacket through their website and it was delivered. Weirdly, there was no jacket but only hanger and the garment bag were included. I contacted the merchant and they reported a claim to UPS in order to resolve this issue. It has been more than 10 days and they kept saying that they need to hear back any update from UPS. But I just don’t understand why this has to do with UPS since the item is missing. What a big disappointment to handle this matter with their responsibility.

Name: LUCAS  BALLAN
Review: Oh my, where do I start, do I start with why does this company has so many bad reviews, how bad their customer service, or how bad they run their online business. I made an order Christmas evening and I bought myself a Chilliwack Bomber, I received my order number and created my account up. A day later, I sign in to track my order and it seems apparently my account has no previous orders, I go to track my order and it says the email address or tracking number is incorrect. They are not, I’ve got screenshots on my phone to confirm they’ve given me that tracking number under my name and email address. So I go to contact them via email, I’ve sent out a total of 2 emails, no response back whatsoever. I’ve rang them 3 times and that’s just as bad. The first 2 times I explained my issue and they said they can’t find that order from their end, yet then money was took out my account (but that’s getting sorted as it’s now pending, but anyway), the first 2 people said they’ll get back to me and give me a call about an hour later, I’ve received no phone call and it’s been days later, I rang up again and someone said my case is already opened and apparently this is his words, this is a common mistake and my order is more likely to have been cancelled. What a joke this is, I pay the premium so I expect the bloody premium. I can’t say how frustrating this is. I wish I seen these bad reviews before ordering because I would of went else where like flannels and I would of had my coat by now. It’s like I’ve been scammed £975 and that’s a lot of money especially for me as I’m only 19 year old.

Name: Serena Gong
Review: I ordered a jacket for my cousin as a late birthday present gift. After seeing how the zipper quality was poor not expected, we tried to return it. We mailed it back and received an email saying that they received it Dec 9th. It is now Dec 30 and still no refund. I have called on their customer service line multiple times and was told to wait a few more days each time I called. They said they would have a supervisor call back but I have not received a callback and have gotten no updates about the refund being processed. I tried to contact via live chat and the same thing happened. The agent would apologize for the inconvenience but still take no action on the matter. They just keep delaying everything and say it will eventually get processed no matter how much I try to contact them. The lack of customer service. I have had a charge of 1411.55 on the card for weeks now for a product that was in hand for an hour. What a disgusting company. It is stressful to have that much money out of your bank account and they hold people’s money hostage and never respond. Hard-earned money that they do not reassure will come back and money that makes it seem like they are stealing from you. I am at a loss for words and have nowhere to turn to get the money back. I am very aggravated and stressed and pissed off and don’t know what to do next or who to talk to. I will let the world know that this company is the worst company I have ever shopped at. I will now proceed to go to every social media outlet to tell my story.

Name: Kevin Chapman
Review: Cintya was able to respond to my query quickly and efficiently. Thank you

Name: Reidun Pedersen
Review: Canada goose website to place an online order is aweful. It says the info you put in is invalid.  Then you cannot place the order.  They are losing out on income by this faulty online website.

Name: Jake Brammer
Review: Bought a Carson parka And was delivered within 2 days, excellent condition couldn’t be happier with it!

Name: Theola
Review: I bought my Victoria Parka in Dec 2020 and less than 1 year later / 1 winter season, the fabric at all the edges (e.g. sleeves, bottom hem, zippers, pockets, etc.) are faded. Additionally there was an external seam in the left sleeve that came undone. I took it to the approved dry cleaners (as per the Canada Goose website) and it would not remove it (i.e. it was not a stain). I did send the jacket in for warranty repair. While the customer service was nice and responsive, they repair hardly improved the fade. I do really like the style of the coat and is a great fit for someone petite. However, I am quite disappointed in the material quality. My brother purchased a Canada Goose coat from 5 years ago and it works great for the cold weather and there is no fabric fading. It must be the recent production of the coats which source poor quality fabrics as the dry cleaner also complained about this.

Name: Anna
Review: The zipper on a 1 year old Canada Goose bomber broke. I sent the item in using USPS w/insurance. In Colorado, it mysteriously disappeared. USPS has been no help - but neither has Canada Goose. The best they offer (after 20+ emails) is that, should I re-purchase my jacket, and need warranty help again, I should really use Fedex or another provider and they are sorry this warning was not on their site. From Google searches, it's clear I'm not the only one with this issue - but they appear determined to do nothing to either help me or help prevent this from happening to future customers. It's a real shame - with adequate warning, I could have easily fixed the jacket locally. I loved the brand, but will have to shop elsewhere.

Name: Tara Rojas
Review: Ordered a jacket for my husband. Received jacket Dec 7. He tried it on and it didn’t fit. I mailed it back the exact same day and received email saying they received it Dec 8. It is now Dec 24 and still no refund. I sent multiple emails that have no response. I called and was told to wait another 5 days. After the 5 days I chatted with them online and was told it will eventually get processed. I am fed up. The lack of customer service. I have a charge of 1275.00 on my card for weeks now for a product I had in my hand for an hour. What a disgusting company. How do you hold peoples money hostage and never respond. Money that people will have to pay interest on.Update: called yet again and was told to wait even longer. It has now been over 3 weeks and no refund. I was told this time no supervisor is available but one will definitely call me back in 24-48 hours. Guess what it’s been 48 hours and no phone call from a supervisor. I am at a lost for words and have nowhere to turn to get my money back. I will now have to pay interest on the 1275.00 they are holding hostage. I am so aggravated and pissed off and don’t know what to do next or who to talk to. I will let the world know that this company is the worst company I have ever shopped at. I will now proceed to go on every social media outlet to tell my story.

Name: Benjamin Pigott
