Review: This is the worst company I have ever dealt with. I figure it being a high end company that they would know how to operate a business. I ordered a jacket and chose the 2-3 day shipping. Here we are 7 days later and still no shipping confirmation. I called customer service yesterday and they said they escalated it to appropriate department and that I would be hearing back within 24 hours. Well after house 28 of nothing I called again and got the same response. Trying to cancel my order I was told that I could not. I then asked for a supervisor and I was told again 24 hours I should hear from someone. I wish I looked at the reviews on this company before I tried to make a purchase. By far the worst company I have ever dealt with and seems like a theme from everything I gathered. I will not be recommending anyone ever to this company or any of the products it offers. Further more I will be returning the jacked if I ever receive it immediatelyUpdate- 1/9/22 we are almost a month in and still no shipment confirmation and no answers on my fiancé’s Christmas present that I this 3 day shipping on 12/17. At this point Canada goose has stolen almost 1400$ from me and can not provide an update. I have asked for a manager to return calls and got nothing. This is absolutely criminal and I will be seeking legal action at this point

Name: John Feradouros
Review: Terrible online customer service support! Ordered a gift certificate and never rec'd an e-mail confirmation..called their support line 3 times and I am being told it's being looked at with an attitude. For a high end store this needs improving.

Name: Brad
Review: Genuinely taken back by the quality of customer service at Canada goose. Ordered a gilet form the official website it was due to be delivered by DHL who are arguably the worst delivery company known to ever exist. They never delivered the parcel although they were adamant they had and said my wife had signed for the parcel (she hadn’t). All this was backed up with CCTV to prove. After a full week of going nowhere with DHL it turns out it was delivered 15 doors down from my house which was 23 not 53. More worrying the driver had forged my wife’s signature. The house up the road eventually delivered my parcel saying he forgot he had it?. Spoke with Canada goose about the whole ordeal. Who advised that they would compensate for our troubles. What we did not expect was what they compensated. I won’t mention what it was but WOW. Me and my wife were expecting maybe £10 off our purchase but it went far beyond that. By far the best customer experience I have ever witnessed from a company.

Name: Lung M
Review: My package got lost during shipping and it showed up as being delivered/picked up at a parcel point.I ordered my Limited edition Expedition Jacket at the 4th of December. I then got a message from DHL 7th of December at 1:36pm that they missed me and would reschedule the package for a later date. I was skeptical of this and checked my CCTV and I noticed nobody rang my bell and put a notice in my mailbox. I ran out and saw a DHL van outside and saw him putting something in his handheld device. I asked him  if he got my package and he said where's the package from I said it's from Canada Goose, which he responded no sorry I don't have such package. Annoyed I immediately called DHL to clarify the situation and they told me the package would be rescheduled to the next working day. I reluctantly agreed to it. Suddenly while on my call at 2:35pm I got a mail that my package could be picked up at a parcel point but the strange fact is that I requested it for the next day and the parcel point is 8km away from my house which is quite far.Not long after at 3:08pm my package got picked up by which is supposed to be "me" at the parcel point. I was really annoyed now and I immediately told DHL at the phone that my package was picked up by somebody else because I was still at home calling with DHL at that point. I also contacted Canada Goose Support through phone and e-mail to clarify my worries and provide them with the information that has occured to me. I spoke with Nadine and Yannick through the phone.Fast forward to 13th of December they said this was still in investigation and the package should have been picked up by me 100% because I was the only one that should've known the location of the package. I told Canada Goose that I want a proof of identification because I also requested a Proof of Delivery from DHL and the signature on the document was not mine. Hence I asked for a proof of Identification e.g. passport or ID. They told me they would put in the request and I should not call any further because I was calling every day to get an update. I am worried about my money because it's an 1500 euro jacket ofcourse I would call everyday. I also called DHL express again on 13th of December asking if I could have some more information on the case and they said the case has been already closed and the only instance that could open a case/claim was the seller in this instance Canada Goose. I also made a request of the notes to be send to my email so that I have all the notes on the case incase the investigation was not in my favour.I called everyday since then and on 21th of December I spoke with Yannick again and he told me that on 20th of December there was an update from DHL and the case has been closed in their favour because they are 100% sure my package has been picked up by myself. The request Proof of ID has not been listened to and I feel robbed of my money from DHL and Canada Goose. Canada Goose has since then told me they couldn't help me in any way and the only thing I could do is contact a legal advisor. Since then I have called with Geodis the logistics company,DHL and Canada Goose which they all refuse to help me on this matter. I am out of options.I also mentioned to Canada Goose that DHL was notoriously known for losing packages in my area and my neighbourhood has 400+ apartments which we all have a group app for so we could share information. almost 70% of the inhabitants have experienced problems with Canada Goose and DHL. I hope this review can make them understand that my issue has not been resolved yet and we can come to a conclusion.

Name: John Kelly
Review: Probably the worst customer experience I’ve ever had with any type of retailer.Coat purchased online for £912.00, 3 weeks later no delivery.DHL has my package but refuse to deliver as issue with consignment note that needs fixed by Canada Goose.30 e-mails and hours on the phone, finally got through to someone who apologised and promised they would sort it, didn’t happen.Still no response from customer’services’ at Canada Goose. No way to escalate, no doubt the executives in the Ivory Towers have absolutely no idea of what is actually going on.I’ve now had to contact my bank and get them to get my money back.Went out and got a Mackage coat instead, 2 days for delivery and no issues, brilliant.The only way that Canada Goose will sort this is when customers start buying from competitors.DONT BUY FROM CANADA GOOSE!

Name: Johara S.
Review: My return arrived at Canada Goose on December 4th. 14 days and 7 phone calls later, no one can tell me definitively when I’ll receive my refund. On my last call, 13 days after the return, someone asked if I’d gotten an email confirming they inspected the jacket. He said that normally happens within one to two days of their receipt of the returned item. Of course I didn’t get that. I don’t know what is happening and who I can escalate to. They keep saying they’re creating tickets but there has been no movement. This is abominable!!! I’ve never had to wait so long for a refund on a returned item. Across the board, no one takes more than a week. At two full weeks with no assuredness of when I’ll get my money back, Canada Goose is most certainly the worst retailer I’ve ever had dealings with. I’m disgusted and will never buy anything from them ever again. DEC 27 UPDATE: 9 days have passed since I left the above review so we are at THREE FULL WEEKS since the jacket I returned arrived back at Canada Goose. Again, I feel like someone has stolen my money. I called just now and the rep advised that she would add another note to  my file. I don’t understand! I feel as though the company is hoping I’ll give up on the chase for my money, so that they can STEAL it!! I don’t want to feel this way but that is how the company appears to be operating.I will have to find a way to get my money back. In the mean time, my recommendation is to stay far from this retailer because you don’t ever want to be in this horrendous position.

Name: Ben Nichols
Review: Pretty much the same as others are saying. Appalling customer service from a supposedly “premium brand”. No response to 3 emails. £875 spent on a jacket for my wife for Christmas. This is the 3rd CG jacket in our household. This is first that didn’t arrive in a CG gift box which is a shame as we store the others in their gift boxes. Such great garments yet repeatedly let themselves down with lack of response and poor customer service as many others also state. I will no longer buy any CG items as I don’t have anymore time or patience to waste chasing them…..

Name: Scott Mchale
Review: Stay away, this company has taken my money for my sons Christmas Present and cancelled the order. They don’t respond to emails or answer calls. And there phone lines are terrible, stay clear of them is my advice.

Name: Jordan
Review: Don’t buy online. I am back here again because is has been over a month since I returned a jacket and still have not received any correspondence or replies to my emails sent. At this point I am fed up and can wholeheartedly say I will never shop with them again.

Name: Dawn
Review: This is the “THIRD” jacket that we’ve received that had been worn. First one had animal hair and human hair on the inside and out. Second looked as if it had been dragged across the floor with some fuzz on the inside collar. Today, my husbands new coat had a roll of dog poop bags in the pocket and smelled of… something. So sad. When I called CG, they said to go to the item and continue with the return process.  Did I mention I ordered two different coats but received them in one box, with one jacket bag and hanger? Who’s sleeping on the job? Unreal! AND….My last three orders never came in the black CG box! Not going to continue with this company!

Name: Stuart Wedge
Review: Shocking customer service I ordered a £250 jumper on the 6th of December, advisory was 1 to 2 days delivery. After numerous emails and the usual standard automated “we are busy” responses. I rang them this evening 14th to be told my order was cancelled as soon as I placed it as there wasn’t any stock. I had the usual two or three confirmed “we are packing your order” emails. I was told over the phone I should’ve had an email and I’ve got to reorder the item   why on eath would I re-order an To find out now that this was all lies. Awful customer service for such an expensive brand in actual fact the items are shoddy and definitely not worth the money that is charged. Customer serve this is probably the worst I’ve had in a long long time. If you like in the brand buying shop do not deal with the competent online staff !!!!

Name: EyesLow
Review: I haven't received the black box on magnet, what you usually should receive and I received the package in a completely torn cardboard box, after waiting a total of 7 or 8 days, but of course I still have to pay the same amount.The customer service sometimes doesn't answer the phone after 20 minutes of waiting.  If he already answers, it only says that you have to send an email, but you have to wait a few days for a reply. I finally got in contact through the chat on the website. The lady of the chat on the website said, they (Canada Goose) just don’t send the black box on magnet, and that I can get a ridiculous $10 refund, when I paid in Euros. I haven't received the "refund" yet. Canada Goose's customer service and assistance is useless. I think it's ridiculous for such a big, world famous and absurdly expensive brand and company.

Name: Firas Hawa
Review: Looking to buy coats for your loved ones as Christmas presents? NOT HERE. Anywhere EXCEPT Canada goose. They love to hide behind the fine print of “lifetime warranty”. Don’t fall for their trap. For it is not lifetime, and I don’t even remotely consider it qualify as a warranty. Save your hard earned money and spend it on a company that can show human decency. I highly recommend to avoid at all cost.

Name: Ivan Milic
Review: I paid this Canada Goose Jacket 1100 EUR at main high street retailer. It developed scuffs from wear after 50 times being used, just going to the office or restaurant normally by car, some walks. I am very disappointed! It’s not a quality product.

Name: Maria Jimenez
Review: I received my order today and I was extremely disappointed. Before ordering I “chatted” with customer service to be sure I was going to receive the jacket in a Canada Goose black gift  box. I waited a long time in the queue and the representative told me my jacket was going to be delivered in a Canada Goose black gift box as always. The jacket is a gift for my son and he loves to storage his jacked in the original package. You can imagine my disappointment when I not only didn’t receive the item in a gift box but not even in a plastic bag or tissue paper, nothing. The jacket was thrown inside a shipping brown box unprotected. Not to the standard of a high end store.

Name: Ryan Ashby
Review: Brought from Canada goose before (in-store) excellent service can't fault them catered to me and my needs brought a jacket online for my dad but didn't fit was too small so returned it they don't offer inshore exchanges for some reason wierd. this is where the problems started, sent off the jacket and didn't hear nothing for about a week so messaged to see what happened they said they received item and was processing the return within 10 days. a day after receiving that email they sent another email informing me I had left a jumper in the box which I didn't (strange) and they was investing what happened don't see why they need to investigate but what ever its been 3 weeks since the return I've tried to contact again by email and now its been 3 days and no response where is my refund??! I would recommend buying inshore as online is very poor not what I would expect and now looking at others they've been through the same problems with exchanges/return.

Name: David Wright
Review: I ordered a hoodie 10 days ago iv had no confirmation of dispatch or that there was any problem with the order. Iv had to email them with no response to date and them chase it up with a phonecall to be informed that there has been " technical issues " asked what they were and was told they were not allowed to say 🙄 my paymemt was taken/reserved and has still not been released. The customer advisers advice was to buy the product again from a different supplier with my own money whilst still waiting for the 1st payment to be released. Absolutely disgraceful conduct for a brand the size of canada goose so i will await my payment being released and when it is I will go and buy a mooseknuckles hoodie along with the jacket iv just ordered which btw is 100 times better quality than canada goose do your research people  glad iv had this issue because it prompted me to really look into the company and its a disaster my order number is CGGB_A00845489

Name: Johnatan
Review: Do not buy this overpriced junk!! I got Canada Goose Lodge model. The jacket is of nice design, but my god!! Quality is worse then 20€ cheap chinese jacket.. Seems are so poorly sawed, there us threads hanging everywhere. Jacket is 4 days old and already under the jacket is starting to become loose. For the price they charge, you’d expect them to be of top notch quality!! Luckily for me, I didn’t buy online but from an authorised dealer so this piece of trash is going back!! Be aware, this are low quality but high price jacket.. Stick to North face if you want half the price and better quality

Name: Marjorie Rodriguez
Review: I ordered my first Canada Goose jacket.  I thought that it being such a high end company that I would not have any issues with their customer service.  Was I wrong.  I have had the jacket for 2 weeks, and already I am having issues.  The right arm is totally off.  The logo is coming off.  I thought since the coat is only two weeks old I would be able to return it for a new one.  I called customer service, I was told I would have put in a warranty claim and ship the coat at my expense to their warranty department.  I found this insane.  I will never ever buy a anything from Canada Goose.

Name: KG
Review: So I ordered 2 jackets over at Canada Goose on-line site, the Simcoe Jacket and the Women's Chilliwack Bomber Holiday edition for an upcoming Ski trip. No issues with shipping and processing, everything was all smooth. I ordered the jackets with a comfortable leeway before my trip. I got to open the package around 4 days after it was delivered as I was at a work trip. The Simcoe jacket was fine, the issue I had was with the Chilliwack Bomber Holiday Edition as the Logo Patch was incorrect. It was not matching the correct logo patch (which was a silver one), instead it had the black label logo patch which was that for the men's variant. Tags on the jacket and even the sizing indicated it was the women's bomber.I e-mailed customer support right away, that was a Monday, for a replacement or exchange of the jacket as I will be leaving the Friday of that week. It was more than 24 hours and no response from the e-mail I sent. I decided to call their customer service line and I waited for more than 40 minutes to just get someone on the phone and the full conversation lasted less than 2 hours which was mostly me being placed on hold majority of the time as the agent struggled to get a supervisor to handle my case. I have informed them that the jacket was intended for a trip and going to a store is not an option for me as it is more than 2 hours drive to get to the nearest one. It's winter, the roads are bad plus I couldn't fit it around my work schedule (that's why I ordered on-line in the first place). All I needed from them is to assure that they will ship me and cover for express shipping to get me the right jacket in time for my trip. But the agent cannot help me and instead advised me to my disgust to just wear the jacket on my trip with the tags on and then do the return after. I told Him that it was the most outrageous advice I heard coming from a customer support. I reiterated it to him that it was a Ski trip and if I ended up staining the jacket then I would end up having to void my return eligibility and in no way will I go around wearing the jacket with the tags still on.I was like, how does a high end brand like Canada Goose train their support? They sell very expensive products and their customer service etiquette is by far the worst I have ever encountered. I ended that conversation by the agent promising me that a supervisor will call me in less than 24 hours. This was already on a Tuesday.I waited until Wednesday and still no call, so I called again. The same experience, waited for more than 30 mins and stayed on call for more than an hour with no solution whatsoever and promised that a supervisor who can make a decison on my case will call me within the day.As I am typing this and it is already Thursday evening and still no calls, I sent another follow-up e-mail and still no response even from the first e-mail sent last Monday. My trip is the next day and it seems customer support is not in the priority list of Canada Goose. They just want you to buy their expensive jackets and do not even bother extending any kind of service after. Lower brands would put them to shame in a mile. Just utterly disgusted and frustrating dealing with Canada Goose. Never Again!!Update:Yes, it’s true,I finally got a call from a supervisor 1 week after I contacted them with my concern. I was still at my trip and still am as of this writing. He explained that they were looking into the issue with the website with the patch being the wrong color(and mind you, up to now the same silver patch is still what’s advertised).I really liked the jacket but I didn’t appreciate how customer services handled the issue & the stress & anxiety it caused. I specifically highlighted that I am not a fan of the black logo etc. I even had to buy another jacket (moose knuckles) to use for the trip. So To cut the story short, I was promised a “gift gesture” to make up for it and that I will not be disappointed.Ended a the call in a good note & I was informed that they have received the “gift surprise” at my work place. I asked them to check & it was just a waffle mackey toque with the worst logo tag they could possibly give me. I mean, I just told them that I don’t like the black logo & that’s what they sent me. That’s what a loyal customer is worth to them, despite of the misrepresentation of the product being sold, the worst customer service experience & follow-up ever & the immense hassle & time wasted being in contact with them & at the end that’s all a customer is worth to them. You guys could atleast have sent the artic disc toque but No! They just don’t value customers enough. The product function was never the issue here, it was the misrepresentation of what you are advertising & the extremely poor customer service you have for a high end brand. I am still out here on my trip & tomorrow’s the end of the 30-day return eligibility! I’m so done dealing with you! The worst ever!

Name: John Db.
Review: Quality is great but customer experience needs to be improved.

Name: SL
Review: Worst customer service experience I have ever had! Canada goose is considered a luxury brand but their customer service agents don’t treat it as such. I bought two Canada goose jackets this year and returned one. Both were puffer jackets for $895. I love the whole experience of receiving a Canada goose jacket from purchasing it to receiving it…the jacket I am keeping did NOT come in the black Canada goose gift box, instead it was thrown in a brown shipping box sloppily (not even in a plastic wrap, just tossed into a brown box) and is not the CG standard. It’s a completely different experience opening the shipping box, taking out the black box and seeing everything nicely stored inside of it. I keep the black boxes and store my CG coats in them.The customer service agents I spoke to didn’t understand the experience and said they can request a box for me but it’s not guaranteed because it needs to be approved?! I paid for this box and there shouldn’t be a question as to whether or not I receive it. CG wants people to buy their high priced products but their customer service is worse than that of less expensive brands. If someone is spending over $500 on a coat you should want your customer service to be white glove. The one agent I talked to didn’t even know what the black box was abs kept telling me they would ship it in a black box….I had provided her my order number and explained I received my jacket but it was missing the black gift box. She didn’t even bother looking at my order to try to understand.As stupid as it sounds, for me…the black box is a part of the experience and I felt like I had bought a knock off version of this coat when I saw it thrown carelessly into a brown shipping box. Very disappointing from a luxury brand. Please send me the box that is included with my coat!

Name: Muhammad Imran
Review: So I bought the mcmillan parka on 26/11/21 using Klarna. Made the initial payment of £275 which was taken by klarna from my debit card, till now jacket not arrived spoke with canada goose customer service yesterday initially by email and then over the phone made 3 calls yesterday and made 2 calls today, they are saying they didn't receive the order intact yesterday the canada goose agent said the communication between canada goose and klarna is slow??how canada goose is so big company and they charge hefty amount for jacket. Surely they should have good mechanism to trace out where the issue lies. Very very unprofessional and shoddy service. I had to waste 4 to 5 hours waiting for my calls to get connected to their agent. Bad customer service please avoid at all cost and also why should I chase my order. They didn't inform me what is going on even though klarna gave me canada goose reference number as well.

Name: S. Goger
Review: They did everything they could to not return the product I purchased. There is no returns section in the website purchases section. I asked for help from the live chat section, they said you can return it to our stores. I took the product to the store but they did not receive a refund.I am filling out the return form from the mobile interface. This time, it says your email address and order number do not match :) It says to call service for return from DHL Service page. It says enter waybill number. I enter the number on the form, this time it says that the order with this number has been delivered, and does not accept the call for return. :)In summary, they did their best to prevent the customer from returning the product after selling it. Tomorrow I will take the product to a store that accepts DHL returns and try to return it. If he doesn't get a refund, I'll go to the Canada Goose store and smash the product inside the store, shoot a video and post it.Order Number: CGGB_A00840564-"Update"I talked to the authorities in live chat, they would send a label for the product to be returned, otherwise, it would not be returned. I will let you know if I can return the product. :)

Name: Mark H
Review: Purchased a number of items totalling £2,000 for an upcoming holiday.....12 days have past now and nothing has arrived, customer service couldn't care less; they say they'll call back but never do.Looks like order won't arrive in time for the trip and i'll be chasing on our return.Avoid!*Update*As stated below the goods finally arrived and my wife is very happy so thank you for finally resolving.Can't fault the jackets but perhaps next time an order goes missing you just send out another so the customer isn't left hanging.....or at the very least be honest about the situation.Anyhow, all resolved now, i've update my post and rating to reflect the situation.

Name: Big C
Review: I actually purchased my black label Wyndham through flannels, I was not really too happy about how the furr is treated in original packaging as it’s lost its structure and now is just a flabby mess, not only that but the flap underneath the zip keeps getting caught and even a slightly worn the colour off, but in general I love the coats warmth but just those 2 things have made me a little sceptical about buying another one in the future, I’d like some help in the restoration in the furr / zip flap, many thanks.

Name: Ang Eric
Review: Hideous company For any customers reading this, wearing a dead baby fox around your neck doesn't make you look cool. It's 2021, time to stop skinning animals alive to feel good about yourselves.

Name: Faizel Kathrada
Review: I ordered a pair of boots for a birthday gift and paid fir next day delivery eventhough the party wasnt for a couple of days still. Its 6 days now and still no boots but i got an email saying theyre sold out. They took my money knowing they were sold out. How fraudulent is that.And customer service is a joke!!!

Name: Christian
Review: The customer service is a joke. I ordered two jackets, paid 30$ extra for next day delivery, and when I called two days later, they couldn't confirm anything! But if I would still not have received the jackets later, I could always call them back. No extra Service, No Promises, No follow up calls, just that the customer who just spend $2,700+, could just call back again later

Name: Alena S.
Review: I will rate the jacket itself. I bought Canmore parka and can say it’s worse investment I made for the last few years. It’s heavy not lightweight at all, and doesn’t give feeling of comfort in warmth by itself, you only need to put on warm and thick wool sweater to feel actually in warmth, but it’s more appropriate for places like Alaska. Unfortunately, I couldn’t return cause my friend bought it for me in Canada and sent to me, so all terms have passed when I received it. But I will not buy Canada Goose ever again and won’t suggest anyone to buy without fitting in physical store.

Name: Samira
Review: Very bad customer service. Although the emails indicate that you can reply, you will not receive a response back.I sent my jacket registered and insured for €23.50, because the seams are peeling on the sleeves. The jacket had to be sent clean. Also paid €30 dry cleaning costs for this. Now they have the nerve to clean my coat again and ask for €55.35!! The total costs have risen to €108.85 for a jacket of €1000!!!!This brand is anything but high quality. Only the price tag is high!!Unfortunately bought a new Canada Goose jacket in October, but this was the last one! I will never buy here again!!Warranty Case: 00173888

Name: Dmitriy Gluschenko
Review: Funny company. Tried to buy a parka, but with no luck (see below). After some time got an email asking to leave comment on my purchase, which technically didn't happen. So the feedback was:"Ordered a parka, because had a good experience wearing one of those earlier and didn't find this model at the local retailer. But just after payment completion got an email saying my order was cancelled. No reason, just notification. Spent almost a week to reach out support. Eventually their answer was literally "Our system done that. It could happen due to a lot of reasons, we don't know why exactly". Luckily got money back eventually."Now got an emai from them saying:"Our staff has read your review and values your contribution even though it did not meet all our website guidelines. Thanks for sharing, and we hope to publish next time!"What a hypocrisy (－‸ლ)

Name: L Chiu
Review: My first and perhaps the only…My first and perhaps the only experience with Canada Goose was unpleasant. I bought a parka for my mom as a gift, but the size was too small. To be fair, the representative I spoke to for sizing help was helpful. So a larger size was bough and a return for the previous size was initiated. The item was send back right away and was received by their warehouse on the 10/28/2021. It's been two weeks now, no respond from them. I reached out few times, and they were saying its delayed due to system error. But there has been no update from them regards to the delay. Its disappointed that a leading luxury coat retailer have such poor quality customer service

Name: Jamil B
Review: I wish I would have read these reviews before trying to purchase a parka from the new flagship store at South Coast Plaza. First, I will say the customer service at the store is outstanding. My issue is with phone and online customer service. NOT the flagship store.  I bought a virtual gift card using PayPal which on their site indicates almost instant delivery. I placed the order. Got a confirmation about 20 minutes later, then 10 minutes after that got an email saying my virtual gift card was delivered. Problem is, it was not delivered. I called customer service, and unfortunately, while everyone is super nice, the representatives you speak to have absolutely zero power to help. When you ask for a supervisor, there is no way to speak to one. I had to wait while the customer service reps communicated through an internal chat with the supervisor. After they could not resolve the issue, they said they would create a ticket to escalate, and it will be resolves in 24 to 48 hours. So now I"m super upset! I can't speak to a supervisor. The money has been paid by PayPal to Canada Goose, but my instant virtual gift card is still no where to be found. But don't worry....we are escalating it.....but that takes 24 to 48 hours. Let's just say I was not okay with that. I called back two more times, and nothing could be done. They just kept apologizing and said I just have to wait. I then chatted with someone online who apologized, said he saw all the notes and promised me someone was working on it and hopefully I would have the card soon. I checked back on line to chat again, and the representative told me he could not find my order and I need to contact the financial institution 😂 It's is amazing that a "luxury" brand has the service of a thrift store. Then I was pissed and called an got a very nice gentleman in Canada. He promised me he would work on it and that hopefully in 2 to 3 hours I would have good news. Bottom line. It is now evening here, almost 12 hours since I purchased my INSTANT Virtual Gift card, and nothing......no gift card, but they have my money. It is insane that a company of this caliber has the most horrible customer service I have ever experienced. The fact that a supervisor will not even speak to you is insane. At this point, I just have to hope that this gets resolved tomorrow. I spent about 3 hours of my valuable time dealing with this today. To say I am upset is an understatement. Their products may be good, but if their customer service is this atrocious, is it worth supporting this company........Beware before you engage with Canada Goose.

Name: Jonathan
Review: nice expensive jackets but the nylon gets stuck in the zippers once too often and then it rips. Bad design flaw. I won't be buying another one.

Name: Mehnaz Chaudhry
Review: I was hoping to speak to Canada Goose customer service manager, however after much miss communication, I have been left no choice than writing here. I am a Norwegian living in London; in Norway, we grow up wearing Canada goose jackets as they provide the best protection from the extreme cold. I have used it all my life and never had any compliments, I would not use any other brand. 5 years ago I bought a classic women’s parka Canada goose jacket form Oslo, Norway after my old one was much worn out. I took good care of it, there was no damage to the jacket and I took it to dry cleaners by the end of the winter each year and so the colour had faded somewhat but it did not bother me. In 2019, however I noticed that the jacket was starting to loose it’s feathers; my clothes were getting damaged (under the jacket) by feathers that got stuck to the garment  and it was no longer as warm as it’s supposed to be. However due to coronavirus, I waited until summer 2021 when I took the jacket to Canada Goose on Regent street and they shipped it for inspection on June 5th. On 14th of June, I received the following email:  CASE 00158032 ‘We have recently completed the inspection of your garment! The defect is covered under warranty and cannot be repaired. As we would like you to stay warm in a Canada Goose we would like to send a brand new coat to you.’I was overjoyed when I received this email and I was so pleased that I always invested in Canada Goose as I thought they had good customer service. However, to my shock and horror I received another email on 15th June stating: “We are sorry to say that, due to a system error, you were sent an incorrect email” and it went on to say that I could not get a new jacket due to fading of the colour. It concluded with sending me either a scarf or beanie as good will gift. I wrote back regarding my disappointment with their miscommunication and demanded to speak with customer services. I spoke with someone who kept insisting that they could not replace my jacket due to fading of colour and I had to say to her over and over again that I sent it in due to loss of feathers not fading. She did not seem convinced and said that she would have it inspected again.On 17th June I received the following answer: ‘Our experts have seen that the down seepage is within quality standards considering the age of the garment. Please be advised that your jacket has reached the limit of its natural life cycle’.As expected, I realised that Canada Goose were not going to replace the jacket although it was a manufacturing mistake when the jacket started to loose its feathers, not the limit of natural life cycle. As mentioned, I had owned Canada Goose jackets most of my life and never experienced any problems. I always bought them because they promised lifetime guaranteed. I understand that if the jacket has been used roughly then the company cannot replace it, but I took really good care of my jacket and there was no damage to it. Following this I asked to speak to a manager and gave them some times to call around my work schedule. However, the customer service kept calling me at the wrong time, while I was working (I can’t pick up my phone while I am in consultation with my patients). I believe they were calling from another country and did not take U.K. times into consideration. After several missed calls and my busy schedule, I gave up and became extremely busy before leaving for a holiday. During this time, Canada Goose decided to send my old jacket back to me and unfortunately, due to my travelling, I did not see their emails until I received a text message from the delivery company about having left my over £1000 jacket outside my flat on the street!!! I contacted my neighbour and asked her to bring it inside when she gets home from work. I know it was my fault that I did not reply to the email when they told me that they were shipping the jacket back to me, but why leave it on the street??? Luckily, my neighbour rushed home and the jacket did not get stolen. I have been left absolutely devastated with the way Canada Goose has treated their loyal customer and I am no longer purchasing from them; I am no longer sure which brand I should wear in the winter. What has hurt me the most is how they first sent me an email saying that they will give me a new jacket and a day later changed their tone and focused only on the fading of colour not the actual manufacture fault. I have completely lost my trust in the brand and I am absolutely devastated.

Name: WT
Review: I placed an order on 24th October for a £900 coat, hoping to get my purchase within the 1-2 business days highlighted on their website. It's now been 5 days and i've had no indication of when I will be getting my purchase or what the issue is.Terrible service.

Name: Michelle
Review: I purchased a Marino wool jumper for my daughter, had it dry cleaned as per the instructions and the jumper still shrunk. Contacted Canada goose who asked me to send in at my own cost for inspection, I did this and received an email back saying I had washed the jumper!!!! I certainly have not, I confirmed this but Canada goose are not interested. Such a shame as I have purchased jackets from them which we have all been happy with but this was my first dealings with their customer service and I’ve been completely let down. I wouldn’t normally ever pay this amount of money for a jumper but it was a treat for my daughters birthday present, I thought It would be excellent quality and last for years, it now doesn’t fit and I wouldnt expect this from a £280 jumper. I’m really upset at the situation as I now feel I haven’t got her a birthday gift.

Name: Danielle
Review: ** Updated as problem resolved.Ordered a hat for £150 on 8th of October, order arrived with my name and address label on the outside of the box but inside was somebody else’s order and invoice, i took photos, contacted CG immediately & they told me to send it back, they arranged collection by dhl for the next day. I put the returns label on that came in the box which was the customer whose order it supposedly was! ie not me! added a note inside the box with detailed info about being sent the wrong order, sent back via dhl. Heard nothing at all and it’s been over a week, so sent several emails / telephoned. Heard back today to say dhl don’t know where parcel is although it’s showing on the tracking info as delivered to somewhere in Birmingham! and now CG logistics need to look into it which will take up to 30 days. Then If dhl admit they have misplaced parcel I will then be refunded. HANG ON! Where is my refund? Why should I wait 30 days? Useless staff packing the wrong order up at the warehouse is the cause of this. Why should I be out of pocket? I have no order and no money through no fault of my own. I am beyond annoyed and it is really poor customer service. I want my £150 refunded.I asked for management to phone me ASAP and have received no reply. I would like somebody to contact me please.I have all the pictures / screen shots / email proof. I want this issue resolving.** CG contacted me 2 days after my trust pilot negative review and refunded my money & sent me a free item as a goodwill gesture. **

Name: X X
Review: Canada Goose's sales strategy.Guarantee.At first glance, the lifetime warranty offered by Canada Goose seems to inspire great confidence in the quality of their clothing. This way they can bind you faster as their customer.Common ailments.Anyone who has known the brand knows its flaws. The jackets, for example, are of very poor quality, apart from being nice and warm. In no time you can see cracks at the seams, discoloration of the buttons and zipper as if they can't stand rain and we are still silent about the discoloration in certain places of the jacket.If that happens I will send it in for repair and everything will be solved under the lifetime warranty?This is what they are waiting for at Canada Goose too. Besides that you will lose your item of clothing for a longer period of time, they will:- Stitch the cracks for you.- They don't do anything with the discoloration on buttons and zipper.- They do have a smart solution for discoloration in certain areas of the jacket. They will wash the coat in such a way that the discolorations will no longer be noticeable, because now the coat is completely discolored.Your fairly new (1 or 2 year old) garment will be washed in such a way that it will discolor all and be much duller than ever. Because the entire color of your garment has changed, you will not immediately notice this at first glance. Unfortunately, you also cannot immediately compare the current color of the washed jacket with the color of the jacket when it was sent to the repair center of Canada Goose.How can we sometimes recognize the loss of color after returning?The only possible way to make a comparison is to open the folded places.Asking for an explanation about the discoloration of the jacket.If you paid attention to your garment when you received it and you immediately noticed the discoloration, you will ask Canada Goose for an explanation. There is a great chance that you will receive the following response from them: “The washing has been carried out in a very professional manner, whereby the real condition / color of your garment has come up.” When you refute this with photos and evidence, they will indicate that it is not discoloration but dirt by own doing. The blame is placed on you almost immediately.If the discoloration is not immediately noticeable, what can and will I do?After wearing it again for a while and comparing it to other jackets, you probably start to notice that the color of your jacket has become dull. You will assume that your garment has had its best days.Probably you will go to the store for a new jacket and fill the pockets of the brand (Canada Goose) again that will offer you the so-called lifetime warranty.Do you still want to become a customer? You decide that yourself, but forewarned counts for two.With the warmest regards,Canada Goose Customer(s).

Name: Alyssa Nestingen
Review: Never buy an accessory from Canada Goose. I bought one of their winter hats for $200+ and within months of owning it the patch came off. Not only that but after numerous interactions they still refused to do anything about it. I originally went to the store and was turned away very quickly by a rude worker, saying there was nothing they could do. As I left the store I decided I wasn’t okay with that, so I went back in and was determined to get a better answer. He then told me that they would send it off to the warranty place in Colorado(I think), to be assessed. I had to pay a dry cleaning fee which wasn’t too bad. My issue is that not only would they not put a new patch on or do anything to even remotely accommodate my problem with the hat, but they also wouldn’t allow me to either be sent or buy a new patch from them. Very frustrating and biggest waste of money.

Name: W. Zhou
Review: I returned my order. Unfortunately, the jacket supposedly never arrived. On request, I should initiate an investigation myself, even though I used the return attached. It's been almost 10 months now and I still haven't got my money back. Apparently that happened to the other customers too? Does Canada Goose provide an explanation for this?

Name: Maddie Frye
Review: Expensive for sure, the jacket is OK though.

Name: Flora Brown
Review: I recently purchased a Canada Goose Cypress Puffer Jacket direct from Canada Goose . The Cypress Puffer is a new Style out oversized style I was unsure whether to go by a Medium which  was recommended  on line for a Uk 12 or size down. I don’t live anywhere near a Canada Goose Retailer so phoned there London Boutique a helpful Representative advised size down buy on line . My Canada Goose Puffer arrived 48 hours later absolutely Beautiful Jacket perfect fit . I had no issues ordering on line I was kept informed re tracking.The Jacket came well wrapped in a Canada Goose Box unfortunately no hanger or dust bag ( due to current circumstances shortage). Yes very considered purchase I was bit anxious after reading several reviews on other Customers experiences  mine went very smoothly.I would definitely re order from Canada Goose again.

Name: Franck Costa
Review: Great product, but worst customer service I've ever seen! Bought 5 jackets last December and kept 1 of of them. I returned the other 4, and only et the refund for 3 of them. I called them 20 times already, and they never resolved the issue. It's been 8 months already and nothing. They just keep pushing me back and coming up with excuses. Even sent me a hoodie to apologize, and no refund still. Be careful!

Name: Irfaan E
Review: I sent in my Chilliwack bomber for cleaning to Canada Goose before putting it away for the summer. This would be the second time; the first time being 2 years ago and they had done a great job then. Like wise, they cleaned the jacket well this time too. The only issue was, without asking me or consulting me they replaced my fur ruff with another one. This wouldn’t have been an issue if they had replaced it with something just as nice or better, but they gave me a horrible, mangly, uneven fur that looked like it was 2 strips put together. I never asked for my original fur to be changed, which was a beautiful golden colour, look well trimed and complimented my tan jacket perfectly. For some reason, which the manager K. B. himself couldn’t explain, someone from the warranty team took my fur and put a poor quality one in place of it. The jacket is literally ruined now as I don’t even want to wear it now with such a hideous thing on the hood. Very disappointing and frustrating.I called the warranty team as soon as the jacket was shipped back to me from the cleaning to try to get the issue resolved. I expected Canada Goose to accept shipment of the jacket with no cost to me and to change the fur to a satisfactory one, representative of quality and price of the jacket, and send it back to me, simple. The warranty manager, kept dragging it on, saying the warranty team said my original fur was “maided” which is not even a word in English which he had to explain to me meant that the fur was worn out from rain and weather – despite me not having any issues with it or asking them to change it. He initially said he would escalate the issue and get back to me after 1 or 2 days, he never did, I had to call him back for the third time, where once again he told me that the warranty team did nothing wrong despite doing something I never asked them to and as a result giving me a poor quality product. I asked him to let me speak with his manager or someone higher than him to which he said there was no one, which is funny because to whom did he escalate the issue? As well, speaking with the customer service rep before being transferred to him, she told me that she saw notes in the system that he had called me back and spoke to me on a day that he didn’t. He didn't follow up with me or keep his promise. His solution was for me to ship back the jacket which I would have to pay for, which I already did when shipping it for cleaning, then I would have to pay $175 or more for a replacement fur. That's not a solution, that's a scam. When the warranty team caused the problem, did something I never asked them too and then charge you to fix the problem they caused when all I wanted and paid for was a simple cleaning. That's a scam, that's thievery. Now I have no options left as the only source to file a complaint is through the warranty team which K.B. is the supervisor of and apparently there is no one to monitor or oversee the performance of his team and whether or not they are doing their job properly. Clearly Canada Goose needs structural reorganization. Searching for different avenues, I have come across numerous complaints from other customers as well about the warranty team on various different forums. It’s quite the shame as I loved my Goose jacket and was simply looking for a cleaning before putting it away to use next winter. Instead I’ve gone back and forth with them for a month, am very unhappy, have an useable jacket and will never consider a product from this company again and if you value good customer service after you buy a product, then you shouldn’t either.

Name: Sarah Forde
Review: Bought my son a jacket for Christmas and within a few months it ripped along the seams under the arm then started to rip outside of the seam thereafter. Warranty is a scam - sent the jacket back overseas (which I had to pay for myself) and received a bill of €190 for clean (jacket was practically new) and repairs and told it was our fault the seam ripped. Worst customer service. No accountability.. the price of their products is scandalous and then they try to place blame on loyal customers. I will never purchase Canada goose again after this experience.

Name: Daniel
Review: DO NOT BUY FROM THESE SCAMMERS.They denied receiving my returned item and didn't refund me, even though I provided proof that it arrived at their ware house (UPS tracking number, and the person who signed for it). Had to chase up the money back through my bank. I've actually never experienced this kind of fraud before with a retailer, pretty gobsmacking.Edit: lol their response that they want to look into my case- I already dealt with multiple customer service agents across two months, all of whom did not help or admit receiving my return despite the evidence. Scam company that’s pretending to care when it’s visible to others

Name: Consumer
Review: Wish i could give a 0 star, i bought a canada goose expedition parka, then i returned it on January 07, shows delivered on January 08 on ups website, received a confirmation email from them,stating they'll refund my account but haven't received refund until now, tried to dispute but didn't work bank and thier customer service were both useless, they refused to refund my account, this is frauding customer, i don't recommend anybody to buy thier product, scammed me out of 1409.93$, will never ever order from this company again.

Name: Heidi Barlow
Review: I would boycott this company. I paid nearly £1,000.00 for a coat which I am unable to wear because it needs cleaning, however no one will touch it because the company will not cover the warranty. I tried to contact them four times until the fifth time when I managed to speak to someone, who was helpless and told me to ship my coat to London. When asked if they would pay for the shipping he said that they would not. Steer well clear.

Name: Elisabeth
Review: “Lifetime warranty” is basically a scam and just used for marketing.After getting my chilliwack with non-removeable fur dry-cleaned each year for a couple of years the leather underneath the fur became hard and stiff untill it eventually broke after a few years. Very reputable dry-cleaner which was not at fault here.After sending the jacket to warranty i was told “the jacket was at the end of its lifetime” lol?! That’s not lifetime warranty is it? Only the fur was broken and some other bits had sign of wear like the cuffs but it was not covered under warranty nor was i offered to get it repaired for a fee.

Name: Kenrick Williamson
Review: I made a purchase on January 21,2021 for a blue faber bomber jacket 2xx and another purchase on   January 29,2021 Faber bomber lichen color xl . I returned both jacket to Canada Goose. Canada Goose sent me two emails on two separate days,Stating they  will  refunded me for both jackets. Canada Goose only refunded me back for one jacket  and not the other Canada Goose Scammed me out of $517.16 . The refuse to do the right thing and refund my account. They lied and stated to my bank Discover they issued two refunds .That was a big lie. I only received one refund and not the other. I will be pursuing legal matters to authorities as well this is frauding customer and it not fair. People work hard for their money. All new customers take your business somewhere else I don’t want you to be another victim.

Name: Barbara
Review: This company has THE WORST customer service I have ever experienced. I actually think they may be intentionally ripping off their customers. I ordered 3 jackets last November. I returned them in December and they only refunded me for 2. The first refund was timely but the second one took 2 1/2 months. The third jacket was never refunded. The email confirmation from Canada Goose of receipt of the package didn’t come until April. Meanwhile, UPS delivery confirmations indicate that they received the packages in a timely manner. Every time we called customer service, we were told it was under investigation. They said that there were processing glitches due to Covid. We tried to be patient because we understand that Covid slows things down. But then a couple weeks ago, they said that they could not locate the jacket in the warehouse and so they couldn’t issue a refund. I am astounded that they would take this stance. We cannot fathom how they would expect the customer to eat the cost of a jacket that they cannot locate.  It took them months to process the return. Something obviously went sideways on their end. The fact that it sat in the warehouse for months, it’s not surprising that it’s missing. It’s possible operating under Covid restrictions taxed their staff but that doesn’t justify their not issuing a refund. It is completely unfair to put that back on the customer. What’s worse is they took so long that now I’m outside the 120 day period in which I can dispute it with the credit card company. There must be a way to protect consumer rights which I will be investigating…I will never ever order from this company again.

Name: Susan Sims
Review: Sales assistant was brilliant and the overall quality of the coat was great.

Name: Elle
Review: Canada Goose is a fraud! I sent my $1000 jacket in to be repaired for fraying of the sleeves on or about March 2021 and they sent my jacket back completed damaged; seams completed slashed, holes in the jacket and marks all over it which appeared to be burned! Canada Goose is not taking accountability of the damage they caused to me jacket! Horrible customer service! I will be taking legal action! Never again will I buy again from Canada Goose!

Name: lexi YY
Review: I bought two coats on Canada goose official website in Feb. I made an return on Feb 12 for one of them and the package was delivered on Feb.19 based on tracking number. however the $1131.38 refund was not issued after almost a month. so I contact costumer services via email on Mar.5. the representative said they confirmed they receive my return package but my refund was delayed because all the “problems” they were undergoing.        So I waited for another month until April, I began to call the consumer services, I got different answers each time. At first the representative said my refund was issued but two weeks later, other  representative denied the whole things his colleague was saying  and told me my refund is still processing.         After another month until today May. 7th, the representative told me that their warehouse can’t locate my package so their “headquarters” decided to not gave me the refund back.         In conclusion, Canada goose confirmed they received my package on march via email, two months later said that they can’t locate my package and I am responsible for their mistake.  I can’t believe this will happen to Canada goose, a well known and popular brand, I am shocked that you played your costumer like a fraudulent company. First of all, as a costumer, I returned the package to you and followed all the return policy, why I am the one should pay for your chaotic management?

Name: DEL
Review: I posted about this issue a few weeks back, but did not pursue since my husband had contacted someone on the Customer Care team at Canada Goose.  Alas, he has gotten nowhere with them… so I will post here again.I received a pair of gloves for Christmas, but they were too small.  I wanted to exchange them, but was advised to return and repurchase.  Customer Service seemed prompt and helpful.  I postmarked them on January 7/21, in advance of the deadline.To this day, Canada Goose claims that they have no record of the package arriving back at the company.  UPS says that they delivered the package and that someone signed for it!  The two companies will not communicate themselves and are instead leaving it up to us.  So now we have no gloves and no refund.  What does the customer  do in this situation???I don’t think it’s right for the customer to be left paying for potential fails in the system, especially during COVID times when we don’t have choices on how to return items.

Name: Sara Milne
Review: Terrible company.I returned two items in one box (As it was delivered) on 24th March and I only received a refund for one of the items and have been chasing it since. 9 emails and I am still being told 'It is being investigated'. They are unable to answer my question as to what is actually being investigated! They have the item and my money. Worst customer service I have ever experienced. Shocking for what is classed as high end retail. I will never shop with them again and would not recommend to anyone. My last email of asking for it to be passed to the management department on Saturday 17th, had a response of a supervisor will contact me within 24 hours...still nothing despite another 2 emails chasing this. SHOCKING! Reading these reviews I now see this is not a one off!

Name: Patchara Smith
Review: Bought my SECOND CG collaboration jacket this year.  My first experience was positive and the medium size jacket I purchased was a perfect fit.  Earlier this month I decided to treat myself to a new coat.   Due to my current location in BC and because of COVID I elected to place my order online.  Again, I went for the Medium size.Upon purchase, I noted the NO REFUND POLICYWhen the coat arrived it is miles too large,  I contacted Canada Goose, not to RETURN but to EXCHANGE for the same model coat in a smaller size.  They will not accept me exchange even though the purchase data was less than 30 days ago,I am now left with a $800 dollar coat I will never be able to use.This is shocking service from such an iconic Canadian company - I WILL NEVER AGAIN USE CANADA GOOSE as their service is embarrassing.EDIT - After posting Canada Goose finally agreed to EXCHANGE my jacket for a size that actually fits.

Name: Cardozo
Review: Have it now for a few years. Good for winter

Name: Theresa
Review: The coat I purchased at the end of February for my daughters 18th birthday got returned to CG by USP in error--I received the confirmation from UPS that CG got the coat back on 3/5/21.  It is now 4/8/21 and I am still waiting for my refund.  I have called them numerous times.  Each customer representative always tells me, it's under investigation.  I ask for  a call back, get nothing.  I wait a week, call again, same thing--it's being investigated!?!  After my 5th call, today a supervisor called me back.  She had no answer either--said it's under investigation.  I have my UPS confirmation that it was delivered back to them--they have my money--they have the coat--WHAT is there to investigate.  This company has the worst customer service I have ever encountered.  I will NEVER purchase anything from them again and I will certainly tell everyone I can about the horrible experience I'm having with them.  Very, very, very disappointed in what I thought was a reputable company.

Name: Yi
Review: For just a replacement, email back and forth more than 30 times lasts two months and still continues. Their custom service is not professional at all. They never want to have a professional argument; response almost never on time; respond by repeating the same thing over and over. Lifetime warranty is just a propaganda. The jacket is good, but over price. They definitely over advertise the products. What they do during the custom service is like stealing the last money from the customers, such as paying dry cleaning fee and repair fee. They treat me as a fool. Haha. I bet I can see they go to bankrupt if they do not improve the service.

Name: Customer
Review: Well done it only took you two months to reply that really meets your timescales on replying to complaints ! And no I’m not satisfied I should never have had to pay for a new ruff in the first place because the original one looked like a malnourished rat !

Name: Shauna Campion
Review: Ordered the 24/03/21 and arrived two days later. Customer service couldn’t have been any more helpful jacket came in a lovely box with a hanger and a dust bag. Size is just perfect and will definitely be ordering again

Name: V. Krasovsky
Review: The lifetime warranty is useless: you must pay for shipping and dryclean upfront, just to have the parka inspected. Then they may declare it's not covered by warranty. While repair is free, you are better off going to local repair, at least with small issues.

Name: MICHELE MACHIN
Review: Absolutely awful ordered the £995 coat as a gift in their size I normally buy. They tried it on when they opened it seemed fine tags removed.Remembering we are in lockdown so coat was then tried on a few times then they decided maybe a larger size needed.So we had to wait to get parcel back then returned it and in the mean time ordered the larger size as they do not do a straight exchange.Then I got an email saying they thought it had be worn snd it was bobbly.How could it have been worn out there’s no where to go and it did not fit also an item only goes bobbly after being washed snd it so obviously had not so they are going to return it to us. We have however bought one that fits now.You would think the cost of the coat and being in lockdown and the fact it did not fit so we bought another from them they would refund but no.I really thought we would get a better customer service than this.If we could have gone to a shop and tried it on then there would be no problem.I am appalled and shocked after reading all these reviews and will never buy from them again.

Name: Gab
Review: Canada goose has the absolute worst customer service that I've ever encountered with a luxury product. Let's be honest, their products are VERY expensive, I'd assume that there would be at least an ounce of service associated with the brand.I've recently had two bad experiences: 1) My BRAND NEW $1000 jacket ripped, and I was told that I would have to mail it back and then they would "assess" whether or not it was under warranty for repair. I would also be without my jacket for 2 months, in the middle of winter.2) I ordered something from their website (don't get me started on HOW it was shipped in the box). Returned it within days of receiving it. It arrived at the warehouse within 48 hours. It's been over 10 days and I have not received my refund. I've gone back and forth with their customer service and each time they have to "confirm" that the package arrived. They are penalizing me because of something they cannot find. My family has owned several products over the years but never again. I've talked with other friends who have CG coats and they've moved on to other brands due to customer service/quality issues. What is the point of owning a nice jacket/product if it becomes faulty due to quality? If anything, I shouldn't have to ever reach out because the quality is so amazing, right?

Name: dee
Review: Update:  it is now 3/29/21, still no refund from CG. They state they did not receive parka I mailed back with their shipping label, even though the tracking shows it as received. Telling me they have IT issues, warehouse problem, they are still looking. I would never buy from this company again.I purchased 2 parkas from Canada Goose website on 1/17/21.  The coats arrived 1/23/21.  I boxed up the coat that did not fit, got a shipping label from the CG website, and it was shipped back on 1/25/21, tracking shows it was received on 1/29/21.  It is now 3/2/21, and for over a month I have been waiting for the refund to my credit card.  I have called and emailed Canada Goose several times, and keep getting excuses, no results.  It cannot take this long to refund a customer their money.

Name: Mazen Hijazi
Review: Worst customer service.  I bought 3 Canada Goose jackets over the last few years.   They lost me as a customer.  I will never ever buy anything from Canada Goose.  I bought a Chilliwack Bomber Jacket on January 10, 2021 & it was delivered on January 15th.  I tried it at home and didn’t like it because it was tight at the wrist.  I shipped back for a return & it was delivered at their warehouse on February 2nd.  I received a call from their customer service on February 8 informing that the it cannot be returned because it was purchased in 2019.  I clarified to them that the jacket that I bought is a Langford Parka & that the returned jacket is the Chilliwack Bomber Jacket that I purchased on January 10, 2021.  The person apologised & advised me that I should receive the refund within a few days.  Two days later,  I received a package by mail,  I opened it and it was the jacket returned to me with a note indicating that it cannot be returned because it was purchased in 2019.  I immediately called customer service & explained to them that this is not the Langford Parka that I purchased in 2019 and that this is the Chilliwack Bomber jacket that was purchased on January 10, 2021.  Again they apologized & indicated that they will send me a new shipping label to ship it back.  I newer received the shipping label so I sent them an email.  They emailed me back indicating that the jacket was returned to me because it was worn.  I emailed them back & asked for a manager to call me back and no one had called back. I called customer service 2 days ago asking why a manager hasn’t called me back,  they promised that I should receive a call with 48 hours.  48 hours later & no call.  Canada Goose is a bad company.  Stay away & don’t waste your money.  They made a mistake by sending the jacket back to me because they thought it was the one bought in 2019 and later to cover up for their mistake they came up with a new excuse that the jacket is worn even though it was never worn except for a few minutes inside my house.

Name: Mr Mick  Hepworth
Review: Really disappointed that the online CG UK site says you will get the coat with hanger garment bag and official box via DHL. Got my order within 48hrs very happy with that but not happy it arrived in a flimsy brown box in a plastic wrapper   Got me thinking is this a fake. Rang customer services they said Uk running low on garment bags and boxes and i could have a £30 refund. Not got the refund but find it very poor for such a premium purchase.Thanks for the response eventually anyway - i have rang the number on 3 occasions and been told 3 different versions/ stories and basically ignored. As i say I’m very happy with the coat can not fault it. However the way i was misled in not reviving the hanger box and garment bag and no refund as left me not so happy and I wouldn’t use this service again. My 3 experience of buying a Canada goose and by far the worst customer experience I’m sorry to say. I have lost the will to try ringing again just to be fob off.

Name: Kat
Review: $1100 item returned 12/29, still no refund, no ability to escalate or get management involved, no follow up, no information other than "IT issues". WORST COMPANY EVER.

Name: Cathy Page
Review: If I could give 0 stars I would. I ordered my daughter a sweater for Christmas, the sweater was not to the quality one might expect for a 350 dollar sweater and it didn't fit. We thought this would be not big deal, sent it back in a timely manner (two days after christmas, and it only took two days because their website would not process the return for those two days). As of today they have had that package for 45+ days ( we confirmed this with the business), we have contacted them a total of 8 times, with no resolution or answers as to when we can expect a return. Obviously completely lack any respect for their customers. Will never buy from them again, and hope anyone reading this will be cautious when dealing with them.

Name: Ted Kanellos
Review: They are not in the business of customer service. They're business is keeping the shareholders and board of directors happy. They may have thought I was joking when I said I was hiring a lawyer to go after them.. Buyer beware there is no warranty. Keep you posted

Name: Peter Crann
Review: Fantastic coats. Got two of them through the secondary market. So warm and well made. Luxury.

Name: Johnny Nguyen
Review: I've been waiting for 3 months for a return label from them as they have messed it up, as they keep constantly telling me that a logistical team is looking into it and to wait 24-48 hours for me i've been waiting for over 3 months now and nothing at all.

Name: customer
Review: Ordered a coat 2020/10/12. Paid for express shipping which didn’t come on time was refunded for 30.00. The jacket never came and required a signature never signed for nor delivered still Fighting for the refund was told UPS had to investigate which took 4 1/12 weeks. Then tells me it was delivered but I have cameras  was never delivered. I’ve asked for supervisor told will get call back 24-48 hours it’s been two months.   Told I’ll receive an emailOf course never. I’m suing Canada Goose.

Name: Jose Diaz
Review: The worst company that I ever deal with. Their product specialist do not understand their own product. I place an order for a Men's Hybridge Lite Jacket two days ago. They accepted the order and next day sent me an E-Mail that the Jacket was not available. Today they sent me an E-Mail stating that the Jacket has become available. Place an order again and I just got an E-Mail that the jacket is not available again. I have never experience this type of ineptitude from a company before. I will never buy from Canada Goose again.

Name: Hana Zero
Review: I bought a jacket as a birthday gift for my boyfriend. It was supposed to be delivered with DHL. According to their website it should have been delivered but it was not delivered at my place. Never received anything. I contacted the CS of Canada Goose and they said they would start an investigation with the delivery company. The delivery company eventually contacted me and said they had indeed delivered it and according to the POD it was delivered. I check the POD and no name or where was stated where it got delivered. There was no signature in it. As the email i received this was highly required. I got called again by the CS of Canada Goose and they said they closed my case because of the delivery being made. No refund nor new jacket, so gone 900 EUR. They also said that they received pictures from the delivery company but due to privacy cannot forward them to me.

Name: dg graphics
Review: I purchased the CG Chateau jacket and can honestly say it is the worst manufactured and worst designed jacket I have ever purchased, also the most expensive..i purchased it 4 years ago and have worn it daily during the winter to go to work and back. I have never seen a jacket disintegrate before likeThis one has..the fabric used to construct the jacket develops holes from friction also by the inside of the arms. I have never had a jacket do this ever…I own snowboarding jackets that take more abuse than this that I have had for 30 years and still look brand new. The sleeve cuffs are unraveling, the zipper is broken..today’s newest failure. It basically a piece of expensive garbage and for the price it should last a lot longer.

Name: Barbara VanDerwarker
Review: I was so excited to receive a Canada Goose parka for Christmas. Unfortunately, I needed a larger size. The jacket was returned with confirmation on January 5. They have the jacket and my money. After 5 emails, numerous calls, and the same response, IT issues, still no refund. How is this even allowed? I wanted to reorder another jacket but after his customer experience, I don’t believe that will happen.

Name: John in Canada
Review: Like many luxury brands (Rolex comes to mind) the quality of a Canada Goose jacket falls short of its high price. Yes, the jacket is warm but I have other winter jackets at 25% the price just as warm. Canada Goose zippers are very fussy (hassling with it will test your patience) and the jackets are bulky and heavy. It just isn’t worth the money.

Name: 小城故事
Review: I placed a return with returning label they issued for me , they received on Jan, 14th, 2021. They said it will take 7-10 days to process. Till today , I haven’t received refund. I called 3 times, customer representatives’ responses were like “ busy season, take longer time”, or IT issues. I requested to talk to the supervisor, they promised to call me 24-48 hrs, I didn’t hear from this company so far, very bad customer services!

Name: Bobby S
Review: This was originally a much longer review with a timeline spanning 13 weeks / 90 days, but as the issue is now resolved I thought it best to remove those points.**This was originally a 1 star review. CE sent me a complementary scarf a few weeks ago to say "sorry" and I appreciate the gesture.***I purchased a new parka on 12/12/20 from the Canada Goose website and was shipped the incorrect order by fulfillment. Although I received the order very quickly, I was not able to exchange the item for the correct one due to the short lead time before the holiday (which is understandable). Over the span of 10 weeks,  I’d been promised dispatch of the correct item at least twice and (later) an immediate refund 7+ times. I was finally refunded $1300US after at least a dozen calls and emails.As a shareholder, Canadian, and owner of some other Canada Goose products… I’m extremely disappointed. I believe that they care about their customers, but it’s important to ensure every interaction – every single one – is a great one. Mistakes happen and more than anything I would have loved to just been engaged with. Strong customer service recovery creates loyal, happy customers.… especially when things go wrong. This should’ve been opportunity vs an outcome.My return item was finally located by the warehouse 60+ days after receipt and a refund was completed on 3/8/21. While I'm obviously happy that my refund finally happened, I feel it’s really important to address the following points of feedback because so many customers have similar stories:-	Customer Experience staff need to be better positioned to solve customer complaints: Although it’s difficult to say for sure without knowing, I constantly got the sense that front line folks on the phone didn’t have the ability to immediately address issues affecting the customer. While it’s true that these folks alone can’t be responsible for the myriad of ecomm and warehouse issues, they need to be positioned to immediately solve problems on behalf of the customer without needing to escalate and wait weeks for answers. In short, customers want an advocate… someone who will work for them and represent them. Every person I talked to was very courteous and professional, but If you claim to sell a premier product you need to roll out the red carpet. Let these folks do that.-	Training needs to be consistent: For the first 3 weeks after initiating the return, I was told something different every time by CE. Am I receiving the correct item? Do I need to exchange it? Am I getting a refund? Get the message right the first time.-	Streamline whatever is going on between Ecommerce and the Warehouse: This isn't totally uncommon but no customer should need to worry about how these two work together. If you return an item and tracking shows it as received, the onus is on the company to sort out a refund within the 2-3 day timeline they've stated.-	Communication needs to be vastly improved: Refund might take 8 weeks? Just say so and explain why. At least the customer is aware upfront that you cannot honor the 2-3 day refund timeline that's been previously stated.If you want to purchase a CG product, I strongly recommend you purchase via a respected Authorized Retailer. To date, while my issue was resolved, it's still one of the worst customer experiences I’ve had.

Name: Just Shallow
Review: Ordered Garson Gilet. I ordered a small in black. Was straight forward to purchase online. Gilet arrived in a brown box. The gilet was in a clear plastic bag which I thought was good because if the box got wet at least contents would be dry. Inside was a hanger and dust  / suit carrier type bag. From purchase to delivery took 3 days. I am happy with my purchase. I thought the service was good. The gilet itself is superb. Overall very happy.

Name: RA
Review: My experience is similar to many of the other reviews, unfortunately. This is really bad.I returned two coats from the same order - both delivered January 4, 2021. Grady at the Canada Goose warehouse signed for the packages. Here are the UPS tracking numbers:1Z 295 22E 90 9344 15821Z 295 22E 90 9814 6982I received a refund for one of them.Every week for the last four weeks I have written to Customer Care and every week I receive the same response which says that the "appropriate department" is looking into this.It is now February 4, 2021. I have disputed the charge with my credit card company. I don't know what else to do. Canada Goose has MY money and THEIR jacket and refuses to rectify the situation.This is too bad, because I have never had a bad experience in the past. Returns have always been credited. However it appears once they make a mistake they are totally incapable of fixing it.

Name: jamez Ali
Review: Excellent quality Longford parka jacket. I brought It direct from regents street store last year in October. You get lifetime manufacture warranty and excellent in store service.
