I recommend anyone to go to the store try sizes on and if you buying one with fur pick one as it’s real fur so each jackets fur is different depending on time of year you buy it and colour of fur.

Name: Sarah L
Review: I purchased the Expedition Parka in early November when it was starting to get to about -20C where I live here in Canada. It was a touch too big, so I followed CG's direction to return and then order a new product. Completed my part within one week, falling in line with all of CG's outlined requirements for returns. The facility received the return in November, and according to the return policy, refunds should be issued within a few days, and the balance should be back into the original account within 10 business days. I'm not here to regurgitate their return policy, but only to mention the facts, because it is February and I am still waiting for a refund! I've had to call the company now over 14 times to check in on the status, and am constantly brushed off, misinformed, and completely disregarded. Though they have confirmed that they received the jacket, Canada Goose is holding over CAD$1500 that should have been returned back in December, yet it still has not been issued and no customer service rep will provide a reason. It has been the most frustrating, stressful, and degrading customer experience. I have absolutely no faith that I will receive my refund for a product that I abided by all the return guidelines. Canada Goose is a company that will outline high expectations from their customers, yet not hold themselves to same standard. If we denegrate this experience to a simple sentence: Canada Goose has robbed me. I really can't underestimate them more - and I truly don't think there could be a worse experience.  So, if you are ordering from this company that has no respect for their customers, I suggest you get the sizing right, otherwise you're going to be essentially giving donations to a multi million dollar company - which I'm sure you have the extra funds to do so.If you want a review of the coat that I purchased the second time, thinking I’d be refunded for the return.. fits fine, warm enough for -35, but, in the words of Missy, is it worth it? Can I work it? Can I put my thing down flip it and reverse it? I would certainly reverse this experience if I could. Never purchasing a CG product ever again.

Name: Elizabeth Kearney
Review: I returned a Canada Goose Parka within a week of first receiving it. The company received the parka on January 12th. I still have not received a refund of $940. I have called twice with no reason as to why I haven't received it and no idea when I will get the refund. I have asked for a Manager to call me back and its been over 24 hours and I still have not received a call back. I have emailed the company twice and still no response. Just like the previous review, they don't even deserve one star.

Name: Alex Le
Review: Truely the worst. Return the jacket 4 months ago. Still not get refund. Called many times request an escalation. They dont even have a note on it. Horrible. Dont buy it.

Name: Lily peace
Review: This is just absurd. I place an order for a 750 pound jacket and get a box filled with cardboards and tape rolls. I have very clear evidence that the parcel was tampered and still they won’t resolve the issue. I will be very wary when placing an order with this company because you will more than likely end up out of pocket even if it is not your fault.

Name: Anita
Review: Paid the most I ever paid for a coat (hybridge knit hooded jacket).  Advertised lifetime warranty. (Lifetime ends when you cut the tags off, by the way).  Zipper was defective day one. Thought it might be me, so tried again with same problem and got stuck in it and had to pull coat off over my head!  Only got to wear to trunk pick up of groceries due to being 70 and Covid everywhere. Bought this as a present to myself for making it to 70 and it looked less bulky than most. Called to set up repair with Canada Goose and they said not covered. Beware....has the word knit in the name and knit not covered. And they noted it was made in Romania and they weren’t sure they could repair it if I sent it back at my expense and paid for the repair. What does knit and Romania have to do with zipper repair? Maybe I should try to contact Romania Goose?  I tried to post this on Canadian Goose and it kicked me off twice.  After I finished it said,”website not available, try again later”. Seems they only let good reviews go through. I’m afraid to send it back now after reading others seemed to disappear in the mail.  They couldn’t even promise they could repair it if it arrived to them. Just wondering how many more had zipper trouble and are out $700-$800? Would give zero stars.

Name: Tricia Mclean
Review: You do not deserve a star from me. You will be hearing from my lawyers soon.

Name: Wmwe
Review: I received a tampered parcel with rolls of packing tape and junk inside instead of the jacket. Contacted customer service but was told they can’t do anything. Do not trust! I am going to try and spread the message everywhere so people won’t be left out of pocket by buying Canada goose.

Name: Bryn Connor
Review: Appalling service, absolute fraudsters, purchased an item that was returned, the company are trying to say the box was returned empty, this has been investigated by DHL who have confirmed the weight of the box the whole way through shipment with contents and they will still not refund, keep saying they will but can take 28 days its now been 2 months saying they have had no reply from DHL yet dhl have replied to me and have advised me they have the same response to the company time and time again told it will be done and will call me back and no one does. £600 out of pocket due to fraudsters in their business, AVOID !!!!

Name: Antonia Gait
Review: Firstly they don’t deserve one star. Absolutely shocking company. Purchased a coat for it to be delivered wrapped in a knotted clear plastic bag, with no documents with it like I’ve seen in the reviews.Looks like something I purchased off eBay not a top end retailer!Avoid this company at all costs! I’ve seen better packaged fakes than this! Shameful!

Name: stevie
Review: We bought a new jacket each for the winter, both arrived slick on time. Really nice jackets. Very warm and have been tested only down to -4 so far. No issues at all. We purposely avoided the fur hoods as we are against the way that allegedly Canada Goose trap the wild animals to get the fur. But that said it’s not our argument if they do it this way we just did not want the fur as it seems a bit cruel. Jackets are expensive, but that’s the price you pay for brands like this , if it’s too much then look for an alternative

Name: margaret roberts
Review: On the 5 January 20 I ordered (2) Wyndham Parka jackets in error when I only meant to order one. Both jackets arrived on the 7 January with DHL delivery. I was delighted with the jacket and parcelled the other jacket up for return. The return form inside the box explained exactly how to return  with DHL free of charge. On Friday the 8 January DHL came to collect my return and I was able to track the parcel back to Canada Goose. It arrived back with them on Monday 11 January and my money was refunded back to my account on the 14th. I had NO PROBLEMS what so ever and was delighted with the cut and quality of the jacket.

Name: Noura khad
Review: Canada Goose you are the worst. I have returned a Parka ( worth £925) with DHL service. The parcel was picked on time and delivered to the warehouse the next day. It has been a month now and I have not got the refund yet. The logistic team is investigating but without any reason. DHL tracking proves clearly parcel was received and signed by someone. First your coat costs a fortune for no reason. Second your customer service is uselessto anyone reading this review, please consider others brands with far better responsive and helping customer service.

Name: Tyler Borger
Review: To my delightful surprise, I received a Hybridge base down jacket as a gift for Christmas. With that being said, I wear a large in almost any brand. Being Canada gooses' sizes tend to run small due to their advertised "slim fit" design, I wanted to exchange for an XL and customer service told my sister it was non exchangeable due to it being over the 30 day timeframe. Also, there is pulls in the seaming of the jacket; In my opinion, I will not purchase one of these "high end jackets" due to their poor customer service, bad exchange policy of only 30 days AND we are in a pandemic so one would think they could extend that a bit or exchange a like-for-like being the jackets has never been worn AND was a gift!? If you are into fashion and love designer names, buy a moncler instead, or purchase from Nordstrom. I am very disappointed and their customer service does NOT justify their 695.00 USD price tag!

Name: Damola Akinyemi
Review: AWFUL COMPANY. CLAIMED I COULDN'T RETURN A BRAND NEW PRODUCT DUE TO THEIR BEING A SMELL. WARNING - DO NOT BUY FROM THEM EVER - THERE CUSTOMER SERVICE IS SO TERRIBLE!!!!

Name: Aria Yousefi
Review: Terrible customer service. Good luck trying to get anything accomplished through them - you’ll get the same runaround. Save your money and purchase elsewhere where optimal service is kept post purchase.

Name: Stuart Jukes
Review: Very disappointed with the service I received and would not recommend ordering via the website.I ordered a £925 coat using their size chart to guess what size my wife would be for a Christmas gift. Ordered nice and early as I knew about shipping problems globally due to COVID as I wanted to make sure it arrived in time. Christmas Day comes and the coat is a size smaller than she needs to fit comfortably.I’ve tried to ask to exchange for the next size up only to be told I can’t return the coat as it’s outside their 30 day returns policy and if I want the next size up I’ll have to order another one. Not sure what they expect me to do with one which is too small.What terrible service from what is supposed to be a global “Premium” brand.Hoping the UK shop sees this review and can help me as the customer care team (got to laugh at that title) couldn’t care less.

Name: Shemika Williams-Gray
Review: I wish we could give negative ratings as Canada Goose does not deserve a 1 star.My husband purchased a virtual gift card for me as a Christmas gift, and it is now after New Years and I still have not received it and this company is giving us the run around.  I’ve called twice and no one has done anything, I got the response that it’s been escalated internally.  Are they serious?  It’s been over a week with no resolution but, they made sure they got our money!!I’ve emailed and of course the same response, it’s been escalated.  This is absolutely ridiculous!! Horrible company!!Canada Goose is the worst company that I have ever dealt with.  They have the absolute worst customer service and for the price of their products it is totally unacceptable!!!  I will never purchase from them again.  They are the absolute worst!!!

Name: Helen Smith
Review: —5 stars, you’ll never see your money again. worst customer service. Impossible to return and get my money back without using their UPS label. Didn’t matter how many times I said UPS didn’t exist here. Canada goose says talk to UPS. UPS says talk to Canada goose. Didn’t matter how many « managers » I spoke to at Canada goose. Cut to me paying 45$ shipping back to the company. NEVER GOT REFUNDED! 1500$ never returned to me. Never recommending them

Name: Isabelle
Review: If I could give negative points, I would!I experienced the same bad customer service as previously reviewed by other customers, when returning an item (that was too small). My item was returned and already reached their Netherlands warehouse the following day. Still, Customer service would not refund me after a month because 'my item had not been scanned yet'. Not my problem if they cannot have some order in their own house! I kept calling several times a week and was always told the same thing: either to wait for my item being scanned or for them to call me back for an update. Both never happened and I demanded to talk to their manager or finance department. Not possible, they told me. So I would not hang up the phone and demanded their manager calls me back on the same day. When he/she did not at the time we had agreed, I called again and after a few hours the manager called me to update me that they would reimburse me.This should not be like that, as customers willing to pay so much, we should not have to spend days calling them and for them not being able to fix anything. I had to shout (but still be respectful) and demand being called by their manager. My tip is to be extremely persistent to the point of 'annoying' them. That was the only way I got my refund.I will never buy again from them again. Such a big company name being tainted by such bad customer service...

Name: Andrew Leathwood
Review: I have for about the last 15 years always brought North face parka , so decided this time to buy a Sanford jacket , so happy I have purchased it, quality is excellent and very comfortable, have been to Liverpool one this afternoon for the sales and something nice to eat, what a difference, always looking over my shoulder in case someone stole my north face parka, but what a relief that most under 20 were all wearing fake canada goose puffa jackets and were definitely not interested in nicking yet another fake. Love it can keep warm , and know that everyone thinks I have a fake knock off and leave it alone,ok £850 not cheap, but peace of mind and jacket still on coat hook , worth it.

Name: Daniel Yang
Review: sent two jackets for a repair. I had one of them for a while about 7years. It came back in the exact same condition, nothing was fixed or repaired. Second jacket was discontinued. Therefore they couldn't send me a new jacket. Canada Goose sent me a list of jackets, which i did not like. I call the agent and the agent tells me i am eligible for other jackets as well. I gave Canada Goose a list of the jackets that i want. Canada Goose tells me none of them are in inventory. And sends me a jacket that was in their original list. Absolutly ridiculus. Spent nearly $200 on shipping and dry cleaning. Now i have to spend more to send my jacket again. Plus, i also got a jacket, that i don't want. What a great customer service :)

Name: Rylan Churchill-jones
Review: ordered a coat and they sent me wrong one I sent it back and ordered it again thinking this time they wouldn’t make that mistake again and they for a second time send a completely different coat to what I ordered. Awful experience

Name: Takita Smith
Review: I ordered a women jacket in September transaction went great however I had to return the jacket because it was a bit to small so I replaced my order great it’s confirmed and on its way I can’t wait however the day it was supposed to be delivered all my trouble begin first no package I called ups nothing I called Canada goose to have either my Coat or money back however I was informed there was nothing they could do the package asked for a signature but one was not provided so I am out of a jacket and over $1000 I will never shop with them again signed an angry customer

Name: Rebecca Leigh Finch
Review: I can't order from them online for some reason.  My order keeps being cancelled.  Called my bank and they say it went through, but they say there is a problem with the payment.  Called them multiple times and they are no help, told me to go to a store and buy it because my account has been blocked since I tried to ship it to a different address than my billing address.  I live 8 hours from the nearest store!  I want to spend $2000 on a toque and jacket and they can't even be bothered to help me make that happen.

Name: Nikolaj Hansen
Review: Bad customer service... I bought a jacket, and send it back... One month later have I still not got my money.... Have filed a fraud notice against Canada Goose, so would get my money back.... Would never buy anything from them again!

Name: Vicki roper
Review: I contacted CG to ask them about a cleaning agent in my area as local dry cleaners would not touch my coat due to streaks appearing. CG told me fill in the warranty and send to them. This cost £50 to send to Scotland WHAT A MISTAKE!They have emailed me (eventually) saying my coat will be sent to Portugal for cleaning before they can inspect it. INSPECT FOR WHAT?There will be an additional cost of at least £40 plus tax and another long delay I continue to email and they only say the same thing about cleaning before inspectionI honestly do not think I will see my coat againI feel cheated, frustrated and angry, the dry cleaning label does not mean it can be DC in the normal way and I’m sure I am not the first person to have been tricked this way by CGI will have no choice but to go through the small claims court which is a lengthy and time consuming objective

Name: Luis Hernández Salgado
Review: Awful customer service!! They do not care and do not solve anything

Name: Ginger Zeller
Review: I purchased a coat from Canada Goose and the coat was the most expensive coat from Canada Goose. The coat was delivered and it was huge and did not fit!  I asked for a smaller coat which they had in stock but the company said, no returns.  I explained I just wanted a smaller size and the company said,  No!  The Canada Goose Company is a terrible company to deal with and I would never purchase another coat from them again.  TheCanada Goose Company is making money but it is not a company for the consumers and they took advantage of me.

Name: Kurtis Aiken
Review: Horrible customer service. paid $1,000 for a jacket. within 2 weeks the velcro on the pocket rips off.when i contacted customer service. they are telling me i have to pay to mail my jacket in to be fixed. they are refusing to exchange it. so basically i will be paying $1,000 for a repaired brand new jacket.what do they expect me to do for a jakect while im wiating for them to fin it and send it back to me?plus, after speaking with a rep, giving all my personal info. that is still not enough to process the repair. NO! now i have to go online, create an account and file a warranty claim. basically defeating the purpose of speaking to the rep in the first place.and what do you know. a week has gone by an no one from the claim department has contacted me about getting the jacket fixed.high end brands, should have high end after sale customer service. Old Navy is better then these clowns

Name: Lorraine Hopkins
Review: What an awful company I ordered direct a coat and my order cancelled, I phoned and was just informed they don’t know why try again with another email and phone number - I did refused again I phoned emailed and no one could explain - didn’t get back to me when said - ignored emails and tweets Still no explanation no help to resolve Poor customer service unhelpful staff on phone and no one knowing what they are doingPoor poor poor - don’t bother Fir such a big company with high end product ls they are useless to help and have no clue in giving an explanation or resolve

Name: Jessica Evans
Review: Absolutely appalling customer service. Beware of non-delivery and refusal to refund money! We are nearly £900 out of pocket with no jacket to show for it and we will be following this up in small claims court. We ordered a jacket from Canada Goose for next day delivery. We were sent the tracking information for the DHL courier. A month later and the jacket STILL has not arrived. Canada Goose opened an investigation with DHL, who says the jacket was delivered, even though the online tracking information shows that the parcel is still in transit, and no proof of delivery has been provided! Canada Goose are now refusing to refund our money, or send another jacket. They say it is our responsibility to follow up with DHL. Canada Goose customer service has been useless and completely unhelpful, saying they will phone us back with updates, and provide the proof of delivery we keep asking for, but we never hear anything back from them. I would avoid buying online from this companyy.

Name: CJ
Review: I have worn my CG winter jacket for just a month and it is wearing off a bit on the arm and bum section. The customer service experience is beyond going through hell. It is just not worth the money. Keep your hands away from CG!

Name: Mrs sally hartley
Review: Excellent service and excellent jacket! Ordered my jacket for Christmas from the website received it 3 days later! Boxed and looking great! Ignore all the ridiculous animals rights activists giving 1 star reviews! They have clearly never bought anything from this company!

Name: Alison Henshaw
Review: 1 is to good.Ordered a coat for my sons birthday and it was supposedly delivered by dhl. I rang dhl and they said they’d investigate.Ibthen rang Canada Goose and was told by Immanuelthat he would raise an investigation.24hrs later I called Canada Goose and spoke to Jonathon who told me that an investigation had been opened.I asked what had been done and he said that they hadn’t contacted DHL but then later in the conversation he told me that they had but couldn’t tell me anything.I reiterated that it was for my sons birthday and he went on to state a load of utter b....... telling me that I had to give it 30 days for the investigation to be done,but it might not take that long. I asked him what the company was going to do for me as a customer to which he said that he was waiting for DHL to contact them.I said that the customer service with Canada Goose was appalling and asked for his mgr to call me back (who apparently in a meeting conveniently) 4 hrs later still waiting. I told them that my contract was with them and not the courier but it was made pretty obvious to me that I am just a number and they don’t care.Dhl have been a lot more informative and Jonathon asked me what they had had to say.By this time I was seething and told him it was for me to know and him to find out,hoping it would prompt him to put his backside into gear.I await to see if it had any effect but won’t hold my breath. Having read all the reviews all customers have had the same or similar problems.CUSTOMER service non existent.Heres hoping if and when my sons belated present arrives it is of good quality.Have already spoken to a solicitor about Canada Goose and will start implementing his advice.In the meantime they need to look at their customer service as I don’t think they will get any returning customers.I will definitely not

Name: Pauline Fleming Snooker
Review: I just want my refund instead of lies, bad customer service and lack of communication with their internal departments. This is my daughters Christmas. £750 out of pocket and no more money to replace the gift with something else. Starting to think I will never get my money back.

Name: Blayne
Review: I ordered a jacket 3 weeks ago and I still haven’t received it , I got a email to say the order was shipped , Canada goose told me that dhl picked up the jacket I rang dhl and dhl told me Canada goose never gave them the jacket , Canada goose lied to me several times I’ve phoned them every day and they’ve told me the same thing over and over , there doing nothing to help me and they have my money for the jacket , canada goose lost my jacket and won’t just replace it , it’s shocking and the staff are so rude and unhelpful , the manager told me she’d call me and I’m waiting on her to call me the past 3 weeks and she hasn’t , I’m not happy at all and I will be going further about this.

Name: David Whidden
Review: A negative review regarding a fleece I bought I put on the CG website, well it was placed on the site but 3 weeks on I see that it has been removed, not what I would expect.

Name: Ali Tariq
Review: Terrible customer service. Been writing to the contact address re a complaint for days and not a response !  I am based in the UK and i cant find a UK contact number........and you call yourself a high end brand - and make all sorts of promises. My son saved for months to buy a product from you and its a huge regret for him. Complaint ref No is:  00104174.

Name: Huck Lim
Review: Ignore the animal rights negative 1 star reviews which are fake as you can tell. I bought a jacket few years ago from Canada itself and it developed a defect. Emailed customer service and they were brilliant. They agreed to send me a replacement jacket. I went to London store to try on as it was a different model to my previous jacket to make sure it fits. I received my new jacket today via dpd and I am extremely happy with the warranty service. Yes Canada goose is more expensive but you pay for what you get in life. I am anti fur myself but you can buy jackets now without this. Thank you canada goose for the excellent customer service!

Name: Anonymous Reviewer
Review: It’s great but overpriced.I like the quality but I don’t see why it should be so expensive.

Name: Finlay
Review: Absolutely disgusting and awful coming. Killing animals left right and centre to then use on their hoods of coats. Google it, it is honestly horrifying. I will never ever buy from this horrible company. It’s 2020 there is no need to kill for clothes. Coats are horrible anyway. Make them go out of business and save animals lives. They can redeem themselves though going animal free and in fact putting a large percentage of their earnings into a charity to help save animals. But they won’t do that as they don’t care. Disgusting company. Would be ashamed to work for them

Name: Michael Di Paola
Review: Canada Goose sent me a stained jacket. I returned Jacket immediately and they claimed to have never received it, when they in fact lost it. I had to prove to them that it was delivered (luckily I had tracking# and confirmation). After making several follow up calls, they finally provided me with Email confirmation that they would refund my money. 7 business days passed and I called again furious, looking for my money. Their employee Raymond told me that they still haven't processed my refund, despite sending me Email confirmation that processing was already complete from his supervisor. They are liars, thieves, and do not care about customers at all. I have a feeling that they are going out of business. They should go to hell instead. Took me a while to save for that gift and they completely crapped on the occasion. Still waiting for my money and I ordered this thing late September. If Canada Goose was a stress ball, I would blow that thing to shreds.

Name: R
Review: Purchased my first ever jacket and got sent a blatant fake. Absolutely appalling and disgusting considering this is from their official website. Sent my item back and now awaiting a refund.  Extremely disappointed as I love how their jackets look. This company is an absolute farce. Avoid at all costs.

Name: CAROL HAHN
Review: Is Canada Goose going out of business? I've been trying to contact them for a week straight to try and return a coat. Three emails have gone unanswered, when you call you just get their hold music for hours, and their chat has been disconnected. What is going on???

Name: Gemma Halling-smith
Review: Absolutely disappointed with the service received from a Canada Goose. My 16yr old son had saved long & hard to buy himself a coat he had wanted for sometime.He tried to purchase the coat himself on the Canada Goose website using his debit card! The order was placed - he received 2 emails 1 saying the order had been placed followed by 1 saying the order had then been cancelled. When I phoned to check why this was they explained it was because the order had been placed using a DEBIT CARD & they DO NOT except debit card!!! Why they do not except DEBIT card I do not know as it is pretty much cash (there available to spend!!!). But my sons money has not been returned yet to his bank. I have been told this could take up to 48hours but 72hours later & it’s still not there. Phoning through for the 3 time to chase this up and the finance department don’t work weekends. So as it stands my son has NO coat and NO money returned.Appalled and absolutely dissatisfied by the service received and would not recommend to anyone.It should state when paying that DEBIT cards are not excepted and the card rejected rather than allow funds to be taken.

Name: Adrian
Review: Absolutely rubbish, overpriced crap. £475 for a supposed rain jacket, supposedly very waterproof, bit of heavy rain in lake district, inside of arms completely damp few days later, nowhere near drying. Not being petty but when pay so much for a 'raincoat' I expect it to be just that and to be waterproof. Not even warm as a coat, either. Front zip jams and won't zip up front. So-called style over substance.

Name: Usmaan Khan
Review: Never received my shipment. They asked me to wait for 30 days to investigate only to find out that they were only fooling me. They claim it was delivered but had no proof of delivery. BE WARE!

Name: Darlene Watson
Review: I have only great things to say about Canada Goose coats. I love them and they are perfect for a colder climate and someone that loves to be outside in the dead of winter or walking the trails in late Fall. I just recently had my newest coat delivered and the first one without a hood. I love them all but this one is spectacular. It is a HyBridge Down Jacket and I was not sure I needed another CG as I have Kensington coat's but wow it is gorgeous. Class act speedy delivery ( I feel like I just ordered it yesterday) and the packaging was 5 Star. Canada Goose you have never failed me. I LOVE it!!!!

Name: David
Review: The coat was a bad buyI purchased there black wyndham parka coat. Months later it started to look faded chalk white looking, really bad on the stitching points which was now completely white. When I confronted Flannels where it was purchased, they said there was nothing they could do and myself being told this was a common problem with these coats in black. So I contacted canada goose customer care who refused to take any steps of replacement even with the lifetime warranty as it being just over a year of having proof of purchase, in which the outcome condition of my coat was blamed on wear and tear of my own usage by them.So that's seems to be the dead end of it. The moral of the story is there not that great a built product in my opinion

Name: David Menšík
Review: Customer service and their lifetime warranty is a joke. Sent in a jacket for a warranty that has been continuously excessively leaking feathers for 2 winters straight, done that in June. First, they tried to play it to "normal Leakage", after numerous emails back and forth I explained to them this is not normal and I am not happy with the product. They agreed to exchange, in July. It's mid-October and I'm still sitting here waiting for my replacement to be shipped! I even offered to go to the store and just pick different jacket, that's apparently not an option. Warranty department is a bunch of jokesters seriously ... avoid avoid avoid. Go and spend your money elsewhere. These people will take your payment and forget about you. Funny that the site says shipment 3-5 days  if you buy a new one but when it comes to replacement they will make you wait 3+ months seems like. Absolute joke. Worst customer service I have ever dealt with ... and to think it's £1000 jacket...

Name: Niklas Donges
Review: My Jacket is in replacement for +6 months.They say they are having issues with distribution centers etc. For months I've been hearing the same story.Worst quality & worst customer support I've ever experienced in my life.

Name: craig - Wakefield
Review: The firm has no idea about customer service!! Been waiting over 7 months (covid aside) for the replacement of my faulty Expedition Parka. £1k paid out and nothing to show for it. They blame distribution centre in Netherlands but that’s a smoke screen. You can buy a new coat online and have it in 3-5days so how can their directors/owners allow warranty replacements to take so long, it’s disgusting!! They give some bull**** on the phones that they’re given no updates and yet you receive email after email saying is allocated and will receive confirmation of tracking once dispatched!! It’s not rocket science to change distribution centres surely and assist customers that have paid good money for a poor product. Oh, to rub it in Ryan Reynolds at least got 300 coats to supply a needy cause. Well done Ryan and Canada Goose, you must be really proud to be associated with each other. Maybe everyone on hear waiting should create a needy charity and ask a celebrity to ask CG for some coats ( well ours anyway 😂) Good luck everyone but suspect it’ll be a cold winter for most of us. Disgusting!!

Name: Sarah Low
Review: Very disappointed with my jacket and serviceMy black canada goose jacket was given to me as a christmas gift. 6 months later it started to go really white and badly from the arms and cuffs. Sent it back since it has a lifetime warranty and got a reply a few months later to let me know I'll be receiving a replacement but they don't have any in stock in there Europe warehouse as its discontinued but waiting to receive the same jacket from Canada which will be posted to me. Its now been 3 months and still not received it. I wont be buying one again with such a poor service and poor quality jacket

Name: Ra
Review: They are the worst jackets in black with seams going whiteI highly recommend Not to buy the black one pacifically. I have had 2 black ones and in all the seams eventually go white. Its a terrible design.

Name: Paul Teasdale
Review: I bought a coat all was good the jacket arrived. After a couple of days, I asked them to send me a dustbag and hanger because these were not with the coat. I then looked over the coat and found a huge white mark in the hood. I contacted them and lucky they gave me a refund. Quality jacket just poor quality control. I won't be buying of these again.

Name: A M
Review: I stop wearing  furs  long ago. Lots of  my friends  like to  wear  Canada goose. But I  don't think  it's  right  choice for  me.  Looks  very  bulky,  unflattering  coats,  maybe  good  for someone  who is lost in the winter  woods.  But not for everyday  life. Ugly  and surprisingly  overrated  bulky  clothes.  No, no , no not for me.

Name: Peter Van der veen
Review: Do you guys and girls have any idee what you are wearing? It's Horrible...

Name: Marina Penney
Review: I am shocked an appalled by how the horrible the customer service department.  I ordered a jacket. Canada goose sent me the wrong jacket.  Instead of apologizing and shipping out the correct jacket, they held onto my money for days stating that, until they received the jacket sent to me by mistake, they would not process a refund for the original jacket.  They were rude and did not take my call seriously.  It took them ages to get back to me when I called and emailed.  I can't believe this company is able to survive with such horrible customer service and such high prices on jackets that aren't actually all that great.

Name: Mohmed Patel
Review: Canada Goose UK Would give 0 stars if I could but doesn’t give the optionWarranty case number: 00093002Absolutely shocking low levels of customer service. Premium company with a economy after sales service.My jacket was confirmed defective after being worn a few times in the first month in May. Four months later and I’m still waiting for my replacement jacket with no clear indication of when I’m going to be receiving it. They had logistical issues and obviously the current pandemic has not helped but surely four months is long enough to resolve the issue. **Lifetime warranty which takes a lifetime to honour**

Name: M M
Review: The worst company to deal with, zero with their customers service. The company needs a lot of coaching and need to invest on training their staff. Staff are useless, lies and don't know anything on their product at there new flagship store at Rideau Ottawa. Take a look at their market share, dropping daily. The company needs to invest on their service and loyalty, otherwise the company will not survive.

Name: Seth Goyes
Review: Price Gouging Canadians like Rogers & Bell! Their prices seem to not creep up every year but SKYROCKET. Their parkas are on average $1,300 which is up from $999 the following year. $150 for a baseball cap? You are a disgrace!

Name: Crockatt Communications
Review: Wow. Underpromised and overdelivered!!! Certainly the best customer service I’ve had in awhile. Yes, the zippers on the light weight men’s and women’s short puffers are not good enough. My husband and I bought 5 of these jackets in 3 weights and the zippers have gone on 2. I sent 1 back and they turned it around in under 2 weeks and sent multiple short emails to say how it was going. No cost to me. They were going to charge for cleaning but I explained I just had the jacket cleaned prior to sending it, and they waived the charge. LOVE their jackets. Will keep buying them (if these ever wear out, which I doubt!) Thanks CG!

Name: Jess
Review: Who even wears fur anymore??? It’s 2020!Skinning innocent animals just for a bit of fur!!? Cruel and disgusting. Can’t wait for this company to fold!

Name: Adelle
Review: So I sent my coat back under the warranty after inspection, the Canada Goose team went above and beyond to get me a replacement jacket! Big Thank you to Nils, Silvia and Elisabeth for the highest quality of customer service i have recieved ever from a brand! Please ignore the bad reviews I simply couldn't fault the service and help i recieved!

Name: Marc M.
Review: Coyotes who can suffer in painful steel traps for days...but Canada Goose don't care. The most horrifying company you can imagine. I hate them. And PBI stop partnership with them !!

Name: Farzad Hemmati
Review: They did not honor their return policy (product wasn't event shipped yet). And turns out the jacket was missing a button and had a loose thread. Actually owned by an American company and many of their products are made in China.

Name: David John Thompson
Review: I’m very happy with my goose. I no longer look like a turkey during the winter. Stay warm the Canadian way eh?

Name: Hikmat
Review: Please, don't waste your money on this garbage! They claim that it can keep you warm in "extreme conditions", wich simply is not true. I can confidently condirm that this jacket IS NOT made for teamperatures between -15 to -25. I had it on the other day where it was PLUSS two degrees and i still felt cold in it. Also many other times where the weather was far warmer than -15 to -25, and i still felt cold. And when i informed Canada Gosse about it, one of the "reasons" were that different people react differently to cold and that i have to wear several layers of clothes under for it to function properly! WELL THEN YOU SHOULD WRITE THIS ON YOUR WEBSITE SO PEOPLE WILL KNOW BEFORE THEY BUY!!!! Don¨t just write that it can withstand -15 to -25 without writing about the exceptions! This is misleading!Canada Goose have not been helpful about this whole situation and i am starting to wonder why Canada Goose is such a big name? Their retailer here in Norway has been especially unhelpful and disrespectful, which reflects a really bad picture of Canada Goose This is the first time and the last time i am purchasing anything from them, and i will make sure to tell others about this as well. Agian, DON'T WASTE YOUR MONEY ON THIS GARBAGE!!!!The customer support has been awful as well.

Name: Dina Baras
Review: Poor quality and TERRIBLE warranty.I sent in a trillium parka at the beginning of Dec. 2019 for a warranty claim because the jacket was falling apart. It was very lightly worn but the seams on the sleeves and pockets were fraying and splitting, the jacket was also starting to discolor.Super disappointing for a brand that is meant to be perceived as a luxury utility brand. I have had a number of more affordable coats from other companies like Helly Hanson and North Face that have lasted me 10+ years and still look new.It took them 2 months to assess my coat. The jacket they sent back was simply NOT the same quality. The fit was awkward. I wore it to the local CG store and a sales associate even commented on it. The sleeves also let in cold air in -6 Celsius When I resubmitted my claim in February 2020 and let them know, the warranty team gave me a canned response basically saying that my personal cold tolerance was to blame and the coat was just fine.I replied asking to escalate the issue. When a member of their own team says the jacket looks weird, that says something. The trillium parka is also rated for -25 Celsius, and I had worn my previous jacket in -40 without issue. They were consistently delayed in communicating to me and did not let me know when they closed their warranty facilities due to COVID-19. Since April, I personally had to follow up 3 times to get a status update with their social media team since no one was able to reply to me from their warranty team.My last interaction with their social team was last week. At that point I STILL didn’t have a jacket or a solution, and was just getting canned replies about how they care so much about their customer experience. When have you ever initiated a warranty claim that lasts for 9 months and still have not had a reasonable response? Any other clothing or coat manufacturer will just take back their item and replace with a new one in store. By the time of my last interaction, their stores were already open for business for many weeks. I suggested they should just send a replacement from the store since they are obviously operational.I got no reply. A couple of days later I got a shipping notification from the supposedly “closed” warehouse. They just sent back my faulty jacket with no context and had not looked into my feedback about the construction of the garment. I’m so disappointed with this experience. I’ve called their customer service team for a last ditch effort to get a reasonable exchange for my garment and will update this review based on what I hear back.

Name: Odoyo
Review: Spent 1000£ on a jacket, turned out to be just average. Reduce your price or upgrade your quality.

Name: Philip Blythe
Review: They advertise their jackets as lifetime warranty. My jacket had a defect with it and I put it into store on the 28th of December. I kid you not, I still haven't got my replacement and its now been roughly 6months and still counting. Not only that, but they weren't willing to replace my jacket with the one I had. Instead, they only offered me older models. They still won't offer me a refund. Do not buy from them, terrible company.

Name: LauraW
Review: Husband bought a coat that only lasted a few months.  CG said they can’t source the material so can’t fix the problem.......can’t or won’t.  £850 completely wasted.  No customer care whatsoever.

Name: Garth Boes
Review: As a Canadian, spending 30+ years of my life in Northern Alberta, Canada Goose is a way of life.  It's a must have.  I have owned my my White Chilliwack bomber, for over 10 years.  I have only had it cleaned once!  It's still in amazing condition, and never fails to do the job.  After moving to the US, I don't often need my parka (it still happens some times) but I did have a need for something more light weight.  So I went with the Dunham Down Jacket, and Canada Goose won me over again!  Another amazing jacket, perfect for the climate.

Name: Rose Lee
Review: I sent my Canada Goose parka in for warranty as the colour is fading around the seams and the fabric around the arms is ripped.  Due to Covid, It's been almost 3 months now, and no repairs are done since their factory is closed and no estimated time of re-open.  I owned many jackets from other reputable designers like Moose Knuckle, Mackage, North Face and none of them have the problem with the color around the seams fading.  I expressed my concerns with the Canada Goose customer service and warranty department and they seem to dismiss my concerns and offered to repair it.    I also expressed my concerns about having multiple people handling the jacket and sending this back to me without being dry cleaned during this pandemic.  I emailed them asking for an exception to replacing this instead, and even under these circumstances, they still won't do it.   WOW, I am extremely disappointed with how they are still sticking to their repair under these circumstances, and having the customer wait for an unknown period of time.  You would think that with Covid in mind, they wouldn't want their customers receive back a jacket handled by many individuals. Just to be safe, I guess I can spend another 100 dollars to dry clean this again!!!  Why do you advertise lifetime warranty if there are so many hidden rules?  The fabric fading under the arms and at the back areas is definitely not wear and tear as no other designer coats I owned have this problem.Anyways this is the last time I will buy from Canada goose, this is my third jacket and the other 2 doesn't have this problem.   Good luck with your future sales.

Name: Luke
Review: Crap customer service, they send out damaged coats and boxes and not even an apology. I own around 5 pieces and will be taking my business elsewhere

Name: Audrey Sussman
Review: I purchased a sweater. After 1 wearing, it pilled. So called guarantee is false. They told me I had to ship it to the factory in Italy (from the US)  to assess the problem  and then they would let me know if it was defective. Last time I will purchase from this company. Awful attitude.

Name: A Ahmed
Review: Brilliant organisation to order from, lifetime warranty on all jackets. Well worth the money. I’ve had mine serviced already and it’s only been 6months. Fast delivery too.

Name: Pierre R
Review: Really great and hot jacket ! They are expensive but they are the best

Name: Katie Frew
Review: There jackets are definitely not worth the money they fall apart. Not to mention they kill animals by ripping the fur from them alive and pluck animals alive. Sickening!!!!! All for the sake of fashion.

Name: Jessica Tanner
Review: Do yourself a favour & avoid this crookery company. The price you pay for quality product does not reflect & when dealing with customer service, you’re wasting your time. Warranty is a joke. This is my second time writing this post as Canada Goose just deleted my review. Why would a company do that ?! Proof is in the pudding folks !

Name: M
Review: There is no ethical sourcing for their products!  Coyotes are caught in barbaric steel traps and can languish in pain for days before being killed and skinned so that their fur can be used for clothing like the trim on Canada Goose’s jackets. Mother coyotes have even been known to try to chew through their legs in order to get back to their starving pups.There’s absolutely no such thing as “ethical down.” Ducks and geese used for down are shipped in all weather extremes to slaughterhouses, where they’re typically stunned, their throats are cut—often while they’re still conscious—and they’re dunked into scalding-hot defeathering tanks.

Name: Alberto L
Review: this is my second negative review: since 7 days they promised to resend me the faulty jacket without any help (unless I pay for it!) and I have now news since then: nothing. they are keepng my jacket and in 11 days it's springtime. BAD EXPERIENCE with PRODUCT and BAD with customer support! to avoid.

Name: Dave
Review: My jacket ($599 plus HST) purchased in November 2018 is back in a second time for a zipper replacement. I can’t believe how poor the quality is for the price. I have a 30 year old standard jacket that cost $100 and it is far superior to the Canada Goose product. Next time the zipper breaks I’ll take it to a tailor to get a quality zipper replacement. Jacket perfectly clean - if they charge for dry cleaning I’ll be even more annoyed. Save yourself aggravation - don’t buy Canada Goose products - they’re all hype not quality.

Name: Lulu Atkinson
Review: Absolutely ludicrous customer service! My son waited for months to get a coat that was always sold out. Turned on notifications so he did not miss it once it was available. When it came in, he brought it via the website. He received an email to say it’s been purchased and order will be out shortly, only to receive another email within seconds to say it had been cancelled. They had taken the £700, so I called CG and they informed me they put a block on the order, for what reason I still do not know. My son then had to wait for 5 days for his money to be returned and now the coat is again out of stock and will be till winter now. Today he received an email asking about his experience was and if he likes he’s product?! So we wrote an honest review and then was just emailed to say our review did not meet their guidelines but thank you anyway?! Absolutely corrupt company and would not buy from them! Be warned. Do not buy via their website

Name: John Sakal
Review: I say flick  Canada Goose. it’s a ripoff  that caters to status .flick em and the horse they rode in on. oh wow that’s not respectful of the horse.john peace out

Name: MAUDERLY Hugues
Review: Very poor quality and very bad warranty service.I bought the 800$ nomad jacket and 2 weeks after the pocket was torn in a normal use.I sent it to their poor warranty service, wait 4 weeks and they told me that it was accidental and no repair is possible. The sent me back the jacket with no refund. Just got apologize from them.It s a shame. Have a look to other brands which are best and cheaper

Name: John Smithers
Review: SCUM OF THE EARTH THE COMPANY AND THE PEOPLE WHO WEAR THEM NO EMPTHY TOWARDS THE ANIMALS WHO ARE TORTURED AND SKINNED AIVE AND WORN FOR MATERIALISTIC PURPOSE NOT SURVIVAL.SHUT THIS COMPANY DOWN!!!

Name: Leah Hamed
Review: I bought this as a Christmas gift, and as I work long hours I wasn't too concerned with delivery as the CG website clearly states "direct signature required." Long story short, Fedex forged my signature and I never received the jacket. After contacting CG's CS I finally heard back after waiting close to a month and was told "Too bad. Since there is a scrawl on the Fedex signature box we won't reimburse you." It clearly was not my signature. It wasn't a signature at all. So now I'm out over $600 and have to file a police report. UNBELIEVABLE. It's not like CG would have to pay the reimbursement cost - that is on Fedex. The simply don't care at all about their customers. BUYER BEWARE WITH CG. Before you buy anything from them, PLEASE research their CS. I sincerely wish I had. Absolutely abysmal and without a doubt the worst I have ever dealt with. The best advice I can give is take your money and spend it at a less morally reprehensible company than CG. And the whole "direct signature required" thing? Yeah, doesn't exist.ETA - I tried to publish this on the CG website but they took it down, even though"it meets all their standards." Shocking.

Name: Marc C.
Review: Animals are trapped alive in the forest for days until they starve to death. This company is a disgrace for humanity.

Name: Thebusybeaver
Review: Ordered a present for Christmas. It never arrived. They advised that the delivery company said it was delivered but had no evidence (signature etc). Contacted the delivery company who had no evidence either. They are refusing to refund and are ignoring my emails. Avoid at all costs. I will never buy from them ever again. I have bought so much from them before and quite frankly am shocked at how rude they have been.

Name: Dave Keepper
Review: Wow. Wow. And. Wow. How is this super expensive brand doing so well when so many people despise it? I just learned it's for good reason. From my experience and those of many others, Canada Goose has A) unbelievably callous/pointlessly snotty customer "service" B) sub-par product quality especially for price and categoryC) reprehensible track record of unethical and inhumane treatment of wolves for fur and geese for down I received a jacket as a gift, learned all this so decided to return it- within 30 days and in new condition. They wouldn't take it back because I LOST THE TAGS, ridiculous, especially in 2020 when customer experience is king. I'll either sell the jacket and replace it, or I may just remove the logo. There are plenty of great brands out there who prove you don't have to be unethical snotty a-hole Canadians to make a quality warm jacket. Mountain Hardware. Arcteryx. Northface... I just searched "responsible goose down." There are some great lists but apparently they don't allow links in these reviews.

Name: Les
Review: Canada goose should stop using fur in it’s jackets.  Unnecessary and cruel.  STOP USING FUR FROM TRAPPED ANIMALS CANADA GOOSE!

Name: Richard Coyle
Review: I bought an expensive parka, hat and gloves from Canada goose...a significant investment.  The gloves don't fit, but I did indeed remove the tag.  They told me I'm stuck with them even though they've never been worn, never been used.  I feel fleeced.

Name: Ryan Smith
Review: Really great hot jacket to wear in Canada !

Name: Iyes Ram
Review: Canada goose’s methods to kill geese and get feathers while putting them in such a bad invorment so bad that they can have heart attacks.

Name: Audrey paton
Review: Murdering poor animals For a profit

Name: Steven MacDonald
Review: Purchased a Kenton Parka for my wife online, the coat arrived damaged (faulty toggle on hood cord). Then purchased a replacement because they don’t do exchange! At which point I actually hadn’t received the refund for the first coat. This second coat went missing in transit. Canada Goose took little ownership of the problem poor service and communication. DHL (the delivery company) were more helpful than the company I actually purchased the garment from! Eventually having finally received the refund for the missing item I gave up on the online option and purchased the coat in the regent street shop. Terrible online experience. What really annoys me is that we never got an apology or proper acknowledgement from Canada goose in fact, when I tried to register an honest review on their web site they said it didn’t meet their requirements. Clearly they only want good reviews. They will never improve clearly because they are too arrogant to listen.

Name: Dan Bull
Review: Kinda of glad all these sick shoppers are having a nightmare with canadian goose jackets when they know they are from live animals tortured and killed for their fur. You deserve it.

Name: Margaret Witherspoon
Review: Finally sold my coat and hat for a third of what I paid.Glad to see the back of it . Done and done with Canada Goose .I am in my second year with my lovely warm well made Quartz coat and it looks as good as the day I bought it.

Name: Madeline Goss
Review: They kill innocent animals to keep warm when there are so many other ways to keep warm. When they are all gone you will think back and feel the guilt. Please use artificial fur instead of killing coyotes and tossing away there bodies use cotton instead of goose feathers what did they do to you to die like this. Why feel the guilt in the future when you could stop now help them please because one day the world will thank you.

Name: Sad Duck
Review: I purchased a Canada Goose jacket on the company website and was shipped a coat that looked to be pre-owned and was damaged.  The coat was not in the original plastic, it was missing tags and had scuff marks under the arm.  I paid full retail for this coat and do not want a garment that someone else returned.  I believe misrepresenting clothing as new is a bad business practice.

Name: Katy Harrison
Review: Order 1-CG cancelled.Order 2 -CG cancelled.I rang up twice and was told my orders had been cancelled as their security team had blocked my orders but no reason as to why.The agent on the phone called me back the next day to advise the block had been removed ,but couldn't tell me why the money had left my account and hadn't returned to my account yet despite them cancelling the orders!

Name: Kimia
Review: They are scammers. They refuse to fill in requests and are just lazy and just want you to buy a new coat. I requested to have my BRAND NEW (2-3yr old) coat re-downed after I noticed that it no longer kept me warm  in 0 degree weather, let alone -10 to -20 degree (Celsius) weather. I always stored my coat properly in the winter. Their team had the nerve to not only tell me that I badly stored my coat, but that my coat was sooo old (Winter season 3 btw) that the down would be noxious to the reconstruction team. I’m disgusted. Your team is trash. I paid 1200$ for a jacket that’s supposedly good for -20 weather. My 300$ Roots down coat lasted years longer, kept me warmer, and was only meant for -10 weather.

Name: Andrew Glenesk
Review: I am extremely disappointed in this brand/company.  I liked my jacket up until my zipper broke and I sent my jacket in to be fixed under warranty.I went to their soho location store since I live in NYC and figured I'd have it fixed through the store rather than following the process on my own through their website.The sales associate studied and checked through my jacket.  She mentioned to me, "They will clean your jacket is that okay" . I said " Yes Sure" (I mean why would I care if they cleaned it.) . About a week and a half later I received an e-mail notice to login to see the status of my jacket.  They gave me an invoice for $110.  $35 for a cleaning and they wanted to charge me $75 to replace the right sleeve.  NOTHING was wrong with the sleeve when I turned it in.  I only requested that the zipper was broken.  The zipper was covered and they weren't charging me for the zipper, but the cleaning was not covered.  They told me okay they won't replace the right sleeve.  They said they found a snag but not a whole.  What does this mean?  The sales person checked over my jacket and didn't see this "snag" nor did I ever see it.  Otherwise I would have suggested it to the sales person as well to see if it can be fixed under warranty.  This makes me think either their cleaning "snagged" my jacket or it got "snagged" in transit or at the soho store.  If your jacket zipper is under warranty why should the consumer have to pay for the cleaning to which the hardware on their product was defected?  I asked to speak to a supervisor and the customer service guy told me it would take 24 hours for me to speak to a supervisor.  I asked, "You don't have a manager or supervisor on staff right now?"  He said, "NO"This was a terrible experience after spending a larger amount of money on a product expected to be good as well as customer service being helpful it all ended up feeling like a scam.In Store Sales Associates should be trained better to let customers understand certain costs are involved.  But honestly if you product is under warranty I should be penalized for a cleaning charge bc of defected hardware.

Name: Lolita L
Review: This is the worse possible Company ever to try to do business with! They have a system set up to BS everyone! They purposely BS the consumer not only once but countless numerous times over many months until you feel like committing murder! The product they put out is expensive and there is fraud to the public of the quality. Shame on them! Look to another Company to spend your money. This is a Co. that should go out of business! Shame on the Canadian Government to allow these things to happen! By using the name Canada in the Companies name poorly reflects on the people of Canada. Too bad! We were victims of everything mentioned and much more. Once excited purchasers to a nightmare experience when we had to clean the coat. Even with their own admissions of defected coat we had these problems. Stay away from them and find another.

Name: Tinaya Gran
Review: What a nightmare sent my jacket in after having it for a year, it was faded and coming apart at the seams. After months and months of back and forth emails and phone conversations they finally sent me a new jacket . Unfortunately the jacket was a cheap faded and low budget jacket. Was not the same as the one you would purchase from the store. Please everyone save yourself money and headache and DO NOT PURCHASE A JACKET

Name: Tina
Review: Please don't abuse innocent animals to make profit and self benefit. Please don't buy this product and save wild life.

Name: stephanie rainbow
Review: Does anyone know of another, other than Scotland, Canada goose repair place in the UK?. Scotland say (after telling me to get it cleaned, before I sent it at a cost of £50) they cannot source the fabric to repair it. I only bought the jacket less than 1 year ago and they still sell the same colour jacket. They really should ask you to send pictures of your problem, before asking you to clean before you send it.Can anyone help?

Name: Joanne Mcluckie
Review: If I could give this minus stars I would. My Canada goose is 9month old and never been laundered yet and has extremely bad faded seams all over. It’s particularly bad under the arms and the back of jacket. The fact that I barely got change from £1000 I would have expected more from Canada goose. When I returned to flannels with it pointing out the clear state of the jacket the woman there was willing to exchange only like for like but there was none in my size on shop floor. I then discovered that it was purchased from cruise which btw is owned by flannels and was advised to go to cruise for an exchange and was informed that there had been two returned to flannels with the same problem. Upon arrival at cruise I was given no help whatsoever no offer of even an exchange. I had my invoice and had been told by some jumped up p**ck that he’s never had a return from Canada goose and that he had his 4years and had never had any problems of the sort and sent me on my way with my faulty jacket no refund no exchange. Please do not buy Canada goose jackets they’re not worth the money they charge for and are really poorly and cheaply made especially for having such a premium price tag. A word to the wise you don’t always get what you pay for. Shame on Canada goose. I should probably mention Canada goose customer service are even worse.

Name: m Doherty
Review: Spent over $900 on a Canada Goose Parka jacket. The zipper gets stuck at my neck, takes 20 tries to pull it down, while I suffer from a feeling of suffocation. The jacket has a grey/ black look that shows every bit of dust. The sleeves have little insulation and the jacket is not warm enough on the arms!I called the store owner at Channer’s Waterloo, who refused to take any responsibility. I was not happy with their service. I was told to call the company directly. Canada Goose wants me to mail this monstrosity to them at my cost to repair the zipper! I have only owned it for a few weeks!Terrible service.You need to put customers first. Possible solutions:The retailer should deal with the manufacturer for the first year. I should not have to pay for the cost of shipping in the first year. Experience means you made a certain mistake!I will not be making this mistake again.

Name: Dodo
Review: Can’t believe in this day and age they are still allowed to use real fur from killing wildlife and celebrate it

Name: Sumit Malhotra
Review: Defective product, horrible customer service I bought one of their Parkas last year - shedding way too many feathers on the inside, such that my jumper or suits were covered with at least 30-40 feathers every single time. In other words not practical to wear.  They kept telling me that this is normal and can happen for up to 3 months. Fast forward to this year and this problem is not going away. They tell me to come in store to send off the Parka for a warranty claim. When I get there they tell me it is a requirement to get the Parka dry cleaned before sending it off to warranty. I highlighted the ridiculous customer experience in store to no avail. I called customer services and same answer. I requested to speak to the manager, but was told that manager will say exactly the same thing and there is no point escalating it. Upon persisting with my request, there was no manager on the shift apparently to speak to. So I haven’t been able to wear the Parka properly for 2 winter, paid an extra £45 and had to buy another parka from a different company to keep me warm this winter. Are they having a laugh, this is a 1000£ parka ?? Not sure what definition of customer satisfaction are they playing to - this is their London flagship store

Name: Gregor M.A. Hiller
Review: Bought this £995 Balmoral Parka 11 months ago. Jacket has dawn leakage everywhere. Faulty product with poor quality. Store in London wont exchange it. They cannot provide an exchange and refuse to give me a refund. Company is playing since months the game of pretending I need to turn it in to they can "review" the item even though they have pictures, I brought it to the store twice and the store confirmed unacceptable quality. They even want to make you pay to send the faulty product to them and refuse to send a shipping label! A real rip-off and far away from their fraudulent advertisement of lifetime warranty!!!!

Name: Jen L
Review: Sorry I had to put 1 star. I had a group of people yell out to me that I was wearing a trash coat and that coyotes were tortured in the making. I was slightly embarrassed but what was the worst part was I heard one of the guys in the group say under his breath " honestly, anyone who has money wouldn't buy that crap. That's the poor persons coat" then they all started laughing.... After a little research on this coat and the making of it - I'm disgusted....

Name: Patryk M
Review: Thanks to Nils and Sarah, very helpful from the warranty team in replacing my jacket in under 2 weeks, thanks guys👍Got my new Carson appreciate the help and fast service, my fur ruff on it is slowly puffing up and is pretty thick

Name: Rosa
Review: Canada Goose lifetime warranty is a joke. I purchased a Lorette parka and used it for one winter (a few weeks in total). Unlike what Canada Goose claims, the company uses cheap non-durable fabrics. The materials they use are worse than North Face and not even a comparison to Moncler. The parka got ripped on one sleeve (about 3 inches) from a hanger so easily. This never happened to any other clothes before. Sent to Canada Goose for repairs and guess what I received? This standard rejection email (it doesn't even have the writer's name):************************************************ We hope this email finds you well. Our Quality Assurance team has performed a thorough inspection of your product. The issues found with your jacket are deemed as normal wear and tear for products of this age, and are not covered under Canada Goose's warranty. In cases where we are unable to make a repair under warranty, we will often offer repairs for a nominal fee, however in the case of your coat we are unable to match that shade of cloth from our repair inventory. Canada Goose certainly has the fabric that was used to make your jacket, however the hard part is color matching the fabric that we have with your jacket in its current state. When a fabric is exposed to the elements and has gone through multiple wash or dry clean cycles, it is expected to change from its original color, so getting the exact shade becomes increasingly difficult and sometimes impossible. We understand that this was not the result you expected, and we want you to know that our warranty team thoroughly inspected your jacket before reaching the decision that it could not be repaired without causing further damage to your jacket. We will be returning your jacket to you, at our expense, within the next 10 days or upon your reply.Warmest regards,Canada Goose Warranty Team******************************************************* That is what Canada Goose calls the lifetime warranty and repairs. Oh, and so far the whole process of nothing took 1+ month and no parka was returned back to me yet. What a lame. If you have Canada Goose, have the department store where you purchased the jacket be the first contact point for return/exchange/repairs. Department stores honor their loyal customers and Canada Goose will not be able to treat them like they treat consumers.

Name: Lisa magnier
Review: I was very dissatisfied with how my Canada Goose Coat had worn after only wearing it for a few months. I returned the coat to Canada Goose to get them to repair it. After a few emails back and forth to customer service my Coat was repaired and retuned to me. My coat is like new. I am thrilled and would like to thank Nils for his customer service.

Name: Alessandro Antonelli
Review: Bought one of the most expensive gloves they had and found out they weren’t warm at all, was told to return them and re purchase other gloves...skip a month later and I still haven’t gotten the funds returned to my credit card.....spoke to 4 different people in customer service that told me they have escalated it over and over but still no return....yesterday I spoke to someone online because I was getting so angry and they told me someone would get back to me in 48hrs....this was the worst return experience I have ever ever experienced

Name: KM
Review: Not sure why some people complain; these are the best jackets money can buy. They're so light, and yet, i can wear just a tshirt under it in -10+ weather and be fine.

Name: Mohamed Zarour
Review: They say best quality jackets, we are professional Laundry in Finland and they make worst quality buttons and leather just gives colors white jacket when washed in dry clean gives colors and shy bad quality! very bad and very horrible company

Name: Hero878
Review: The customer service at the London store on Regent Street is really poor. The ship assistance have zero knowledge of their products and cannot offer any advice to customers on sizing. They are so lazy and all they do for you is check stock and bring you the coat you want but know absolutely nothing about Canada Goose.Now I have a coat that feels too small. It's not just about the product, Canada Goose need to really focus on their store assistants.

Name: laura
Review: Who would support animals being skinned for fur? It looks tacky, it's the 21st century, for is not attractive. We have the ability to make synthetic stuff. Shame on you if you hunt living beings and if you work for this company and if you keep it in business.

Name: Allison
Review: Canada goose has the warmest jackets ever

Name: Nickie Duong
Review: I bought a jacket for around $900 and it was already damaged. I wore it for 2 years regularly in the winter, not for sports or anything and it's just crap. The jacket has lost filling and gotten so thin that it's not even warm anymore, the fur has thinned, the cuffs have unraveled, and the back has ripped. Their site is also useless and doesn't allow me to make a claim no matter how many times I try with different accounts even. Honestly, its been a terrible experience overall in every way.

Name: Joseph Rhodore
Review: Same happen to me dry clean for more than one month calling them begging them just bring back my Jacket everything is paid. (case 00058177)Hannah1 review1 star: BadUpdated Oct. 15, 2019Extremely unhappy with quality and customer serviceExtremely unhappy. After only one month of wearing the jacket in winter, I had to send it for repair. They said they are going to re-stitch the whole jacket (CASE 00055021). How is this happening in the first place? Doesn’t this show that the jacket was defected when I got it? I didn’t pay +1000 dollars for a jacket to only last a month. I was super careful with it also. I am very dissatisfied and disappointed . Never ever will buy anything for my family from Canada goose.

Name: Tom Apuzzo
Review: I purchased one parka and two sweaters at over $1,800 US at MOA.I just cut the tag off my sweater and snagged the arm putting it on.  I went back to the Mall of America store in Minnesota where the salesperson showed me his sweater that was  also snagged in several places.  He call for the store manager who stated there’s nothing he could do.  I said I just want a replacement and he told me the sweater is no longer perfect and couldn’t do that or give me my money back.  If I had bought this at Nordstrom they would have.  No hassles.  I then asked if he had a list of People who could reweave it, and of course no help or even Canada Goose doing that service for a fee.  Very disappointed with my experience and lost me as a customer.

Name: RZ
Review: Worst company ever, maybe the jackets are good but they send you defective ones. I have been asking for a refund since 2 weeks and they are tossing me left and right. What kind of company are you if you can't have a proper system. People are paying 1000$ if not even more. I understand the quality is a thing but it also comes with customer service. Save your time and buy it from a store dont even think about buying online.

Name: Mia Wilson
Review: Really hot, really beautiful jacket. The winter is better with this jacket !

Name: Juste
Review: It is been >3 weeks since I submitted my parka to warranty and I am still freezing in London without the jacket I paid £925 for. I am extremely disappointed by the quality of the navy Lorette parka which had faded in white patches.In addition, l Canada Goose lousy and unprofessional customer service made me lose any brand loyalty. After inspecting the jacket (which arrived late to the warranty department due to London Regent's street store sending it the following week after I submitted it) I was told  the jacket cannot be repaired and they should send me a new one. Two weeks later they claimed it would take another 3-5 days to 'process' it and get a tracking number but of course 5 working days later no update from Canada Goose...It is getting very cold where I live and I am beyond disappointed that I paid a huge price tag for a premium quality jacket that I cannot wear due to its appalling quality and even more appealing warranty service.I was given excuses that 'there are processes' they need to follow when claiming warranty but that is simply not satisfactory for disappointed customers. I thought I purchased a high quality jacket, yet what I got is terrible fading and I don't even have a jacket for >3 weeks because Canada Goose think it is ok to make their customers wait that long to receive a jacket they paid for.I should have been given a replacement jacket from the store straight away. That is what a good luxury brand would do (or offer any other way goodwill gesture) but instead, Canada Goose choose to operate like any mediocre high street brand just with a premium price tag...

Name: Catherine
Review: My own experience about Canada Goose is extremely satisfied. My husband and I wore the Canada Goose to Yellowknief last February. I was worrying whether the jacket won’t be warm enough for those extreme weather like - 35 degree with windchill = - 45 degree. However, I was totally wrong. The Jackets work very well in those extreme weather conditions and I found they are keeping the body temperature like sealed and they are  better than my Arcteryx coat.Usually I will change a new coat each year. And, I am keeping my Canada goose the second year and I will keep it as long as I can.

Name: Claire Roberts
Review: I often think on here that many people who have had an excellent experience with a company don’t bother to write reviews as opposed to people who have had terrible experiences, so I just wanted to put it out there about the recent dealings that I have had with Canada Goose customer service.I had used my Canada Goose Shelburne parka for 3 winters, certainly not in any extreme weather conditions when I noticed tiny little holes on the seams of both sleeves and on the outside of the pockets.I contacted customer service which I believe are in Switzerland who were extremely polite and helpful who asked me to parcel up the coat and send to their repairers in Scotland.It was inspected very quickly and they informed me that they would be repairing it and that it would be done within a 4 week turnaround period.After only a few days they got back in touch and said they had done the sleeves but couldn’t repair the pocket due to a problem with fabric.I contacted the customer service team again and said I wasn’t happy about that and would like the coat replacing if it couldn’t be repaired.After a few emails the customer service agent who was very helpful, understanding and very polite agreed to send out a brand new coat to replace the one that couldn’t be fully repaired.I have received my new parka and am absolutely delighted with it and can’t thank these guys at Canada Goose enough for their efforts in helping me.I would go as far as saying they are one of the best companies I have ever dealt with.thank you so much! A very happy customer 😁

Name: Maritza Velez
Review: Horrible online purchased has been cancelled many times because they have faulty system. This is horrible customer services and trickster. Since oct 8 2019 I have placed non stop a coat and each time they cancelled my order have me go back an reorder and then the coat is no longer available today is 10/17 and I am still dealing with my cancellation I spoke to my credit card company and all orders they have approved! I wonder who is going through the same thing

Name: Hannah
Review: Extremely unhappy. After only one month of wearing the jacket in winter, I had to send it for repair. They said they are going to re-stitch the whole jacket (CASE 00055021). How is this happening in the first place? Doesn’t this show that the jacket was defected when I got it? I didn’t pay +1000 dollars for a jacket to only last a month. I was super careful with it also. I am very dissatisfied and disappointed . Never ever will buy anything for my family from Canada goose.

Name: Bab Vladimirova
Review: #Boycott Animal Abuse. Stay informed don't buy products with organisations that care more about profit than animal wellbeing. If you want more information go and see the videos of their cruelty on PETA.

Name: Michelle
Review: I took my Victoria CG jacket to Yorkdale store for frayed cuffs. Warranty emailed me after 2 weeks saying it cannot be fixed and will send me a replacement of the same jacket.  I received the replacement within 4 weeks. Once I took out the jacket I found it’s much lighter than my old one and the fur is ugly. I emailed them they asked to hang up the jacket for a while for the down to decompose and every fur is unique. Nothing they can do. I talked to everyone, no one thinks that’s the reason of the lighter weight jacket. Want to know if anyone experiences this? My Rossclair fusion is also 625 fill down but it’s thicker and warmer!

Name: AJ
Review: Disgusting, sick company who traps coyotes and skins them. You're paying for the suffering of animals. #BoycottCGJ

Name: Todd Kranes
Review: An abusive, exploitative company with no consideration for the animals who are enslaved and skinned alive. Shame on you, disgusting.

Name: Asha Kaur
Review: I had the bloody best service ever  they received my jacket they contacted me that day and said they would like to replace me with a new jacket, honest to god i was so worried because of the reviews but they contacted me straight away and told me not to worry and guess what within a week the coat came!!! So happy thankyou cananda goose amazing service

Name: Pei
