Review: I gave my limited edition jacket ($1400) which I bought from Toronto, has ripped sleeves. Went to store on London, the staff said because it has "LIFE TIME WARRANTY", they can repair it for free, they asked me to make it drycleaned (£15) and bring it to the store. I did, and I received this:Thank you for taking the time to talk to me. As discussed, the garment is beyond repair. In addition, I have asked my manager to call you. We are sorry to not have been of much assistance. Kind regards, TalaYeap, they can't even repair their own jacket, above all they can literally disregard any repair by simply reply with the above email. Truly, there is no such a thing as "life time warranty".

Name: Alex M
Review: was a big fan of CG for years but the warranty / CS is absolutely disgusting.  recently noticed that the hood fur started to shed and sent in for repairs (no cleaning, no abuse, even limited interaction with the fur itself).  London store told me that there is a "life time warranty" ... but after reviewing the fur, they are putting me a $100 bill to pay for repairs - case 00051426.  Clearly its a manufacturing defect, but they want to make money off me.  disgusting.  as much as I liked CG for its coats, I'll never buy there anything again because of these nasty tricks

Name: Jason Delaney
Review: Hey all just ordered a jkt for my son €675 .This was  from the European wed site based in Switzerland  ,firstly ordered on sunday evening all was good compelled the order money was taken from my sons account. Then less that 10mins later got email saying it order is cancelled for security reasons. The money still not back in my sons account.Rang Customer care monday but the whole website was down due to maintenance. Finally got in touch later in the day like about 3pm Monday, got told it was no big deal no apology this happens all the time ,money still not in my sins acct and no order , got told I had to reorder it and the money would go back into the acct today. By 5pm the money only got back in , had to reorder it still awaiting on a email to confirm order .also on Sunday evening I had rang my bank got told it wasn't any security issue on our end or with our bank in dublin .Firstly the service is not up to the standard u would expect from a company that sells high end products that can run in to thousands of euros. I will not use the site again .I would not recommend anyone else does if u want to just loss a large amount of cash and be told it's no big deal . Jason

Name: Benjamin Tant
Review: I had a difficult experience trying to get my coat back from the warranty department do to FedEx being lazy and incapable. In return for the hassle they made the company went above and beyond to make the situation right by resending it same day and sending me a new hat for my troubles. If that isn’t a luxury experience I don’t know what is

Name: Paula Reveliotis
Review: There is no such thing as a warranty with Canadian Goose.  Their warranty service says if they have to repair something you will have to pay for it.  Had the coat 6 months a painter got paint on the back, I looked up everything I could and got 80% of it out. Called the store they said it has a life time warranty and they could repair it, I would be charged but they would contact me. After two months they did sent it back with the paint still in it.  They did not change out the panel as claimed, they charged my credit card 55,00 for cleaning now the paint is really in there. DO NOT BUY FROM THEY, VERY DISHONEST. You will be bait and switched, they will tell you and give you another, its illegal in the US

Name: vickyr81
Review: DISGUSTING COMPANY - i ordered a jacket back in march for a Birthday present, i had it a week before the birthday then went on holiday for a week, the coat i ordered was the wrong size and i returned it upon my return from holiday. Canada goose got in touch and advised the coat had been worn, this is impossible it was completely the wrong size and would no way have fit, all i wanted was a replacement. i have been refused a refund and was told the product would be returned - 5 months later still nothing received, canada goose are absolutely disgusting and i cannot understand what has happened, i believe something untoward has gone on in the warehouse, maybe the coat was dropped, swapped however i am yet to receive an explanation. i have bought many canada goose jackets however i will never buy one again due to the service received i am 1k out of pocket with no coat for the husband. i kept receiving emails asking where to ship the coat to - canada goose have the shipping address andn i have confirmed this on the phone yet still no coat and no refund. i am disgusted with this

Name: Gary
Review: Absolutely shocking service. Bought a raincoat,the last medium one in stock. When it arrived I unboxed it to find a small noticeable hole on the inside. So as anyone would i sent it back for a full refund. It was posted on the Thursday, they received it on the Friday and processed my refund. At this point i put my name down for a notification email when a medium became available again. 12hours later I received said email informing me a medium was back in stock. I know what your thinking, they couldn’t could they? Well they did. I paid more money to get the same jacket with the hole in it resent to me. This company unbelievablely put this faulty jacket back on the shelf for resale, lucky for all you people out there that i got it again. Id love to say it ends there but if it happened once,then chances are it will happen again. Still waiting on a reply from head office and my second refund , can see me gettyone but not the other so take note people, this company are only after your hard earned money and don’t give a flying #%+* once you cut the tags off.

Name: Jerome Ty
Review: Dirty company – the warranty is a lie. I bought a new jacket in November, wearing it for the first time in December, and the fluff inside was coming out. I sent it in right away hoping to get the issue fixed or get a replacement jacket for the remainder of winter. They told me I could get a replacement jacket, but not the same model as the one I bought. The thing is, I tried on all the other jackets but none of them fit me as well. What kind of warranty is that? Have you ever heard of a car dealership saying, "Sorry the luxury SUV you bought had defects, but we won't give you the same spacious SUV, rather we're giving you a smaller sedan."

Name: Lama
Review: Canada Goose has absolutely the WORST customer service. I moved to Montreal in March it was my first and last experience with that brand, I bought a jacket for 1500$ CAD. I bought it as I wanted to use it for minimum 4-5 years especially that I payed 1500$ now and I cannot use it in winter.  It did not fit, so I wanted to exchange it for the next size up.I went after 2 weeks to the store they told me there’s sings of use on it and we cannot exchange it with a bigger size, and I only used it for one week it turned out when it’s so cold and I want to wear more clothes I cannot close the zipper how can I survive the winter with it???I sent them an email, They told me I have to send another email for Quebec branches what????? Isn’t supposed to be your job to forward it ?? Anyway I sent them another email to Quebec branches in Montreal, I didn’t receive any reply. I called the customer service and I told them the whole story and they told me they are sorry they cannot do anything because 30 days of warranty have been passed and we cannot exchange it. It’s not my fault if I went to your store and they didn’t accept to exchange it, it’s my worst experience EVER. I considered as my top brand but now I don’t want to walk in that store again. How they can let people pay 1500$ without being satisfied and happy with their jackets???? TOO BAD

Name: Robert
Review: I originally bought a grey MacMillan Parka 2 years ago and a year and minimal wear I noticed white marks under armpits on the external material. I contacted the warranty team at Canada goose about it and they said to send the jacket in. After inspection they said the material was faulty and the white marks shown were undue wear and tear for the jackets age and sent me a replacement, this time in black. That was ten months ago and fast forward to today and I have the same issue with white marks under the armpits. I again contacted them a month ago and sent the jacket in. I received a very vague email regarding some repairs they were carrying out, which included replacing both cuffs, restitching certain areas and colour fast treatment. I received the jacket back and the white marks were still under the armpits. I contacted them and they said that the jacket is not faulty and the white marks are due to wear and tear, a totally different story to my last jacket where they accepted the issue without fuss. Apparently the jacket is fully functioning and it is not an aesthetic jacket, made solely for cold weather and therefore white marks are not an issue. For a £800 coat....not meant to look good for more than 6 months.....who are they trying to kid. It is like your paint peeling off your year old car and the manufacturer saying that as it still drives and is safe it is not an issue!! Add to that the fact the jacket needed multiple repairs I hadn't even known needed doing makes you seriously question the quality of the jackets. Their stance is firm, there is no escalation process other than speaking to a manager. Shocking customer service. I for one will not be buying another of Canada goose jacket, will be strongly suggesting any friends, family or readers of this review do not unless of course you want to spend a lot of money on a coat that will look seriously worn after minor wear.

Name: HAYLEY RAMALHO
Review: I HATE that they kill animals to make FUR COATS. I'll never buy anything from y'all EVER

Name: G L
Review: Canada Goose has ab-so-lu-te-ly the WORST customer service on the planet. I live in Toronto, Canada, and bought a coat 1000 CAD worth. It did not fit, so I wanted to exchange it for the next size up. I called customer service in Quebec, lonnnnng wait on the phone (20 mns), after which I asked for one (1) flat measurement (chest) of the bigger size coat. The person just disconnected me. I emailed customer service with the same question. Never got a reply. I called again, lonnnnng wait again (30-40mns) and after my request, the person said, "you have to understand, we're very busy at this time of the year..." like, yes, we're in October, HOWEVER, how long have they been in business? And they don't know that comes winter, they should expect to be busy and to double up on customer service? They're selling winter gear!!! For a so-called "Luxury" brand, they have a "Pauper" customer service. I returned the coat and will NEVER EVER BUY from them.

Name: EkalapPravitoon
Review: I want sue Canada goose about warranty process. Don’t send it back to warranty if you want to fix your Canada goose, see Canada goose in the court.

Name: Aiden Cogley
Review: I wont buy anything from Canada Goose.They sell real fur and support animal cruelty. No animal should die for the sake of a fur trim on someones coat.Shame on you Canada Goose.Animal abusers !

Name: waseem ahmed
Review: I ordered a parka from Canada Goose after nearly 6 months of saving £900 so I would have a quality parka come the colder weather    All was fine delivery arrived within 48 hrs which was great upon opening the box and taking the parka out it seemed as if it wasn’t brand new looking closer could clearly see bobbles on the inside of the cuffs there was sand like in the inside thermal pockets and stains on parts of the jackets. You can imagine my disappointment BUT I thought this was a mistake and contacted CG explained my findings they advised me to return it which I did the next day checked my account after 5 days still no refund contacted them the person I spoke with advised me that a Manager would be intouch. The next day a manager called me explaining that the refund had been rejected due to me sending them a different jacket you can imagine my horror I said wrong jacket ???? What does that mean did I send you a jacket from Primark in the hope you wouldn’t notice. No he replied the jacket is the correct style size colour but it’s serial numbers don’t match first I thought maybe It was a late April fools prank but it wasn’t This has to be a joke as I can’t not even begin to imagine how this can be possible he advised me the best they could do would be to clean the jacket and send it back I am now £900 out of pocket and my only option is to accept a second hand jacket

Name: Motti
Review: A couple of months ago I purchased a Canada goose jacket. When purchased, I noticed that the zip was faulty, when I tried sipping up the jacket, the zip would constantly get stiff and I would have to pull it abnormally he’d to zip it up as well as being careful not to damage the coat. Even worse, when the jacket was worn, it appeared that the feathers from within the jacket were seeping through it. As I didn’t and still haven’t worn the jacket on the regular, I assumed that if I were to keep the jacket in the right temperature and be moderately careful with it, That will stop the feathers from appearing from the  fabric and falling out. However that was not the case. I looked up Canada goose returns policy and decided to write them an email seeking help for my problem, however I still haven’t gotten a reply. I’ve been very satisfied from my previously purschsed items form Canada goose and have not once received this problem. This is not the quality I expect from my Canada goose jacket worth £450.

Name: Michael
Review: Just received this response from Canada Goose Warranty Customer Care in relation to a genuine warranty claim, absolutely shocking.........Canada Goose	Warranty | Customer Care CASE 0003xxxxxHi,Thank you for your patience.As per my telephone message, please be advised we are unable to repair the coat as we no longer have the same materials in order to fix the zippers.  The tape would need to be removed and replaced, and the coat no longer has the lamination necessary to have the reflective tape stick.We are very sorry for any inconvenience.The coat will be shipped back to you next week, and when the courier collects the parcel, you will receive an email with tracking and delivery information.Should you have any questions, please don’t hesitate to reply to this email and a warranty agent will be happy to assist.Kind Regards,Christine If you have any questions, feel free to reply to this email or contact Customer Experience:North America: 1-888-276-6297 or Europe and rest of the world: 0041 41 727 5900 or China - 400-820-5612© 2018 Canada Goose, 250 Bowie Avenue | Toronto, ON | M6E 4Y2 | Canada

Name: Shailesh Patel
Review: Cheaters scammer bad customer service don't buy it from them at all

Name: Komar
Review: By far the worst delivery service in Canada

Name: Msaint
Review: Their Un Ethical treatment of animals is disturbing , yet they showed up in my suggestions feed .Big Mistake as I LOATH CANADA GOOSE COMPANY .Pure Evil.

Name: Carly
Review: Not great.  Not overall impressed with the level of customer service for such expensive items.

Name: annamaria Khan
Review: Horrible customer service, bad quality jacket and completely over-priced. Avoid at all costs!

Name: Keith
Review: I purchased a Hybridge jacket in red as a Christmas present for my wife. I mistakenly thought that Canada Goose were synonymous with quality, I was wrong. After my wife had worn the jacket a few times we started to notice that the the internal black fabric started showing through the outer red fabric making it look stained and dirty - not what you expect from a Canada Goose! I contacted Canada Goose approximately two months after I purchased the jacket and I sent it back to their warranty department for review. Unfortunately, their response was more than a little disappointing. According to Canada Goose this is what it’s designed to do. Quote from Canada Goose: “The fabric of the HyBridge Lite is thinner in order to make them lightweight. Due to the colour contrast of red and black, down underneath is visible and come off as slightly black, taking on the reflection of the black material inside. As the red material is lightweight you can also see the black material behind. What your wife is experiencing occurs because of the design of the coat and this does not represent a manufacturing defect.” Funny it doesn’t say on the website that this coat will look shabby and dirty after a couple of weeks!! I did try to publish this review with photographs of the jacket on their website. However, Canada Goose rejected it as it "did not meet their website guidelines“ presumably the truth. So much for independently verified reviews.Absolutely awful.

Name: April
Review: This company is horrid. Their products are cheaply made, and they've been selling coyote fur coats. Fur coats, in the 21st century!? So barbaric and...so lame. Fur coats are disgusting and we all know better than to support them. This awful company is not worth anyone's money or time.

Name: Stephania
Review: Their coats with fur are made from dog fur. Coyote and domestic. They are truly pieces of sh** for killing beautiful animals for fame and money. Trapping them and murdering them for the fur on their back and then advertising custom fur coats, yeah because one dog only has so much fur, right? Poor dogs.

Name: Alison
Review: Canada Goose clams to take pride in providing customers with the best service possible. I did NOT receive the best service. After receiving an email confirmation regarding my order number and tracking number, my order went to TORONTO. I live in BC. Delivery said it would take 3-6 days, It has been a week and a half and I still have NOT received my order. I called UPS and Canada Goose customer service, the sales rep told me they would look into the case and get BACK to Me within 48 hours. It's been over 48 hours and NOTHING BACK. Is THIS how the company provides THE BEST customer service? I did not pay almost one grand for this.

Name: Ruth Jeang
Review: Opened a case for my coat regarding dye fading after a season and a half of wear. Sent photos and descriptions, but it doesn't seem like anyone cared to look at them before sending some automated emails asking for me to to pay out of pocket for dry cleaning before sending, and to pay for the shipping of the coat for assessment. It's poor customer service to ask an already dissatisfied customer to go through this added headache and cost for what is supposed to be a premium product, without providing any prediction or insight into where the case may be headed. I was hoping the quality of the coat could make up for your failing brand image, but it seems like the quality matches the brand. Poor quality, poor customer service, poor branding. Nothing but a status symbol. The above was what I posted on Canada Goose's Facebook. I received a scripted reply asking for me to private message them to work something out. I was hoping for more of a personalized reply, some accountability and transparency. Ever thought that you could use it as an opportunity to put other customers at ease by being transparent with how the company handles complaints? Instead of focusing so much on expanding, how about worrying about the quality of your products and how it associates with your brand? How about expanding on locations for after-service if you can't seem to address the dwindling quality of your products? If you can't provide value in the coat, at least provide it in service. It's not a good look to have your customers walking around with under-stuffed and or faded coats. It doesn't look aesthetic and appealing to potential customers. Your customers are also your ambassadors, both directly and indirectly when they are out in public. With all this being said, I am not willing to pay for dry cleaning and shipping to have YOUR inferior product be assessed by you. Your product did not live up to the expectations that YOU have instilled in people. There's also the inconvenience of being without the coat after shipping it.  And who knows if i'll be left to foot the bill for repairs. I'd rather cut my losses short and never purchase Canada Goose again. I will be sure to warn others as well.

Name: Rubber Ducky
Review: I would give Canada Goose a 0 star if I could.  Absolutely the worst customer service I have ever received.  I sent in my jacket that was under a week old as it had torn on the bottom of the jacket in multiple places (terrible quality jacket).  I should add that this was the most expensive jacket in their line - you would think this would have held up a little better than ripping the very 1st time the jacket was worn.  The response from Canada Goose was beyond abysmal.  They said that since they had proof that it left their warehouse with no tears that they absolutely would not do anything for me.  They wouldn't even fix it for me for a charge!  Just sent the jacket back totally useless to me.  They absolutely do NOT stand behind their LIFETIME WARRANTY!  This jacket was under a week old and they had absolutely zero resolution and it took 3 weeks before they even sent the jacket back to me.  BEWARE OF CANADA GOOSE!!!!

Name: Concerned Citizen
Review: The designs are great, but the quality is now very poor.  The customer service is provided by people in a third-party call centre who are paid minimum wage, and are summarily fired if they don't tow the company line, which means constantly having to lie to customers. The warranty is a joke, and takes months, not weeks to see any kind of resolution.  It is obvious that this company cares more about it's brand image than it does about the quality of its products, or the people who buy their products, unless, of course, that person is a celebrity, or an "influencer".  What once made this Canadian feel proud, does so no longer.  This company is now tainted, with it's callous and greedy behaviour, is debasing the image and name of my beloved country.

Name: Muhammad danish
Review: Hi i went to buy my second canada goose jacket the customer service was absolutely brilliant . To name a few Matteo, Noar, Kelsey and Esther at regents street they were all brilliant helped me with xxl parka which was for 895 pounds brilliant offered me and my mrs water while we was shopping . Matteo was absolutely brilliant and the rest of the team. KEEP IT UP GUYS.

Name: jennifer laurence
Review: Avoid. They will be legally sued. Worst and Terrifying service to the point that they WILL GET sued for their fraud service. Avoid psychotic store manager "elina" from soho flagship location in New York as well as the hands-down the "WORST" warranty experience any company would ever provide. It is hands-down the very worst experience. Terrifying and moving straight into the legal procedure for suing them.

Name: George
Review: Bought a jacket for £895, 2 months later the colours fading massively and noticeably without having to look for it. Sent it off to the warranty people. Got a quick reply saying they'll replace it as it's beyond repair. At this point I didn't want the same jacket back considering how terribly made the first one was, I offered sending the needed extra costs to replace for a different model and they said it was possible but only ones i was offered were no where near the value of my original jacket so I requested a refund or credit so I could purchase a new one online. At this i was told they would contact me within 1-2 days. 5 days later i had to call up asking about the refund as they had in no way tried to contact me or even reply to my email and they told me they're just sending me the same jacket i had originally! Spoke to me like i was an annoying child being petty about a £5 jacket and he sounded completely bored of the conversation! 3 different operators told me 3 different options for me which wasted weeks of my time leaving me without a jacket in the middle of winter! I was offered no apologies or any sort of acknowledgment of the fact they completely messed me around and now i'm waiting 4 more days for my jacket to arrive. Never have I been so strongly dissatisfied with  a service and the way I was treated that I felt the need to write a review.

Name: Clifford
Review: Poor Quality - Poor customer service. I purchased a beautiful Wyndham parka in Dec 2017. I could feel the cold in the arms near the seams.  I noticed that the down insulation was lacking in this area.  I mentioned this to an employee in the Boston store and they recommended I immediately send the garment to Warranty which I did.  I was told a two week turn around and it took 58 days during which time I was given a canned response by customer service when I would call to check on the progress.  I finally received the garment back and was disappointed to see that the garment is still cold in the arms and it was not apparent that any down was actually added to the arms in the area of the seams.  It is only 36Degrees F.  I should not be cold in this garment.  I recommend another brand if you are considering this brand.  It's too bad.  It's a beautiful parka.  Just poor quality and poor customer service.

Name: Judd Kessler
Review: Men's glovesThey were great the first year. Now the finger tips are cold. Sorry, says Canada Goose, gloves are accessories and accessories are not covered under our lifetime warranty. Sorry, says Canada Goose, but over time, they are not expected to stay as warm as they were when new, and there's nothing we can recommend to fix that.

Name: Petru Voinescu
Review: Canada Goose Jackets trim their parkas with Coyote fur taken from trapped animals that has sat often for days in agony with their feet and legs broken in metal traps -Search on Youtube the video titled: ARE YOU WEARING A DOG ON YOUR COAT?

Name: Hande Demir Oralis
Review: Unfortunately, I joined a victim club of Canada Goose. I bought my coat 3 months ago. It is already started to shed and the color is fading which I got the admiral blue one so, you can imagine how bad it looks. I paid more than 1000$ for this coat and this is a very huge mistake to buy a coat from this company. They have a very very horrible CUSTOMER SERVICES. They want me to ship my coat to their address but they force me to pay for this shipment which is none of this issues are not my fault. They sell a fraud product.I have even pictures of this s---y coat that they sold me. I will post this pictures in the social media as much as I can so, I might warn people about not to buy a coat from this company because it is only waste of money. Do not spend your money and get a s---y coat.(Sorry about my language but they really deserve it)I have all proves,recites and pictures but they are so cheap people and they do not care. Go to Northface and buy a coat with a half price at least if your coat started to shed and change the color like mine you would say I did not spend 1100$ for a coat.

Name: hong lee
Review: I bought a mystique parka in October 2018. I was shocked at how cheap this parka looks after having paid over 1000 for it. It is an admiral blue and looks dull and faded. The fur looks cheap and thin. I asked to pay for a replacement but so far no one has returned my emails or calls. If you purchase online they send you cheap crap. The customer service is just ridiculously horrible. If you really want class, style and warmth then buy a Moose knuckle. Canadagoose parkas are truly not worth that money. You can even purchase mackage or any other less expensive parkas. Canada Goose have gotten greedy and careless. I won’t be purchasing from them again.

Name: Erika L Humke
Review: Returned coat. After purchasing a previous Canada Goose coat - a nice high end model - I expected the warranty and repairs to be quick and easy. No such thing. Warranty and repairs were not handled well. I was treated as if I lied about the coat. (Purchased it thru Nordstrom's and they would never treat a customer this way, not sure why CG feels they can!) I had to send in receipts and wait for they response. Twice I never heard back from them, and pointed out the dates they received my emails. They called it a technical glitch. The website says 1-2 week turn around, but my coat just now passed their cleaning inspection - that took them a full 30 days. Now I wait for them to make repairs. It's the dead of winter. Yep. Had to suck it up and go buy a new coat. Not Canada Goose.

Name: LAD
Review: HORRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE AT THE CANADA GOOSE STORE AT THE PRUDENTIAL CENTER BOSTON MA.  Bought the Shelburne Parka Black Label in SilverBirch and needed to have it dry cleaned for $54 within the first 3 weeks because the dye from my backpack pocketbook transferred on to the coat all around the shoulder area.  Brought it to the store and they did absolutely nothing!!!! Wouldn't even offer to pick up the cost of the dry cleaning. They should forewarn people of how sensitive the fabric is!  You would think for paying $950 they would mention it!!  DISAPPOINTED IS THE BIGGEST UNDERSTATEMENT.  EVEN MORE DISAPPOINTING IS THE LACK OF CUSTOMER SERVICE AND SUPPORT!! BEWARE and BUY SMART!!

Name: Jovana Perazic
Review: If I could I would give 0 stars! There was a tear on my sleeve, I send it  for inspection, the warranty department took it for dry cleaning eaven I did it before I sent it out, they want $45 for dry cleaning, on top of that they are saying that my fur is “ not up to their standards” and it is only 6 months old, Io wore my jacket maybe 10 times and that’s it, so fur on my hoodie is not up to the standards but stitching on my right wrist is!!? And they are letting me know that “ it won’t change look of gourmet “ !!So now they are asking for payment and telling that they will discard my case if I don’t pay, but nobody is answering on my question since I’m nicely asking  to let me know if is gonna be visible or no, if is visible I won’t have stitching done, and they are not replying on, I went in the store on michigan ave in Chicago and they assure me that I will get new jacket since this is under warranty and now I’m getting this??! Don’t spend money on Canada Goose ! Go to Patagonia they’re warranty is worth money! We have at least 11 Canada Goose jackets and we have accessories now we won’t buy ever again there and I will make sure that all my friends and family know this and to think twice before spending money there !

Name: Marsha Jarvis
Review: Bought a CG coat approximately 7 years ago. Sent this Kensington model parka for warranty since it was no longer providing warmth.  The down in the sleeves was almost non existent.  The fabric had faded and there was some wear around the cuffs.  The fading and cuff wear were not big issue to me.  I did not expect any warranty to cover these issues since I consider this a part of normal wear and tear.  I did expect the company to do something about the fact the down did not stay in the coat and was now very cold to wear.  I sent the jacket off for warranty review asking about the warmth issue only.  The company notes they would stitch a couple of areas however they would not do anything about the down as it was considered normal wear and tear.  Stitching minor areas on the cuff should not be covered as that is actually normal wear but continued warmth of a product designed to keep you warm should be!  I am so disheartened with the 'warranty'.  On top of that, they insisted the coat needed dry cleaning.  I had only dry cleaned it in the spring prior to storing it for the summer and had just taken it out on the fall.  I had worn it twice until I decided it was just too cold to continue to wear.  To give potential customers an idea of how much down was missing from the sleeves... You could rub the arm of the jacket between your fingers and feel the fabric rub against fabric, you could not feel down.  We own 5 CG jackets within our family.  We will never purchase another.  Buyer beware...you did purchase much, much cheaper down coats to provide comparable warmth of the Kensington parka and replace it every couple of years... Do not think you are getting any value from the warranty.

Name: Ryan
Review: I’ve had to send my jacket back to Canada goose for repair every winter I’ve had it.  Three winters now.  Had to buy another jacket to keep from freezing all winter.  Three zippers have broken.  Extremely light use.  Walking the dog and driving to work.  That’s it.  They ask to have it cleaned before repair.  I’ve put it through the wash at home.  I’m a clean freak.  The jacket is clean. All three times Canada goose tells me it’s dirty and there’s a cleaning fee.  I’m so done with them.  Buy a mec jacket and save your money.

Name: Elsa Fox
Review: Terrible quality. Totally not worth it. If you are thinking about buying a jacket from Canada Goose don't even bother; it is a waste of money.

Name: Frederik Wijsenbeek
Review: Parka is warm and fits well.  The problem is that the lining is so poorly made that it keeps shedding down even a year after I bought it.  More importantly, I bought a similar coat for my wife and when it became clear that it had a manufacturing defect that meant it didn’t keep her warm, customer service did everything possible to deny the claim and kept insisting it was fine.  We didn’t receive a refund or exchange and decided to give the coat to charity.  I will never buy another Canada Goose product.

Name: Anthony
Review: I purchased an expensive CG coat last year. After little use the zip broke. After much going back and forth with them I returned it (at my own expense) and they agreed to carry out the repair on Dec 20th. I called yesterday to get an update and was told 6 weeks plus a delay because of the holiday period. In other words I probably wont get it back until end of February. What use is an £800 + coat if you cannot use it for the coldest months of the year! I asked to speak to a Manager but after my request was ignored 5 times I was eventually told they would call me back. However I did not get any call. This a premium priced product but the customer service is bargain basement poor.

Name: sean mcgreevy
Review: Would never buy from Canada Goose. It's 2019 you don't need to skin animals for fashion. Get with the times. Coyote fur on a hood of a jacket? Seriously. This company chooses profit over morals. No way shape or form can you justify killing innocent animals for fashion, especially the cruelty that occurs during the process. I'm disgusted Everytime I walk by someone wearing your coats.

Name: Mel
Review: Can’t even begin to express my frustration with the warranty department. Canada Goose has had my coat I sent in since October. Since the coat was not in stock and covered under warranty, I was informed I would receive a full refund for the coat. It is now January and I am STILL waiting on a refund. The only response I have gotten from CG is that somehow apparently my bank rejected the deposit (which is not true at all- they never even received any incoming refund in the first place). It’s a never ending nightmare just to speak with someone who will pretty much just tell you to continue waiting. Every rep has told me a different day and week it was apparently processed which tells me this seems like a complete scam. Sincerely,You very frustrated customer who will never purchase your products again.

Name: Hunt Peck
Review: Canada Goose Warranty Department is a joke!  After calling them and speaking with a rep from Toronto, I was told to mail my 2 jackets to Chicago.  I was told it would take 2 weeks to get my jackets back.  TWO MONTHS later, I still don't have my coats back.  Not only that, the issue I was told could be handled is now flat out being denied.  So $100 to ship the coats and I have absolutely nothing at all.  TERRIBLE SERVICE.  I would NEVER ship anything to Canada Goose again for anything!  Better off doing any repairs yourself.  For such a luxury high end brand, the Warranty Department is a JOKE.  I will not be buying their products again for this reason alone.

Name: Aurin
Review: I bought a Loretta Parka from CG on DEC 23,2018 from York dale shopping Mall. But after wearing it I didn't feel the warmth that I was expecting. Even the weather was not so cold these days but I felt cold even wearing it. So I decided to return the Parka. Even though in their return policy it is written that it should be unworn, but my point is how would I know without wearing a outwear that it will keep me warm enough? Such a fake condition of return!! I have experience of working in an international retail store so I have proper idea about product management and return policy. However I went to the store to return it. They didn't even ask me the reason for the return (seems like they don't care!!). They just started doing the anatomy of the the product to say NO to return. they didn't give me any reason why it is not OK to take it back. They just told me it has been worn. I said yes I wore otherwise how would i know. I could have lied to them but i didn't. I should have called their manager. They seem like just not willing to accept any return request!!! I felt such offended that I felt like returning the item to the store without taking any refund from them!!!A brand cannot survive as a trustworthy one if they do not care about customer satisfaction. This is we, the customers, who still believe in you and your product. But you are misusing it. This was my first time buy and definitely the last time as well!!! My relatives, my friends and anyone in my affinities are not going to CG ever!!! I will never ever recommend it to anyone till my death. You are not respectful enough to your customer..You don't want to make the return just because u cannot hit the Target !! We all understand it ... You just ruined the trust I have on the brand in such a big country. The item is now really worthless to me to wear. CG will remain a negative brand to me forever. CG, YOU ARE A DISGRACE TO CANADA, THE LAND OF EQUALITY AND JUSTICE!!! - Regards,A completely frustrated customerToronto, ON, Canada

Name: joeph gallant
Review: Still waiting for a $1300 refund after a month; not impressed! As for their customer service on this issue, I have had more fun and success dealing with Bell or Rogers if that gives you an idea.

Name: Flora Lew
Review: Dear canada goose, please kindly take note of all the animals suffering just for your jackets. Imagine if this happens to your families what will you do?Please just stop. Consumers won't buy your products unless you make it animal free products like cotton or farbric

Name: Gary Rossell
Review: the new saisonal style is nice. Thanks

Name: Indranil Debnath
Review: Don’t even buy the sweater- it’s a flop no point of paying that much for that brand!!! I will never ever recommend anyone to buy this. Can spoil in a day and they don’t even entertain you or refund that. It’s a scam !!!

Name: Ash
Review: Canada goose jackets have blood all over them, extreme cruelty to coyotes and geese. Love good quality jackets but wouldn’t touch them with a barge pole.

Name: Robert Reiss Jr.
Review: Where do I start?. Purchased a pair of gloves and a " Kensigton" Parka. 1 st the gloves, very warm and flexible as advertised, then fell apart before a year of ownership. As a figure skating coach, little ware and tear, all the seams started to pop open. Sent back to Goose for "warranty repair". Customer service nightmare!. They have a warranty tracking web sight. They send you regular emails and refer to the tracking sight. If your late in correspondence they start dropping the procedures. They ship back the wrong size, then its impossible to swap for the right size without going through the whole procedure again. Weeks turn into months and there is no communication between the repair unit and sales and customer service.  The coat, started fading, seams popped looking shabby inside a year. This time tried the store return approach. Manager was very understanding and shipped the coat to CG. They could not find it between US and Canada repair areas. Store manager gave up retuning my calls for an update after 3 weeks. From the warranty  department finally got the word the coat is no longer available and would I accept a substitute? Confirmed acceptable terms to come to the store and select the exchange. On our way to the store (50) miles away, got another email saying the have found stock in Kensington and will be replacing the coat. when?, how?, MIA. Here we go again. The customer service and warranty repair management need to be replaced if there is any chance of this company survival. DO NOT BUY CANADA GOOSE UNTIL THEY GET THE MESSAGE, YOU CAN'T TREAT CUSTOMERS LIKE THIS IN THE USA..

Name: Kellee
Review: Customer Service/Support is Lacking but the Product is Fantastic,Canada Goose asked for my review of the product I just received, I wrote my review and Canada Goose rejected posting it on their site telling me it didn't meet their guidelines.  As well, they haven't offered to replace the damaged box the product arrived in:  "Purchased the Garson vest as a Christmas gift for my son. Product arrived in good time but the gift box that it was in was in very poor shape. When I contacted Canada Goose they apologized and told me this SHOULDN'T happen the NEXT time I order product from them. That was it! Needless to say I am disappointed in their lack of ability to fix such a minor problem on their end and such a disappointment it's going to be on my end when the gift is opened."

Name: Nina Rice-Parsons
Review: I have owned my long Canada Goose jacket for 3 1/2 years. Not used a lot, but yet all seams started to fade. I sent it in twice to Canada Goose for warranty coverage. Wasn't very pleased with the customer service I received. When you pay almost 1000$ for a jacket, you expect it to last longer then 4 years before it looks 10 plus yrs old.To say I am disappointed is an understatement, more like disgusted with Canada Goose. I have a disability, so jacket isn't use much outside of going to the store or church. You would expect it to last longer before looking so worn and old.  This was gift from my elderly mother who gave her kids an early gift, so i thought I would buy a jacket thats warm and I would get many years of wear from. Totally didn't happen, and only 3 weeks ago, my mother passed away, and I will be lucky if I can wear this jacket out in public many more winters before it looks too aged to wear. Sad, for a company that saids they honour their warranty. will never buy another, or recommend anyone to buy.

Name: john doe
Review: THEY ARE KILLING ANIMALS AND THE COATS ARE NOT WORTH 900$ FOR KILLING AN ANIMAL!

Name: rmk
Review: Awesome quality, quit crying over animal cruelty, it is just like buying leather products, great brand, super warm, perfect.

Name: paminagd
Review: Living in Ohio, I was considering purchasing a Canada Goose coat but in doing research into the company I was disgusted to discover that they use goose down and coyote fur as part of the "materials" in their products.How sterile and euphemistic to call animal parts stripped from the bodies of beautiful creatures that have been brutally tortured and killed "materials".On the Canada Goose website, they proudly display their pledged statement to only follow formal humane standards for both coyote trapping and goose down collecting. This includes their promise to use only "wild" fur, never farmed, as if this is somehow ethically better in some way.*As PETA has found in investigating whether the trappers and suppliers that Canada Goose uses are following the "humane standards" as pledged (which include checking all traps DAILY), the only part of "humane" involved is that humans are committing the brutality and torture of these defenseless animals.Coyotes are caught in no-kill traps for days if not weeks to slowly die of starvation, thirst, frostbite, predation, and blood loss. Some mothers will struggle violently, even trying to bite off their own paw, to return to their pups, who starve and die without them. The treatment of the geese in the stripping of their bodies for down is just as gruesome.PLEASE don't spend your hard-earned money on these overpriced blood-drenched excuses for outerwear. There are so many truly humane alternatives in this world. Let's not allow cruelty to win. * The fur industry would have you believe that they're performing a vital service to the natural world by "culling" these "nuisance" surplus coyotes and geese and making sure the bodies don't go to waste. It's clearly a lot of self-serving PR. If trappers truly would follow humane standards like checking traps daily to prevent needless suffering it wouldn't be as egregious ( still completely unacceptable) but none do!

Name: Darren
Review: I bought a hat from Canada Goose which was rather flimsy (paid $125 - not worth it) so I immediately returned it. Canada Goose received the shipment on Nov 20 and here we are on Dec 13 and my credit card has yet to be credited for the hat. I've escalated the issue several times and aren't they have an army of people investigating it and still nothing - terrible customer service!!! I will never purchase another thing from them again!!!

Name: Avi
Review: My experience with Canada Goose customer service and their managers - Names are Karim and Ricardo are beyond horrendous! For a company who sells coats over $1,000 a piece, should have a much better service! I sent my coat for repair in September (as I thought I would get it back right before winter) but I was WAY wrong. Canada Goose “experiencing delays” and therefore we are in the middle of December and I still don’t have my coat. I called the customer service multiple times and spoke with several managers and it was such a waste of time because NONE of them could give me an answer where is my coat and when I will receive it back. Here is my advise - DO NOT BUY THEIR COATS! They are expensive, horrible customer service and they use real fur.

Name: Collin Anderson
Review: How Canada Goose makes even more money: install low-quality zippers that fail quickly and then charge a $45 fee to "clean" every single jacket that gets sent back for warranty repair, even if the jacket is brand new or was just cleaned exactly how they asked for it to be cleaned, the only way out being a receipt from a dry cleaner. If the specific jacket model specifies that it can't be dry cleaned due to a protective water proofing coating, charge the $45 anyway, dry clean it anyway, and ruin the water proofing coating. Awesome business practices!

Name: john
Review: I bought a hat and gloves as a gift.  The gloves arrived, in a plastic bag with the warranty card all bent up.  I called asking where the hat was,  They didn't know.  Told me to order another one as the investigation would take 3-4 weeks.  So...they couldn't figure out to put the two items ordered together in the same shipment and put it in a box.  Nice...$400 worth of product and one ticked of customer.  So I eventually received the original hat and the second one ordered. Now the return process.  So I have the extra hat and look for the return function on the website.  Big surprise order number not recognized!  So i call and eventually someone emails me the return label and tells me to put it on box and return it.  I said, what box? I didn't get a box I got a plastic bag.  Needless to say i will not be shopping at Canada Goose ever again and make sure everyone I know hears about this story and I will defiantly discourage them from buying anything Canada Goose.

Name: Tanisha Burt
Review: I wish I would’ve read these reviews before I  spent 600$ On a jacket horrible quality horrible customer service and the warranty is a fraud Never ever will I purchase anything from this company again

Name: Sarah
Review: They torture animals to get the fur they need for the coats. They trap them by bear traps and let them suffer as they bleed out. DONT BUY CANADA  GOOSE!!

Name: Nic Donovan
Review: Canada Goose evil company should be banned !!!

Name: Topy
Review: I purchase my jacked from online and it’s fhe best quality and very very warm especially in Germany when it can be so cold

Name: Ben Pitches
Review: They use real fur. Shame on them. The world's changing and I think they should too. Disgusting. Absolutely disgusting! In modern society they should be setting an example not a fashion statement. With the reports going viral, this will undoubtedly be a PR nightmare for them as a company. I'm no animal rights activist but hell this is wrong!

Name: Rasputin
Review: OK, this is a review of the Canada Goose customer support systems.  Overall, the company did what it claimed it would in it's warranty statements but how they went about it was just poorly done.  The biggest issue was the length of time it took and the slow communications.  The company did replace my item, it just took almost 3 months.  Glad i had other options.  The support rep's were pleasant and knowledgeable and generally very helpful.  The process seemed to be just flawed at best.  First you setup a warranty return case online and ship the item in for inspection.  UPS delivered the item n 5 days but the web site was not updated for 4 weeks after that.  So we are already at 5 weeks.  Finally, the item was "found" and listed as arrived.  It took roughly 3 more weeks to be inspected.  Return shipping must have been by mule train as it took another 3 weeks from Ontario to Boston.  Retailers who handle the garments warned me of exactly this.  The warranty was upheld, the item replaced but why does it take them so long!!?I think better and cheaper gear can be bought from RAB, Arcteryx etc.  Those two companies have been extremely good with their customer support.

Name: Chris Stedman
Review: I tried, my mum tried, my girlfriend tried, my girlfriend's boss tried. Just can't get a purchase after everything gets cancelled by their super high security. Banks are fine they pay them but the company doesn't want my money? How do they exist?Ring their customer service, they'll promise to ring you back but they wont. I think I have spoken to all of their customer service reps now. Nice enough people but i think they are all dead inside.

Name: PM
Review: Zip gone on newish coat and still waiting after 48 minutes on the phone on hold to customer services - joke

Name: Charles Toop
Review: I’m afraid I echo all these negative comments. I bought a CG Wyndham end last year to replace my Selkirk. My intention was to go to the new Regent Street store, try it on, look at a few other coats, enjoy the shopping experience, etc. I phoned them to check stock first. ‘We don’t know what we have in store’. ‘Well please go and check’. ‘I can’t leave my desk otherwise no-one will answer the phone’. ‘Mmm, what’s the point in answering the phone if you can’t help your customers’. ‘OK, can I reserve one or make payment over the phone, if you had one?’ ‘No’. ‘OK so I have to spend £50 on a train fare and a 4 hour return journey just to find out if you have one at Regent Street?’ ‘Yes’. ‘What happens if the last one is sold 5 mins before I arrive?’ ‘There’s nothing I can do about that’.So I bought 2 different colours from CG online and returned one (the reason I bought two was that when I emailed CG customer services in Canada two pictures of my colour preference taken from the internet but which showed different shades so I could clarify which was correct, they didn’t know and couldn’t/wouldn’t find out). When the jackets arrived, the down fill on both was noticeably less than the Selkirk. I spoke to the Regent Street store manager on his mobile. No problem, we will replace it. Excellent. When? I don’t know (the colour Admiral Blue in M went out of stock end Dec 2017 and this was now early January 2018). Website has stated ‘back in stock soon’ for 2 months. ‘What is ‘soon’? Don’t worry, the replacement offer is for life. OK so I send the manager 3 emails in Jan and Feb asking him to confirm this offer in writing. No response. I phone his mobile number, which he has answered previously, 3 times last week and this week. Answer message. I phone the Regent Street number – but now diverted to the Netherlands. I ask that they pass him a message to call me. We can’t do that. After persisting, OK we’ll take your email address and someone will email you. No email. I ask the same thing a week later. No email. Clearly the manager, if he is still there, has been told not to answer emails, telephone calls, etc.I need to buy my wife a winter coat and I can guarantee it will not be a CG one, probably a Froccella or Pyrenex.But why would CG worry about customer service. Their products are much in demand. They deliberately starve supply to try to increase that demand. Their customer service is the worst in the business. If you know what you want and don’t care about back-up, go ahead and take a chance. But do read these reviews, it’s not a co-incidence that they get 1* for 15 out of 16 reviews, and be prepared for a truly shocking customer experience if you ask them to go the extra mile because you need help. I should add I have nothing to do with the animal rights lot.

Name: Candy
Review: Their service is worst than 1 star. They don't even deserve one star.They have the worst customer service ever!!!! I called Canada Goose regarding my online purchase. Probably my english was not as fluent. But the way how they talk and yelling back at me. I have never experience anything like this. I even talk to the manager too. The manager was super rude. I order two jackets online and i received them. But i realize that both jacket does not have the exterior logo. I called just to verified that does the jacket comes with the CG logo or not. cause I assume all the CG jacket comes with a CG logo on the should sleeves.Which they told me it doesn't come with it. so I said i saw it online at sporting life website. both jackets, it shows online it has a CG logo on the sleeve.I end up returning both of the jackets. Bad customer service.

Name: jim
Review: I will never buy Canada Goose again !!  Terrible customer service !! I never received my order from them and all they say is oh well. Finally got my refund as they said the order was cancelled because of lack of inventory. While their site and customer service said there is inventory. Just terrible service. I will go out of my way to inform as many people and stores such as Moosejaw and Backcountry not to sell/buy their product.  Arcteryx is just as good if not better with better customer service.

Name: Lauren Ansay
Review: Horrible experience with Canada Goose. I placed a $1300 order and paid for express shipping. I talked to a representative and they said it would ship the next day, called everyday subsequently because it hadn’t shipped and after almost a week THEY CANCELLED MY ORDER. (Which I found out by calling them, I was not notified by the company) They said that they never had the jacket to begin with and there was a glitch in their system. After a fruitless transaction, lots of frustration and time consuming phone calls I’m still jacketless. I’ll be buying a parka elsewhere.

Name: Ashley
Review: Horrible customer service. I originally ordered a jacket for myself that cost $925 and didn’t receive an email confirmation back stating the order was placed but my cc was charged so after a couple days I called to find out if the order processed and if it had shipped. They told me that the order was processing still it sometimes may take up to 3 business days to process (crazy) so I said no worries I’ll call back if I don’t receive a shipment notification so Day 3 I call back and apparently it was still processing and I should receive some kind of correspondence by end of day. That next day (day 4) I ended up receiving my jacket. Still didn’t receive an email with an order number nor tracking but hey at least I got my coat. For the money I wasn’t crazy about the style so I figured I would return and purchase another style. I went to place another order but my cc declined the purchase bc of the amount $925 they wanted to confirm I was making that purchase so I confirmed with my cc company and tried placing the order again and it went through. This time I received and email confirming my order was placed however an hr later I received another email saying that my order was cancelled due to in quotes:“Unfortunately we were unable to verify the legitimacy of your payment information. “ Thinking this was a glitch since my cc did reach out to verify my purchase, I tried to purchase this coat AGAIN. Once again the order goes through saying it was placed and received an email again confirming. This time I think I’m in the clear so I go to bed. I wake up the next morning to the same exact INVAILD PAYMENT email so I end up giving their customer service a call to see if they can place the order for me and to express the troubles I had been having trying to placing this order. At this point all I want is my jacket and now I wake up to find the size color and style I want is now unavailable. Of course now I’m upset and have all these pending charges on my cc account. When I finally speak to customer service they tell me that my account has now been red flagged bc of the amount of times I tried to place this order. I’m like now even if I did want to place the order in a size down I couldn’t bc my account under my name has been red flagged. They told me to try again in 2-3 business days and they couldn’t do anything to override this. I hang up and order the coat under my boyfriends name number and debit card and the order goes through, I receive an email confirmation, and think this time I should be good. I ordered the jacket on Monday and received an email today FRIDAY that my order has been cancelled due to the size I requested is out of stock. Of course now I’m really upset. I go onto the website and see that the size I originally requested is now available again but only 2 sizes are left so I call customer service immediately and explain once again my frustrations, and ask to please change the order to my original size however they were unable to recover the cancellation and would need to place a new order. I explained that I had problems placing the order before but they told me 2-3 business days so he confimed the information with his manager and proceeded to place the order under my name and cc since I was at work. I requested express shipping at their expense since I had expected the coat soon. They said they would put the request in to “headquarters” and I would receive the $40 refund due to all my troubles. Again I just wanted to purchase this coat. I already had 2 pending transactions on my one cc. Another pending transaction from my original order awaiting the refund and my boyfriend also had a pending order on his cc. Totaling $3700 in pending transactions. He went to place the order and my order didnt go through. He tried it again and it didn’t go through but it went through to my CC bc it was showing up as an additional 2 transactions now totaling about $5600 in pending transactions. I ask to speak to a supervisor. The supervisor expresses that she “understands” my frustrations but there is nothing they can do. She offers to call the nyc flagship store and see if the coat is available but I had already told her that I went and the availability was scarce. I was disconnected from that call. I call back later that day to speak to a manager but they were not in the office but she will make sure someone calls me Monday. In the meantime I have my brother try placing the order for me online but this time in a different color since BLACK was completely unavailable at this point. Thinking to myself why do I continue to try.. but he places the order under his cc and received the same exact INVALID PAYMENT email I received  What do I do at this point. I’m so disgusted by this company and if it wasn’t for the quality I would have never attempted to purchase this item as many times as I’ve TRIED.

Name: Catherine Bruce
Review: I.m not happy with service,  I ordered a coat  and have received nothing from this company, I have tried to  e mail this company and now can.t get in to the e.mail at all, they have taken my money and sent no  goods..

Name: guti
Review: Non existent customer service.... they claim free delivery and free return but you will have to hunt them down like a dog to receive your return label.It happened twice after few emails and few calls i finally received the label for the collection only it was wrongly booked and again i had to chase them to make it right. Probably the worst customer service i have seen, you would expect at least a decent service when you purchase something that expensive.i will never buy from them again

Name: Lucinda Lyn-Jones
Review: I am appalled that this company use coyote on  their garments! Not acceptable in this day and age!

Name: Vivien Someya
Review: Horrible vile company who murders coyotes and geese for their ugly jackets. Just do your own research how these animals are treated.

Name: Andrew Orr
Review: Their treatment of the geese is absolutely horrific, and is the subject of numerous investigations, for example by PETA. Hopefully more and more people are becoming aware of this and will stop buying their clothes.

Name: Tamara Coche
Review: I ordered a jacket that does not fit me so I wanted to send it back. I wrote to the customer service and asked for the return label. I received an email with a phone number to call them back. I tried to call but my call did not get through because I called from a different country. I wrote to the assistant and told her just to send the label. She said without phone number she could not send the label due to policy. But the terms do not say you have to leave the phone number so the DHL person could pick the parcel up. I told her it is much more convenient for me to drop it off at a post office (I checked with them earlier and it was ok). I still have no label. She send me the terms and conditions and hers are also not stating I need to send a phone number. The downside is: I cannot just send the jacket back because the terms state: they need a return label to handle it...Worst customer service in the WORLD! And I just want to return the jacket...

Name: Armin Brendal
Review: I have bought a Chateau Parka jacket from this store, and ship to Germany through a package Forwarding Company Global shopaholics. Jacket material was very good, and it was not expensive as well

Name: John Perkins
Review: Abominable customer service.Their products may be amazing, they are certainly very expensive.  Sadly their customer service is truly appalling.  Here's my recent experience.  My wife ordered a jacket that, on arrival, was defective.  I called and then emailed them a photo.  Did they call back with options as they promised?  Hell no.  All I got was an email telling me to send it back and wait days for a refund.  I called back, spoke with several staff whose grasp of English and their foreign accent made it difficult to understand.  Their hands were tied.  In compensation i was promised a Canada Goose hat for my wife.  A week later it had not arrived.  The first person I spoke with told very clearly that sending the hat was dependent on them receiving back the faulty garment.  This was not made clear to me at the time so I insisted on speaking to the supervisor who had promised the hat.  He then told that sending the hat was NOT dependent on getting the jacket back.  He had ordered the hat that day and had no idea why it had not arrived and had no way of finding out why it had not been sent.  What a fiasco.  I then insisted on speaking to a manager, but there was none available for 2 hours (this was at 12 pm, so may be they take 2 hour lunch breaks.  I asked to get the manager to call me today. Will it happen.  Somehow, based on my experience so far, i am not holding my breath.  Advice.  if you want a Canada Goose jacket, do not buy it from Canada Goose.

Name: L
Review: Bought a jacket online but when received it there were feathers coming out all over the place. Called up to return jacket and get refund that was 3 months ago. Had to threaten legal action to get them to send return instructions and get refund. Customer services are completely inept, they don't respond to emails and give the excuse that they are busy therefore you have to call them in mainland Europe which costs a fortune.  Absolute con
